1a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter bzhugs/
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sa ma sA dA naM sid+d+ha so
1b2(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ba ni d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpel gsang ba 'dus pa'i
2a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//
2a2(rgyud 'grel): zab gsal gnyis med dag pa'i bdag nyid kyis// bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i sku// dpal ldan chos kyi
2a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi phyag rgya la// rgyal sras rgyu dang bcas pa rab 'byung zhing // rtag sogs rgyu 'das khams kun rab bkang nas/
2b1(rgyud 'grel): ji srid bar du don mdzad rgyun mi 'chad// khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' de dang ni// de yi sras rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu kun khyab
2b2(rgyud 'grel): pa// snying ga'i dbus bsam de la brtan sogs skye// chos bdag khros pas kyang ni mi gnon pa// mi shigs thig le gang yin rtogs par mos// blo dang ldan pa
2b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi pad+ma kha 'byed pa// rmongs pa sreg byed snying ga'i mun pa sel mdzad pa// yon tan dag pa'i mkha' la rgyu zhing 'jigs bral mdzad// bla ma dam pa rnams kyi
2b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga rgyal gyur cig/ dang ldan gsang 'dus mtsho chen las// bla ma'i brgyud rim gru gzings kyis// yid bzhin nor bu rnam pa gsum// sman pa'i zhab kyis rnyed pa'o// de rnyed dpe mkhyu
3a1(rgyud 'grel): spangs byas te// 'di ni thun mong cig shos kyi// dngos grub 'byung phyir gter 'dra ba// phan phyir bdag gis brtsam par bya// gzhung gzhan spangs te bla ma'i brgyad rim gyis// dpal dang ldan pa'i mnyam 'dus
3a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs// dam pas gsol ba btab phyir rab brod cing // dad pas ci nus bdag gis bshad par bya// de la kha cig ni yang dag pa'i man ngag dang bral ba rnams ni dam pa ma yin par mkhas pa grags pa rnams la bla ma nyid du//
3a3(rgyud 'grel): khros blangs nas de'i lam la zhugs te/ dka' thub dang smang ba dang / brtul zhugs la sogs pas don dam pa gcig po la dpyod cing / 'di snyam du bdag gi rgyu'i 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu skyes kyang / de rnams
3a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis stong pa'i dngos po ni yod pa nyid de/ de tsam zhig brtags pas mngon du byed kyang / dngos po la don dam par zhen pas stong pa nyid mi shes te grol ba dang rgyang ring du 'gyur ro// ji skad du/ stong pa nyid ni ma shes pas// kun las
3a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das nges mi shes// dngos dang dngos med rnam 'jig pas// stong pa nyid ni shes par bya// zhes 'byung bas so// yang kha cig dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad zin kyang / dam pa ma yin pas de'i lam la zhugs te/ bdag la sogs
3a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bral ba'i phung po dang skye mched dang / khams rnams mi rtag pa la sogs par 'jig cing / sdom pa'i snod la brten te/ zhugs pa la sogs pa'i lam gyi phung po la sogs pa la grol nas lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / lhag ma med
3b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du byed do// 'di yang ma rig pa dang 'brel ba'i phyir 'bras bu phyir ldog pa can zhes bya ste/ de yang ji skad du/ rtsa ba'i rnam shes leg gyur nas// lhag bcas lhag ma mad 'gyur ba'i// rnam grol 'bras
3b2(rgyud 'grel): bu thob 'gyur yang // mngon du rgyu ba med pa yi// ma rig bag chags dang 'brel phyir// rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mchos// de la thugs rjes bzung ba'i phyir// dpal ldan go cha'i 'od zer dang // phyag gis dbu la reg mdzad nas//
3b3(rgyud 'grel): de yi ro myang zlog mdzad de// yang dag lam la 'dzud par mdzad// ces gsang po'i rim pa che ba las gsungs so// yang kha cig ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa dang phrad du zin kyang / de rnams kyis brgyad rims 'khyud pas/ sbyin pa
3b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu skal pa mi nyung bar bsags nas/ sa'i de bzhin nyid du mngon du byed cing rims kyis sa bcu mngon du mthar thug par byed do// de'i sprul pa'i sbyor bas dga' ldan gyi gnas nyid du skye ba len pa dang /
3b5(rgyud 'grel): gling la sogs pa la gzugs par mdzad nas yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa dang / lhums nas bltams pa dang / gzhon nu rol pa mdzad pa dang / khab bo zhes pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas byung ba dang / rab tu byung ba dang / dka'
3b6(rgyud 'grel): ba spyad pa ston pa dang / de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon rang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i man ngag rang rig chos kyi sku mngon du byed par bstan pa'i phyir/ til gyi gang bu bzhin du ched du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
4a1(rgyud 'grel): sku bstan te/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya snang nas/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i tsho gas rtsa ba'i ye shes dmigs pa dang bral ba/ sbyor ba gnyis kyi bdag nyid/ sngon dang phyis kyi sbyor ba mngon du byas te/ bdud
4a2(rgyud 'grel): la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa mdzad do// don de lta bu'i snod dkon par gzigs nas/ sba bas mjed de sangs rgyas pa'i tshul ser mthong bar mdzad do// bla ma chen po'i zhal snga nas ji skad du/ ci'i phyir shAkya
4a3(rgyud 'grel): thub pa yis// grangs med bar du tshogs bsags kyang // 'di don ma gtogs nai rany+dzar// ci yang ma yin ting 'dzin gnas// de tshe bde gshegs kun gyis kyang // thal byung blo chags de bzlog ste// nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rnam dag pa'i
4a4(rgyud 'grel): zab gsal gnyis med rab bstan te// nam phyed dus su rgyal ba ltar// de nyid bsgoms pas tho rangs su// skad cig gis ni yang dag rtogs// byang chub snying por zhugs byas nas// dpung chen bdud rnams rab bcom ste// sems can
4a5(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar bya ba'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// de nas bzung ste don mchog 'di// skal pa ldan pa 'ga' zhig la// zhal nas zhal dang snyan nas snyan// brgyud de nges pa'i don bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de bas na sangs rgyas thams
4a6(rgyud 'grel): cad sangs rgyas pa'i tshul 'dis shes par bya'o// gal te lam gzhan gyis sangs rgyas pa srid na ni// de'i tshe bla dang bcas par 'gyuraro// de bas na 'bras bu sku gsum ni gcig kho na ste de'i lam ni sngags kyi spyod pa 'di'o// ji skad du
4b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mjed byang chub pa'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// gzhal med ye shes thob pa ni// rdo rje sngags kyi don sgom yin zhes 'byung bas so// sngags kyi spyod pa la mos pa de dag kyang gzhir
4b2(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o// kha cig ni phyi'i gtsang sbra la sogs pa dang / bdag gi de kho na nyid la sogs pas lhag pa'i lha mnyes par byas par byas pas mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyam su myang bar byas nas/ bsod nams dang ya shes kyi tshogs
4b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do// yang kha cig ni phyi'i gtsang sgra la sogs pa bya ba dang / bya ba ma yin pa spangs nas/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mngon par
4b4(rgyud 'grel): mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong nas/ tshogs gnyis bsags nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do// yang kha cig ni gtsang sbra la sogs pa smad cing / nang gi rnal 'byor dam tshig sems dpa' dang / phyi rol gyi ye shes sems dpa' phyag
4b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya bzhi dang ldan pa mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rang gi lha mnyes par byas pas/ mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong nas/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do// de
4b6(rgyud 'grel): dog kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu la mos pa'i gdul bya gzung ba'i phyir thabs gsungs pa ste/ phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig byed pa yin par shes par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig byed pa ni 'di lta ste/ gang dag sems ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pI/
5a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pas skad cig re re la yang snod dang / bcud lam dang / 'bras bur bcas par sbyang bar byed cing / rnal 'byor dang phyag rgya la brten nas cha
5a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid las rab dang rab kyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ba la som nyi med pas bla na med pa'o// de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni dpal ldan 'dus pa ste/ ji lta bu zhe na/ chos phung brgyad khri bzhi steng dag/ 'dus phyir snod yangs dam pa'o// rmongs
5a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mun nag sel bas na// sgrol ma'i mchog ni 'di yin no// rta rgod lta bu'i sems 'dul byas// 'thad pa'i srab skyebs mchog yin no// rnam shes glang chen yan lta bu// 'gugs phyir lcags kyu dam pa'o// rnal 'byor mchog tu nges pa yi//
5a4(rgyud 'grel): dam sdom can gyi tshong 'dus so// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las// sgrol byed gu ni chen po'o// mngon mtho nges legs khang bzang gis// steng du phyin byed tham skas so// rnam rtog las byung nyon mongs kyi// grong khyer 'joms shing grol ba yi//
5a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo skyong phyir rgyal po'o// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen pos// nye bar bstan pa'i mdo sde dang // de 'dadra'i tshul len rgyud 'di ni// kun gyi phyi ma gsungs pa ni// don rnams de ru gtan la phab// 'di don sgom byed rnal 'byor pa// ma 'ongs rdo rje 'chang ba
5a6(rgyud 'grel): bsad dga'o dang rtsod pa med pa dang // srung ba dang ni dran pa dang / bag yod pa yis brtson bya'o// de lta bu'i gzhung de la rtog pa mngon du gtong ba'i nyan pa po rnams mkhas len pa'i yan lag dang / gleng gzhi phun sumi tshogs pa'i rnam par bshad pa
5b1(rgyud 'grel): gang zag gzhan yid brtan du rung bar bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don du bshad pas der zhes bya'o// ye shes las sprul pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la rgyud kyi don ji ltar bstan pa yang der shes par bya ste/ de'i phyis 'byung
5b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don rje btsun rnams kyis snod du rung bar byas pa'i gang zag la rgyud kyi don ji ltar bsdus te bstan pa de sgrub thabs kyi rim pa 'dir rgyas par bshad par bya'o// de la dang po snying rje'i stobs las skyes// byang chub sems ldan sbyin pa la sogs
5b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i 'khor lor cho ga bzhin// dbang bskur snang ba thob pas rim 'di bya// gang zhig dgon pa chen po'i a phyogs sogs// gang rung gnas su stegs bu gru bzhi pa// tsan mchog sogs byugs nas bde ba'i stan// rdo rje skyil mo
5b4(rgyud 'grel): kruklung 'dug byasam gtan bya// dang po tho rangs nyi dbus su// stong sogs kyis dag mthing ga'i hUM// 'od zer gyis mthong yul dmigs te// snying rje la sogs bsgom par bya// 'od zer gyis gsal sangs rgyas dang // bla ma la sogs mdun du dmigs//
5b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i// mchod pa'i sprin spro phyag kyang 'tshal// gang zhig thog med dus nas srid pa'i chu rgyun la// rtog pas rnam par bsgos pa'i sdig pa ma lus rnams// thugs rje cher ldan khyod kyi mdun du yang // gsum du dmigs pa
5b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal te bshad par bgyi// sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa gzhan rnams kyi yang dge ba dang // ma lus bdag gis de dag yi rang nas// bla med yang dag byang chub phyir bsngo'o// spros med thugs ni zla ba lta bu ste//
6a1(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas don du thabs kyi sku chen po// rtag tu bdag gi yid dang dbyer med pa// bde bar gshegs la rtag tu skyabs su mchi// rtog pa kun las nges par grol ba yi// dam pa ma lus kun gyi phun tshegs rten
6a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos po kun gyi ngo bo gcig pa po// chos la bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi// bcing ba ma lus rnam par spangs pa yi// dpal ldan snying rje mchog gis rab drangs pa// rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab gnas pa'i// 'dul ba'i
6a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bsam pa dag pas rnam smin dag pa yis// sgrib pa'i bag chags ma lus kun bcom ste// mi 'phrogs pa yis brgyan pa'i sems kyis kyang // byang chub tu ni sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sras
6a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i dge bar gshegs pa yi// thun mong lam ste pha rol phyin pa bcu// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yid kyis ni// da ltar 'dir ni bdag gis bsten par bya// sdug bsngal la gnas sems can rnams// snying rjes yang ni dmigs
6a5(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ byang chub sems ni dpag med pa// rin chen bdag gis bsam par bya// rang bzhin med phyir stong pa nyid// rgyu med pas na mtshan ma med// rjes su dpag pa dang bral bas// smon med nyid du nges pa'o// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/
6a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags des bdag gzhan dngos po gsum// gcig byas de nyid gsum mtshan mo// dgyes mdzad yos mar sbrengs pa yi// mdun gyi mkha' bsam par bya// stong las nyi dkyil hUM nag las// rdo rje zer 'phros phyi rol bcad// 'og dang phyogs mtshams
6b1(rgyud 'grel): steng spros pas// sa gzhir ba bla rar bskyed// bruM 'khor rtsibs bcu 'od zer drag/ pad nyir khro bo 'khor lor bsgom// de dbus hUM mdzad rtag pa sogs// gnas gyur de las chos 'byung bskyed// gru gsum dkar po gyen la gnas// sna tshogs 'od
6b2(rgyud 'grel): zer phyogs bcur 'phro// mkha' yi dkyil du pad+ma dang // sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya// de dbus zla steng bruM las skyes// 'khor lo bru~M mtshan las byung ba// rig ma dang bcas snang mdzad las// gyur pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom// gru bzhi la
6b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs yon tan ldan// sna tshogs pad+ma bcu dgu'i steng // nyi ma'i gdan ni bdun dag dang // zla ba'i gdan ni bcu gnyis bskyed// de nyid gsum gnas sems babs pas// bde gshegs rnams kyis de la gzigs// rang gi khams su shes
6b4(rgyud 'grel): rab thabs// dbyangs yig bde ba'i yi ger 'gyur// dbu rtse la byon ye shes sems// 'dres gyur rten babs zla gnyis gyur// 'du zhing 'phro ba'i sbyor ba las// gcig tu gyur pa bsam pa'o// de las hUM dkar las byung ba// rdo rje rtse lnga me shel
6b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs// phyogs kun 'od zer 'phro bsams nas// hUM bcas ldan pas nga rgyal bya// oM badz+ra At+ma ko haM/ de las 'phros pas bde gshegs kyis// 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid du byas// slar 'dus thugs kyi rdo rje las// btsud nas bdag la nga rgyal
6b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ oM ya thA sarba ta thA tasta thA a haM/ sa bon gsang gsum rdo rjer gyur// gcig gyur rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ 'gro kun ro mnyam gcig pa po// kun tu bzang po bsgom par bya// sku dang dbus zhal zla nor 'dra// g.yas nag g.yon ni dmar
7a1(rgyud 'grel): po la/ rin chen sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa'i// phyag gnyis rang snang shes rab 'khyud// g.yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri ste// g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o// mkhyen byed mtshan mtshan ma dbu rgyan la// mi bskyod pa yis brgyan pa
7a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// de nas 'dod chags chen po yis// 'dul ba'i 'jig rten gzigs gyur nas// sbyor ba'i sgra yis rang lus la// rnam snang la sogs gzhug par bya// de ni spyan ma la sogs dang // gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi bdag/ rnam pa dgu
7a3(rgyud 'grel): nispyi byas nas// rang gi shes rab nyid la thim// shes rab de yi pad dkyil du// bde las sprul pa'i 'khor lo bskyed// gzigs 'gyur 'gro ba ma lus pa// snod du rung phyir gzhug par bya// rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyi// na mkha'i khyab pa'i bde gshegs
7a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ zla ba lta bur zhu byas pas// de rnams dag phyir dbang bskur bya// de yi stobs kyis de dag rnams// bde dang yid bde thob pa dang // tha mal phung sogs bshig pa'i phyir// zla ba lto bur zhu ba'o// de la mig la sogs pa rnams// kAM tri khaM gi ske
7a5(rgyud 'grel): saM gyur// de bzhin gzugs la sogs pa rnams// dza hUM baM ho khi ro gyur// sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dag/ laM maM paM taM du ni gyur// gzugs sogs phung po'i bdag nyid rnams// bru~M AM dzaM khaM hUM du gyur// de las mtshan ma de yis mtshan// de
7a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams sa sgying la sogs par// khams kun 'dus par byas nas su// dris shing rtogs phul mi sgyu 'dug/ da ni pad+ma'i gzhal yas nas// phyi rol byung nas bstod nas ni// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs kyis so// rang rang khams su 'grus par bsams
7b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas par ma'i sems can rnams// skar ma lhung zhing zhal zhugs nas// rdo rjer phyung nas pad+mar gnas// shes rab chags pas de zhu byed// da mo 'od zer dmar 'gros pas// yab yum byang chub sems su zhu// de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs// glu mas
7b2(rgyud 'grel): bskul nas thim par byed// sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pa bdag la skyabs su gsol// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed no// sems can yab chen
7b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor los sems can kun la phan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog tu rab tu phan par gzigs// mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na// spyod pa dri
7b4(rgyud 'grel): med kun tu bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod// khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba// 'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson// mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na// spyod pa dri med kun tu
7b5(rgyud 'grel): bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod// khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan yon che// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs la// mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhad na// yon tan rin chen
7b6(rgyud 'grel): mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod// glu 'di yi ni dor byas nas// zhu ba phun sum tshogs bral ba// zla nyir gyur te yi ge hU~M// rdo rje sngon po kun zad gdengs// des mtshan bshes gnyen nu byas pas// sku dang zhal dbus mthing ga'i mdog/ g.yas
8a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar g.yon ni dmar po la// dam pa dang po'i mtshan mar ldan// dam pa ma yin rnam rtog rnams// stong pa nyid du bsam byas te// mya ngan 'das pa zhen spang phyir// chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab// oM d+harma d+hA tu s+t+ra b+hA ba
8a2(rgyud 'grel): At+ma ko hUM/ sa snying rdo rje na mkha' dang // dbang phyug sgrib sel kun bzang rnams// k+Shi la sogs pa'i rim pa yis// mig la sogs par dgod par bya// de bzhin snying mgrin mgo zla la// hUM AHoM las skyes pa yis// lte bar thugs rdo rje sogs
8a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyod de/ di rnams thugs ka nas byung ba'i// gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs 'od kyis// ma lus rdo rje gsum mchod nas// byin gyis brlab phyir gsol ba btab// dpal ldan thugs ni rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// dang bdag byin gyis
8a4(rgyud 'grel): brlabs nas su// rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// dang bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga
8a5(rgyud 'grel): ti tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba badz+rI At+ma ko haM/ chos kyi gsung lom dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje gsung dang 'dra bar mdzod// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/
8a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje me phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje gsung can mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta wAg badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pos// deng
8b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rjeswA du ldan par mdzod// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rgyum phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje sgra can mdzad du gsol// oM sarba d+ha thA ka tA rmA
8b2(rgyud 'grel): ya badz+ri swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ ye shes sems dpa' sa bon gyis// 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i mgon po bskul// de mi 'od zer las byung ba'o// spyan la sogs pa mchog rnams kyis// bdud rtsi lnga yos chus gang ba'i// bum pas dbang bskur ba/
8b3(rgyud 'grel): shis sgra// dri dung dril sogs rol mo sgra// dbu rgyan rdo rje 'chang ldan bya// de bzhin zla ba gnyis la sogs// 'gro ba'i dbang bskur ma gtogs pa// thams cad sngon bzhin bshes gnyen dang // gzugs kyi khyad par shes byas nas// byin gyis
8b4(rgyud 'grel): brlab cing mig la sogs// sa snying sogs bkod rdo rje gsum// gnas gsum mtshan la dbu rgyan la// rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshon pa'o// mgo snying lte ba gsang rkang par// oM hUM swA AHhA rnams sam// cha shas ngo bo nyid kyis ni// sangs
8b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas lnga yis dgang bar bya// hUM las rdo rje chu skyes ni// rtse lnga 'dab brgyad bsam par bya// oM as nor bu ge ser bskyed// phaT kyis gnyis kyi lam 'gog pa'o// mtshan nyid lnga dang ldan bsams nas// bde mchog myong bar bya ba'i phyir//
8b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi shes rab la zhugs nas// dbang po gnyis sbyar rjes chags byas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin to// thugs dka'i sa bon 'od lcags kyus// sangs rgyas 'khor lo mkha' khyam
9a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjer phyung // pad gnas zla ba lta bu'i gzugs// de las sa bon hUM bcu dgu/ mi bskyod pa yi 'khor lo mchog/ gsal bar bsams nas 'gro ba kun// phan phyir rims kyis dbyung bar
9a2(rgyud 'grel): bya|badz+ra d+hika gis rab bskul la// gong ma lta bu'i mi bskyod pa// sangs rgyas mdzad pa byas na su// 'dus nas bdag la zhugs par bsam// dza na dzika gis rnam snang 'byung // dkar nag dmar po phyag drug pa// 'khor lo ral gri rin chen
9a3(rgyud 'grel): padang / 'dus nas shar gyi zla bar bsam// rat+na d+h+r-ika gis rin chen dbyung // ser nag dkar po phyag drug pa// rin chen ral gri 'khor lo pad// 'dus nas lho yi nyi mar bsam// A ro lig gis 'od dpag med// dmar nag dkar po phyag
9a4(rgyud 'grel): drug pa// pad+ma ral gri rin chen 'khor// slar 'dus nub kyi nyi mar bsam// pradz+nyA d+h+r-i// gis don yod grub// ljang nag dkar po phyag drug pa// ral gri 'khor lo rin chen pad// 'dus nas byang gi nyi mar bsam// dang po rang gi rig ma 'khyud//
9a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan kun brgyan pa'i na bza' dang // rin chen sna tshogs dbu rgyan can// gdan lter 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lo// mo hA ra tis+ya spyan ma dbyung // sku yi rdo rje dang 'dra ba// 'khor lo ral gri rin chen pad// slar 'dus shar lhor zla bar bsam// dwe Sha ra tis
9a6(rgyud 'grel): mA mi kI/ thugs kyi rdo rje dang 'dre ba/ ut+pal rim gri rin cheni pade// 'dus nas lho nub zla bar bsam// rA ga ra ti sa gos dkar mo// gsung gi rdo rje dang 'dre ba// pad+ma ram gri rin chen 'khor// 'dus nas nub byang zla bar bsam// badz+ra ra tos sgrom
9b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dbyung // rin chen dbang phyug dang 'dra bA// At+pal 'khor lo rin chen pad// skur 'dus bya shar zla bar bsam// oM AHhUM gis lha mo drug/ go rim bzhin du dbyung bar bya// gzugs kyi rdo rje rnam snang 'dra// me long ral gri rin chen pad// sgra yis rdo rje mi bskyod/
9b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dra// mi byang ral gri rin chen pad// dr-i yi rdo rje rin chen 'dra// dung dang ral gri rin pa// ro yis rdo rje mtha' yas 'dra// snod dang ral gri rin chen 'khor// reg gi rdo rje don yod 'dra// gos dang 'khor lo rin chen pad// chos dbyings rdo rje sems dpa'o
9b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra// chos 'byung ral gri rin chen pad// me mtshams la sogs grwa bzhi dang // shar sgo g.yas g.yon zla steng bsam// ya mAn+ta kr-ita gshin rje gshed// mi bskyod lta bu phyag drug pa// tho ba ral gri rin chen pad// shar sgor khro dkyil nyi dbus dgod//
9b4(rgyud 'grel): pradz+nyA na ta kr-ita shes mthar byed// snang mdzad lta bu phyag drug pa// dbyug pa ral gri rin chen pad// lho sgor nye dbus nyi 'od 'bar// pad+mA na ta kr-ita rta mgrin ni// mtha' yas lto bu phyag drug pa// pad+ma rin chen ral gri 'khor// nub sgor nyi dkyil khro dkyil
9b5(rgyud 'grel): bas mad/ big+h+nAn ta kr-ita bdud rtsi 'khyil// mi bskyod lta bu phyag drug pa// rdo rje ral gri rin chen pad// byang sgor nyi dbus khro dkyil bsam// de rnams rgod dang gdangs pa dang // mche ba gtsigs nas bzhad byed pa// dbu skra da mar ser gyen du brdzes//
9b6(rgyud 'grel): stag lpags smad g.yogs dang ldan pa// gtum pa'i sbrul gyis brgyan pa yi// dang pos rig ma 'khyud pa dang // me yi 'od kyi 'khor lo nang // gtum po rab tu bsam pa'o// de ltar dngos po thams cad kyis// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
10a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong nas su// sa bon 'od zer lcags kyu yis// gshin rje gshed bskul 'khor lo dkug/ de dang lhan cig 'ongs pa'i bgegs// bskrad nas thim byas khro bo thim// bde bas rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor
10a2(rgyud 'grel): nimadun du dmigs la mchod par bya// dung gi chu yis bsang gtor dang // kun das kha bkab chus nye reg/ mchod yon snod kyis mchod yon dang // mtha' sogs dbye bas zhabs bsil lo// de bzhin khro bo gzhan bskul bas//
10a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis ni gzhug pa dang // gcing dang rje su dgyes bskyed pa// chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab// mes pas mig la sogs pa rnams// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bkod// snga ma bzhin du dbang bskur bas// rigs kyis dbang
10a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur bzhag pa'o// sangs rgyas bzhi po mi bskyod pa// lha mo rang rang bdag pos brgyan// rnam snang mi bskyod snang mtha' yas// mi bskyod sgo srungs mtshan pa'o// sa bon 'od kyis lha mo bkug/ zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjes phyung // pad+ma nang laM
10a5(rgyud 'grel): mo pau taM dang // dzaHhUM baM he khaM ra gyur// de yi 'od kyis bcu po dgug/ rang rang sa bon la zhugs pas// nus dang ldan par rab byas naso// shes rab bya spu'i bu gar spro// 'od rtsa gzugs rdo rje sogs na// rang rang mtshan mas rnam mdzes pa'i/
10a6(rgyud 'grel): dri med rgyun gyis brgyan pa'i sku// sgyu ma lta bur spro bar bya// de bzhin phyi yi bdug pa sogs// 'od rtse las spron mkha' khams// bkang ste bdag dang 'khor lo la// mchod pa bya ste mchod pa dang // mchod pa po dang mchod gnas gsum// rmi lam
10b1(rgyud 'grel): lta bur shes bya'i phyir// tha dad las ni grol bya nas// sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ de nas bag ca'i sgra lta bur// sgra yul thams cad rab bsams nas// rdo rje dril bu bde dbyangs
10b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis// rang yid lha yi bstod pa bsgom// mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam par snang mdzad dga' chen po// rdo rje zhi ba dga'
10b3(rgyud 'grel): pa che// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje na mkha'i dri ma med// dngos gnyis dag pas gos pa med// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che// mi rtog
10b4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// dag pa rdo rje gdon mi za// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod//
10b5(rgyud 'grel): rlung dang me oM dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma bana~M d+ha ra bdud rtsi lnga// zla ba nyi mar yi ge lnga// bsams nas 'od zer spro bya'o// rtag sogs bkug nas sa bon gzhug/ bzhu zhing bskol bas rlangs las hU~M// de byung rdo rje zhu byas nas// phreng ba'i rgyun tu dpag
10b6(rgyud 'grel): phar bsam// oM gyis bsil bar byas nas su// lha rnams phyag tu spro byas la// lce hUM las byung rdo rje bkod// snying zla'i 'khor lo tshim par bya// dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs 'od kyis//
11a1(rgyud 'grel): thubya pA'i dbang pos kun rtog spangs// 'gro kun sangs rgyas nyid byas nas// sa bon ldan thim par bya// thugs ka'i mtshan ma nang gnas pa// nyi ma'i dbus kyu ya ga hUM// 'od zer rnam pa lnga ldan pa'i// can ri 'bru tsam thig
11a2(rgyud 'grel): ler bsam// de yi 'od kyis gnas la sogs// rdo rje mchog gsum gsal byos nas// bzhag ste thig le lta bu ru// rang gi sems nyid zhugs par bya// de ma thag tu ting 'dzin gsum// grub pa rab tu bsam byas nas// de yi
11a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa las spro zhing // thig le yan chad gsal bar bya// bzhag pa pa spu las spro zhing // dkyil 'khor rten la sogs pa nas// khams kun bkang nas mtha' la bsdu// de ring yang ni spro bsdu bya// yang ni sa bon 'od kyis ni// /
11a4(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs bkug gzhug zhu gyur nas// rdo rje lam nas phyung nas su// ze'u 'bru bum pa'i nang du dbab// de las rdo rje mthib ga che// nas tshad lte bar rin po che// yungs kar ched tsam dbus su yang // rten bcas ting 'dzin gsum po/
11a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// rdo rje rje lnga lcags kyu yis// phyu ste sna rtser gnas pa bya// rdo rje nang nas thur sil rlung // byung ste gnas bya rnam pa gzhan// 'di yi ting 'dzin gsum pa las// spro bsdu gong ma bzhin du bya// dri la bzung bas stobs ldan na//
11a6(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa'i mtshan ma skye bar 'gyur// de skyes sprul pa 'phro ba ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rnam pa sna tshogs phyag mtshan rnams// yang nas yang du smra bsdu bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // ye shes sems
11b1(rgyud 'grel): sa bon las// gsang sngags bzlas brjod spro byed pa// rim pa 'am ni cig car bya// oM sogs re re brjod skad cig/ sku rdo rje la sogs 'khor lo// spros pas na mkha'i khams bkang nas// yan lag bcu gnyis gsum ldan mos// oM
11b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs re re brjod skad cig/ ma bskul gas dang gong ma ltar// dang pos phyung sbyin mkha' la// bkod nas gnyis pa gong ma ltar// mchod pa'i lha mo spro byas nas// 'khyud pa'i bde bas thub dbang rnams// bde chen dbang du gyur byas
11b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ gsum pas nang du thim par bya// rdo rje dang ni gsal ba dang // lam byung chos kyi 'khor lo las// steng du g.yas g.yon gnyi ga las// drag dang dal bar shes par bya// 'byung ba hU~M ste 'jug pa oM// gnas pa AHste de nyid
11b4(rgyud 'grel): bzung // ye shes sa bon ngo bo ste// bzhi rnams gcig tu brtsi bar bya// nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga lngas// bzhi bsdus brgya phrag dgu nyid do// de ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi rims// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o// phra myur rnams kyis ngal ba bsal//
11b5(rgyud 'grel): spyan sogs glu yis bskul byas nas// sngon bzhin 'khor lo mchod bya ste// sems kyi gzungs ni bstod bya ste// nyams chung spyi bar mtho gang tshad// zla steng oM gyis brlan pa yi// bdud rtsi cho ga bzhin phab pas// rdo rje gsum sogs tshim
11b6(rgyud 'grel): por byu// ba ma las byung ba'i bum pa bzang // zla gam phyed kyi kha bcad pa// thigs pa yid sbyin rin po ches// brgyan pa rkan gyi dbus su bsgom// 'od zer lnga ni rab 'bar ba'i// oM ni lce yi rtse la bsam// de gzer rim pas dbang byas pas//
12a1(rgyud 'grel): nus dang ldan pas bkras bsgom gzhom// bkres bsgom la sogs nyon mongs la// rnal 'byor de ni kun brtsams na// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// sdug bsngal thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur//
12a2(rgyud 'grel): cung zad ngal sos yul gzhan 'gro/ gong ma'i cho gas brtan bya'i phyir// rdo rje gsum sngags ma zhen par// gsang sngags bzlas brjod yang bya'o// ldang bar 'dod na sngags pa yis// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la// oM
12a3(rgyud 'grel): AHhUM nyid brjod byas la// de nyid gsum la 'khor lo bsdu// las kyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa yi// rig pa'i lta ba ma thob pa'i// sems can thugs rjes bzung ba'i phyir/
12a4(rgyud 'grel): smon lam 'di ni mngon du bya// dpal dang ldan pa'i mi bskyod mgon// rnal 'byor gyis thob dge ba gang // bde chen ye shes rang byung nas// sems can kun mkhyen par 'god shog/ gang zhig 'di mthong 'dod pa 'am// gang zhig
12a5(rgyud 'grel): zhu bar 'dod pa des// thugs kyi dbang phyug grangs med pa// mgon po de ni mthong bar shog+sa/ nam mkha' mtha' klus phyogs bcu ru// sems can kun gyi don stod la// ji ltar thugs kyi dbang phyug la// bdag gis kyang ni spyod par shog
12a6(rgyud 'grel): ji srid thog ma med pa nas// 'khor ba yi ni mthar thugs par// de srid sems can phan pa nyid// sangs rgyas spyod pa bdag spyod shog/ ji srid sangs rgyas sna tshogs rnams// 'jig rten pashes gnyen mya ngan 'das// de yi bsta
12b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don du ni// bskal pa'i bskal par byed par shog/ rdo rje 'chang sogs gzugs kyis ni// bdag gis phyogs bcur sprul gyur cig/ sngags kyi tshul gyis sems can rnams// de tshe bdag gis 'dul gyur cig/ ting 'dzin las ni
12b2(rgyud 'grel): langs nas ni// lha yi nga rgyal dang ldan pas// spyod yul sems tsam shes byas la// rang gi lha yi gzugs su dmigs// yang na spyod yul de dag nyid// rang rang dag pas gnas pa'o// so so rang rig chos nyid pas// rnam snang mdzad la
12b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs par snang // yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa ste// rang yid dga' bar byed pa'i phyir// dbugs rtog spangs nas rab bsgoms na// gas ba chen po mchod pa'o// rang gi kha zas za dus su// snying gar 'khor lo rab bsgoms la// bdud rtsi sha
12b4(rgyud 'grel): yi sbyor ba yis// gong ma lta bu ru sbyang byas te// de nyid gsum ni bzlas byas te// lce dang dbu rgyan mchog bsgoms la// lha rnams ma lus tshim pa yi// bsam pas nang gi sbyin sreg bya// phyi rol sbyin sreg dpag pa tsam// ye shes ma ni 'bar byed pas// /
12b5(rgyud 'grel): swAng+ga sogs thun pa'i thud shIng bsreg so// bla na med par bshad pa'o// ji skad gsungs pa'i sdom par ldan// ji lhur+ya myong bar mnyam par spyod// blo dang ldan pas do mo med pa// dus rlig byas la gsang bar bya// snying rjer gnas pas las
12b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis byed// 'gro ba'i don dang sangs rgyas mnyes// lus ngag tha mal khyad par can// phyag rgya sngags kyi bdag nyid // chos can gcig la ldog pa ni// sna tshogs rnam par snang ba yin// sdug bsngal bde ba grol 'byung ba// las kyi
13a1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par mang gyur yin// de phyir dag dang mi dge las// lus la sogs pa'i rtog las byung // kun rtog thams cad las grol ba// nag po'i lus su ga la 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa bskang don du// don
13a2(rgyud 'grel): yod rdo rje sbyor bsgoms te// thugs ka'i zla bar khom bskyed pa'i// sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya// gzugs sogs na mkha' bzhin dag nas/ rang bzhin 'od gsal sems bskyed de// bskul ba sngon du 'gro ba yi// dbang bskur byas
13a3(rgyud 'grel): pas dag por bya// bla ma brnyas pa'i skyon byung na// yon tan ldan pa'i ston mo dbul// sdig bshags la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i// sdom pa bzung bas snang bar bya// phyi yi khrus kyi cho ga la// rang gi rnal 'byor dmigs byas nas// dbang
13a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur gong ma bzhin bsgoms nas// mtha' ru bdag po bzhag pa'o// de ltar nyin phyed dus dang ni// phyi 'phreng du yang bsgom par bya// nam phyed dus su sa bon na/ bzlas pa'i bar du bskyed par bya// gshegs su gsol 'dod sngags pa
13a5(rgyud 'grel): yiyis// mchod pa bstod pa bdud rtsi myang // byas nas mtha' ru mu bzhag pa'i// yi ge gsum gyis gshegasu gsol// de bzhin yi ge gsum brjod pas// ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor lo la// phyi rol 'khor lo bcug byas te// shes rab
13a6(rgyud 'grel): snying rje ldan pas nyal// ldang ba'i dus na lha mo yi// dbyangs kyis bskul bsam langs nas su// sngon bzhin dus bzhir ting 'dzin gsum// rtse gcig pa yis thams cad bsgom// brel ba bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus dang por ni ting
13b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gsus// ma lus par ni bsgom byas la// yan lag rnams ni sngon bzhin bsam// de las gzhan pa'i dus dag tu// blo bur rang gi lbu bzhengs la// thugs las 'khor lo spro byas la// dbang bskung ban sngon bzhin rlung // mchod bstod bdud
13b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsi myang byas la// thig le 'am yang na phra mo 'am// sngags kyi bzlas brjod yang byas nas// 'khor lo bsdu ba sngon bzhin brtsam// de ltar zhugs pa rnam pa gnyis// rang gi lam gyis mi mthun phyogs// bzlog pas brtan pa'i rtags rnyed pas// las dang
13b3(rgyud 'grel): po yi rnal 'byor ro// de yis sku la dmigs pa yis// man ngag thob pas ye shes che// 'bebs thob rang dang gzhan mthong na// cung zad ye shes dbang gyur pa'o// dus 'dir mig dang lus sogs rnams// byin brlabs dbang bskur rab byas nas//
13b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes byas la// bzlas brjod spyir ba brtsam pa'o// ston bzhin du ni bsdu byas nas// sdom pa bskyang sogs snga ma bzhin// rgyun du gom bslabs bcu dang gcig/ mthu can stobs rtogs des dmigs pa'o// de yis gsung la
13b5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa yis// rlung gi rang bzhin rtogs mdzad nas// bdag dang gzhan gyis dkyil 'khor mthong // ye shes dbang du gyur pa'o// de la nyin mtshan rgyun du 'am// yi ge gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin// kun tu spyod las chos thams cad// dbyer med
13b6(rgyud 'grel): gong bzhin bsnyen byed do// 'di yis phyag rgya chen po yi// bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma gsum mthong nas// brtul zhugs la sogs rim 'di yis// sems dmigs rdo rje 'chang ba thob// 'di las gzhan pa bcu bzhi yis// bsnyen pa'i cho ga 'di bzhin//
14a1(rgyud 'grel): tad/ rang rang lha yi sbyor ba yis// 'og nas 'byung ba'i don brtson bya// de yan chad ni mngon du bsten pa bya ba'i chag rgyas par bshad zin te// / da na slob ma rnams la dbang bskur ba'i cha/
14a2(rgyud 'grel): ga pa shad par bya'o// de la gang gis dbang bskur zhe na// dang por zhugs dang dang po pa// thams cad kun gyis slob dpon no// cung zad ye shes dbang gyur pa// nus dang ldan pa'i slob dpon no// ya shas dbang du gyur pa ni// sbyor ba rnyed pa'i
14a3(rgyud 'grel): slob dben no// de rnams ci rigs mnyes byas nas// de yis dkyil 'khor brtsam pa'o// gang dag gi don du zhe na/ dad ldan gtong phod brtson 'grus ldan// snod rung srog la mi lta ba// tshe 'dir dngos grub thob 'dod pas// gnyis sam
14a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis bar du zhus// sku gzugs bris dang lngar so dang // glegs pa ma rdo rje la sogs dang // mchod rten la sogs gnas pa'i phyir// gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du zhus// gang dag sdig pa'i las dbang gis// mngon du 'am rmi lam
14a5(rgyud 'grel): dag tu ni// lha 'khrugs pa ya mtshan ma mthong // gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du zhus// mos mang brtan la dad pa can// gzhan la phan dga' mthong nas ni// ma zhus kyang ni de bos la// phan 'dod phyir ni dkyil 'khor bsam// de ci'i phyir
14a6(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ bum pa'i dbang gis rab sbyor bas// sa brgyad pa ru yang dag gnas// gang dag gsang ba'i dbang gis ni// dgu pa dang ni bcu par byed// shes rab ye shes dbang gis ni// rdo rje lta bur rab gnas pas// 'bras bu 'byung bar nus
14b1(rgyud 'grel): mau l+r-inau/ daung bau bzhi pau r-i shausau paur byaM// ra bau gnas mau gzugs brnyan la// thal bar brlag kyang 'bras bu maud// sdigasau dang br-i lau bau'i sbyin sreg bzho nau// l+r-isau nyon mongasau pau kha nau r-i zo // dau bau sau dzau sr-i gau nausau pau'-i br-i rau// mchod pany+tsau/
14b2(rgyud 'grel): rten du rung bya dang // 'khor los sgyur po bzhin de dag/ byin gyis brlab phyir brtsam pa'o// mngon bsags sdig pa dpag med rnams// skad cig gis ni zad byed pa// dkyil 'khor zhugs dang dbang bskur ba// de yis rab tu byed pas nas//
14b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyis kyang 'debs pa yi// cho ga zab mos sdig pa zad// mtshan ma'i 'bras bu mi 'byung zhing // gong gi yon tan ldan par mdzad// thabs ji ltar zhe na/ bdag nyid chen po de la gong du smos pas zhu ba gsol ba dang / khyod kyis spro bya rnams
14b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sam/ dI bar bya'o// des kyang kha cig ni tshogs/ kha cig ni ma tshogs zhes gsol nas/ 'dzab bzlas pa bya'o// 'phrul du dben par 'dug nas ni// lha'i 'khor lo bsgom byas la// tshogs 'phel bgegs ni zhi ba'i phyir// sngags kyi bzlas
14b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod byas pa yin// de nyid gsum par yi ge gzhug/ yang na dbyung ba bar du gzhug/ sgrub pa de 'am phreng sngags sam// rig pa dang bcas bzla bar bya// du mA rab tu bzla ba 'am// 'khor bdag 'bum ste rang lha'i 'bum// gzhan dag khri phrag bzlas
14b6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// bsam mam dngos su bka' thob bri// gsum pa bsrungs nas 'dzab bya ba// cho ga bzhin te rang gis bsam// sbyor ba dag gi dag byas nas// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri ba tsam// lha khang grong ngam skyed tshal gyi// byang shar mtshams ni ji lta bar/
15a1(rgyud 'grel): sharar+ya dang byang du dma' dza ya// mkhas pas san btsal bar bya// deng na bcas nas sa bskor te// lhag 'gyur yang ni rdzing 'dru ba// chus bkung ma g.yos g.yas su 'khyil// ma drangs 'khyil ba'i phur thus gzhis//
15a2(rgyud 'grel): der ni sa bdag phyogs skyong ba// phyogs su bskyed nas sngon bzhin du// gtor ma byin rlabs dbul byas nas// sa gsol byas nas gshegs su gsol// ting 'dzin rim pa gsum pos ni// dkyil 'khor 'khor sogs sta gon gnas// mchod
15a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod bdud rtsi myang ba dang // gtor ma yon dang phye mchod 'bul// sbyin sreg gis ni tsham byas nas// gsol ba btab ste na mkha' la// khung bu brko ba'i ched du yang // byin gyis brlab phyir dgod par bya// las kyi rdo rje slob ma yis// lto 'phye brtags
15a4(rgyud 'grel): nas 'dzer gyis klog/ mgrin pa lte ba pus me tsam// dngos grub rim pas brko bar bya// tho bas bong ba dag bkrugs nas// zhib mor brtags nas btsags nas su// shis pa'i phyir dang dge ba'i phyir// rin chen 'bru sman nang du gzhug/ de steng sa
15a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan las kyang // stegs bu khru gang spangs brtsigs nas// dam tshig lnga yis rab byugs te// steng rgyan sogs pas mdzes par bya// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ram// yang na bgegs dgra'i rnal 'byor gyis// dbang bskur blangs pas bgegs kyi
15a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs// bskrad pas nang nyid dag par bya// oM b+hu khaM gi sngags kyis ni// mkha' la ri rig bskyed par bya// b+h+rUM laM hUM zhes rdo rje'i bdag/ sa gzhir byas nas brtan par bya// oM me de ni badz+ri b+hA ba ban+d+ha hUM/ sngon bzhin spyang ba'i 'khor lo nas// rjes chags
15b1(rgyud 'grel): mtha' mos sbyor dang po// dkyil 'khor byung ste mnyes mdzad pa// dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog bdag nyid// 'khor lo gong dang 'og las byed// lus kyi rgyal mchog sbyor bdag nyid// nga yi dbang phyug mgon pa ni// ting 'dzin gsum rgya ma
15b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur yin// dpa' bo rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// thams cad dang ni bdag mnyam mo// rang bzhin gyis ni bdag dag go// rdo rje'i bdag nyid nga rgyal bskyed// 'khor los dbus su gnas pa la// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa yi// rtag sogs las kyi rdo rje yis
15b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod gnas dkyil 'khor gsol ba gdab// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi chos// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs//
15b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos mchog yang dag byung // ye shes spyod yul rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad
15b5(rgyud 'grel): du gsol// sems can kun gyis sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med// kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol// mi bskyod rdo rje khros byas nas// ma dang Ta las rang gi mig/ nyi zlar bskyed nas mig
15b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras hUM// rdo rje las spros sprul par bya// rkang mthil haM las rdo rje bskyed// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa dri la// 'gying bag mche gtsigs hU~M brjod cing // phyogs kun 'bar bar blta bar bya// g.yas brkyang g.yon brgyang zlum po dang // sa grwa bzhi ste sa
16a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa'i// rnal 'bor gyis ni phyogs bzhi ru// dang por rab tu brtsam pa'o// khro bo re res drug drug tu// phyogs bcu rnams su brtsam byas pas// 'khor lo bgegs kyi tshogs rnams ni// bskrad par gdon mi za bar 'gyur// rus sbal
16a2(rgyud 'grel): stabs dang rdo rje gar dang sgra// lcags kyu thabs dang ting 'dzin thabs dang mtha' yas thabs// gAshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal gyis gnas nas// shod+tha phyogs su rnal 'byor pas bya'o// rdo rje gdengs pa dang ni rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang // ral gri thabs dang
16a3(rgyud 'grel): phub kyi tshul dag dang // rdo rje skyil krung rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs// shes rab mthar byed kyi ni lho phyogs tsam// rdo rje 'joms tshul dang ni rdo rje ro lang so dang // rdo rje thabs dang mdung gi thabs dag dang // pad+ma'i 'dug stangs gsus po che yi thabs// rta ma grin gyis
16a4(rgyud 'grel): ni nub kyi phyogs su brtsam// rkang pa ya gcig stangs dang rdo rje tho ba dang // 'khor lo'i thabs dang sems dpa' skyil krung dang // sprin sgra dang ni gzhu yi thabs dang ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byang phyogs nas brtsam mo// seng ge thabs dang rdo rje gdu bu dang //
16a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dAn thabs dang thag mdung bskor ba'i thabs// bzang po'i 'dug stangs phur bu brdung ba yi// shar lho'i mtshams su 'dod pa'i rgyal pos brtsam// seng ge glal dang bud med sgyu 'phrul thabs// zhags pa'i thabs dang mchod sbyin pa yi thabs// cog
16a6(rgyud 'grel): bu'i 'dug stangs dang ni ra ba'i thabs// lho nub mtshams nas dbyug pa sngon pos partsam// rdo rje sgrog dang stobs po che gdengs dang // pad+ma'i stabs dang mtshon rtse gcig pa'i thabs// rtsa ba'i thabs dang mtshams bcings pa yi thabs// nub byung mtshams dang
16b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs pa ches brtsam mo// bung ba 'phur stangs zhal bzhir byin brlabs dang // gtun shing thabs dang mda' 'phangs pa yi thabs// dpa' bo 'dug stangs bkra shis rgyal mtshan stangs// byang shar mtshams nas mi g.yo mgon pos brtsams// rdo
16b2(rgyud 'grel): gsor ba dang ni rdo rje mche ba dang // be con thabs dang thag pa'i 'khor lo'i thabs// phyir 'gyed pa dang phyogs bcing ba yi thabs// steng gi phyogs nas 'khor lo sgyur bas brtsam// rdo rje sgeg pa dang ni rdo rje gad mo dang // mi 'jigs pa yi thabs dang phyag
16b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal ba yi thabs// phur bus gnas lngar gang ba dang mtshon cha lnga yi thabs// 'og gi phyogs nas gnod mdzes kyis brtsam mo// de rnams kyis ni bgegs kyis tshogs// ru dra'i bi bo sha nA dang // tshangs pa'i srin po gza' phur bu// gtso bo drug cu rtsa bzhi
16b4(rgyud 'grel): skrod// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson// bdag ni dpal rdo rje 'dzin// bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas// gal te gang gis bdag bka' 'goms// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis// 'dod gsum bskyed lus
16b5(rgyud 'grel): bshig bod de// 'jig par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// bgegs bsal bya phyir phur bu yang // stod ni kho bo smad zur gsum// bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsams nas su// dkyil 'khor dbus su gdab par bya// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn phaT/ kI
16b6(rgyud 'grel): la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ro adz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ de las 'od zer 'khrugs shing 'bar// phyogs bcu bdud bcom slar 'dus nas// mtshams dang ra ba gur bcing bas// dkyil 'khor
17a1(rgyud 'grel): sa ni spang ba'o// sau gnon phyag rgyas so la mun na// sa oM lha mo bton gyur nas// mnyag sogs pas mchod nas na// sman phyir gsal ba gdab par bya// grub pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyad pa'i tshul dang khyad
17a2(rgyud 'grel): par gyis// swa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang por gsol// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yos// ji ltar bdud kyi stobs bcom pa// de ltar bdag gis bdud bcom nas// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// de skad gsol nas zhal gyis
17a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhes// de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur// bdag nyid kyis ni gtsang gtor sogs// byas nas de ru nyal bar bya// mtshan mo gnyis pa'i cha dang por// dri zhim sogs kyis sa bskul la// me tog sil ma la sogs bkram// tsan dan mchog
17a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs maN+Dal bya// de ru ting nge 'dzin gsum mamra// yang na lhag par mos pa yis// rten dang bcas pa dam tshig gi/ dkyil 'khor rab tu dgod par bya// de nas bdag nyid spro bskyed la// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni// byin brlabs
17a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod dang bstod pa dang // bdud rtsi myang bas mnyes par bya// bum pa nag nog med pa la// mchu 'chang zhabs ni brtan pa dang // rdo rgyus chus byug nyi shu gcig/ yang na drug tu sta gon bya// mgur pa dar gyi cod pan mtshan// a mra la sogs
17a6(rgyud 'grel): khargyan can// spos bsreg dri zhom chu yis bkang // rang rang sngags kyis bzlas pa'o// 'bru lnga sman lngar rin chen lnga// 'khor lo dri mu yin snod bsti// mtshan ma lnga yis brgyan po yis// rnam rgyal bum pa bdag pos bzlas// rdo rje pargyas ba
17b1(rgyud 'grel): nas su me tog dgar po drug tar// bdag gi slob ma sems cad la// dbyung bsgyu mdzad cig gsol ba ga ba// bdud rtsi 'khyil bzlas zlum pa la// \u0f88\u0f90 shA'i bam por ba s+yA p+na y-is// shAdag gi slab ma thams cad la// byugags bzlog ga
17b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes snyan gsan dbab// de rnams byin gyis brlab byas la// thun gsum gtor ma phul nas kyang // mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la// so so'i sngags kyis mnyes par bya// 'khor lo sngon bzhin mchod byas la// lag par pog phor thogs nas//
17b3(rgyud 'grel): mo btsugs nas thal sbyar bas// dkyil 'a'akhor sogs la snyan gsan dbab// bcom ldan mi bskyod rdo rje yi// rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi snying rje'i dkyil 'khor ni// mgon po bri bar 'dod pa ste// slob ma rnams la phan
17b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir dang // khyed la mchod po'i don du ni// de bas bcom ldan gus bdag la// byin rlabs gnang bar mdzad par rigs// dgongs shing bdag la sangs rgyas dang // 'gro ba'i 'khor lo don byed rnams// 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
17b5(rgyud 'grel): glang zhig gzhan yang sngags kyi lha// lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang // 'byung po byang chub ston pa rnams// sems can bstan la mngon dga' ba'i// gang zhig rdo rje'i mig can rnams// che ge bdag ni rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems 'byung
17b6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar nyer spyod nus pa yis// 'gro dag don du bri bar bya// slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni// thugs rjes nye bar bzung nas ni// tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// snyan gsan lan gsum du gso
18a1(rgyud 'grel): nas// mchod pa la sogs rab sbyar nas// mtshams la sogs pa bcings nas ni// phyi rol byung nas slob ma bzung // shes rab chen po dga' chen po// nga rgyal med cing drin lan shes// rigs ldan yon tan dad pa che//
18a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mdog gzhon pas brgyan pa'o// gsang sngags kyi ni grub pa mchog/ 'dod pa rab tu ldan 'gyur na// dman pa'i rigs dang byad ngan dang // yon tan med kyang gzung bar bya// slob dang yid ches dang ldan dang // thig chen dga' ba'i bdag
18a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang // dkyil 'khor mthong dang sngags 'grub 'dod// tshogs 'phel phyir ni 'khor lor bzung // snod ldan 'khor ni bzhi po dang // 'di dang pha rol bsod nams 'dod// snod dang snod min rab bsgrags la// bdag nyid rang gi nang du 'gro/ ting
18a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin rdo rje chu skyes kyis// sbyangs pa'i slob mas khang pa'i sgor// thal mo sbyor ba byas nas ni// tshig 'dis lan gsum gsol ba gdab// ston chen khyod la bdag dga' bo// bstan po byang chub chen po'i lam// mgon po chen po bdag 'dod do// de
18a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol// bdag la byang chub sems kyang gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // skyabs su 'gro ba bdag la stsol// thar chen khang pa brtsegs pa ru// mgon po bdag ni gzhug par mdzod// de ltar brjod pas bla
18a6(rgyud 'grel): ma yi// slob ma gcig ni gtsor byas nas// de sogs rnams la tshig 'di yis// gzhug phyir brod pa bskyed par bya// bu tshur shog cig theg chen gyi// cho ga sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// tshul chen khyed kyis
18b1(rgyud 'grel): bsten par gyis// sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung ba// sku gsum thugs kyi rdo rje can// gzhal med ye shes thob pa ni// rdo rje sngags kyis don bsgoms yin// ci phyir dpag med sngags rnal 'byor// shAkya sing+ge sogs rab kyis// drag po chen po bdud kyi
18b2(rgyud 'grel): tshotshogs// dpung chen de dag gzhom byas nas// 'jig rten rjes 'jug rtogs na su// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de phyir blo ldan bu khyod kyis// thams cad mkhyen pa thob par gyis// de ltar bgyi zhes der 'dug nas// bla mas tshig gis byang chub
18b3(rgyud 'grel): sems// ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya// bskyed pa yin na 'phel bar bya// sdig pa bshags pa rjes yi ring // sngo dang gsol ba skyabs 'gro dang // byang chub sems bskyed lam bsten dang // smon lam gdab pa ston 'gro bya// 'khyil bzlas bsrungs nas
18b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum du// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma las// oM hUM AHni bkab byas la// rdo rje khu tshur dris chus byug/ spyi bor me tog mdun du spos// mor me'i dri ni snying gau ru// las kun byed pa'i sngags bzlas nas// mchod pa'i don du sbyin par bya// a shwat+tha dang u duM wa ra//
18b5(rgyud 'grel): me tog rtse mor sor bcu gnyis// drang po dri zhim gyis byugs pa// dngos grub bltas phyir sbyin par bya// ha cang ring min thung ba min// ku sha sngon po 'bus ma zos// rmi lam yi 'khrugs bkra shis phyir// nyag ma gnyis ni sbyin par bya// sum sgril mdud pa
18b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum byas pa// 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas pho yig g.yon// mo yi dpung pa g.yas pa ru// bsrung ba bya phyir bcing bar bya// 'khyil bzlas chu gtsang sbyor chu yi// kha bshal lan gsum 'thung bcug ste// byin chags gtsang bar bya ba dang // ngag gi
19a1(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa sbyang phyir sbyin// oM hrI bi shud+d+ha sarba d+harma bo so nga sa bo kalpa a pa na ya hUM/ phyir mi ldog dbang dkyil 'khor la// byin nas mgon po bdag la gsungs// dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid dang // slob dpon gyi ni phrin las dang //
19a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dong // gsong ba mchog gi sdom pa rnams// rtag tu dbang gi slob dpon bgyid// sems can kun don byed phyir stsol// de nas bla mas thun mong sdom// byin nas slob ma de yis kyang // rig dbang thob phyir lan gsum du//
19a3(rgyud 'grel): bka' stsal de ni blang bya'o// kun mkhyen gang du 'jig rten du// bde bar 'byung ba mi 'byung ba// u duM wa ba'i me tog bzhin// gal te brgya la ma re 'ga' 'byung // de bas thob dka' 'byung ba ni// gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'di ni// ci phyir dpag med
19a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can don// bla ma med pa byed nus pa// sa yang bskal pa du ma yi// sngon du byas pa'i sdig pa gang // de kun zad par 'gyur ba yin// dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong bas so// gang gzhung mtha' yas grags po yi// sngags kyi spyod pa l-i gnas nas//
19a5(rgyud 'grel): bla med go 'phang phyin pa ni// sngags bzlas pa las skye ba'o// gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la// blo gros gtan du mi g.yo ba// sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung ba yi// ngan 'gro de dag gis gcod do// de ring dpag med rnyed pa ni// bdag chen khyed rnams kyis
19a6(rgyud 'grel): thob ste// sras bcas rgyal ba kun gyis kyang // bston pa 'di la khyed rnams kun// thams cad yongs su bzung gnas pa'i// skye bar gyur pa bdag chen gyis// de phyir khyed kyis bdag chen la// bde ba skye bar 'ong 'gyur cig/ dpal ldan mchog
19b1(rgyud 'grel): gi theg pa 'di// chen por 'byung ba theg chen po// gang gis khyed cag 'gro 'gyur ba// de bzhin gshegs rnams 'od 'gyur la// zhal bzang khyed ni de rang 'ongs// sang ni 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen// mthong dka' nga yi thug rje yis//
19b2(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyis mthong bar 'gyur pa'o// kye bu dag nyon cig do nub ni// seng+ge nyal stabs bzhin du nyol// khyod kyis rmi lam dge mi dge mthong ba tho rangs bdag la smos// de ltar bgyi zhes rab gsol nas// de dag nyal bcug 'khyil pa yi//
19b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas dri chu byugs nas su// bsrung ba byas te gnas par bya// lhag par mos pas dkyil 'khor dmigs// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas te// bsdu zhing ye shas 'khor lo ni// kha sbyar dbus su mkha' la bzhag/ tho rangs langs nas
19b4(rgyud 'grel): shar bltas te// so shing 'chos nas steng du bsgyur// ba lang ko tsam maN+Dal la// zhi ba la sogs grub par blta// sbyin dang srung ba la sogs la// 'khyil pa'i sngags ni mchog nyid las// mthong ba'i rmi lam mi dge bas// rang ngam des
19b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas gzhom par bya// mtshan mo gsum pa'i cha dang por// skud pa rtag pa la sogs 'dra// de yI sa bon las byung ba// nyi shu rtsa lngar mes pa'o// mi b+ho snod rdo rje mig gnyis kyang // dza lA nyi zlar bskyed des mtshan// rdzi ma'i rlab rlab lcags kyu
19b6(rgyud 'grel): yid/ mkha' yi 'khor lo las dgug bya// oM AHrnam par snang mdzad che// rang gi 'khor lo la mchod phyir// khyed kyi skud pa bdeg la stsol// dip+ta dr-iSh+Ti badz+ra a gu sha dza hUM/ de ltar mi bskyod par byas pas// rang rang skud pa rang la thim//
20a1(rgyud 'grel): so gnas pa'i skud pa kun// chos nyid sngags kyis bsgril bar bya// sarba d+harma s+pha ra Na a nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harma a t+yan ta u nu pra baSh+Ti d+harma/ dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur ring thung dang // sgo yi nyi shu chas sbom phra// tsan+dan mchog sogs dri
20a2(rgyud 'grel): zhim gyis// byugs nas gser dngangul snod du bsrung // yi ge gsum gyi bar bsams la// khrus byas rang lha'i nga rgyal gyis// de nas skud pa bsdogs byas nas// 'khor lo thig ni gdab par bya// bdag nyid mi bskyod shar bltas nas// slob ma snang
20a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil// lte bar khu tshur g.yon bzung nas// na mkha'i thig ni ma lus gang ba// na mkha' la gnas de bzhin gshegs// sems can don byed dus bab pas// gnas 'dir byon pa'i dus phyed du// thig gi sgra yis bskul
20a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ gnod sbyin gshin rje brgya byin klu// phyogs su la bltas phyogs bzhir gdab// me mtshams bden bral mo tshams gnas nas// grwa yi thig ni rab tu gdab// de nas tshangs thig logs
20a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu// sum char byas la mtha' gnyis dor// dang po che bzhir rab byas la// de yi dang po che gnyis so// de yi gnyis pa gnyis byas la// re re yang ni gnyis gnyis so// gsum pa'i dang pos cha chung gnyis// de nas yang ni cha chung
20a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig/ de nas cha chung gnyis dor nas// cha chen gcig ni dor byas nas// cha chung gcig ni bcad pa'o// yang ni gnyis dor gcig bcad do// gnyis dor gcig bcad de steng du// cha chung gnyis ni dor bar bya// de nas cha chen gsum ni ra
20b1(rgyud 'grel): de steng cha chung gsum dor nas// yang ni cha chung gsum dor bya// / lhag ma cha chung gcig lus pa'o// de nas thig skud nyis 'gyur byas// tsan dan phur bus dbus su gzugs// yang ni nang gi ra ba dang // phyi rol ra ba kun bskor bya//
20b2(rgyud 'grel): chen lnga ni rab bskor na// nang gi rdo rje ra ba ste// lha yi gnas la cha chung lnga// byas pa'i phyed gnyis ka bar 'gyur// phyi yi 'khor lo cha brgyad la// cha gcig sgo yi dbus bya'o// de tshad lha yi rnams bu ste// de phyed 'khor sa chung ngu'o// de yi tshod kyi kha
20b3(rgyud 'grel): khyer sa / dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang // phreng bgral 'phyang ba'i snam bu dang // de bzhin 'gram pa bshog pa'o// logs kyi phyi rol ya phubs te// de ltar ka pa la yang ngo // de phyed rin chen pa ku dang // tshon sna lnga yi sa mnyam mo// de bzhin 'khor lo
20b4(rgyud 'grel): ko sogs dang // rdo rjer ba'ang de bzhin no// a phubs steng du cha chen gsum// tA ra Na yi sa ru 'gyur// mchung drug lo pad+ma dang // rdo rje ra ba bskor bar bya// cha chen gcig ni 'od dkyil 'khor// bskor nas gcig ni nye 'khor las// ltas rngan gyis
20b5(rgyud 'grel): ni 'grub mi 'gyur// thig skud chad na slob dpon 'chi// lhag chad byung na 'bras sogs 'byung // phyogs 'phrul slob ma skyo bar 'gyur// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi// rgyan cing dang sha ma me tog dang // 'phan dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis//
20b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa'i 'khor lo mthong bar bya// grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo yi zur kun chal yang // zla ba rin chen rdo rje dgod// gam pa'i ri sogs rab rgyan pa// chos kyi 'khor lo ri dgas gnyis// 'phan sogs kyis rgyan tA ra Na// ji ltar
21a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes shing klubs par bya// sems can rnams kyi bsam dbang gis// 'di ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bas// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud 'di ru// khru ni bcu gnyis nyid du gsungs// de la khru bcu gnyis ni// byang chub kyi sems la dag
21a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdo rje sgeg mo dang // gzungs dang yon tan gyi rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / chos 'chad pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje glu ma dang / sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'i rdo rje gar ma dang / grags pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rdo rje bdug pa ma dang / byang chub kyi
21a3(rgyud 'grel): yan lag gi rdo rje ma tog ma dang / 'gro ba gzhan dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje ma ra me dang / tshul khrims la sogs pa'i rdo rje dri chab ma dang / sbyin pa'i ring bzhin rdo rje kyo ba ma dang / snyan par smra ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje gsol kra ma dang / don mthun pa'i rang
21a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rdo rje pho nya ma dang // don spyod pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'bebs ma ste// de rnams rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// / de bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor la khru bcu drug tu gsungs pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems brtan par byed pa'i
21a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' dang / thams cad 'gugs nus pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje chags pa dang / gzi brjid bstod cing dga' ba'i yon tan rdo rje legs pa
21a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje rin chen dang / gzi brjid gzhan las 'phags pa'i yon tan rdo rje gzi brjid dang / re ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i yon tan rdo rje dpal rab dang / 'dzum pas lung ston pa'i yon tan rdo rje bzhad
21b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / chos la dmigs shing so sor rtog par yon tan rdo rje chos rab dang / sgrib pa yongs su gcod pa'i yon tan rdo rje rnon po dang / sku gsung thugs zad ma shes pa'i kun la khyab pa'i yon pan rdo rje dang / gzhung gi chos rab tu smom
21b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon tan rdo rje smra ba dang / sems can sbyin pa dang grol bar byed pa'i yon tan rdo d+hI las rab dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing smyung ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje srung ba dang / gdul dkA rA la bar byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/
21b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum bsdus shing dbyer med pa'i yon tan rdo rje sdud pa ste/ de rnams rnam par dag pa'o// / gsung gi dkrol 'khor la khru nyi shu gsungs pa ni// de rnams dang rdo rje'i rigs rnams sdud cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob
21b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon mAn+ta sems ma rdo rje ma dang / rin po che'i rogs sdud cing dbang bskur ba'i byin gyi rlob pa'i rang bzhin yon tan rin chen rdo rje ma dang / pad+ma'i rigs sdud cing chos kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan chos kyi rdo rje ma dang / las kyi
21b5(rgyud 'grel): gas sngun cis las kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan las kyi rdo rje ma ste/ de rnams rnam par dag pa'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/ de rnams bcu rnam par dag pa ste/ sa bcu ni ye shes lnga'i rten du gyur pa'i phyir ro// ji skad du gsang ba'i thig le
21b6(rgyud 'grel): nor bu'i rgyud phyi ma las/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// lam rnams dag ste rim pa bzhin// bcu gnyis bcu drug nyi shu ru// ye shes la ni ye shes gnas// thos dang bsam pa ngo bo ni// kyo ba la sogs rang bzhin no// shes rab
22a1(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus ting nge 'dzin// thar chags sdug pa la sogs so// drod la sogs pa dang por sbyor// sgeg me la sogs ngo bo'o// lhag ma nyi shu gnyis gnyis kyang // sa re ru 'i rnam dag pas// ye shes rten du yang dag 'tsham// stegs
22a2(rgyud 'grel): bu 'di yang 'khor lo yi// rten du yang dag gyur pas na// rnam par dag pa mngon du bya'o zhes so// mdor na zab gsal gnyis med las// grub pa'i khyad par 'byung bas na// rigs dang tshad sogs nges med pas// khru grang nas brtsams stong phrag
22a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad da rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am// yang na 'byung khungs nas 'byung dang // sA lu btags pa'i phye ma la// snga ma'i rim bzhin 'khor los dbab// bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs brjod de// gser sogs snod du bdug par bsre// gsal bar bsams
22a4(rgyud 'grel): nas gsang sngags 'dis// mngon par bzlas pa rab tu bya// badz+ra ne trA sa mA ya hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis zhugs nas su// chos dbyings kyis ni 'di nyid dag/ sems can dbyings ni rab sgrol mdzad// rgyal ba'i mchog ni mi bskyod mgon// bde bar gshegs
22a5(rgyud 'grel): pa kun gyi gnas// skyon kun las ni grol bar mos// bla mas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis// dbang ldan mtshams nas phyi rol nas// ri mo lnga ni bri ba'o// dkar po ser po dmar po dang // ljang gu nag po nang du'o// g.yas su bskor tsong chad med pas// rdul tshon
22a6(rgyud 'grel): rim bri ba'o// sbom por bris na nad 'byung ste// phra bas nor zad 'khyog 'thab 'byung // chang na slob ma bla ma mchi// de bas phyogs kun mnyam par 'gyur// g.yas bskor tshul du mi 'debs na// tshon la phur bus gda' bar bya// rdo rje rtse mo gnyis dka
22b1(rgyud 'grel): mo// gzhan ni ser por shes par bya// pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba gzhan// ma ra gA ta lta bu ste// dbus nag por shes byas nas// tshon gyi rim pa de ltar ro// shar gyi phyogs su dkar po che// lho ser nub dmar byang ljang gu/ dbus ma'i cha phyogs rabs bskor
22b2(rgyud 'grel): in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog go// de dus rlung dang sbrul sogs sbrul// bgegs dgra'i phyag rgya dran byas nas// sdang ba'i dgra yis sngags rgyal 'di// brjod pas de dag sel bar bya// na ma sa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daMSh+Tod ka Ta b+hai ra
22b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ya a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gar+Na/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nA na bi nA ya ka/ mahA ga na pa ti/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka re ya hUM phaT/
22b4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rdul tshon btab gyur nas// pad+ma'i gdan la nyi ma dang // zla ba rab tu bkod byas nas// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dgod pa'o// dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// shar du lce brgyad 'khor lo ni// zla ba lta bu'i 'od zer dang // lho ru r-in
22b5(rgyud 'grel): chen zur dgu pa// margad lta bu'i 'od zer ldan// nub tu pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// dmar po 'od zer dang ldan pa// byang du ral gri rin chen yu// sngon po 'od zer dang ldan pa'o// me mtshams spyan ni sngon po'o// bden bral mtshams su rdo rje bri// rlung mtshams pad+ma
22b6(rgyud 'grel): sdong bur bcas// dbang ldan ut+pal ljang ser can// phyi rol me mtshams la sogs dang // shar sgo g.yas g.yon gru gnyis la// me long pi wang dung deng snod// gos dang chos kyi 'byung gnas bri// tho ba 'bar ba sher sgo bri// rdo rje dbyug po
23a1(rgyud 'grel): skor brid/ pad+ma nub kyi sgo ru bri// rdo rje kha bye byad du bri// shes rab thabs su rab ldan pas// rtag tu mnyam par bzhag ste bya// rang rang gi ni ngo bo rnams// 'phro ba'i sngags kyis gdab par bya// de nas lha rnams gnas bya'i phyir// sle shwa
23a2(rgyud 'grel): can gyi bdag nyid che// bu mye lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// mA ma kI ru byin gyis brlab// gnyis sbyor rjes su chags bskyed nas// sangs rgyas rang gi nang du gzhug/ cho ga gsum gyis bsgrub byas nas// bzhi pas gnyisu med par bya// rdo rje pad+ma'i sgra yas ni//
23a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnam par dgug/ bskrad nas srung bya sngon bzhin du// mchod yon la sogs dbul bar bya// mchod stong bdud rtsi myang byas nas// shes rab mthar byed kyis gzhug dang // bcings te dga' byas nyer sgrub dang // sgrub pa
23a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur gyis mtshan pa'o// sngon bzhin mchod pa yang byas te// de bzhin bstod dang bdud rtsi myang // gsal bar bsgoms nas bzlas brjod dang // reg pa'i mchod pas mnyes bya'o// de bzhin phyi yi dri la sogs// sngags dang phyag rgya
23a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas// rang gi sa bon las sprul te// 'khor lo yang dag mchod pa'o// 'di ni yang dge bdug pa ste// rang bzhin dang ni sbyar ba'i dri// bdag gi 'bul ba 'di bzhes la// bdag la bka' drin stsal du gsol// badz+ra d+hU paM pu dza s+pha ra Na/
23a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs me tog yid 'ong ba// rab tu yid 'ong 'bar ba yi// byang chub yan lag me tog 'di// bdag la rtse dgongs bzhes bu gsol// badz+ra puSh+pe pU dza s+pha ra Na/ ting 'dzin mar me dge ba 'di// sreg byed ngan 'gro 'jigs las sbrug//
23b1(rgyud 'grel): yi spyan ni thob byed pa// bdag la brtse dgongs bzhes su gsol// badz+ra A lo ke pU dza s+pha ra Na/ ga bur la sogs byug pa ni// dri zhim la sogs me tog rgyan// hUM dbyangs snyan par rol 'byung 'di// bdag la brtse dgongs bzhasu
23b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol// badz+ra gaun+d+he pU dza s+pha ra Na/ sna tshogs bza' ba yid 'ong ba// bza' dang bcas dang ldag dang bzhi pa// yid 'ong gdung ba sel ba 'di// bdag la brtse dgongs bzhes su gsol// badz+ra nai bi t+ye pU dza s+pha ra Na/ sna tshogs btung ba yid
23b3(rgyud 'grel): 'ong bad/ 'bru yi tshing dang bcos pa'i chang // myos byed bdud rtsi dpa' bo 'di// bdag la brtse dgongs bzhes su gsol// badz+ra su ra pU dza s+pha ra Na/ rin chen ri'am rgya mtsho ri chen rnams// bzhad dang sgeg dga' rol dang bde ba dang // dpag
23b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam shi ba dang na bza' shing rnams kun// 'khor lo bla mar bcas la dbul bar bya// bo d+hi rat+na a laM ka ra/ ha sa la se ra ti kri ha so khyA a nut+ta ra/ a nut+ta ra bo d+h+yaM laM ka ra bas+t+ra/ pU dza me g+ha sa mu tra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes dbul lo// srungs
23b5(rgyud 'grel): nas phyi rol byung nas kyang // phyogs skyong rang rang rnal 'byor pas// sdig med sha khrag chu zan gyi// gtor ma phul nas nang du 'gro// 'di ni gzhan du bshad pas der shes par bya'o// gos dang rgyan gyis rab brgyan te// rdo rje hUM mdzad bdag bsgyur
23b6(rgyud 'grel): la// dkyil 'khor bskor ba yang byas te// phyag 'tshal me tog sngon po dor// bdag pos bcing bsam mgo ru bcings// de yi gong 'og cho ga rnams// rnam par dag par 'gyur bas na// dag pa'i dag pa rnam dag pa'o// de nas lha rnams
24a1(rgyud 'grel): chom bya'i phyir// thob la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i// sbyin sreg gnas su song nas kyang // sbyor ba ldan pas mnyes par bya// 'di'i cho ga yang gzhan du bshad pas der shes par bya'o// dkyil 'khor mchod pa yang byas te//
24a2(rgyud 'grel): shis pa'i phyir na bkra shis glu/ 'khor lo bskor nas bdag nyid kyis// pheb rdob pa yi gar gyis kyang // hUM hUM 'khor bya don byed sku 'dzin pa// gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'i mchod// mi bskyod rdo rje khyod 'ba' zhig/ te na hUM te na hUM te no te te hUM
24a3(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi zhabs la kyi pad+ma la// lha dang mi yis 'dud pa'i mchog/ sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs dag/ mi bskyod rdo rje khyod 'ba' zhig/ te na hUM twe na hUM te na te te hUM/ dngos po rnam grol rnam par bsnyen// gsang ba'i gsang ba 'dzin pa khyod// bdud rtsi
24a4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' med gsol ba khyod// khyod kyi dgongs pa pad rgyas yin// ti ne hU~M te na hUM te na ti te hUM/ rtsom spangs sems can don mdzad pa// rgyu med gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// te na hUM taM na hUM te na te te hUM/ dung dang ku mu da yi gzugs// rgya mtsho dang
24a5(rgyud 'grel): ma zla gzugs 'dra// te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ rol pa gnyis med rnal 'byor mdzad// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'dzin// te na hUM te na hUM te na ti te hUM/ sgyu 'phrul las kyi 'gro ba bzung // rkyen gyis ma byas gzugs can yin// te na hUM te na hUM te na te te
24a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i rim// bdag nyid zhugs byas lha yis kyang // chu nas bka' stsal bar gyi dbang // bskur bsams 'khor lo de la ni// slob ma rnams ni gzhug pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'chang ba las byung ba 'i// dkyil 'khor rten dang
24b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa yi// de bzhin nyid ni lan gsum brjod// nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir// theg ma tha ma med pa'i sems// rdo rje sems dpa' che rang bzhin// mi bskyod rdo rje dang grub shog/ mchog chen dngos grub thams cad dang // dbang phyug rdo rje
24b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i lha// thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs// dam pa'i yi ge grub par gog/ skyon med rtag pa la sogs pa// 'dod chags kun la rjes su chagaso// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// de nyid bcom ldan bdag la grub// gtan du
24b3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod ma nas grol de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub bo// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje snying gtso bdag la ni// rdo rje
24b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags chen grub par shog/ sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa// sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// sems can kun gyi de bzhin pha// dam tshig mchog gis 'dod pa'i mchog/ bden pa gang gis ye shes kyi// shes rab thabs dag
24b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ni// mgon po khyod kyi bden pa des// bdag gi 'dod pa yongs su skongs// gzugs brnyan dang ni mnyam pa'i chos// dag cing dang ba rnyog med pa// gzung med brjod du med pa yang // rgyu dang rkyen la kun tu byung // de nyid de nyid
24b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa ni// de dag bden pas dkyil 'khor la// gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob pa ni// sdig med pas ni blta bar bgyi// thun mong sdom pa dang ldan pa// bsnyen sgrub gsum gyis bsgrubs nas su// yol bas bar du bcad pa la//
25a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil bzlas chu yis gtor bar bya// dmar po sham gyis gdong g.yogs nas// dga' ba khyod gang yin zhes dri// dga' ba skal ldan bdag yin zhes// 'jug pa po yis smra bar bya// de nas me tog snyim bkang nas//
25a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor los bzhes shes gtor nas ni// gtong sems bskyed nas bla ma la// yon te ni rab tu dbul bar bya// yul mkhar khyim dang glang po rta// bran dang bran mo chung ma drug/ bu mo shin tu yid 'ong dang // gang gis rang gi lus 'di yang //
25a3(rgyud 'grel): dang nas brtsams te dbul bar bgyi// ci'i phyir na dbul bya na// slob dpon du ni nyer gnas phyir// rdo rje chen pos nyer gnas phyir// sems can thams cad skyob don du// bdag gi lus 'di dbul ba bgyi// hUM gis snying gar rdo rje bsgom// oM badz+ra
25a4(rgyud 'grel): yo ga tsit+ta ut+pA da ya mi/ su ra ta s+t+waM si d+hi badz+ro ya thA su khaM/ brjod pas byang chub sems bskyed la// lus kyi 'khor lo bskul por bya// de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs
25a5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi mchog gi gsang chen 'di// dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o// dad par mi byed pa yang mi rung ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// gshin rje gshed la sogs pa 'am/ oM khaM bi ra hUM brjod nas// drangs
25a6(rgyud 'grel): nas 'jug pa'i sbyor gnas te// sgyu ma'i sdom pa brtan par bya// de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rigs la rab tu chud do// de bas ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya'o// ye shes des khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams
25b1(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos// de'i thabs 'di khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du mya smra zhig/ khyod dam tshig las 'da' bar mi rung ba'i phyir ro// snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas ni// de ring
25b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas// gal te tshul 'di 'das na ni// snying 'gas sdug bsngal de ltar 'byung // badz+ra satwa hU~M/ pad+ma'i ban+d+har bdud rtsi lnga// yi ge gsum gyis 'bar byas la// rdo rje yi ni de yi kha ra// mi ldog phyir
25b3(rgyud 'grel): ni blud par bya// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// ngam las 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pa'i// bdud rtsi rdo rje chu 'thung zhig/ badz+ra u da ka pra/ de nas de yis mi 'gyur byas// sems g.yo dogs phyir bstan pa yi// dam
25b4(rgyud 'grel): pas 'di ni bla ma yis// lan gsum du ni bsgrags par bya// de ring phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis// ngas ci smras pa'i bya ba thams cad khyod kyis bya dgos so// khyod kyis bdag la brnam par mi rung ste// brnyas na yang ba ma spangs pas
25b5(rgyud 'grel): shi ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar me 'gro zhig/ de nas slob ma ngo yis kyang // brtan nas rang nying dag bya'i phyir// gsol ba gdab pa 'di yi mchog/ spros shig ces ni bla mas smras// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// byin gyis
25b6(rgyud 'grel): rlo sde l-i rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag cag la dbab du gsol// de yi snying ga ru ni hUM// lam byung dbang chen dbus su bsam// mgrin par a ni baM byung ba'i// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su bsam// spyi bor haM ni dkar po che// yaM byung rlung dbus bsams
26a1(rgyud 'grel): nas nid/ skul byed dz+nyAM ni rkang mthil gnyis// rlung gi bskyod pas 'bar byas dbab// aM A be sha ya staM b+ha ya rA ra ra ra tsA lA ya tsA la ya/ hUM a ha dz+dza/ rdo rje dril bu sgra dang bcas// 'jigs rung kar gyis smin
26a2(rgyud 'grel): rings bskyod// mig bgrang so gtsigs bzhid byed pas// slob ma dbab pa rab tu bya// lce la thig le'i yi ge AHpas mas nas bzlos shig dge mi dge/ 'bru hi badz+re zhes brjod nas// dbab pa brtan par bya'o// pra ti badz+ra ho brjod la//
26a3(rgyud 'grel): me tog dkyil 'khor dor du gzhug/ de yis bcings par rab bsams la// blangs nas mgo ru bcing bar bya// 'di ni stobs chen sems dpa' bas// 'di yi ma 'dres so sor zung // phyag mtshan nye ba 'am mi nye ba// re'u cha'i gnas las shes
26a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// yang na rang gi skal pa yis// gdong phye ma tog de la gtor// mig gnyis oM 'bar bsams nas ni// gdod phye las kyi kha dog bstan// de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// nan tan byas te khyod mig phye// bla ma med pa'i rdo rje mig/ thams
26a5(rgyud 'grel): cad la ni mig phye 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gtso bo gnas brtsams nas// bdud rtsi 'khyil par bstan pa 'am// yang ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa las// gtso bye'o bar du bstan bya'o// slob mos thal mo sbyar byas la// rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yi/
26a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor nyid du bdag bzhugaso// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor de ring bdag gis mthong // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur// de skad lan gsum brjod par bya//
26b1(rgyud 'grel): bum pa rnams chu gcig tu bya// mi bskyod rdo rje rab bskyed la// zhugs nas slob ma'i mgo bo ru// 'khor lo sgyur bzhin dbang bskur bya// rin chen la sogs dbu rgyan la// rin chen 'byung ldan gyur byas te// dbus su rang gi lha bzhag pas/
26b2(rgyud 'grel): cod pan dang ldan dbang bskur bya// rdo rje rtse mo dgu lnga pa// 'od dpag med bsgoms yongs gyur te// byin nas snying gar de bzung ba// rdo rje'i dbang ni bskur bar bya// dril bu don yod grub pa ru// bsgoms nas yongs gyur byin nas ni// rdo rje dril bu
26b3(rgyud 'grel): la 'khyud tshul// bdag por dbang ni bskur bar bya// spyi gtsug lhag pa rab bcug ste// spyi bor phyag reg ming gi dbang // che ge rdo rje zhes bos nas// khyad par gzhan yang mthong bar bya// gang gang snang ba kun bdag ste// dro yi gtso bo mi bskyod
26b4(rgyud 'grel): mgon// chos rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pas// chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge tshul// kun gyis gtso bo yin pa'i phyir// ming gong dpal gyi sgra gzhug bya// go ba nyid du bsgrag pa'i phyir// dang po kye 'byor mtha' yi bar// hUM bskyed rdo rje lag byin nas//
26b5(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba'i rdo rje lan gsum gsor// brtul zhugs 'dri ni dang po ru// rnal 'byor pa yis blang bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na gnas// rtag par khyod kyis kyang bzung ste// lag pa rdo rje rtul zhugs brtan//
26b6(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta si d+d+he badz+re sa ma ya tiSh+Tha ai Sha trAM d+hA ra ya mi/ he hi hi ni dz+haiM/ de yi de nyid bshad par bya// sngon mtha' mod pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag// rdo rje snying po'i gtso bo'i gtso//
27a1(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i dril bu ni// lag g.yon byin nas phyogs brgyad dkrol// brtul zhugs 'di yang dang po ru// de yi grogs su sbyin pa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs chen 'khrol bar 'dod// rtag par khyod
27a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang bzung ste// rgyal ba byang chub mchog tu 'dod// de nyid bshad par bya ba ni// 'di ni chos kyis dkrol bya ste// srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag phyir// rang bzhin gyis ni 'byung bar byed// rang bzhin dag pos sems can kun// dam pa'i srid pa byed
27a3(rgyud 'grel): pa po slob ma rdo rje dbyings phyug dang // ldan par bsams nas bcom ldan 'das// mngon byed 'das pa mchog 'di yis// phyag rgya'i dam tshig sbyin pa'o// phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs te// snying po bsnyen pa la sogs grags// dam tshig 'dod gzugs
27a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnams kyis// sngags ni dbugs su rtogs nas bzla// rang gi rang bzhin de rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dus gsum khyab pa yi// ma lus gtso bo mchod byas nas// bdag dang gzhan yang mnyes par bya// dka' thub dam bcas de dag gis//
27a5(rgyud 'grel): bsten par byas kyang 'grub pa med// mi snang mngon shes mkha' gro med// sku gsung thugs las grub skyeso// de bas sangs rgyas sems can rnams// sngags kyi spyod pa mchog bzung ste// 'dod pa kun las longs spyod pas// chos kyi yi ge mchog
27a6(rgyud 'grel): thob 'gyur// bde sdug gnyis med bdag nyid kyis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bsten to// chags chen ye shes don sbyor na// de kho na nyid kun kyang 'grub// sku gsung thugs grub yang dag ste// gang gzhan dman pa yang bskyed 'dod// de yang sku
27b1(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs bsgoms nas// sngags bzlas pa yis 'grub pa'o// thun mong ma yin sdom par ldan// sbyor ba ma nyams yon phul nas// rdo rje slob dpon dbang nod phyir// de yis lan gsum gsol ba gdab// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la//
27b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod chen ji ltar bgyi ba bzhin// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir// na mkha' rdo rje bdag la stsol// 'jug pa'i sgo ru khru do ba ra// pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad la// sa bon gyis mtshan dbang stegs bri// seng+ge mtshan par 'dug tu gzhug/ de
27b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid ting 'dzin gsum ldan par// byas nas bla ma'i lus dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas sogs spro rnam dgug cing // na mkha'i khams kun dga' bar bya// de yis rnga dril sil snyan dang // rgyal mtshan 'phan sogs pheg rdob cing // bum pa gtso
27b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs gzung byas nas// sngon bzhin chu sogs dbang bskur bsam// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni// khams gsum kun gyi phyag byas pa// gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin pa yin// de skad lan gsum brjod
27b5(rgyud 'grel): nas su// dge ba'i phyir dang shis pa'i phyir// bum pa spyi bor rab bzung ste// bkra shis dbyangs 'di brjod par bya// dpal ldan gser gyi ri bo ltar 'barla// 'jig rten gsum mgon dri ma gsum dang bral// bcom ldan pa rgyas lta bu'i spyan
27b6(rgyud 'grel): mnga' ba// bkra shis des ni deng khyod zhi byed shog/ de yi bstan pa'i dri mang mchog rab ni// 'jig rten gsum grags lha dang mis mchod pa// cho ga skye dgu rnams ni zhi bar byed// bkra shis gnyis kyi deng 'dir khyed la shog/ dam pa'i chos
28a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan thos gang bkra shis shing // dge 'dun lha dang lha mis mchod 'os pa// ngo mtshar dpal rab mchog rab tshogs rnams kyi// bkra shis gsum pa deng 'dir khyod la shog/ de nas de dag thams cad kun// ye shes ngo bo
28a2(rgyud 'grel): gas bsams pas// dbu rgyan ya shes sems dpa' bskyeng // bskor byas slob dpon gnas par bya// sngon bzhin mchod dang bstod pa dang // bdung rtsi myang ba yang byas nas// dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid bstan bya// sangs rgyas ma rgyas
28a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i phyir// gru bzhi ru ni rab tu bstan// dran pa nye bzhag shar gyi sgo// yang dag spong ba lho yi sgo// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa nub kyi sgo// dbang po stobs ni byang gi sgo// bsam gtan bzhi ni tra ra Na// ting 'dzin rnams ni kha khyer brgyad // gzungs rnams
28a4(rgyud 'grel): der gnas lha mo'o// bsam pa bstong pir lha tshogs rgyan// gsung rab yan lag 'phags sogaso// byang chub yan lag dra ba sogs// rnam par thar brgyad ka pA brgyad// sngags tshul rdo rje phreng ba zlum// phyin log rnam ngag yon tan lha// dri med
28a5(rgyud 'grel): stobs sogs mchod pa lnga// bum pa chus gang thugs rje dang // tsho gas rdzogs ser po ye shes gter// 'gro ba rnams dang dbyer med kyang // de yi nyes pas mi gos phyir// sna tshogs pad+ma bcu dgu ni// sdong bu dang ni bcas pa'o// mi dge
28a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dam rdzab skam mdzad phyir// dge ba'i myu gu gso mdzad pa// nyi ma'i gangadan ni bdun rnams so// nyon mongs tsha ba bsil byed dang // mo rig mun nag sel ba'i phyir// zla ba bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'o// tshor ba gsob la sogs pa dang // 'ju ba la
