28b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs dus bcu gnyis// zang dus sgron bdun rnam dag pas// grangs ni nges par bstan pa'o// nyon mongs thams cad las grol phyir// gzhal yas khang du btags pa yin// snying po la ni 'dus pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad pa yin//
28b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par shes pa zhe sdang thugs// chos dbyings rnam dag mi bskyod pa// gzugs phung gti mug phye dang skye// me long rnam ngag rnam snang mdzad// tshor ba'i phung po mnyam pa nyid// nga rgyal rnam dag rin chen 'byung // 'du shes phung po 'dod chags gsum//
28b3(rgyud 'grel): so sor rtog pa snang mtha' yas// 'du byed phung po nan tan dang // phrag dog rnam dag don yod grub// sa dang stong nyid thabs dang ni// snying rje zhi byed spyan ma'o// byams dang mtshan med smon lam dang // chu khams srung byed mA ma kI// dga' dang smon med stobs
28b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ni da me khams rgyas byed na bza' bkar// btang snyems ye shes rang bzhin gsal// rlung khams sgrol byed sgron ma'o// sbyin pa rnam dag gzugs rdo rje// tshul khrims rnam dag sgra rdo rje// bzod pa rnam dag dri rdo rje// brtson 'grus rnam dag ro rdo rje// bsam
28b5(rgyud 'grel): gtan rnam ngag reg rdo rje// shes rab rnam dag chos rdo rje// phyi yi longs spyod kyis mchod phyi'i// du byung sngags ting 'dzin gsungs pa'o// mi la sogs pa rnam dag phyir// de nyid du ni bkod par gsungs// du byung sngags ting 'dzin ma gsungs pas// sa snying
28b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs phyir mi bgod// 'jigs sogs shes bya'i phung po'i bdud// dong ngag gshin rjeg shing 'gugs pa// nyon mongs de bdud mthar 'dzin lha// brtson dag 'jug byed shis mthar byed// skye sgrib 'chi bdag log par lta// dran dag 'ching byed rta
29a1(rgyud 'grel): mgrin no// las dang lha bdud mchog 'dzin lha// ting 'dzin mgu mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // ngo bo nyid de rnam bzhi ni// thugs sogs rdo rje ye shes sems// phyag rgya bzhi zhes bya shad
29a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// rnam par rtog pa dang bral phyir// gting dpag dka' bas zab mo ste// phyag rgya chen por rab snang ba// rang gzhan smin byed gsal ba po// zab mo dang ni yang dag gsal// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid de// mtha' gnyis skyon ni rab
29a3(rgyud 'grel): bkab pas// dus thams cad du dbyer med do// de bzhin slob ma dbang bskur dang // dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// sgrub pa'i thabs ni rab bstan pas// gang zag gnyi su shes par bya// gzugs brnyan glegs baM la sogs pa// yod na
29a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis rab gnas mdzod// de ni ji srid bar du ni// sems can don du 'gyur ba'o// de ltar lung bstan dbugs dbyung dang // bka' stsal pa yis dbang bskur nas// bskyed pa'i rim pa kun bstan te// dka' lung g.yar gyi blang ba'o// bum pa'i
29a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang gi cho ga'o// lo 'am yang na zla ba ru// rig dang slob dpon dbang thob pas// lus dang zang zing thabs dang bcas// spyod pa mchog gis bla ma bkur// rin chen sna bdun la sogs pa// rje su mthun pa dbul bya ste// bla ma dgyes par byed pa'i
29a6(rgyud 'grel): ched// bu mo gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba// rgyan ldan dam sdom dbang bcas pa// lus rgyus mdzes pa dbul byas na// bla ma'i g.yon du 'u mo bzhag/ rgyal po mu stegs chom rkun gyis// gnod med dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mchog gi dris byugs
29b1(rgyud 'grel): pad sogs gung na// bla re rgyal mtshan sogs kyis klubs// rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs sgras// gong gi 'khor ram yang ma sku// tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po yis// dbyer med 'khor lo mchod byas nas// me tog snyim bkang gsol ba gdab// kun
29b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen ye shes phung po sogs// pus gtsugs thal sbyar mgrin dma' bas// gsang ba mchog gi sdom pa che// yang dag blangs nas bsrung bar bya// ji ltar dbang bskur sogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas la sogs thob pa bzhin// byang chub spyod pa
29b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhan gyi ni// 'dul ba'i dge ba de bzhin med// de bso dam tshig bus srungs shig/ rtag tu sdom pa yang skyongs shig/ sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bza' ste// de las gzhan yang dam tshig srungs// dkon mchog bla ma brnyas byed gzhom// gzhan gyi bud
29b4(rgyud 'grel): med spyad pa dang // ma byin par yang blangs byas nas// rdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// rnal 'byor rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin// de ni cho ga bzhin du srungs// de ltar bya'o zhes gsol nas// yang ni me tog phreng ba gtor// thal mo sbyar nas gsang
29b5(rgyud 'grel): ba yid/ dbang nod phyir ni gsol ba gdab// rdo rje sems khyod la sogs pa// tshigs bcad lnga yis lan gsum du// zhugs nas slob ma dam pa ni// mdzes pas chas ldan gyis bya'o// de nas bla ma yon tan mche// mchog gi mchog gis de gas
29b6(rgyud 'grel): nas// zhal ni mdongs dang ldan byas nas// snying rje de la bskyed par bya// gzugs sogs phun sum tshogs ldan pa'i// lha mo da ni byin rlabs nas// thub pa'i dbang po zhus byas zhus// rdo rje nang du gnas par bya// mthe bo srin lag gis bkab nas//
30a1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma dpal ldan snang mdzad khar// spro ba'i sngags kyis bab nas su// gnyi gas 'di ni brjod par bya// a ho a ho su kha ho// gzhan yang blo yi bye brag gi/ dbang bskur byas nas mgrin pa ru// de nyid myong bar byas nas su/
30a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'di yis bsngags pa'o// de 'di rdo rje thams cad kyi// dbang bskur mchog tu bsngags pa ste// thams cad sngags ni grub 'gyur te// las mchog khyad par can yang 'grub// zla ba za ba rab byung ba// lung bstan dbugs dpyong bka' stsal pa//
30a3(rgyud 'grel): 'og nas 'byung bzhin sbyin par bya// rdo rje bzlas pas phyi nang tshogs// sgyu ma rmig sgyu la sogs pa'i// 'dod don phyag mtshon mdog dang dbyibs// bas mo mi khyab pa'i rnam smin sku// bsgom pa la gnas de sgom gzhug/ gsang ba'i dbang gi tshe
30a4(rgyud 'grel): ga'o// de bzhin gang mi'i'o rim pa yis// mtshan dang ljon pa'i rig pa tshe// btsal te bla ma dag la yon// rjes mthun dang bcas dbul bar bya// sngon bzhin gsol btab sdom pa blangs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal
30a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin te// sku gsung thugasu sbyor ba na// phyag 'tshal na ni ma rungs 'gyur// kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi// lus ngag yid kyi dkyil 'khor la// bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// sngags zlos pas ni bsam gtan bya// mdor na sems can
30a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni// bsam gtan rdo rje bskul bar bya// de 'di rdo rje thams cad kyi// dam chos rab tu bstan pa'o// dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi bri// glegs pam klag par mi bya zhing // mchod rten dag gis las mi bya// rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya// gal
30b1(rgyud 'grel): te byang chub mchog 'dod na// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo // de ltar bya zhes gsol bar bya// yang ni me tog gtor byas nas// mchod sbyin rdo rje la sogs pa'i// tshigs bcad lan gsum gsol btab nas// shes rab ye shes yang dag blang //
30b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha mo bdag nyid dang / dam tshig sdom pa'i mchog smras nas// bde chen bla ma teg gi ni// lha mos sngags pa rab tu brjod// de dag mdun du gnas pa'i lag/ g.yas g.yon 'og dang sdang bzhag nas// byin gyis brlab pa'i lha mo 'di// sngags
30b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis ni sbyin par bya// yid 'ong gzungs ma 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyo du gnang // dkyil 'khor lo rim pa yis// dam pa'i bde ba khyed kyis myong // de nas rab mnyam bzhug pa yis// del ba'i bya ba rnam gsum gyis// rdo rje skyil krung nang
30b4(rgyud 'grel): sems// rin chen dkyil du rtogs par bya// rang gi lha yi 'khor lor ldan// dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang 'brel pa// yol bas bcad de bde myong lo// sngon bzhin dbang bskur byas nas thim// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ gti mug
30b5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gti mug sbyor// gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan// gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// zhe sdang rang bzhin zhe sdang sbyar// zhe sdang dga' ma dang ldan par// zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// zhe sdang rdo rje
30b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid 'gyur// 'dod chags rang bzhin 'dod chags sbyor// 'dod chags dga' dang yang dag ldan// 'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur ni// 'dod chags rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur// shes rab ye shes bdag sbyar na// rdo rje dga' ma dang ldan par
31a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur// shes rab ye shes so// de nas bla mas g.yon pa yi// phyag ni slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag/ de bzhin gshegs kun dbang byas la// rig pa'i
31a2(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o// thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya// de bas rig ma 'di ni mchog/ chos kun gnyis su med pa la// gnyis kyis rnam par mtshon pa yin// de bas rtag tu 'khor ba ru// khyed kyis 'bral bar ma byed cig/
31a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med// blun chen gang zhig 'da' byed na// mchog gi dngos grub de la med// de ltar de bzhin gzhir yang grags// sngon bzhin gnyis ni rgyas btab pas// gsal
31a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing rab dga' mkha' 'gro ba'i// man ngag tu ni de nyid brtag/ bla ma de bzhin gshegs gyur nas// snying gar khu tshur chos gos g.yon// g.yas pas mchog sbyin phyag rgya bya// bdag nyid bzhengs nas lung ston bya// oM khyed la bdag
31a5(rgyud 'grel): gis lus 'di bstan// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// srid pa'i ngan 'gro bar byas nas// yang dag srid pa grub pa'i phyir// sa bla sa stang sa 'og tu// kye rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba/ rang 'byung rang nyid grub gyur cig/ sngags
31a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gang la lung 'di bstan// de ni 'gro ba kun gyi gtso// bla na med pa'i byang chub la// bde gshegs kun gyis lung bstan yin// lung bsten pa'o// ji ltar dbang bskur thob pa yis// slob mas yon tan brjod par mos// dam tshig gsum gyis
31b1(rgyud 'grel): dbugs phyung nas// 'di yis sngags pa brjod pa'o// ngam mchog gsang chen dkyil 'khor la// rab tu zhugs nas mthong bas na// khyod ni sdig pa kun las grol// de ring shin tu kho nar gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di la ni// byin chad shrI
31b2(rgyud 'grel): yong med/ mi thub mi shigs gzhan gyis kyang // rol zhing 'jigs par ga la 'gyur// sdug bsngal srid las mya ngan 'das// srid pa gtan du dag pa'i phyir// yang dag 'byung ba ston pa'i mchog/ srid pa bstan du dngos grub bo// dngos
31b3(rgyud 'grel): grub dam tshig sdom pa 'di// rig ma rtag tu bsrung bar bya// dam pa'i shes rab bstan pa ni// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par gsungs// byang chub sems ni spang mi bya// gang zhig rdo rje phyag rgya zhes// da ni bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs
31b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas nyid du the tshom med// dam pa'i chos ni smang mi bya// mi rig pa dang gti mug gis// de ni bor bar mi bya'o// yang bdag yongasu spangs pa dang // dka' thub sdug bsngal gzir mi bya// ji ltar bde ba 'di bzung na// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa
31b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di las 'byung // rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams// nam yang spang bar byar mi rung // bla ma sangs rgyas dang mnyam phyir// rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya// de ni sangs rgyas kun mnyam phyir// slob dpon la ni slong byed na// sangs rgyas
31b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad smod pa yin// des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob// rims dang 'or dang dug dang nad// mkha' 'gros gtses dang bzung ba dang // bgegs dang tshigs bdag drag po yi// bsad nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de bas na rna
32a1(rgyud 'grel): tan thams cad kyis// mchog gi dge ba mngon gyur pa'o// rdo rje slob dpon zla chen la// nam yang brnyas par byar mi rung // gus pas bla ma'i yon du ni// rje su 'thang pas dbul bar bya// des ni rim ngan la
32a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa// phyi nas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsgrub// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod// rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul// sangs rgyas kun dang de mnyam phyir// de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la// rtag tu byin pa
32a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid du 'gyuraro// de byin bsod nams tshigs yin pas// tshogs las byang chub mchog tu 'gyur// ci phyir shin tu 'dir gnas pas// khyed kyi tshe 'di 'bras bur bcas// dam tshig lha dang mnyam pa ru// gnas par the tshom med pa'o// rdo rje
32a4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas sangs rgyas kyis// de ring khyed rnams dbang bskur banA/ rgyal po chen po khams gsum na// rgyal po chen po khams gsum na// rgyal po gtso bo bstan par 'gyur// de ring bdud rnams rnam bcom nas// gzhal yas khang mchog tu
32a5(rgyud 'grel): chung phyir/ sangs rgyas nyid phyir de kho nar// khyab bdag gis ni the tshom med// rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis ni// rdo rje de dag kun mdzod cig/ zad med rang gi dam tshig bde// badre bar sems bskyed la bsnyen cing // myur bar 'gro ba'i bde churaru/
32a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra ba yi// mnyam pa de ru gyur nas// khyod rnams ngal 'gro bar shog/ dbugs dbyung ba'o// de nas slob mas phyag 'tshal te// bla ma'i zhabs kyis bka' drin gyis// sogs pa'i tshogs gis thams cad kun// snang ba
32b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang ni blang bar bya// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// sems can+da rang bzhin du 'gro bgyis// de lta de ltar sems can don// 'dod chags la sogs dag par bya// nyinA re yi ni mtshams gsum la// ting 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ldan ni// bsgrubs nas
32b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa thun mong dang // TIg shos dngos grub bsgrub par bya// mi snang stong ni chung ngu la// mngon shes nyi stong bar ma la// rigs 'dzin dag ni stong gsum la// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro kun gtso// zhi ba rgyas pa segs las gang // de las gzhan nam
32b3(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dod pa// dkyil 'khor kun tu chags sbyor na// bsgrub pa myur du 'grub par 'ong // rdo rje bdag po thams cad kyis// 'dod chags de nyid don bsams te// sems can thams cad pan byed pa'i// byang chub 'dod chags las skye mdzad// de bas
32b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub 'dod sngags pas// sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms byas te// cho ga bzhin du las byed na// de kun rtogs par 'gyur ba yin// de dag byang chub thob 'dod kun// dga' ba'i sems kyis thams cad dbul// gang zhig 'phongs pas yid mi
32b5(rgyud 'grel): bded dang pa'i mchog ldan de yin no// bka' stsal pa'i dbang ngo // dad pa mchog tu gus ljon pas// bla ma'i zhabs ni spyi bor blang // ji lta rje btsun bka' stsal ltar// de ltar bya zhes spyan sngar gsol// bkra shis smon lam dang ldan par// yang
32b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag gnas par gyur cig brjod// snod rung byas pa'i slong ma la// bla ma shin tu dgyes pas na// de dag kun las gsang ba da // rab gsang shin tu gsang ba yi// bsgrags min mna' yi so btab byas nas// som nyi med par bshad par bya// 'byor
33a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan slob ma kun tshogs nas// sbyin sreg gnas su gnas byas nas// bla ma slob ma sbyor bar ldan// mar la sogs pa rgya chen rnams// slob mas g.yon pa'i mthe bong ni// bla ma'i g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang // gung mo yis ni
33a2(rgyud 'grel): gzung byas nas// sdig pa rnams ni zhi bar bya// de bzhin de rus bdag dang // phyogs stong rgyal po la sogs pa// zhi bar bya phyir bdun nam ni// yang na gsum mam gcig tu bya'o// bdag nyid bshad dang nyan pa dang // bsam dang bsgom dang
33a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub bsgrub// tha na 'jig rten las grub dang // khyod kyis grogs ni mdzod ci gau ces// gsol ba btab nas gshegasu gsol// sngon bzhin mchod pa thams cad dang // glu gar sil snyan la sogs dang // bza' dang btung ba'i mchog
33a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis// bdag gzhan 'khor lo mnyes par bya// de nas pog snod lag thogs te// dril bu bsil nas pus mo btsugs// ye shes 'khor lo thams cad kun// sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol ba'o// oM sems can kun don
33a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad nas su// dngos grub stsal te rigs pa bzhin// sangs rgyas yul du gshegasu gsol// yang ni 'byon par mdzod cig muH// de bzhin oM dang AHdang hUM// brjod pas ting 'dzin 'khor lo rnams// rdo rje gsum la bsdu byas nas//
33a6(rgyud 'grel): de yang na mkha' lta bur mos// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA naM A d+ya nut+pan+na twAta oM a hUM swA hA zhes brjod pasau/ gzugs brnyan stong pa nyid dmigs la// snod gtsang ma ru bsdus nasu// 'dod pa la ni nyung shas sbyin// lhag ma chu yi skye ba
33b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs 'phan phyir gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang // 'phan sogs sil snyan rab ldan pa// dge 'dun tshogs kyis btegs nasu// chu bo chen por blugs par bya// rdo rje rtse mos ri mo dbyi// bum pa bla re la sogs pa// spyad rung bla mas blang bya
33b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ lhag ma gong bzhin dor bar bya// dkyil 'khor 'di ru gzugs brnyan dang // glegs bam la sogs rab gnas kyi// cho ga bya ba gzhan du bshad// mkhas pa rnams kyis der shes bya// 'di ni dang po rnal 'byor pa'i// dkyil 'khor
33b3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga dang por gsungs// gzhan du khyad par ma gtogs pa// cho ga rgyas par 'dir shes bya// cung zad ye shes dbang thob pas// 'bebs pa'i tsho gas bri bar gsungs// khams gsum skye bos smon 'jug phyir// rnam pa gzhan du mi
33b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang // nags tshal rab tu dben pa 'am// mchod rten kun dga' ra ba sogs// dgon pa'i gnas su spyad bya'o// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma// de bzhin bcu gnyis lon pa'i khye'u/ tshe rigs btsun zhing drang por
33b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes rma sogs spangs dang bzhin mdzes shing // so yi thags bzang rab gtsang ba// sgra gnag mig tAkyus ring ba dang // rang bzhin dul ba rig pa che// bzung nas dbab par rab tu rtag/ de la gong du smos pa dang // snod rung sogs kyis
33b6(rgyud 'grel): zhus nasu// de rnams don du tshogs bskyed phyir// rnam par dag pa'i bzlas pa bya// de bzhin sa btsal la sogs nas// sbran pa'i cho ga'i bar byas nas// lha dang bum pa sems can rnams// lta gon du ni gnas par bya// thig skud rdul tshon byin
34a1(rgyud 'grel): brlabs nas// gong gsungs snod ni khrus byas te// gos dang rgyan gyis rab klubs te// ri sgra la sogs kyis bdug bya// de yi gnas gsum snga ma bzhin// dbang chen chu dang klung dkyil 'khor// yi ge gsum gyi byin brlabs
34a2(rgyud 'grel): lad/ rkang mthil gnyis su skul byed pa// rlung gis sbar bas sdig pa bsreg/ ye shes yang dag dbab pa'i phyir// rigs gsum bdag nyid rdo rje dril// 'jigs rung gar dang bcas pa yis// do yi snying ga phye byas nas// chu dang mar bzhin ro gcig
34a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ gzi byin la sogs ldan gyur na// babs pa'i rtags kyis shes par bya// spyan dang rnam par snang mdzad zhugs// khru gang tsam 'am khru do 'am// khru lnga tsam 'am brgyad tsam du// 'jigs shing skrag tshul 'phar bar 'gyur// snang ba mtha' yas
34a4(rgyud 'grel): gos dkar zhugs// phreng ba'i sngags dang dbyung ba'i sngags// de bzhin snying po rigs pa sogs// ma brlabs par yang brjod par 'gyur// mi bskyod mA ma kI babs pas// 'das dang ma 'ongs dus dag gi/ ji ltar byung 'byung dngos po rnams// skad
34a5(rgyud 'grel): cig gis ni yang dag ston// de nas sngags kyis brtan par bya// de gnyis bla ma slob ma'i tshul// thig 'debs dang ni tshon 'gyed dang // phyag rgya'am sku sogs 'god par byed// de nas mdun du 'dug byas nas// ji ltar bgyi zhes bka' nod byed//
34a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa sna tshogs rab byas la// ye shes lha ni gshegasu gsol// gnod gnyis zas dang skom rnams dang // yon gyis mnyes par byas na su// grangs lhag rung bar bya ba ste// rang gi gnasu btang bya'o// de nas 'khor lo gnas bsam dang // mchod
34b1(rgyud 'grel): dang zhugs dang dbang bskur ba// bsdu ba dang po rnal 'byor bzhin// cho ga rgyas par bya ba'o// 'di 'am grong du slob ma 'am// gzhan don rab tu bya ba'i phyir// bri ba'i gsung ba'i cho ga ni// gzhan du bshad pas der shes bya// 'di ni cung zad dbang gyur
34b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// bri ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// sgrub pa la yang ri mo ni// tshul 'di dang ni mtshungs zhes bya// ye shes dbang bskur rnal 'byor pas// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog las rgyal mchog/ rdzogs pa'i bsam
34b3(rgyud 'grel): gtan gyis bsgrub bya// bla ma'i man ngagi rab thob cing // sbyor shes de dag lhur len pa// rtag shes dang po pha rol phyin// yul l-i zhen pa dang bral ba'i// bdag nyid chen po nyag cig des// de 'dra'i sa bcu mgon po che// rang gi nus pa dang phrad pa//
34b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyes bya de yis ang dag blang // me tog la srogs mchod pa'i tshogs// phyi rol nang du bcas sngon song // thal sbyar pus mo btsugs nas ni// bla chen de la gsol ba gdab// 'jig rten sgron mchog rnal 'byor kun la 'phags// khyod ni skyon
34b5(rgyud 'grel): sa dag pa'i pha rol phyin// srid pa'i mtsho las sems can kun sgrol ba// ded dpon chen po khyed la skabasu mchi// bdag cag thabs bral 'khor bar 'khyams gyur te// ma rig mun pas bsgribs pas dmus long gyur// sdug bsngal gyis
34b6(rgyud 'grel): gzir yang dag don ma rnyed// bdag nyid chen po khyed kyis skyab du gsol// de skad gsol nas de yi tshe// bla ma bdag nyid chen po des// snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas// tshig 'dis gnang ba sbyin pa'o// bu tshur shog cig bsam gtan gyi// 'khor lo
35a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po nga yis bstan// khyod kyis kyang ni mnyam zhog l+ya// nga yi bgrod pa lta bar gyis// de skad gsol nas bsam gtan gyi// dkyil 'khor rim pa 'di yis bsgom// lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba ni// skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs
35a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'od sangs rgyas 'khor lo sbyar ba yis// bsam gtan 'khor lo rab rdzogs bya// ye shes 'khor lo bsam gtan gyis// 'khor lo can kun mngon sum zhugs// gong gsungs mchod pa'i cho ga ni// bsam gtan ldan pas mnyes par bya//
35a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid brjod pas 'khor lo bskul// zhugs sngogs gong bzhin rab byas te// ye shes dbab pa sngon 'gro ba'i// mthong ba'i yul bzhin rnam par gnas// ye shes kyi ni 'khor lo la// gnyis med 'khor lo gzhug par bya// de nas byin
35a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs brjod la// sa bcu'i mgon po'i dkyil 'khor la// dngos grub rtags ni shes bya'i phyir// me tog 'dod par bya ba ste// sku 'am dbus su nub 'gyur na// phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la babs na// sngags
35a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dngos grub thob par bshad// lte ba'i dbus su rab babs na// thun mong dngos grub brgyad 'grub bo// sku smad cha ni gar bobs kyang // zhi sogs dngos grub 'byung ba'o// ring zhing thal bas dngos grub kyang // da du nga rgyang ring 'gyur ba'o// /
35a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po ji lta bzhin// sgrub pas ji bzhin dus thob po// ye shes babs pa'i mthu nyid kyis// dman mchog gsum dang rang gi las// ji skad bshad bzhin gyis rab thob// de las gzhan pa ji snyed pa// bla ma'i ye shes stobs
35b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis nidasbyar ba yis ni rnyed pa'o// de nas mkha' dbyings thams cad kun// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rigs pa'i lha mo khro bo tshogs// chu sogs rkyen bzung gang bar bsam// de dag kun gyis bum pa dang // gsang dang shes
35b2(rgyud 'grel): rab ye shes dang // brtul zhugs lung brtan dbugs dbyung dang // bka' stsal pa rnams rim bzhin dbang // de yis de yi byang chub ni// sku gsung thugs kyi byang chub tshe// sems can thams cad phan 'dod pas// ngo mtshar chen po
35b3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu grub// bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis// mchod dang dbang bskur de bzhin du// byas nas gzhan la 'ga' yi don// bsgrub phyir lung 'di bsgo ba'o// nga yi khyed ni dkyil 'khor du// bcug zin dbang bskur yang
35b4(rgyud 'grel): zin gyis// khyod kyis slob dpon sgrub po las// 'dod bzhin du ni gyis shig ces// gnang nas bsnyen pa la sogs pa la// 'jug par gang yin 'gyur ba ste// de yis kyang ni khyad shwasau bya// bsam gtan 'khor los sbyang phyi ro// gnyis pa
35b5(rgyud 'grel): de ru 'jug mau nus// mthong ba'i yul la mngon zhen zhing // blo gros ngan zhing sbyor ba spangs// dang ldan snod rung de mthong nas// don rnams yal bar mi 'dor phyir// snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas// ngag sogs cho ga sngon 'gro ba'i// phyi yi
35b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba bsten bya ste// ye shes cung zad dbang gyur ltar// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// dbang bskur yang dag brtsam bya ste// gnyis med man ngag gis sbyong bya// de bzhin sku sogs 'khor lo la// cho ga sngon bzhin rgyas bya ste/
36a1(rgyud 'grel): kun khyab chos kyi dbyings ye shes// thams cad de ru rnam dag pas// bde gshegs gnas su mi bskyod dgod// gzhan gyis gnas gzhan bkod de// gnyis shes rdo rje mtshon la sogs// khyad par gzhan yang
36a2(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa bya// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma sogs// gong dang 'og gi cho ga rnams// sems kyi 'ba' zhig gtso bor gsungs// dman pa las ni mchog mi 'gyur// sems nyid glang po ya nA lta bu// gzugs la sogs la 'phan byed pas// dran
36a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro g.yongs sar lhung bar 'gyur// de nyid rab tu rtogs byas la// dran pa'i thag pa dam po yis// dmigs pa'i ka ba la btags te// 'dod bzhin pa yi yul spyod pas// ji lta bzhin du 'dus par bya// ji skad du/ sems can kun gyi
36a4(rgyud 'grel): sems gang ni// brtan pa'i phyir na sems dpar brjod// mnyam par bzhag na ting 'dzin te// de bstan pa las rdo rjer 'gyur// sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba las// slar yang rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// zhe'o// bsod nams tshogs
36a5(rgyud 'grel): kyikyi yan lag phyir// bcom ldan 'das kyis lus ngag gi/ bya ba bstan te drang srong ltar// dang po rab tu 'bring ba'o// khang skas yan lag dang po bzhin// sdeng byin ma yin dgos med min// de yi rten gyis de bzung ste// de nyid 'ba' zhig rtog
36a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ de bso sems la khyad par 'byung // longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku// de yi zhing khams yongs dag pa// sems nyid 'ba' zhig las byung ste// mtshams kyi rnam shes ji lta dang // klu khros pa yi sems bzhin du// mi mthun
36b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar yang snang ba ste// de bas sems nyid rtogs par bya// rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum gyis slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad zin to// // da ni dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga
36b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya'o// de la sgrub pa po gang zag ni// brtul zhugs sdom pa sngogs ldan pa// mi brtan lha yi nga rgyal bral// cung zad ye shes dbang gyur pa// thun mong sgrub pa shes par bya// rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas pa rnams// sgyur 'drar sems
36b3(rgyud 'grel): can dbyer med rtogs// thun mong cig shos dngos grub kyi// sgrub pa ye shes dbang gyur pa'o// de yi yid dang mthun pa'i gnas// shin tu dben pa'i ri dgon dang // rnam pa sna tshogs ri bo dang // rlung dang 'bab chu rnam sau dang ni// du ri khrod kyi/
36b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs par yang // bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di bsgo mo// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs ni// me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan// ri bo dben pa dag tu ni// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pas 'grub// lam gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig//
36b5(rgyud 'grel): drung da/ mtshan ma gcig dang zhi gnasu// rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par gyis// sgrub pa phos ni rtag tu bsgrub// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam// rab tu rnam par dben pa 'am// ri bo nags 'dab chung ngo gsu// ting 'dzin byas nas ting 'dzin 'thob//
36b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'gugs gnas mig sman dang // ka pA la ru bsgom par bya// yid du 'ong dang shis pa'i gnas// sgrub pa po yis rab nges bya// rje su mthun pa'i shis pa'i zas// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // chu dang shel dang sman dang dri// phyag rgya chen
37a1(rgyud 'grel): po rigs 'dzin gyis// lam la mkhas pa rnams kyis sngags// glang chen sha yis mngon shes bsgrub// rta yis sha yi mi snang bsgrub// 'gugs pa ba lang sha yis bsgrub// khyi sha yis ni thams cad bsgrub
37a2(rgyud 'grel): nus pa yis ni dgug par bya// med na bsam pas rnam par brtag/ ngo bo nyid dang mthun dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes// 'dod khams 'jig
37a3(rgyud 'grel): rten dbang phyug gi/ las kyi go 'phang thob par 'gyur// gtso bo gzi chen stobs dang ldan// mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong // mthong bas bskul ba ma byas kyang // 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
37a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba dam pa byang chub ste// yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di// rmongs pa'i man ngag sems 'di'o// mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa dang // rdo rje 'gugs pa mchog dag kyang // dam tshig 'di yis rnam
37a5(rgyud 'grel): par 'grub// grub pa yi ni mtshan ma ni// shin tu 'bebs pa thob pa yis// gdon mi za bar 'grub 'gyur te// bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag rdzogs// spyi yi mtshan mar shes par bya// bzlas dang bsgom dang rang lha yi// khyad par gang yin
37a6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par mdzad// rmi lam bye brag rab byed pas// so so'i mtshan ma shes par bya// bsam gtan ngag gi bzlas pa yis// dus sam byin rlabs rab sdud du// 'dod pas rnyed pa'i mtshan ma ni// rmi lam du ni shes par bya//
37b1(rgyud 'grel): lam na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs tha dad par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na bdag nyid ye shes mchog thob nas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mthu mnyam par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na mtshan dang dpe byed du ldan pa'i mang spyod
37b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sku rgyud dag pa la snang bar bdag nyid mthong ba dang / rmi lam na brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang drag po la sogs pas bdag nyid la me tog la sogs pas mchod par mthong ba dang // rmi lam na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
37b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' thams cad kyi phyi nang gi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bdag la mchod par mthong ba dang // rmi lam na bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang ba 'am// rtag pa la sogs pa'i gzugs mthong ba dang / rmi lam na rdo rje gsum 'am spyan ma la sogs pa 'am/ phyogs
37b4(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdag la btud cing phyag 'tshal bar mthong ba dang / rmi lam na mngon par dga' la sogs pa'i zhing du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa mthong ba dang / de dag kyang thugs rab tu dgyes nas chos kyi mdzod chen po gtad
37b5(rgyud 'grel): par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na bdag nyid shAkya thub pa la sogs pa'i gzugs lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas bskor zhing chos bshad par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na bdag nyid la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
37b6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis na mkha' la gdugs dkar po bteg cing / seng+ge'i khri la bzhag nas chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang / rmi lam na gdol pa'i bu mo 'am/ khyi 'am/ rta rgod ma la sogs pa 'am/ snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
38a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i mtshan ma'o// gzhan yang rmi lam na kha dog sna tshogs pa'i kun dga' ra ba dang skyed mos tshal yid du 'ong ba mthong dang / rmi lam na lha'i bu mo gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan cha dang mgu
38a2(rgyud 'grel): chu dang / nu 'bur dang / zur phud la sogs pas brgyan pa dang / mi'i khye'u dang bu mo yid du 'ong ba bcu drug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mthong ba ni/ thun mong gis grub pa'i mtshan ma'o// rigs 'dzin la sogs yongs smin
38a3(rgyud 'grel): las/ dzam+bu gse 'dra'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// de bas de dag thams cad kun// cig shos mtshan mar shes par bya// sngon du bya ba'i las kyi rgyal po mchog ni// sngags pa rnam par dag pa yis// de dag rab tu rtogs byas nas//
38a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi phyir na gnyis kyis kyang // ci rigs gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// dben par gtsang gtor byas nasu// dgegs bskrad sa la gsol pa gdab// cig shos la yang gsol byas nas// bka' stsal sa ni brko bar bya// sngon gyi
38a5(rgyud 'grel): rim pa shes byasapa// sa steng rgyan dang ldan pa dang // dag bya'i phyir na gong bzhin du// dbang bskur blang bas yid sbyar bya// rdo rjes khyad par byas pa yi// sa 'dzin lta bur byin rlabs la// bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsum gnas pas//
38a6(rgyud 'grel): de dbus nga rgyal gsum ldan bya// sngon bzhin rtag sogs gsol btab nas// byin rlabs stangs thabs brtsam pa'o// phur bus btab nas sa srung ste// nub gcig sta gon gnas par bya// lha rnams gnas par byas nasu// brod bskyed
38b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa sna tshogs brtsam// dgongs par bya phyir gong ma bzhin// 'khor lo gsol ba gdab par bya// lha mo bzhi dang mi bskyod pa// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bum pa ni// rdzas dang ldan par sta gon bya// yod na bcu dgu nges pa'o// skud pa
38b2(rgyud 'grel): tshon rtsi 'dus byas la// sngon bzhin 'bebs pa'i cho ga bya// de yis thig dang tshon btab nas// zhal sogs ldan pa'i phyag rgya dgod// gzhan la ma thos sems can rnams// gzung bar bya phyir sngon bzhin bshad// gnas rnams
38b3(rgyud 'grel): stong pa mi mdzes pas// dad chung srid pas de ma sngags// mi rnams kyis ni phye ma yis// zhal la sogs pa rdzogs mi 'gyur// yan lag ma rdzogs byin mi rlob// de bas lha yis mdzes pa sngags// rang gi phyag rgya 'am sems kyi su// lha
38b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams rab tu gnas byas nas// byin rlabs mngon du mchod pa sogs// brtsams te 'byung gtor khyad par du// rnam rgyal sbyor bas skyon bsal nas// tshim par bya phyir lha rnams la// ji srid rdzas kyi thabs rnamasu// sbyin sreg gis
38b5(rgyud 'grel): ni mnyes bya'o// slob ma zhugs pa'i rim pa bzhin// bdag nyid 'khor lor zhugs par bya// sdig bshags me tog 'dor ba'i bar// byas nas lha rnams kyis gnang ba'i// sngon bzhin bum pa gsang ba dang // shes rab ye shes
38b6(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs dang // lung bstan dbugs dbyung bka' stsal thob// de yis bsgrub pa brtsam pa'o// / sgrub pa'i thabs gang zhe na/ dang po de bzhin gshegs pa yi// rigs 'dzin sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o//
39a1(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin byas pa'i sngags pa yis// thun mong cig shos bgegs bsal nas// spyi gzugs gyur nas rtag pa las// byung ba'i gzhal yas khyang pa bsgom// lnga dang bzhi pas mchog dang po// rab bskyed sku
39a2(rgyud 'grel): rims bzhi spangs nas// dri za rab tu zhugs byas pas// de ni cho ga bzhin du zhu// rang gi tshangs pa'i spyod pa bzhi// mA ma kI la sogs gyur nas// bskul te thim gyur sa bon gyur// phyag mtshan des mtshan bshes gnyen zhus// do las
39a3(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa mngon bzhin bskyed// de yi thugs kar zla ba la// oM las 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan// bsams nas sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs// oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko hi/ gnyis sogs ma gtogs de phyag rgya// gnas nas sngags
39a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di bsgom par bya// oM AHoM dzi na dzika hUM/ brjod pas oM las 'od zer tshogs// dkar ba'i rgyun gyis nang gsal te// baM spu bu ga nas spros pa'i// 'od rtse rtag pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// nam mkha'i khams kun bkang byas nas// sangs
39a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rtag pa spyan drangs nas// rang gi ba spu bu gar bzung // brtan pa'i ngo bos phyag byas nas// yang dang yang du dus bzhir bsgom// de nas zhag bdun la sogs nas// nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni// 'byung po rnams la gtor byin rba
39a6(rgyud 'grel): yang ni sbyor ba der zhen bya// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ldan pas// rdo rje'i sgra ni rgya mcho gau/ zla ba phyed na nges pa ru// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten nas ni// rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba'i// sangs rgyas sku na 'a
39b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od// rdo rje bskul pa gsum du gnas// thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te// 'od dpag med bsgoms mgrin pa ru// A las pad+ma A yis mtshan// bsams nas bzlas brjod yang bya'o// oM AHA ro lig hUM/ de yis sngon
39b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'od dpag med// spros te bkug nas rang la btsud// bstan byas sngon bzhin rab bsgrubs nas// zla ba phyed na 'grub par nges// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yis// rdo rje chos ni bsten byas nas// de dang 'dra ba'i 'od thob ste// rdo rje bskal pa
39b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum du gnas// sngon bzhin mi bskyod rab bskyed de// thugs kar hU~M las rdo rje la// hUM gi mtshon pa rab bsams la// sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o// oM AHhUM badz+ra d+h+r-ik+ka hUM// sangs rgyas mi bskyod chags rnams kyang // btsud nas chags par byas
39b4(rgyud 'grel): nas su// mngon bzhin nye mtshan mthong bsgrubs nas// zla phyed 'grub par the tshom med// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// ston pa rdo rje thugs 'dra ba// ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// thams cad sngon bzhin
39b5(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas te// mi bskyod cho ga bzhin bskyed nas// thugs kar rdo rje bum pa ru// oM bsams bzlas brjod bya ba'o// oM d+harma d+hA dz+nyA na rastu hUM// mi bskyed tshogs bkug ston bzhin du// zhugs nas chags byas nye ba mthong // gtor ma btang nas rab
39b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs nas// zla phyed mi bskyod 'dra ba thob// mi bskyod pa yi sku dag dang // gsung dang thugs mchog 'dra ba 'dzin// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// mi bskyod rdo rje mchod par 'gyur// rim chen 'byung ldan sngon bzhin bskyed// thugs kar
40a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma la gnas pa'i// oM bzlas pa yi 'grub pa'o// de dang 'dra bar bsgrub par bya// oM AHoM sa man+ta dz+nyA na rastu hUM/ de yis rin chen 'byung ldan tshogs// spros pa bkug nas rab tu btsud// brtan byas gong bzhin
40a2(rgyud 'grel): rab bsgrubs na// zla ba phyed na rab tu 'grub// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rin chen 'byung ba'i 'od dang 'dra// de ni byang chub bdag med dang // ye shes gsang ba'i gnasu 'gyur// 'od dpag med pa bsgom byas la// de yi thugs kar pad+ma la//
40a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i oM ni bzlas byas pas// dpag med 'dra ba bsgrub par bya// oM AHoM pra tA bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na rastu hUM/ 'od dpag med pa'i tshogs spros pas// bkug nas brtan byas chags byas nas// gong ma bzhin du rab bsgrubs nas// zla ba phyed na
40a4(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par nges// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// dpag med pA yi 'od dang 'dra// 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi// theg chen lam gyi mchog tu 'gyur// sngon bzhin don yod grub bsgoms la// thugs kar ral gri yu ba la// zla ba'i dbus su oM
40a5(rgyud 'grel): bsams la// sngags kyi bzlas brjod brtsam pa'o// oM AHoM kri ta a nu sta nA dz+nyA na rastu hUM/ de nis don yod grub pa'i tshogs// spros te bkug byas zhugs byas la// gnas brtan ngo bor chags byas nas// zla ba phyed na de dag 'grub// sku dang gsung
40a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rdo rje yi// rdo rje thogs med 'dra ba 'ong // de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho// sems can don kun 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin snang mdzad bsgoms byas te// sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o// oM AHoM A dor sha dz+nyA na badz+ra ra sU hU~M// sngon ba'i
40b1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs sogs rab byas nas// zla phyed de dang 'dra bar 'grub// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te// snang mdzad mgo mgrin thugs ka ru// 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje la// zla ba'i dbus nas oM gsum gnas// oM AHA oM oM tri ka ka ra ya sU hUM/ de yis rdo rje
40b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi tshogs// bkug nas gnas gsum du brtan paH// byas nas nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong // gong bzhin byas na zla phyed 'grub// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// sangs rgyas snang mdzad 'dra ba'i mdog/ de ni byang chub ye shes dang // sku gsung
40b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes 'grub par 'gyur// de yi rim pas mi bskyod sogs// rang rang ngo bos rab bsgrubs nas// dpal ldan zla ba phyed grub nas// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// de bzhin de ltar de gnyis sam// gcig la'am gsum du goms byas nas// rgyal ba'i
40b4(rgyud 'grel): sras po mos pa yis// nyung ngam lhag par gnas par 'gyur// sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la// rnam par snang mdzad cho ga bzhin// bskyed nas chos dbyings byin brlabs nas// lag pa g.yas par 'khor lo bskyed// 'khor lo gser sogs
40b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos byas la// oM bskyed lte bar rtag pa yi// 'khor lo chen po rab bsgoms te// sngags kyi bzlas brjod partsam pa'o// oM AHdzi na dzaM ka tsakra ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ 'od zer gyis bkug rtag dkyil 'khor// bsdus te bcug nas brtan byas pas// drod
40b6(rgyud 'grel): dang dud dang 'thul 'bor ba dang / nam mkha' la ni 'phar bar 'gyur// de yi steng du sum bsams nas// lag tu babs nas spyan mas bzla// 'byung po rnams la gtor sbyin la// phyag byas zla ba byed nas 'grub// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rab tu
41a1(rgyud 'grel): phra ba'i rdul skyed kyi// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun// de ma rna su 'brang bar 'gyur// sngon bzhin ma bskyod rab bsgoms la// rdo rje dngos byas thubaskyed de// rdo rje dngas kyi 'khru la bsgom// sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o//
41a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra d+h+r-ika badz+ra ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi spro ba dang bsdu// brtan par byas la chags byas nas// sngon bzhin rab tu bsgrub gyur na// zla ba phyed na 'grub par nges// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// de snyed kyi na bud med
41a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// yon tan can gyi bdag gir 'gyur// drag po dag gis phyag byas pa// khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur// sngon bzhin rgyas par rin chen 'byung // bsgoms nas sgra bskyed rin chen dngos// rin chen rigs kyi lha bsgoms la// sngags
41a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o// oM AHrat+na d+h+r-i ka rat+na ar+tha sid+d+hi swA hA/ rin chen rigs kyi lha rnams kun// spro zhing bsdu bas bstan byas nas// nye ba'i mtshan mthong ston bzhin bsgoms// zla ba phyed 'grub the tshom med// ye shes lnga ldan brten na ni/
41a5(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsang pa gsum la bsnyen bkur byed// de bzhin dpag med tshe bsgoms la// gser sogs pad+ma a las skyes// lte bar gsung rigs lho bsgoms
41a6(rgyud 'grel): la bzlas brjod rab tu bya ba'o// oM AHA ro lig ka ma la ar+tha sid+d+hi swA hA/ de spros gsung gi rigs bkug nas// bcug nas brtan bya yang yang bsgom// mtshan ma thob nas gtor ma gtang // zla ba phyed na de 'grub 'gyur// ri rab
41b1(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed la// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed// don yod grub pa sngon bzhin bsgom// ral gri dngos byas hA las bskyed// las kyi lha rnams yu bar bsgom// sngags
41b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa brtsam pa'o// oM AHpradz+nyA d+h+r-ika kharma ar+d+ha sid+d+hi swA hA/ las kyi rigs kyi lha rnams spro// bsdu zhing bcug nas chags byas na// de mtshan mthong nas sngon bzhin bsdu'o// zla phyed kyis ni nges par 'grub// khams gsum kun gyis ra
41b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing // tshangs la sogs pas phyag byas kyang // stong gsum na ni mchog tu dpa'// mi mchog gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur// gang rnams 'dod dang bsam pa dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje thugs las rab byung ba// de lta
41b4(rgyud 'grel): bu yi dngos grub ster// / 'khor lo la sogs grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang gi bye snyed thams cad du// grub pa kun tu rnam par spyod// dam tshig dam pa thams cad kyi// rig pa
41b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// rdo rje sku ni rab bsgoms pas// de ni dam tshig mchog tu 'gyur// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te// 'jam dpal bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs// thugs kar ral gri yu ba la// haM gi 'od ldan bzlas brjod bya// oM AH
41b6(rgyud 'grel): haM many+dzu shrI hUM phaT/ de yi 'od kyi nang gsal nas// ba spu las byung 'od zer lnga// thams cad 'jam dpal bskur byas te// bkug cing bu gar thim par bya// yang nas yang du bstan byas pas// ba spu dbang po gzhu mthong nas// 'byung po gtor byin
42a1(rgyud 'grel): chags byas nas// zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub// 'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' de 'gyur ro// yang ni 'jam
42a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal de bzhin bsgom// ral gri yu bar bcug 'phen gnas// bzlas brjod byas la gong bzhin dpag/ de dang 'dra bar bsgrub par bya// oM AHb+h+rUM many+dzu hUM swA hA/ de ni zla ba phyed na yang // 'od zer 'bar bar gyur pa yin// rdul phran
42a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lus dag gi/ rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// snga ma bzhin du kun shes bya// gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bcu// longs spyod dang po rdzogs pa la// mtshan ma yis ni de 'dra 'grub// tho ba dbyug pa pad+ma dang // rdo rje lcags kyu dbyug gsal
42a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal zhing // ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje rnams// dngos byas 'khor lho gcig bsgom brjod// A~M AHya mAn+ta kr-it+ta mu gA ra sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHpradz+nyA na ta kr-itA badz+ra d+ha na da sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHpad+mA na ta kr-ita pad+ma sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHbig+h+nAn ta kr-ita badz+ra sid+d+hi hUM/ oM
42a5(rgyud 'grel): AHnI la DaN+Da sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHma hA ba la tI shu la sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHtsa la khaD+ga sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHtsakra ba ra ti tsakra sid+d+hi hU~M/ oM AHsum b+he badz+re sid+d+ha hUM/ daM yis khro bo'i tshogs bkug sde// bcug nas bstan par bya sa nas su// mngon bzhin
42a6(rgyud 'grel): gtor sogs kyis bsgrubs na// de 'dra zla ba phyed na 'grub// yang na rtag pa 'od dpag med// mig bskyod pa yis mtshan ma rnams// bsgrubs te rang gi lha bcug pas// zla phyed de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// mi snang ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o//
42b1(rgyud 'grel): sngon du spyi yi cho ga sogs// rgyas par rab tu bshad 'gyur yang // bde blag tu ni rtogs bya'i phyir// yang ni thugs rjes bsdus te bstan// mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'dzab bzlas cho ga la sogs nas// lhas dbang bskur ba'i bar zhugs
42b2(rgyud 'grel): da bde ba'i stan la 'dug pad+ma byA// daglegs bzlog tshig nas 'jams te// brgyad kyis na mkha'i snying po bsgyud// chos dbyings byin rlabs lus kun la// gnas bzhi mya rtogs kham gis myatshan/ oM AHkha~M gra na kha gar+b+had+hI/ de yi 'od kyi
42b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams// na mkha'i snying po'i sgrad byas la// bkug ste khams kun la bstim la// na mkha' bozhin du stong par bsam// bdag gi yan lag mi mthong sogs// 'byung po gtor ma yang byin te// chags byas yang du bsgrub
42b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur na// zla ba phyed na mi snang 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yang dag yang du mchod pa dang // bskal pa gcig tu gnas pa dang // sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs 'gyur// bzhi yis 'bras bu gzhan yin/
42b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ de bshad gsang ba'i thig le las// rim pa 'di bzhin tshig 'grub pa// 'jig rten dbang po bsgrub pa bshad// thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la// spyan ras gzigs dbang bsgom par bya// de lce hri las pad+ma ni// 'dab brgyad
42b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dun du rdo rje ni// oM AHhri lo ke shwa ra b+ha d+ha na ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ bzlas pa thos pas sangs rgyas rnams// 'jig rten dbang ni bskur byas te// bkug ste lce la bcug nas ni// gnas brtan ngo bor chags par bya// lce de rdo rje mthong gyur nas//
43a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma byin te yang yang bsgom// zla ba phyed na nges pa ru// tshig gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub// bden pa ru ni smra ba dang // shags dang rgol ba sun 'byin dang // kun thos rnams ni yid 'ong bar// 'gyur ba 'di
43a2(rgyud 'grel): la the tshom med// de las yang ni bsgrub pa'i mchog/ mtshon tsho rnams ni 'jig 'gyur ba// phyi mar gsungs pa 'byung ba'i phyir// de yi bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad// sngon gsungs rgyas par bshad pa yi// cho ga rnams ni rdzogs byas
43a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ klu shing me tog mtshan pa yi// snang mdzad 'dra ba'i byams pa bskyed// thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i// me ni cho ga bzhin bsgoms la// bzlas brjod byas pas byams pa yis// tshogs kyis khams gsum dgang ba'o//
43a4(rgyud 'grel): AHme ma hA me b+ha ra sa ra Na hUM swA hA/ de yis sems can thams cad lo// byams pas dmigs byas snying rje sogs// khro dang bral bar rab bsams la// sems can de dag rab tu bsdu// brtan par rab tu chags byas la// ral gri so
43a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs ma gtogs te// 'byung po gtor sbyin yang bsgoms na// zla phyed mtshon chas mi tshugaso// 'phen dang mi 'phen la sogs pa// mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig par 'gyur// btab 'gyur 'thor ram me tog 'gyur// gang mthong byams
43a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dang ldan pa'o// sngon bzhin bya ba thams cad bya// 'jam dpal cho ga bzhin bsgoms la// thugs kar ral gri yu bar maM// bsam nas bzlas brjod par bya'o// oM AHmaM many+dzu shrI ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ 'od zer stug pos nang
43b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal te// ba spu gu ga las byung bas// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam dpal skur// byas te bkug nas pa spu yi// bu gar bcu gnas stong pa nyid// bsam nas sngon bzhin rtogs gyur na// bar chad zhi bar byas nasu// bsgrubs na zla ba phyed na
43b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grubar/ dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od dag gis// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// grub pa'i mtshan ma snang bar 'gyur// tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas// nam yang mthong bar mi nus so// yang ni sngon bzhin thong
43b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po gang yang rang rung // cho ga bzhin du dang pos bsgrub// de yis bsgrub pa'i ri lu gsungs// bdud rtsi lnga 'am rtag shar sbyar// khyi sha 'am sha chen dag dang sbyar// ba lab shA 'am bshang srin bu// ga bur tsan+dan dang sbyar ba 'am// 'gi haM
43b4(rgyud 'grel): oM ka ru ra sbyar ba 'am// ga bur gur gum sbyar ba yis// ril bu skrod byed lnga sbyor tsam// nyi ma zla ba sreg byed kyi// nyi ma man tsha bzhi dang ni// sreg byed gcig ste zla ba gnyis// bkri ba tsa na'i 'bru tsam du// o 'am AH'am hUM las bskyed// khar bcug/
43b5(rgyud 'grel): nas ni de dbus su// rang gi 'khor lo rab bsgoms la// de yis de yi sangs rgyas tshogs// bkug ste bcug nas bzlas brjod bya// oM AHgu la an+d+ra sid+d+hi hUM/ brtan pa'i ngo bor chags byas nas// 'bar sogs mtshan ma mthong bar 'gyur//
43b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po gtor ma yang byin nas// bsgoms nas zla phyed mi snang 'gyur// rdo rje sku dang rab 'dra zhing // nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra ste// dzam+bu na da'i gser 'od kyi// byang chub ye shes thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dpal dang ldan pa yi// sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra/
44a1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'gyur// dpag tshad bye ba gang+gA yi// steng du rdo rje 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo ni// lha yi longs spyod brtul zhugs sam// yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la// stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyod// thaMd
44a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin rab byas te// rang gi lha ni dang po dmigs// dkyil 'khor dbus su man 'dza'i steng // thod pa yis ni brgyan par bya// bdud rtsi ldi ni go rim bzhin// gong gi cho gas dag byas na// oM AHhUM yig gsum po ni// brgya dang brgyad du bzlas pa
44a3(rgyud 'grel): byed/ de yi dro ba la sogs pa// mthong nas bar chad zhi bya ste// yang ni sbyor bas brtan byas na// zla phyed sangs rgyas kyis mi mthong // de bzhin bshad pa 'ba' zhig gam// khyi sha r+d+ha sha 'bras chen sha/ gong gi tshogs rab zos na// sangs rgyas nyims
44a4(rgyud 'grel): mi mthong ngo // mi snang gyur pa kun las mchog/ stong khams dag ni snang bar byed // sangs rgyas kun la 'phrog dang // lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod// / mig sman bsgrub pa bshad par bya'o// mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor
44a5(rgyud 'grel): pas// thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba ni// longs spyod dang pos rdzogs par bya// nya yi dusu brtsams na ni// dro sogs rgyu las rab byung ba// brgyad kyi dusu shes byas la// bcu bzhi'i dusu bsgrub par bya// gong gi gnas
44a6(rgyud 'grel): su song nas kyang // thod pa nyid kyi steng 'dug nas// mdun du thod pa'i man 'jil// skyes pa'i thod pa bzang po bzhag/ de yi nang du tshil chen la// khrag dang bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang // pad+ma'i khong srog dur ras dkris// de la me maro 'bar bar bya//
44b1(rgyud 'grel): spyad mkhan thod pas steng bkab nas// dwe yi dud pas blangs nasu// 'ug pa'i mgo ni bsregs byas nas// pad+ma'i rak+ta bsre bar bya// spyod kyi dusu btags nasasu// bya rgod rje bar nang bkang la// pad+ma'i zil pas brlan par bya// 'od med thur mas mig la
44b2(rgyud 'grel): bskud/ de yi the rangs dus nas ni// gnod sbyin gter rnams mthong ba dang // 'gro kun dbang du 'gyur ba dang // gzi can kun gyis mi mthong 'gyur// rigs 'dzin grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bskal par gso bar gnas pa'i rgyu// bdud rtsi sman gyi cho ga
44b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ ji bzhin du ni bshad par bya// thabs dang shes rab dbye ba yis// dkon mchog dpa' dang 'od dpag med// dbu rgyan la ni bsam byas la// gnyisu med pa'i ros zhu 'gyur// tshim pa'i cho ga bzhin drangs nas// rtsa rgyus thams cad khyab par
44b4(rgyud 'grel): byas// rlung dang byad kan mkhris pa ni// khros par gyur kyang mi thub bo// skal dbang rnams la gsum po yis// mos pa'i sems can bzung po'i phyir// mthun pa'i cho ga la gnas nas// rang rang dam tshig gis gnas bya// thugs rjes non pa'i sngags
44b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// nyan thos gzugs kyis gnyis med spangs// dge ba bcu la btsud nas ni// rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin rang sangs rgyas gzugs kyis// lus kyi rdzu 'phrul dpag med mdzad// btsud nas de don 'di la bkod// slar yang rang gi ngo bor
44b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de bzhin skad cig oM las bskyed// tshangs pa chen po zhal bzhi pa// mtshan dang rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa// tshangs skud se ral cod pan la// rdo rje sems dpas mtshan pa yi// dang po dbyug pa rtse gsum gyis// mtshan pas zhi ba'i ku tsa btsir//
45a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na bgrang 'phreng 'gu Da 'dzin// dang steng pad+ma zla bar gnas// gti mug lam gyis dman pa rnams// 'jigs pa bskyed cing mos ma thag/ rang gi lha yi skur 'gyur ro// a lus bskyed pa'i drag po ni// thal mdog zhal
45a2(rgyud 'grel): cig spyan gsum pa// zla phyed dang ldan cid pan la// rdo rje sems dpas mtshan pa'o// kha T+wAM mgul pa dril mtshan pa'i// phyag g.yas kyis ni phrag pa brten// bdud rtsi lngas gang thod pa ni// g.yon pas bsnan shing 'khyud pa'o// u ma sku
45a3(rgyud 'grel): mdog sor po ste// me tog sna tshogs sku la dkris// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan pa// rdo rje rtse mo nang bltas bsnams// gnyis kyis de yi ku tsa 'dzin// stag lpags sham thabs glang steng na// pad+ma zla ba la gnas nas// zla ba'i 'od kyis rgyan
45a4(rgyud 'grel): du mtshan// de yi gzugs kyis 'dod chags can// bud med dngos po gsum spyang na// btsud nas mos ma thag tu ni// rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba'o// hUM las bskyed pa'i khyab 'jug gzugs// nag po rin chen dbu rgyan can// rdo rje sems dpa'
45a5(rgyud 'grel): ral pa mtshan// phyag bzhi 'khor lo rje gsum dang // 'bud dung rin chen ldan pa'o// lha mo gser sku'i bdag nyid 'dra// thod du me tog sna tshogs dkris// mtshan ma bdag 'dra rgyan rnams brgyan// dang po gnyis kyis legs par 'khyud//
45a6(rgyud 'grel): khyung steng pad+ma nyi mo la// nyi ma'i 'od kyis rgyab brten mdzad// de yis gzugs khams gsum ni gnas// sdang ba rnams ni bsad ni su// yal bar mi 'gyur brtson byas nas// slar yang rang gi bdag nyid 'gyur// de ltar de bzhin sha
45b1(rgyud 'grel): bza' zhing // gzhan gyi bud med spyod pa yis// gnod sbyin pho mo bsgrubs na ni// don byas yang ni grol bar 'gyur// 'o ma dang ni phra ma dang // 'dod yon lnga dang dri rnams kyis// klu yi bu mo bsten byas na// yang ni grol nas ngo bo
45b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas// khro zhing nga rgyal gnod sems ldan// spos dang me tog spyad pa yis// lha min bu mo mnyes byas la// grol nas rang gi skur 'gyuraro// zos rung sdug pa 'bru mar gyis// srin po rnams ni dga' bar bya// de bzhin 'byung po rnams
45b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang ngo // des kyang gtsang ba'i don chen byed// bdud rtsi lnga 'am khrag dag gam// chang la sogs pa 'thungs pa yis// go'u ri la sogs mnyes byas la// sdang ba ma lus bsad par bya// de bzhin brgya byin la sogs pa'i// ngo bo dam
45b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig la gnas nas// de 'dra'i sems can gdul bya'i phyir// gzugs kyis de tsam gnas pa'o// ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba// khams rnams dag na rnam par spyod// sems can kun la phan 'dod pas// dam tshig ma lus spyad par
45b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ gang dang gang gi bsam pa yis// 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs can de// thugs rjes non pa de dang der// snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams kyis bstan// da ni mngon par shes pa lnga// bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// mtshan ma thob
45b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon bzhin bzlas pa'i cho ga nas// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas// lha yis dbang bskur ba zhugs te// bgegs dgra sbyor ba nas brtsams te// chos kyi dbyingasu byin gyis brlab// gnyis kyis bsgrub pa rnam tra/
46a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad / gtsug la 'bras bu gnyis shes// mag gnas dang nan gnas/ dpral bstud ga lbu ba ma// spyan bzhin sogs mapa gnas las/ 'kha la mags da yi maHsa// de las ban pa ga /
46a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bskyed// de rnams thugs kyi 'od zer gyis// sangs rgyas rnam bkug zhugs byas pas// rdo rje sngar gyur bcung 'phen mtshan// oM AHbadz+ra d+h+r-ika pan+d+ha bI b+hi ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM/ swA hA/ de brjod 'od zer 'bros pa yis// sangs rgyas sa snyi sa
46a3(rgyud 'grel): byas pas// bkug ste gnas bcug brtan byas nas// bar du chod pa'ang mthong la sogs// dngos grub par chod nyer zhi'i phyir// 'byung po sogs la gtor byin nas// kong gi sbyor bas chags byas na// zla ba phyed na 'grub par 'gyur// de
46a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rtag pa rin chen 'byung // 'od dpag med dang don yod grub// 'khor le rin chen pad+ma dang // ral gri gyur pa bcud 'phen mtshan// oM AHtri na dzi ka pany+tsa a bi b+h+r-i ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ oM rat+na d+h+r-ika pany+tsa a b+hi b+h+r-i ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/
46a5(rgyud 'grel): oM U ra li ka pany+tsa a b+hi b+h+yid ar+tha sid+d+hi trAM s+yAhA/ oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ban+d+ha a b+hi b+h+ri ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ brjod cing spros pas gong ma ltar// sa snying la sogs bcu byas te// mtshan mthong gi tshod zhi byas nis// zla ba phyed na nges par 'gro'o/
46a6(rgyud 'grel): gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams// nyid kyi rdo rje gdan bzhugs pa// shing rtogs lag tu bzhag pa bzhin// rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag na// rna ba'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin// sgra grags pa ni ji snyed pa// mngon
46b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rna bas thos pa'o// gAd+hA'i bye snyed zhing dag gi/ sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis mtshan// gar mkhan la sogs rig par 'gyur// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// 'khor ba dag na gnas pa yi//
46b2(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi gnas kyi brtan tshigs brtags// zhag gsum 'das pa bzhin du dran// gang+gA'i byi snying zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas sprin gyis brgyan pa'i sku// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog gis 'gengs// sangs rgyas
46b3(rgyud 'grel): mngon shes rgyu yi phyir// phul du 'byung bar bshad pa ste// grangs dang tshad du rab ldan pa'i// mngon par shes pa rtogs par bya// gang+gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa'i// 'khor gyis yongs su bskor na su// rdo rje sku dang gsung thugs kyis//
46b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams kun bgrod par 'gyur// / da ni dgug pa'i cho ga'i las 'ga' zhig bshad par bya'o// mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gong gsungs gnasu ji lta bzhin// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor
46b5(rgyud 'grel): b+hi byas nas// lha yis dbang bskur byas nas// dka' yi 'khor lo sogs sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa'i sngon 'gro ba'i// 'dod pa'i lha ru dmigs byas la// mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab// lcags kyu gnas ni bsgrub pa'i
46b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ rdo rje gsum gyis byin gyis brlab// yi ge gsum par rang rang sngags// rig pa dang bcas bzlas par bya// rdo rje gsum las 'phros pa yi// lcags kyus mtshan pa'i lha rnams spro// skyes pa bud med la sogs pa// sen
47a1(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pa yang rung // rlung gi dkyil 'khor thog gnas pa// lcags kyus snying gar sbyar bar bya// rims bzhin 'ongs te lam byung gis// phab te 'dun du zla gnas la// 'og 'byung tshogs mA ma kI/ spyan ma zhi
47a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bsrung bar bya// de ltar byas pas ji tsam du// 'dod pa'i las ni byed nus pas// cho ga'i mchog ni 'di nyid ni// dgug pa kun la spyi ru sbyar// de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang // rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan par bskum// sngon
47a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rlung dkyil la gnas pa'i// mi yi bu mo mchog rnams dgug/ oM AHbig+h+nAn ta kr-ita bu mo che ge oM A kaR+Sha ya dza hUM dzaM brgya rtsa lnga bcur brjod par bya// sngon bzhin 'dod pa'i rgyal po yang // rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlab la//
47a4(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// na mkha'i bu mo dgug par bya// oM A Tak+ki ri dza na mkha'i bu mo A kaR+Sha ya dza hUM dza/ sbyor ba de ltar gnod mdzes kyang // rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan bsgoms la// lha ma yin gyi bu mo mchog/
47a5(rgyud 'grel): rlung dkyil tri shu lcags kyus dgug/ oM A suM ba ra dza lha ma yin gyi bu mo A kaR+Sha ya dza hUM dza/ sngon bzhin 'jam dpal rdo rje bskyed// rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlab la// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// gnod sbyin bu mo'i cod
47a6(rgyud 'grel): pan la/ mnan phyir khro bo gshin rje gshed// bskal pa'i bsregs pa ltar bsams la// lcags kyu zhags pas snying gar sbyar// mngag gzhug don du dgug par bya// rang rang sngags kyi khyad par dang // phyag rgya'i khyad par
47b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis// dgug par rang rang thabasu gsungs// gzhan du byas na mi 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// yang dang yang du bskul bar bya// de nyid lha rnams thams cad dang // rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'o// rdo rje rgya
47b2(rgyud 'grel): mtsho rkang pas gnon pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ri mo'i cho ga sngon bstan bzhin// chu yi drung sogs bris nas kyang // lha yis dbang bskur bar gyis zhugs// bka' yi 'khor lo la sogs pa/
47b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed nas kyang // dri za 'jug pa la sogs pas// byang chub sems su zhu bar 'gyur// de las phyogs bzhi dbus lnga'i chu// bruM aM dzi khaM hUM du gyur// de la mtshan ma de yis mtshan// spro bsdu las ni rigs lngar
47b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur// mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bkod// de rnams kyi ni ye shes kyis// bskul sogs sngon 'gro dbang bskur bya// de yi dbu la bdag nyid ni// rdo rje 'chad pa rig mar bcas// mi bskyod
47b5(rgyud 'grel): dbu gnas zhabs bzhi yis// sangs rgyas bzhi yi spyi bor bsgom// oM AHsarba bud d+ha ma ku At+ma haM hUM/ nga rgyal de yis brtan par gnas// chu la sogs pa reg rung ste// 'byung po mnyes par byas na su// chags byas zla ba phyed
47b6(rgyud 'grel): na 'grub// de nas rtag pa la sogs pa'o// rnal 'byor ldan pas chu yi rdul// spyan la sogs pa bsgoms byas nas// dus de nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// 'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs pas// chu rnams rang gi gzugasu bsgom// gong bzhin
48a1(rgyud 'grel): brtan par rab byas nas// zla ba phyed na 'grub par 'gyur// grub nas rgya mtsho bzhi la sogs// thams cad kun tu 'chag 'gyur te// thang la bya ba ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa ni spyod par byed// thams cad sngon bzhin rab
48a2(rgyud 'grel): byas ted/ rdo rje sems dpa' sngon 'gro ba'i// bi dang rdo rje snyir po las// dpa' bo rdo rje bsgrubs par bya// cung zad ser la g.yas g.yon zhal// nag dang dkar po bsgom par bya// dang pos 'khyud cing lhag mo na// rdo rje ral gri nor bu pad// rgyan rnams
48a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// mig dang lus rdzogs byin brlabs nas// bskul ba la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i// mi bskyod pa yis dbu rgyan bsam// oM AHbi bi ra badz+ra hUM phaT swA hA/ bzlas pa sngon bzhin rab byas pas// sangs rgyas
48a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad de ru byas// bkug ste bcug nas brtan byar pas// zla ba phyed na bka' nyan te// dgug dang dbang du bya ba sogs// sman dang sngags kyi dngos grub rnams// sgrub pa po ni ci 'dod pa'o// de dag thams cad sbyin par byed// yang ni
48a5(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin thams cad bya// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// chu dang pad+ma dkar po las// tsuM gyis mtshan pa bsam par bya// de yi 'od 'phros sangs rgyas kyis// phyogs bcu la gnas sangs rgyas sogs// skul byed pa yi gzugs byas
48a6(rgyud 'grel): nasad/ bkug ste de ru bzhug par bya// de la sangs rgyas rdo rje ma// dkar mo g.yas g.yon nag dang dmar// dang po thabs la 'khyud pa dang // pad snod ral gri nor bu 'bar// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// mig dang lus sogs
48b1(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs la// bskul ba sngon du 'gro ba yi// mi bskyod pa yis dgu rgyan bya// de yi ye shes sems ma yi// thugs kar zla ba tsuM bkod de// spro bsdu gzhug pa snga ma bzhin// sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ba'o// oM a tsa le tsu le tsun+da le swA hA hUM swA hA/
48b2(rgyud 'grel): de yis zla ba phyed na ni// zhi ba la sogs gang yang rung // sgrub pa po yid la 'dod pa'i// dngos grub rnams ni ster bar 'gyur// khyad par du ni bum bzang dang // yid bzhin nor dang dpag bas mau shing // rnal 'byor pa ni gang 'dod pa// sgrub pa
48b3(rgyud 'grel): la sbyin par byed// snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya// rdo rje sems las byung ba yi// dzaM dang ral gri 'bras bu ni// dzaM gis mtshan pa bsam par bya// de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams// gnod gnas kyi ni bskur byas nas// bkug nas de lnga thim
48b4(rgyud 'grel): par byo// de la gnod sbyin dbang po che// gsus che rkang pa thung ba ste// gser 'dra g.yas g.yon nag dang dkar// dang bos 'phags ma nor rgyun 'khyud// lhag mas pi dza pu r+ya dang // sre mo rin chen skyug byed dang // rin chen ral gri 'dzin
48b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// zhabs g.yas rdo rje mtshan pa yi// bum pa bzang la rab bzhag ste// g.yon pa btsan dkyil du gnas pa// zla steng de yi 'od kyis mtshan// nor rgyun de dang dang po na// mtshig sbyin 'bras kyi ste ldan pa// sku 'jam dbu la me tog
48b6(rgyud 'grel): gi/ sna tshogs thod bcings zhi ba'o// gzhan gyi spyan zlum yid dga' ba'o// spyi bo snying ga lte ba dang // gsang ba dang ni rkang mthil du// zla ba nyi mar go rim bzhin// rtag pa mi 'khrug rin chen che// 'od dpag med dang don grub bsgom//
49a1(rgyud 'grel): sku sogs byin gyis brlab byas nas// bskul ba sngon du 'gro ba yi// mi bskyod pa yis dbu rgyan bya// de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi// thugs kAr zla bar dzaM bkod de// sngon bzhin nor gyi char 'bebs pa// brtsom pa bcug
49a2(rgyud 'grel): ste bzlas brjod bya// oM A dzaM b+ha l-i dza len+d+ra ye hUM phaT swA hA/ de yis zla ba phyed na ni// nyin re gser srang stong stong gi/ sgrub pa po la rab sbyin par// 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med// / yang ni rang 'dod sbyor ba yis// yan lag
49a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad ni rdzogs byas te// rdo rje pad+ma sbyar brtsams nas// bde gshegs rang gi zhal du gzhug/ zhu nas rdo phyung pad nang du// byang chub sems ci bcu dgu'o// de las gtso bo gnod gnas kyis// 'brel pa'i 'khor lo brtan par bya// de yi mig la
49a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang // sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlabs// yang ni rang gi sa bon gyis// 'od kyis bde gshegs dgug par bya// zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjer phyung // de yi lce la dzaM bkod nas// 'od kyis drangs nas sngags 'di yis// zhal du dab
49a5(rgyud 'grel): par byas nas dbul// oM swA dza~M dan de hi dwe hi hUM/ de yis tshim nas dbu rgyan la// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgom zhing // zla ba phyed du dus bzhi rtsa// de 'dra'i chu rgyun byin+da nas 'grub// ji tsam 'dod pa'i nor ldan zhing // 'bru yi char ni 'bebs par
49a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs pa'i// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor ram// 'jam dpal rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis// gnod sbyin mo ni bsgrub par bya// ci gsungs gzhal
49b1(rgyud 'grel): yas khang bsgoms la// de yi sbyor bas dbus su gnas// mdun du gser mdog zla ba la// zla gam thig le rtsa ldan pa// k+ShiM bsgoms de las 'od zer spro// kha dog sna tshogs 'phros pa yis// spyan sogs lha mo bkod pa la// phog pas
49b2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin mo ru 'gyur// bkug ste de la thim gyur nas// de gzugs gnas gyur gnod sbyin mo// rgyud gzhan las ni gsungs pa bzhin// bsgrub pa'i mdun du rnam par bsam// gser mdog mdzes pa'i cha lugs can// bud med gzho nu /
49b3(rgyud 'grel): sku tshulo ldan// dar gyi na bzas stod spyad dkris// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// g.yas pas gdugs ni dkar po thogs// g.yon pas dpag bsam shing la brten// cung zad 'dzum ni zhal mdzes shing // kha dog lnga pa'i me
49b4(rgyud 'grel): tog las// me tog phreng ba sogs kyis mdzes// byas pa'i phyed krung thor tshugs can// rin po che yis ri phug ni// gnas par rab tu bsam pa'o// de yi gzugs la sogs pa lnga// shrI bud d+ha haM b+ha lnga yis// lha mor bskyed nas gnas
49b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum du// yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab// bskul ba sngon du 'gro ba yi// dbang bskur byas pas dbu rgyan la// gshin rje gshed po rnam bsgoms te// de yi ngar 'dzin mnan par bya// de nas rang gi sa bon gyi// 'od kyis ye shes
49b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' bkug/ thugs kar bcug te snyan tshig gis// bzhams te bsgo bas bsgrub par bya// de nas de yi ye shes sems// rang gi sems dpar rab bcug pas// rang bzhin gcig tu gyur bya nas// sngags kyi
50a1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// du nas shwa dang khrag dang // til phye skur gdong la sogs pa'o// gtor mas mnyes par byas nas su// zhi ba'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// yang ni de yis ma grub na// drug shul gus
50a2(rgyud 'grel): ni bsgrub par bya// ye shes sems dpa' der bcug la// rdo rje sbyor ba brtsam par bya// gnod sbyin mo la 'khyud byas nas// rdo rje rtsa lnga 'od zer 'bar// pad+mar rtsal nas sngags bzlas pas// nang du 'od zer spro bar bya// oM A ya mAn+ta kr-ita yak+Sha yak+Shi
50a3(rgyud 'grel): dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ 'od zer me ltar 'bar ba yis// ye shes sems dpa' gdung byas pas// tshe ste skrag nas sgrub po la// zla phyed 'phral du dngos grub ster// sgrub po'i mdun du thal sbyar nas// rje gcig bdag la bka' stsol zhis// 'dzum pa'i
50a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bltas bka' len te// sgrub pos de la bka' stsal pa// ma dang sring mo chung ma dang // g.yog mo bya ba gyis shes bya// de nas de yi rje zhig gi/ bka' ni spyi bos nod ces len// gal te ma yi bya ba byed// tho rangs song la 'ongs byas nu// /
50a5(rgyud 'grel): gser srang bcu dang mu tig gi// ha ra bdun ni bzhag nas 'gro/ sring mo yi ni bya ba byed// nyi ma'i gung la drung 'ongs te// gser srang bdun dang ha ra bdun// phul te ming po sang 'od zer// gal te chung ma'i bya byed na// yid kyis 'dod pa'i dusu ni//
50a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phral du drung du 'ong bar byed// tsang mi smra bar 'dod pa spyad// gser srang lnga dang ha ra gcig/ bzhag ste rang gi gnas su 'gro// gal te gtam smras gyur na ni// phyin chad ci yang mi gter ro// g.yog mo bye ba byed pa yis// zas pa
50b1(rgyud 'grel): gos dang gser la sogs// bzhon pa la sogs ci 'dod pa// bka' tsam gyis ni sbyor bar byed// gzhan ni na chung yid du 'ong // bkug nas byin te rang gnas skyel// de sogs gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi// yon tan bsam gyis mi
50b2(rgyud 'grel): khyab thob// sngags kyi khyad par rnams kyi bsgrub pa khyad par bshad zin to// da ni zhi ba'i las kyi rim pa bshad par bya'o// spyan gyi tshul gyi rnal 'byor gyis// bsam gtan 'di ni brtag par bya// yang na mos pa'i rnam pa yis//
50b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rab tu brtsam pa'o// grong ngam yang na grong khyer ram// ljongs rnams gang ba'i nad la sogs// zhi bar bya phyir bsam gtan mchog/ 'di ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// zhi ba'i sems kyis sha
50b4(rgyud 'grel): bltas te// rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa mchog/ ta la bdun tsam na mkha' la// phyogs te 'greng bur rnam par bsam// de yi bum po gzhal yas khang // gdan dang bcas po rnam bsams te// de na rtag pa'i 'khor lo ni// dkar po sngon bzhin
50b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi shus bsgoms// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la// sngags kyi bzlas pa las byung ba'i// 'od zer rnam par spro bar bya// oM AHbruM dzi na/ dzag che ge mo'i nad dz+wa la dza hUM swA hA swA hA/ de brjod lha dang rdo rje yi// lus la 'phros pa'i
50b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis// zad dus me 'drar 'gro kun gyi// nod rnams rag tu bsreg 'gyuraro// she la ltar rab tu gnas pa la// mi ldog bya phyir rgyas bya'i phyir// gsang sngags 'dzin brjod pa yis// spyan la sogs pa spro bar bya// oM ru ru sU
51a1(rgyud 'grel): ru dz+wA la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lho tsi ni ar+tha sA d+ha ni nad shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/ mkha' dbyings yongs su bkang byas nas// bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yis// de rnams spyi bor bkra shis sgra// ldan par blangs nas dbang bskur stsol//
51a2(rgyud 'grel): oM ka ya badz+ra nad shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM wag badz+ra nad shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM tsit+ta badz+rA nad shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ de rnams brjod pas rdo rje gsum// ba spu bu ga las spros pas// sngon bzhin dbang bskur rab byin na// nges pa'i nad kyang zhag
51a3(rgyud 'grel): bdun 'jig/ rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba'ang rab tu 'gengs// de ni sbyin pa rab grub cing // yid sbyin nor bu dpal 'drar 'gyur// bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing // sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// 'di
51a4(rgyud 'grel): ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o// yang ni 'ga' zhig don gyi phyir// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rtag pa'i 'khor lo nyi shus bskyed// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la
51a5(rgyud 'grel): de yi ya shes sems dpa' yi// thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni// zhi bar 'dod pa bzhag par bya// de nas gong du gsungs pa yi// spyan ma'i sngags ni rig mar bcas// bzlas brjod byas pas ba spu yo// bu ga las ni spyan tshigs spro// de
51a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'od zer lnga 'bar ba'i// 'od zer tshul gyis nad pa la// zhi bar bya phyir rgyas bya'i phyir// de la gzi brjid dbab par bya'o// yang ni mi ldog bya ba'i phyir// gong gi dbyung ba 'am sa bon nam// yi ge gsum par rig par bcas// bzlas
51b1(rgyud 'grel): pas rtag pa'i tshogs spro bya// de rnams spyan dang bcas pa yis// bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa bzung // dbyangs dang bcas pas dbang bskur bya// nad ni zhag bdun gyis zhi byed// rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba'ang rab tu
51b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grengs// de ni de ma thag tu yang // dpal ldan rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// spyan ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog/ cho ga nyi shus rdzogs byas la// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya// de yi ye shes sems
51b3(rgyud 'grel): ma yis// shi ba'i ro ni bzhag byas nas// sngags 'di rnam par brjed par bya// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hiM lo tsa ni saHar+tha sA d+ha ni shi ba bsos par gyur cig swA hA/ de yisau de nas lam 'phros pa'i// lcags kyu'i gzugasu phyung byas te//
51b4(rgyud 'grel): de yis shi ba'i rnam par shis// bar ma do ni gnas pa'am// yang ni skye gnas chud kyang rung // dri med mar me'i tshul gnas pa'i// dkug ste ro yis snying ga ru// bcug nas dbyung sngags de la dgod// de yi zer gyis ro bsregs te// rang
51b5(rgyud 'grel): ming thams cad spyan ma yi// gzugasu bskyed nas phung po dang // khams dang skye mched kyis dag bya// de lus gong ba'i phreng sngags kyis// phyi nang bar mtshams med par gtam// sngags las sngon bzhin spyan ma spro// bsdus nas 'od zer
51b6(rgyud 'grel): spro bar bya// bskal pa'i bar du gnas bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas rtag pa'i tshogs spros pa'i// dbang bskur byas pa las skyes pa'i// shi ba'i zhag ni bdun nas 'tsho// 'tsho na'ang lnga brgya'am stong gi bar// 'di nyid du ni gnas par 'gyur//
52a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan gyi ye shes kyis btab phyir// rim gyis sangs rgyas thob pa'o// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te// rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byor pas// lta ba rdo rje dug la sogs// mi bzad dug ni dbrog par bya// bdag nyid
52a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i paru ma ru/ 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa// lte bar oM dkar po yis mtshan// 'od zer dkar po spros nas brtsam// nad pa mdun du bzhag byas la// sgrub pos spyi bo la bzhag ste// dug rnams dbrog pa'i ched du ni//
52a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di brjod la 'od zer spro// oM AHdzi na dzaM ka che ge me'i dug zhi bar mdzod cig hUM swA hA/ brjod pas 'od zer dkar po ni// spyi bor zhugs pas nag po dbyung // 'od zer de yis na mkha' khams// phyogs bcu kun tu gtor bar
52a4(rgyud 'grel): byad/ de yi shul du 'od zer ni// dkar zhing bsil ba phab byas pas// zhag bdun na ni na mkha' kun// gang ba'i dug kyang med par byed// yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya// mi bskyed 'khor lo dang ldan pas// ha l-i ha la la sogs pa// sbyor
52a5(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di yis gso bar bya// bsgrub bya 'dun du rab bzhag lo// de yi thugs kar hUM byung ba'i// rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa// 'od zer dkar po 'bar ba bsnam// de yang zla 'od ltar byasil zhing // bsil bas lus kun khyab pa'i dug/ snying ga lkog mo
52a6(rgyud 'grel): dpral ba dang // mgo bo'i gnas su yang dag bsdu// de ltar lan gsum par bsams la// thams cad snying ga'i dbus su bsdu// de nas 'di ni brjod pa yis// nag po skrag pa'i tshul du bsam// oM AHbadz+ra d+h+r-ika che ga mo'i dug bsos
52b1(rgyud 'grel): par gyur cig swA hA/ de ltar byas pas zhag bdun na// na mkha' khams kun gang ba yi// dug rnams kyang ni zad byed na// bsgrub bya'i lus ni smos ci dgos// sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la// 'od dpag med kyi rnal 'byor gyis// 'bras
52b2(rgyud 'grel): dang phol mig 'brum phran sogs// nye ba'i dug rnams dbyung bar bya// g.yas kyi bar mas as skyes pa'i// pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad pa'i// lte bar 'od zer lnga 'bar ba'i// a bsams nas ni byab par bya// bsgrub bya mdun du rab bzhag la//
52b3(rgyud 'grel): yi 'od zer gyis bsdus nas// nag po mdog ni rnam pa ru// bsgrub bya'i lus las byung bar bsam// de yis kun tu rab spros pas// dug spangs kha dog dkar po bsam// de ltar dus bzhi ro gsang sngags 'di// bzlas pas zhag bdun dug
52b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'byung // oM A ro lika che ge mo'i nye ba'i dug zhi bar gyur cig hUM swA hA/ de yis las skyes snying 'bar ba'i// dug rnams thams cad zad byed na// bsgrub bya'i lus gcig la gnas pa'i// nye ba'i dug rnams smos ci dgos// thams cad
52b5(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin byas la// khro bo rgyal po rta mgrin ni// kha dog dkar po rab bsgoms te// dug rnams thams cad bsal bar bya// bsgrub bya mdun du bzhag byas la// de yi snying gar zla ba la// hUM dkar 'od zer dkar po 'bar// 'od zer de yis
52b6(rgyud 'grel): lus kun gyi// dug rnams rab tu sbar byas la// g.yas pa'i bar mar hUM dkar po// de bskyed pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// dkar po'i lte bar hUM bsam mo// rang ming yi ge dang po yis// bsgrub bya rnam par bsams nas ni// gsang sngags 'di yis de
53a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ni// dug rnams kun tu bsal bar bya// na maHsa man+ta kA yA waka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM tu ru la bi ru la/ sarba bi sha ga ta/ dza li ta ya/ bi s+phu ling+ga ta ta/ ha sa ke sa ri sa twa to pa/ badz+ra khu ra nirba/
53a2(rgyud 'grel): tatatetsa li ta ba su ta ta la ni sh+tsa sa ma ru tod k+Shi ba da da ra ni da ra/ bi sha na ta ha sa/ a pA ra mi tA/ pa la pa ri kra ma/ Ar+ya beg sne b+hU ta ga na/ b+hu ta b+hU ta/ ha ya gr-i ba/ kha ta kha da/ pa ra m+b+ha tra na chen+na tshin+na/ sid+d+hi me da ma me da da bi
53a3(rgyud 'grel): sha/ A be sha ya rak+Sha dza/ bi sha tsa nan/ sarba kra he sh+tsa bya/ pra ti ta to ta b+ha ba badz+ra daMSh+Ta ki tsa ma ra ya si/ i dan duSh+Ta/ gra ha na duSh+Ta/ sarba na/ du na du na/ ma tha ma tha/ ma ta ma ta/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bud+d+he ra ma saM gi nu/ dzI na ta ga ra naM/ kuT
53a4(rgyud 'grel): sri ba na ha ya gri ba ya phaT/ badz+ra ya phaT/ badz+ra ga ta ya phaT/ badz+ra nai tra ya phaT/ badz+ra daMSh+TA ya phaT/ badz+ra khu ra ya phaT/ badz+ra khu ra nir ga ta ya phaT/ pa ra man+ta bi na sha na sha na ya phaT/ trai lo ki ta pa yi ka ra ya phaT/ sarba karma
53a5(rgyud 'grel): shwa pra ti ha ta ya phaT/ badz+ra ku la ta san phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ hUM las 'od zer dkar po yis// bdud rtsi babs pas bsgrub bya yi// lus las nag po'i dug blangs te/ sa la sogs par spo bar bya// shul du bdud
53a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi dkar po yis// 'od zer babs par byas nas su// de bzhin thun bzhir byabs gyur na// zhag bdun na ni na mkha'i dbyings// dug gis yongasu gang pa yi// rdo rje mi bzad pa yi dug/ sbyar ba tsam gyis sel bar byed// sngon bzhin
53b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab byas la// yang ni dug rnams zad bya'i phyir// sbyor ba rnams la brgyad ldan par// gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba bsgom// gser 'dra g.yas gnag g.yon dkar te// dang pos rang 'od rig ma 'khyud// g.yas par 'og 'byung
53b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'dzin// lhag ma ral gri rin chen pad// 'di la rnam snang lta bur sbyar// bruM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ni// dkar po bruM gis mtshan pa bsam// bsgrub bya ming gi dang po bskyed// sgrub po'i mdun du rab bzhag la// sbyor ba gsum
53b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis spang bya'i phyir// gAsang sngags 'di ni brjod pas su// byam las 'od zer dkar po spro// na maHsa man+ta ka ya wa kIt+ta/ badz+ra NAM/ oM A sarba la bu ti/ lo ka da ra shi/ yan+ta man+tha tan+ta/ ts+tshar+Na pra yo gi ti/ ma ma kr-i tA ye na ken \u0f7f
53b4(rgyud 'grel): tAkr-I ti/ d+hA nI s+yoHn+na/ tshin+na tshin+te/ bin+d+ha bir+N+NaHhA na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa thA tsa/ kaM pa ya kaM pa ya/ bi d+hA saM ya/ shA taM sA ha stAM/ bi tsur+Na ye/ oM uSh+NI Sha badz+ra tsakr-i tha ra ti/ b+h+yob+h+yAM b+h+yAM/ hUM hU~M hUM/ phaT swA hA/ de nas 'od zer sna tshogs
53b5(rgyud 'grel): spros pas// spyi bo nas ni phul byas te// rkang pa'i mthil du phyung byas la// sa yi gting du gtan par bya// yang ni 'od zer de yis kyang // mdun du snun pas dug rnams kun// rgyab tu phyung bas sa la sogs// 'byung ba rnams su spro bar bya// de
53b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'od zer gyis bsdus nas// phyung ste gtor nas de shul du// bdud rtsi dkar po rab 'bab pas// dug ni rnam par spang bar bya// dkar po dponi ser po dang // nag po bsam gtan 'di yis ni// rdo rje gsum gyi sprul pa yis dug rnams
54a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang ni zhag bdun 'byin// yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che// kha dog dkar po bsam byas te// 'don pa'i sngags kyis nad rnams bsal// nad pa mdun du bzhag byas te//
54a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid khros nas gsang sngags 'di// brjod pas 'od zer tshogs spros pas// bsgrub bya'i lus la gzhug par bya// oM AHdzi na dzi ka che ge mo'i nad a pa na ya hUM/ de yi nad rnams bskul bar bya// rlung mkhris bad kan las
54a3(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i// spre'u yi gzugs brnyan lta bu 'am// de bzhin khyi ni rkang pa gsum// yi dgas gcer bu'i gzugs dag tu// bsgrub bya'i lus la phyung nas su// phyogs bcu dag tu rab rgyug cing // 'bros par gyur pas rnam par bsam//
54a4(rgyud 'grel): oM AHdzi na dzika che ge mo'i nad ma ra ya hUM phaT/ brjod pas thugs las 'phros pa yis// khro bo'i 'khor los mtshan ma yi// spre'u la sogs pa'i nad rnams kun// mtshan mas phye mar brlag par byed// bkug ste 'ongs pa rang
54a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi// mtshan mas phye mar brlag 'gyur te// bsgrub bya nad dang rnam bral bas// shel 'bra'i kha dog lta bur bsam// de nas bdag nyid 'khor lo che// kha dog dkar po rnam bsams la// slob bzhin spyan ma'i sngags brjod pa//
54a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'bab pas lus dgang bya// oM AHdzi na dzi ka nad pa che ge mo la sa b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swA hA/ zhes brjod pas sngon bzhin rtag pa'i tshogs// spyan dang bcas pa bum pa 'dzin// dbang bskur byas te brgya rtsa brgyad// zhag bdun bar du
54b1(rgyud 'grel): dus bzhin bya// de ltar byas na phyi nang gi/ myong byur nges pa'i nad kun yang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du// the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin mi bskyod rin chen dpal// 'od dpag myed dang don yod grub// mI ge'i tshig ni gang
54b2(rgyud 'grel): mos g+ha/ dang ba bskyed do nad rnams bas lo// oM AHbadz+rA d+h+r-ika che ge mo nad a pa nA ya hUM/ oM AHrat+na d+h+r-ikaM che ge mo'i nang a pa nA ya hUM/ oM AHA ro lika cho ge me'i nad a pa na ya hUM/ oM AHbAdz+nyA d+h+r-ika che ge mo'i nAd a ba nA sa
54b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ \u0f7fbahrI d+h+r-ika che ga mo'i nad ma r+yA ya phaTahUM/ AHA ro lik+ki che ga mo'i nad m+bA ra ya oM Ar+yApradz+dza d+h+r-i/ na pa che ge mo'i nad mA ra ya be mU dz+dza/ oM AHbadz+ra d+h+r-i ka nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa dz+dza swA hUM/ oM AHrat+na d+hA/
54b4(rgyud 'grel): nod pa cheg mo la s+t+waM b+hi'i \u0f7f/ oM maHoM.e ro lika na pa che ge mo la a d+hI \u0f7f/ oM swA/ b+h+yo/ nid pa tshige mo la sa Shi ts+tsha hU~M swAr+m+ma/ de yis nang rnams byed byas te// rang rang mtshan mas sngon bzhin pasod//
