54b5(rgyud 'grel): dang dbang bskur sogs pa yi// snga ma bzhin du rab tu bya// sbyor bas zlas pas zhag bdun du// myong bar nges pa'i nad rnams kun// rdo rje bsam gtan cho ga des// phyi dang nang du bcas pa sel// / da ni rgyas pa'i las kyi
54b6(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi rim pa rgyas par bshad par bya'o// sngon bzhin bzlas pa'i cho ga nas// dbang bskur yan chad rdzogs byas te// rdo rje pad+ma can gyi ni// sbyor bas rgyas pa'i las brtsam mo// stobs la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang // lhag ma'i tsher
55a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur 'dod pa dang // mdzod po che ni rgyas bya'i phyir// rgyas pa'i sems kyis bya ba'o// bka' yi 'khor lo sbyor ba yis// sngon bzhin khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus// rdo rje sems dpa' zlas pa yi// dbang chen dkyil 'khor ser
55a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i dbus// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni// gsor zhon lto bu'i 'od dpag med// 'khor lor bcas pa byasam byas la// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang bya bya// de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi// thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni// 'dod pa rnam
55a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum gzhag nas ni// thams cad gsang sngags 'di ni zlos// oM kA Te bi kA Ti ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te ka ro pa re che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru hUM/ na bza' dkar mo la sogs tshogs// mngon par 'dod pa'i don char 'babs// na mkha' khams kun rab dkang
55a4(rgyud 'grel): nas// rjesu 'od zer bsdu bar bya// de ni 'od zer rnam pa lnga// 'dod pa'i spyi bo mgrin pa dang // thugs ka'i gnas ni gsum po ru// 'dod pa gsum gyi tshul du bzhag/ de rnams mi bzad bya ba'i phyir// thams cad kyi ni gsang sngags 'di//
55a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas 'od dpag med pa'i tshogs// bum pa gang ba bzung bar bya/ oM AHdzi A ro l-i ka che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru hUM/ bkra shris glu dbyangs tshig bcad kyi// dbang bskur ba ni stsol bar bsam// de ltar dus bzhir zhag bdun du// sbyor bas
55a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rgyas par 'gyur// rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgong dka' ba'ang rab tu 'gengs// de ni sbyin pa rab bsgrub cing // yid sbyin nor bu dpal 'drar 'gyur// yang na 'di ltar gos dkar ba'i// 'khor lo ldan pa'i sbyor ba bsgom// /
55b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems ma'i thugs ka ru// 'dred pa dag nA gzhug par bya// oM ka Te bi kA T+Te naM ka Te ku TaM kA Te ka ro ba re che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru N+yaM/ brjod pas de mtha' dbus yig la// na mkha'i khams ni dkar mos gang //
55b2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid gzi baN+Did tshul gyis su// rje su 'od zer sngon bzhin dba'// gong gi sngags kyis 'od dpag med// spros nas dbang bskur stsal bar bsam// de ltar dus bzhir zhag bdun du// byas pas bsgrub bya rgyas par 'gyur// bsam
55b3(rgyud 'grel): gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba 'dis// rtag par chos kyis rgyas par mdzad// rtag tu mdzod po che dang ldan// nad rnams med cing tshe rgyus 'gyur// da ni dbang gi las kyi rim pa bshad par bya'o// thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la// ri mo'i
55b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dbang du bya ba brtsam pa'o// sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang // sems can khams rnams ma lus pa// dbang du byed dam byed 'dod phyir// chags pa'i yid kyis bya ba'o//
55b5(rgyud 'grel): bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor bas// khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zla gam la// ji bzhin sbyor bas ban du ka/ don yod grub pa'i 'khor lo che// bsgoms nas mchod pa
55b6(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa dang // bdud rtsi myang bas mnyes par bya// de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi// thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni// gong gi gnyis po bzhag nas ni// thams cad kyi ni gsang sngags brjod// oM AHkhaM pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika che ge mo ba shaM raM rA ga
56a1(rgyud 'grel): ya ho// de brjod thams cad pa spu yi// sgo las sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis// mkha' dbyings yongs su dgang bar bsam// de rnams 'od zer rnam lnga yis// tshul
56a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis thams cad 'dus byas la// thugs kar 'dod pa de lus la// rje su stobs ni dbab par bya// gong gi sngags brjod sngon du// dbang bskur de la stsol bar bsam// de ltar sbyor bas dus bzhi ru// bzlas pas zhag bdun 'grub par 'gyur/
56a3(rgyud 'grel): de ni de ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas kun gyis thugasu byon// 'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam// las thabs byed par de 'gyur ro// dga' bas myong ba'i dbang po dang // dgyes nas ci 'dod rab tu stsol// bskul ba chen po ma byas kyang //
56a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba 'di kun dbang du 'gyur// yang ni de ltar sgrol ma yi// 'khor lo ldan pa rab bsgoms la// de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi// thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni// dbang du bya ba bzhag nas ni// dbus su yi ge taM dmar po// mtha' ma phreng
56a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags dmar po ni// gyen du 'greng bas bskor bar bsam// dmar ba'i mtshan ma rnams dang ni// taM las 'od zer dmar po'i tshogs// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod nas// bsgrub bya bskul phyir dbyung bar bya// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re che ge mo bshaM
56a6(rgyud 'grel): ku ru ho// skyes pa'i snying dang mgrin par bskul// bud med gsang ba nas bskul bya// phreng ba'i sngags las 'od zer dmar// rang gi skye gnas nas phyung bya// gong gi sgo ru rab zhugs pas// bsgrub bya'i sems ni bkag 'dra ba// zla ba'i
56b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs 'dra bkug nas ni// rim pa gnyis su chud par bya// gal te lha mo mda' can ma// 'og nas 'byung bzhin byin brlabs la// bskul ba la sogs de bzhin bya// des kyang dbang du byed pa'o// gzhan yang snga ma bzhin du 'dod// de ni thugs
56b2(rgyud 'grel): kar rab bzhag la// dpa' bo btang sogs cho ga yis// gzhan la stobs ni dbab par bya// de ltar sbyor bas dus bzhi ru// zhag bdun bar du rab byas na// sangs rgyas rdo rje sde can dang // sems can khams rnams ma lus pa// de ma thag tu
56b3(rgyud 'grel): bran bzhin du// thams cad yod med dbang du byed// thams cad snga ma bzhin bsgoms la// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// 'jam dpal rdo rje 'khor lo yis// dbang du bye ba brtsam pa'o// sngags byed dang ni dal byed dang // 'dod byed dang
56b4(rgyud 'grel): ni rmongs byed dang // dbang gi rang bzhin mda' lnga ni// cho ga 'di yis byin brlab bya// smyug ma a yis byin brlabs te// mde'u ni hUM gis byin brlabs la// g.yon gyis maM bskyod gzhu bzung nas// dbu rgyan rtse mor sbyar byas la// drangs taurna drung du
56b5(rgyud 'grel): bkang nas// sngags kyis rab tu gdab pa'o// oM AHaM many+dzu shrI che ga mo ba sha~M ku ru ho// de yi spros pas bsgrub bya yi// mgo dang snying ga lte ba dang // gsang ba dang ni rkang mthil du// khro bo'i tshig gis rab tu gdang // sngags kyi 'od zer dmar
56b6(rgyud 'grel): po yi// rdo rje gnyis las phyung nas kyang // zla ba spyad ldan lto bu'i sems// 'od zer gyis ni dgug par bya// bdag ni skye gnas nas bcug ste// ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin no// dngangs shing brgyal bar rab bsgoms te// sdong po bcad
57a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin zhabs 'og 'gyel// sbyor ba de yis dus bzhi ru// zla ba phyed du rab bsgoms na// byis pa'i blo ni grags chen pos// gsang ba'i bskul ba bsgom byas pas// rdo rje kun gyis rab gsang ba'i// rdo rje don ni chud pa
57a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// de nas mngon spyod lam gyi rim pa bshad par bya'o// sngon bzhin bzlas pa la sogs pa'i// dbang bskur yan chad rdzogs byas te// rdo rje khro bo rnal 'byor gyis// las 'di rab tu brnam pa'o// dkon mchog gnod byed ma chags
57a3(rgyud 'grel): pad/ gdug pa'i sems can rnal 'byor gcod// bla ma smos brtson ma rungs pa// gtum pa'i yid kyis bsgrub pa'o// de rnams bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta// sta gri gtun shing lag na 'dzin// gnod par byed pa rab brtson pa// bsams
57a4(rgyud 'grel): nas bsam gtan rab tu bya// mkha'i dbyings sems can sangs rgyas kyis// yongs su gang bar rab tu bsam// gdug pa'i sta re gtun shing gis// bsad par rab tu bsam pa'o// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yis// mkha' dbyings
57a5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gang bar bsam// sta re gtun shing gis bsad par// bsams nas dgra rnams myur du 'chi// de yis dran rnyed mtshon cha bor// skyabs med skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs// sdug bsngal dang ldan gzigs byas la// snying rje
57a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i khro ba bskyed// rang lha goms pa'i phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor byas nas gsum pa ru// ye shes sems dpa' 'od zer gyis// sangs rgyas tshogs spro bka' lung blang // khams bzhugs mgon po rnams kyis ni// bdag
57b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsom las 'di gzigs mdzad phyir// gro ba tsan dan dkar po sogs// las brtsom bris pa snyan du gsol// phan mdzad khyed cag rnams la ni// 'di yi thabs 'di ma brtsams na// 'di ni mnar med skyi g.ya' ba'i// bud shing du ni 'gyur bar nges//
57b2(rgyud 'grel): snying rjer ldan pa'i rnal 'byor po// khyod kyi bka' lung bdag cag byed// de bas las ni bgyid pa la// rdo rje can rnams bdog la stsol// bdag cag khyad par ma mthong bar// dad pa kho na dang ldan pas// snying rje 'di la phan pa'i phyir// khyed kyis
57b3(rgyud 'grel): bka' stsol byed pa'o// gong bzhin khro bo'i tshogs spros pas// de dag snyan du rig pa dang // sngon bzhin du dang gal bcu yis// snyan gsan dbab par bsam pa'o// las mdzad 'di la khyod kyis ni// grogs po mdzad pa rigs pa yin// de ltar
57b4(rgyud 'grel): min na khyed tsog 'dir// dam tshig 'gal bar gyur pa'o// de nas de dag thams cad kyang // zhal gyis bzhes par bas ma byas nas// 'khor lo dang bcas nag por bsgyur// khros nas bka' yi 'khor lo spro// bgegs kyi tshogs kun nyan par
57b5(rgyud 'grel): byos sku gsung thugs la gnas pa yi// dpal ldan padag ni che ge mo// bka' yi 'khor lo byed pa'o// gal te nga yi bka' 'goms nas// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis// 'dod gsum bskyed lus 'jig byed de// 'gas par 'gyur te gar+b+ha
57b6(rgyud 'grel): du min 'di nas sa bon 'od zer gyis// mkha' khyab sangs rgyas zhal bcug ste// zhu gyur rdo rje pad+ma ru// cho ga bzhin gyis bskyed byas la// mi bskyod lta bu dang pos 'khyud// rdo rje lcags kyu ral gri zhags// 'dzin pa'i khro bo sum b+ha'i gzugs//
58a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi srungs ma dgug don bskyod// snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dbyangs yig 'og la hUM yig steng // rdo rje rgyu gram kha sbyor phyir// sngags 'dis srungs ma dgug pa'o// oM AHhUM suM b+ha ni che ge mo'i
58a2(rgyud 'grel): srungs ma khugs cig/ dzaHhUM/ de yis dgug la g.yon du bzhag/ gnod mdzes de la bcug byas te// de yis lus gnas 'khor lo la// de yi nyes pa bsgo ba'i phyir// dpal ldan gnod mdzes mdun du gnas// rig pa'i tshogs
58a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis gsol gdab bya// las kun rnam pa gang gis ni// da lta mthu ni yod 'gyur ba// ma 'ongs bde ba 'dod pas na// khyod kyis 'di nyid spang bar bya// sangs rgyas gsod byed ma chags pa// bla ma smod par byed pa'o// 'di yi srungs dang byin
58a4(rgyud 'grel): brlabs kyis// da lta ru ni spang bar gsol// de ltar min na khyed cag kun// rang gi bstan pa 'di la ni// rdzun gyis sgrub po bslus 'gyur bas// khyed rnams dam tshig 'gal ba'o// de dag thams cad mgrin cig tu// bdag gis spangs kyis 'dod
58a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis// dgyes te bsad dbyung rang lha yi// 'khor lo ru ni gzhug par bya// bsrung ba la sogs rnams dang yong // de yi lha rnams mnan bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kun bgegs dgra'i gzugs// sngon bzhin phur bus bskyed byas
58a6(rgyud 'grel): nas// g.yas pas tho ba bzung byas nas// g.yon pas mgul ba brtan byas te// stong pa dran par bya ba'i phyir// sngags 'dis rab tu btab pa'o// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba duSh+TA na ye shwa
58b1(rgyud 'grel): srungs ma phaT/ hUM hUM hU~M badz+rA kI la ya/ bad+d+ha d+hAn+do A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ sarba duSh+TA na yAM shes sems dpa'i k+ShA ya wA k+Shid+d+ha badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ de yis rang gi ye shes sems// gnyis su med par 'gyur bar bsam// sgra bshig gcer bu 'bru mar
58b2(rgyud 'grel): byugs// 'jigs btsos dran nyams srog med pa// me la gnas shing gzi brjid bral// skyabs byed srung sems rnams spangs pas// khang stong lta bur bsams nas ni// las kyi dngos gzhi la 'jug bya// sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas
58b3(rgyud 'grel): la88dang po mgon po las byung ba// sa bon las skyes kha bzhi pa'i// rtse lnga mgon pos byin gyis brlabs// 'od zer bde gshegs thams cad la// bsgrub bya'i skon brjod de dag kun// mi bskyod ngo bor khros gyur nas// zhugs bzhin de la
58b4(rgyud 'grel): thim par 'gyur// de gnyis zhu bar gyur pa las// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang mi bskyod pa// drag po sbrul gyi ska rags can// mgon po rten sogs kyis mtshan po// dang po sbyor bas rnam bsgoms te// de kho na bzhin rtag pa sogs// sbyor ba
58b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pas bsgom byas te// mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes par bya// de nas badz+ra d+h+r-ika sogs ni// yid kyis brjod pas rab bskul la// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i tshul spros pas// skrag pa spang phyir dang po dgra/ 'od kyi gong bu tshul du ni// sha glan
58b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir na gnas gsum du// btsud de rang sngags brjod pa yis// ji lta gzugs bzhin spro bar bya// oM a badz+ra d+h+r-ika tshi ge mA ra ya phaT hUM/ sems lus khros pa'i khro bo che// mi sdug 'jig su rung ba'i gzugs// gsod pa'i don rnams sems
59a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i phyir// sta re tho ba sogs 'dzin spro// gzhan yang gri dang k+Sha pa la 'dzin// sgra 'greng srin po'i tshogs rnams dang // ring du sgra 'byin pa yi tshogs// khwa dang bya rog sna tshogs spro// bya rgod lcags kyi mchu can dang //
59a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyi mche ba can gyis khyis// nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar spro// bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar ba yis// gru gsum la gnas sngon bzhin du// gnas pa'i bsgrub bya de dag gis// khros nas rtog cing 'thab pa'i tshul// drag po
59a3(rgyud 'grel): tshigs gi bskul bar bya// sha rnams gcod cing rgyus rkang drangs// rus 'chos khrag 'thungs rab bsgoms te// dus bzhin rab tu brtan byas te// nyi ma bdun du bsgrub par bya// de ltar bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi// snying rje'i dbang gis
59a4(rgyud 'grel): 'og bzhin brtsam// gal te rmongs pas 'grub mi 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin yang zla phyed 'chi// sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo che// rang gi rdo rje rab brtan la// gsum pas las 'di brtsam pa'o// oM AH
59a5(rgyud 'grel): ya mAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ de yis ba spu bu ga las// zhi ba'i tshul spros sangs rgyas kyis// sems can bsdu ba byas nasu// rang gi sku gsung 'khor lo bzhug/ oM hriHSh+T+r-i wi kr-i tA na na che ge mo na sha ya staM pa ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ brjod pas de
59a6(rgyud 'grel): ngag spro bar bya// gshin rje gshed gzugs 'ba' zhig tu// spros pas gdug sems dgra bo rnams// sngon bzhin gcod pa byed par bsam// thun mtshams bzhi ru zhag bdun du// brtan pas rab tu chags byas nas// ma mo'i bdag
59b1(rgyud 'grel): gshed yang 'chin// gdug sems ldan pa smos ci dgos// rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang // bsrung ba'i dam tshig bsgrub pa'i phyir// nyin mtshan bzlas pa la sogs brtson// bdud rtsi 'khyil pas gdug pa gzhom// thams cad snga ma
59b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin byas la// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'o// gdug pa'i dgra bo 'ba' zhig gam// 'khor los bcas pa bsam byas nas// mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes par bya// oM AHbig+h+nAn ta kr-ita che ge mA ra ya hUM phaT/ brjod pa ba spu bu ga las//
59b3(rgyud 'grel): gong ma lta bu'i srin po dang // gtum zhing mi bzang khro bo spros// me steng gnas pa'i bsgrub bya ni// bcings shing brdeg pa l-i sogs pa// de ni skrag par byas par bsam// de bzhin 'ug paM khwa ta dang // ring du sgra 'byin pa spros pas// mig dang rna ba
59b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs par// rtse zhing deng bar rab bsams te// skrag cing 'jigs par bsams gyur nas// dgra bo de yi mod la 'chi// de bzhin sbrul nag mgo brgya pa// re re lce gnyis mche phreng can// rgyud dang gnas dug bdag nyid spro// dpral bar dug
59b5(rgyud 'grel): bsams gdug pa 'chi// yang na bdag gi lag pa ru// tho ba rab tu drag po bsam// bsgrub bya gong mas mdun bkug la// 'og ma'i sngags kyis snying gar brdeg/ de bzhin lag na gnas pa yi// rdo rje sta re gtun shing sogs// bsgrub bya
59b6(rgyud 'grel): bshig cing gtub bsams na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang 'chi bar 'gyur// sngags kyi tshe lugs dran byas nas// phyag 'tshal la sogs sbyor ba yis// spros pa rnams kyis bsgrub pa'i phyir// sngags 'di brjod par bya ba'o// na maHsa man+ta/
60a1(rgyud 'grel): yA lpA ka tsit+ta badz+rA nAM oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha nA ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsA pa tsa/ gar+Na gar+Na/ bi swe Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ che ge mo'i srog dza bitAn+ta ka re ya phaT/ sngags rgyud sbyin sreg las
60a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la// 'di yi las la de mchog yin// phyogs bcu sems can thams cad la// 'tshe zhing gnod pa 'byung ba yi// dgra rnams 'jigs par byed pa la// bskul ba dam pa 'di mchog yin// snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya// sku
60a3(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// dang po las byung hri bskyed do// de la tri shU la hA yis mtshan// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kun// mkha'agro'i gzugs byas hri la zhugs// de gnyis rdo rje mkha 'gror
60a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// drag po mi sdug khros pa ni// ut+pal sngon po lta bu la// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar phyag drug pa// dang po rdo rje mkha' gro 'khyud// g.yas pa tri shUl rdo rje bsnams// g.yon pa thod pa rin chen 'dzin// nyi ma'i gdan la brkyang bskum
60a5(rgyud 'grel): dudo khro bo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bskyed// dkon mchog bzhon pa la sogs pa'i// bsgrub bya na mkha'i dbus su ni// khaM bskyed dmar gyi rkyal pa ltar// brgyangs pa'i ye shes drangs byas nas// mi bskyod pa ru bskyed byas tI// lus de khang
60a6(rgyud 'grel): stong lta bur bsams// bdag gi lho la hri bsams te// de yi 'od zer mthing ga dang // dkar ser dmar po ljang gu'i tshogs// lus dang yan lag bzhi ru bsam// rang gi mtshan ma tri shul dang // rdo rje rin chen phur bu yis// gong ma rab tu
60b1(rgyud 'grel): phug byas te// bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// 'od zer lnga yis thod pa ru// / khyag drung pa ni bsam par bya// hUM hri khaM badz+ra d+h+r-ika ni a nu ka sa ma ya rag tA A kAR+Sha ya tsu sha ya hUM/ brtan par zhag bdun thun bzhi ru//
60b2(rgyud 'grel): byas pas sangs rgyas chos sku yang // snyoms par 'gyur na gdug pa kun// smos ci dgos te de lta yin// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// brgyad kyis dbyug sngon 'og bzhin bskyed// mchod pa bzlas pa mnyes byas la//
60b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags rgyud ldan pa'i las brtsam mo// sha chen dur khrod sol ba dang // bal mi kham sa khre rtse phug/ bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes rnams dang ni// bong bu'i gcin gyis gzugs brnyan bya// de yi snying gar dur ras la// sna tshogs rdo rje rgya
60b4(rgyud 'grel): gram la// gnas pa'i me yi dkyil 'khor te// bsgrub bya'i ming dang phreng sngags spel// zhi ba'i sa bon ston na su// hUM phaT ldan par mi dgug par// dug khrag ram gyis bri byos la// de yi snying gar gzhug par bya// bsgrub bya
60b5(rgyud 'grel): bkug ste bcug byas nas// rabs chad thod pa kha sbyar gzhag/ shin tu khros pa'i g.yon pa yis// mnan taM brgya dang brgyad du ni// nyi ma'i gung dang nam phyed du// bzlas te rdo dang rus pa dang // nim pa'i lo ma rnams kyis ni// gzugs
60b6(rgyud 'grel): baR+Shan de ni mnan par bya// na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM i h+ye hi b+ha ga ban nI badz+ra daN+Da/ ku ru ku ru/ la hu la huM/ hA hA/ ku la ku la/ kro la pA ya ku la pA ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga ban/ ba yu be ge na/ bu dan shi kra
61a1(rgyud 'grel): na da ha da ha/ ha ra ha ra/ ba ha ba ha/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma ta ma ta/ ma ta pA ya ma tA pA ya/ sarba karma ni tshin+ta tshan+na/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ bak+Sha ya bak+Sha ya/ me ta maM sarba dra d+hi ra/ ma ma sa me da mar+g+ha
61a2(rgyud 'grel): ru ti pri ya/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban sarba big+h+nAn/ mu la karma ni/ sarba mu la kra ha na/ ha na ha na/ bany+dza bany+dza/ marda marda/ i daM me dz+nyA s+ya da ya/ hUM nI laM ya nI la ya badz+ra/ d+ha na d+ha na/ du ru du ru/ bi g+ha naM bi nA ya ka nA sha ya/ hu druM du druM/
61a3(rgyud 'grel): d+hib+da d+hA d+ha ya/ sarba man+tha na sha truM nan/ hrid ya ni/ pri da ya/ tshin+na tshin+na/ bid+ya nAn/ tiSh+Tha a nu smA ra ya sa ma ya badz+ra da ra pa tsa non/ da ra ma ni ni kr-in+d+ha hUM/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ du ru du ru/ ku ru ku ru/ phaT phaT/ hUM hUM/ kri dan+ta ya/
61a4(rgyud 'grel): dre ba ri'i bir+ya ka pa ya/ badz+ra dany+dza na che ge mo ma ra ya hUM phaT/ g.yel med pa yis zhag bdun du// mtshan ma mnan nas bzlas byas pas// de yi nyi ma kho na la// gdug pa rnams ni gsod par byed// de ru gal te mo grub na// nam
61a5(rgyud 'grel): phyed dus su dur khrod du// gang gi gzugs brnyan khyer nas ni// mi ro bsregs pa'i thal ba la// mngon spyod haM khung gzhung bzhin byas// nim pa'i me ni sbyar byas nas// zhal dang spyan rnams 'gyur ba yi// dbyug sngon kha gdangs
61a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus bsams la// gzugs brnyan mtshon cha rnon po yis// g.yon pa'i rkang nas bcad gtubs nas// gong gi sngags bzlas sbyin sreg bya// de yi mtshan mo 'chi bar nges// yang ni khro bo gang rung gi/ bzlas pas sngags pa
61b1(rgyud 'grel): dag byas la// rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu// 'brum phrag tu ni rang sngags bzlas// ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam// khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang // ling+ga gcig pa shing gcig drung // mngon spyod las ni
61b2(rgyud 'grel): brtsam pa'o// dbyung skyon can gsungs rdzas lnga ni// gzugs brnyan ming dang bcas byas nas// gan rkyal du ni bzhag byas te// dgug pa sngon 'gro kha sbyar dbye// de nas khro bo gang rung gi/ rnal 'byor khros byas khyig chu yis//
61b3(rgyud 'grel): gsher po'i gos ni gyon pa 'am// bshang gcis gsher ba'i gos gyon pa// gzugs brnyan rkang pas mnan nas ni// mngon sum bzhin du bsams byos nas// rang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlo// de bzhin chu dron 'ba' zhig
61b4(rgyud 'grel): gam// bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos// ngan pa rus pa dri snam pa// bgos te sngon bzhin bzlas pa bya// de bzhin thal ba'i skyo ma yis// gsher ba'i gos gyon lus ngan 'khrugs// sngon bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
61b5(rgyud 'grel): na// rdo rje sems dpa'ang 'jigs par 'gyur// yang na gcer bur rab phyung ste// skra bshig thur du 'phyang byas te// mche gtsigs mig ni bsgyur byas wa// rkang pas gzugs brnyan mnan nas ni// sngon bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad
61b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas te// lus dag yid gsum khyos byas nas// thun bzhir zhag bdun sogs sbyar bas// na mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jigs par nus// yang na gong ma'i gnas de ru// rnal 'byor der gnas phur bus gdab// lo bsregs sol
62a1(rgyud 'grel): dang thal ba drang // chu ngogs sa dang phug ma dang // rkang rjes dang ni bshad gcis brdzis// bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan snying ga ru// ske tshe dug dang lan tshwa dang // nyungs mar snag tshas dur ra sa la// khyo bo rdo rje
62a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa'i// lte bar sngags dang ming spel ba'i// rang rang sngags ldan mi dgug par// bris nas snying gar gzhug pa'o// kha sbyor dbye ba sngon 'gro ba'i// dgug pas gzugs la phab na su// mi yi rus pa las byas pa'i// sor brgyad
62a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi phur bu la// rang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad tu bzlas// gzugs brnyan snying gar btab nas ni// dgra yi khyim 'am sgo 'am ni// grong la sogs par sba bar bya// sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// shes dang mi shes rnams spangs
62a4(rgyud 'grel): pad/ zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyi// skams sam yang ni 'jigs par 'gyur// rdo rje gsum gyis rnal 'byor gyis// mngon spyod las la bgegs dgras sbyar// dkyil 'khor gsum dang rig lnga'i las// ting 'dzin dag pas byed
62a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro// de yi rnal 'byor sngon bzhin bya// gzugs brnyan gong ma bzhin byas la// dgug pa sngon du 'gro ba yis// rtag pa'i sbyor bas las 'di bya// mi yi rus po'i phur bu la// sor brgyad rtse mor 'khor lo bsam// me tog sngon pos
62a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing ni// 'khyil pa'i sngags ni rig bcas pa zla// de yis spyi bor btab 'gyur na// rtag pa yang ni klad zer can// 'gyur na bdag sems ljon pa yi// dgra bo dag ni smos ci dgos// de bzhin seng ldeng rtse mo las// byas pa'i phur bus
62b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma tsanA// byin gyis brlabs bzlas sngon bzhin mchod// snying gar btab nas ling ga de// thod pa kha sbyar nang bcug ste// dur khrod me la gdungs byas nas// tsha ba'i nad kyis 'debs byed pas// dpag med rnal 'byor gyis bya'o// de bzhin
62b2(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod rnal 'byor pas// gsod byed lcags byas phur bu la// rdo rje rtse mor byin brlabs la// mchod cing sngags bzlas snying gar gdab// me 'bar nang du de bcas bsgyur// de yi mod la gang sbyar ba'i// sku gsum 'jig par byed pa ste//
62b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag sems ldan pa smos ci dgos// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sngon bzhin gzugs brnyan rab byas la// de mnan khro bo bka' nod bsgo// de nas btang nas bkug ste gzhug/ sngon ma 'am yams nad 'tshe ba 'am/ yul
62b4(rgyud 'grel): du sna tshogs 'byung byed pa// gzugs brnyan de la phab nas ni// snying ga nas ni rkang pa'i bar// de bzhin du ni spyi bo'i bar// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags brjod cing // gdug dang sdig pa bsal byas nas// che ge lus ngag yid gsum la// rdo rje
62b5(rgyud 'grel): phur bus thob ces po'i// sngags ni gong ma bzhin du brjod// thun bzhir g.yel med zhag bdun du// phur bu'i rnam 'phrul 'di bya'o// bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'bebs// rdo rje sems dpa'
62b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po che// phur bu btab na'ang myur du 'chi// de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi// rnal 'byor sngon bzhin rab byas te// kha sbyor dbye ba sngon 'gro ba'i// sbyor ba bdun gyis bsgrub par bya// dur khrod thal ba la sogs la// sngon bzhin gzugs
63a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ming bcas pa// dgug pa sngon 'gro dur khrod du// skra bshig gcer bur phyung byas te// mtshan ma mnan nas sngon ma yis// sngags ni brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzla// zhag ni bdun du thun bzhi ru// sbyor
63a2(rgyud 'grel): bapa de yis khams gsum 'jigs// ro bsregs thal ba 'ba' zhig la// gzugs brnyan la sogs sngon bzhin byas// gong ltar stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na// sbyor ba do yi mod la 'chi// chu 'gram gnyis kyi sa sogs la// bsgrub
63a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'i gzugs brnyan rab byas te// ske tshe lan tshe 'bru mar dang // dug dang da dur snag tshar sbyar// dur khrod ras la de yi ming // sngags spel bris nas ming bcug ste// gan rkyal mgo ni byang du bstan// srang ko tsa dang 'byi rtse ka/ gzhan ma
63a4(rgyud 'grel): btsos pas de'i lus la// tIl 'bru tsam du btsags byas la// bskul ba'i tshig dang sngagos bcas pa// dgang zhing thun bzhir zhag bdun byas// sbyor ba de yis sangs rgyas kyang // 'jig par 'gyur na gnod sbyin kun// smos ci
63a5(rgyud 'grel): dgos te de lta yin// rus phye dug dang khrag rnams lo// gzugs brnyan ming dang bcas byas la// sol khur spangs pa'i gos gon la// khros nas rkang pas mnan te bzlas// che ge mo rak+Sha seng kra ha ya// bskul ba'i tshog bcad thun
63a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ru zhag bdun bzlas pas dgra bo de// srin pos khyer bar gdon mi za// ske tshe mar dang bshang gcir sbyar// gzugs brnyan yog par blugs byas la// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rkang pa mchog/ mi yi 'khor lor byin gyis brlab//
63b1(rgyud 'grel): pra shu dza la che ge mo ma ra ya hUM phaT/ gong gi sngags spel thun bzhi ru// zhag bdun g.yel med sems kyis bsgrubs// tsha ba'i nad kyis 'debs par byed// gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la//
63b2(rgyud 'grel): phran tshegs rdo rje gsang ba yis// bsad pa'i las 'di bsgrub pa'o// rdo rgyus sam dur khrod sol ba la// de nyid gsum gyi bar bcug pa'i// kham ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// dur khrod sa l-i sbrul gzugs bri// nag po mi sdug 'jigs
63b3(rgyud 'grel): byed pad 'od 'bar sems 'khrugs mche phreng gtams// lce gnyis myag ma mig bgrad pa// mjug ma brdeb pa'i tshul cano// de yi kha ru mi zad dug/ sreg byed lta bu dmar nag tu// gnas pa'i yi ge kham bsam te// de yis sbrul
63b4(rgyud 'grel): te gnas las bskyod// de yi lce yi rtse mo la// hri ljang gu yi lcags kyu yis// rgyu ba dang ni gnas pa'i dug/ ha la ha la la sogs kun// bkug ste bsdus nas khyer 'ongs nas// lce yi rtse la gzhug par bya// de yi khams gsum
63b5(rgyud 'grel): dug blangs nas de nyid dug gis gang bar byasam// oM kr-iSh+Na sarba che ge mo'i dpral gr-ih+Na na khaM hri phaT/ brjod pas de sod dpral bar bzung // mche bas phug ste lces reg pas// rdo rje 'chang ba chen po yang // dug gis 'chi nges dogs
63b6(rgyud 'grel): pa med// de kho na bzhin sdig pa dang // sre mong blta ba la e na pa// chu sbrul rlung sbrul la sogs pa// sa yi zas can sbal pa yis// bsgrub bya 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir// bri ba'i rdzas dang gzugs dang bskul// gdug pa kun nas spang
64a1(rgyud 'grel): btang bas// de yis mi 'chi ngogs pa med// gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ldan pas// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// dkon mchog gnod byed gzhom pa'i phyir// sbyor ba bzhi yis bsgrub par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+r-i
64a2(rgyud 'grel): kri ti na na cheg mo pa ta ya hUM phaT/ de yis dur khrod sol ba la// stong rtsa brgyad ni btab nas kyang // ro 'asregs gul gyi sa la yang // bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris bkug ste gzhug/ bkaso pa'i bsam pas sol ba de// gong gi
64a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas spu gri ltar// bsams te mgul pa 'am spyi bo nas// de ltar thun bzhir zhag bdun sbyar// spyi bo 'gas sam mgo chad par// 'gyur ba 'di la som nyi med// de bzhin de 'dra'i rnal 'byor pas// de nyid lag pa g.yu
64a4(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// mdun du bsgrub bya'i lus bsams la// sngags 'di nyid kyis bsnun zhing rgyu ba// oM hrIHSh+T+r-i wi kr-i tA na na che ge mo mud ka ra a ta ya hUM phaT/ de yis thun bzhir zhag bdun du// bsnun zhing brdungs pas bsgrub bya ste//
64a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yang du lhung nas 'chi bar ngos// yang ni de yi rnal 'byor gyis// g.yas par hUM las byung ba yi// rdo rje rtswa lngas bsgrub bya yi// lus la bsnun zhing rab brjod do// oM hrIHSh+Ti wi kr-i ta nA na che ge mo badz+ra a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ de yis
64a6(rgyud 'grel): thun bzhir zhag bdun du// kha phye bsnun pas bsgrub bya de// srin po la sogs 'jigs par byed// de ltar de yi rnal 'byor gyis// sngon bzhin sngags btab rdo rgyus sam// sol bas dur khrod gzhi la// bsgrub bya pho mo'i gzugs bris
64b1(rgyud 'grel): lA/ hUM bsgyud stA re lag par bsam// khros te mgul par sngags bzlas nas// mid pa bcad par bsam pa ni// sbyar bya thun bzhir zhag bdun du// a haHwA n+ta kA tA na na chu ga mo b+haka ti ba tA hU~M phaT/ brjod cing g.yel ba med /
64b2(rgyud 'grel): yis// bzlos pas bsgrub bya mgul 'gags nas// kha zes mi thar nad kyis 'dzin// de bzhin bag gas dgro'i sbyor ba yis// ro bsregs thal ba rus le sogs// khro bo nyi shu 'am de phyed kyis// me thab dkyil 'khor gru gsum
64b3(rgyud 'grel): byas mar tshon dud pas kha~M dag bsgyur// kha phye rdo rje rtse gsum pas// dbus su kha khyer gsum byas te// tsher ma'i me ni khros nas sbar// bshad pa'i tshogs me lha bskyed// gong gsungs rdzas byos gzugs brnyan btub// de yi zhal du
64b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan gsum du// gang ba'i sbyin srog dbul bar bya// de yi ye shes sems dpa' ru// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhal gdangs pa// hUM ljags mche ba rnon po can// khro dang ldan pa sngon bzhin bsam// srog song steng ngam sra ba 'am/ yang na
64b5(rgyud 'grel): ci yang med pa ruH/ rkang pas rkang pa mnan nas su// sos nI so yang 'cha' bar byed// ba lang sho dang khyi yi sha/ zangs phud can sogs sha rnams ni// bsgrub bya'i yan lag tu bsam la// gong ma'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya// sha
64b6(rgyud 'grel): chen 'ba' zhig kho na la// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// de yi zhal du sbyin smyig byas// rdo rje las byung 'jig par bshad// sngon bzhin dgra yi gzugs brnyanA la// bshang gci 'bru mar bcas byugs nas// sngon gsungs sngags dang
65a1(rgyud 'grel): bskul bar bsam// tsher ma'i me la khros te bsreg/ thun bzhir zhag bdun brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas pas sangs rgyas kyis sbyar ba'i// las kyang 'jig na dgra bo yi// sbyar ba'i las ni smos ci dgos// bsrad
65a2(rgyud 'grel): pas de dag thams cad kun// thugs rjes gzung phyir rnal 'byor ches// gnyis bral 'das pa'i de ma thag/ 'jug pa'i las 'di brtsam pa'o// de dag rnams kyis dngos po rnams// ma skyes par ni gzhig nas kyang // 'bras bu myong bar
65a3(rgyud 'grel): nges pa'i dus// ye shes rang rig chen po mchog/ sa bon 'od zer gyis bkug nas// zhal du zhugs nas zhu 'gyur te// rdo rje lam byung pad+mar gnas// ye shes bdud rtsi'i gzugs gyur lo// spyan sogs lha mos bskul ba la// hUM los byung
65a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje hUM gis mtshan// spros bsdus mi bskyod rdo rjer bskyed// chos kyi dbyingasu byin gyis brlab// rang las dgu gnyis drug phyung nas// gnyis dang gsum du rdzogs byas la// dang po rtog pa yongs dag phyir// sngags kyis phur bu dbyung bar
65a5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ oM AHbadz+ra ki lo ta kI la ya hUM/ phyung nas do yau gnasu yang // rang gr-i ye shes 'khor lo ts+tshan// gnas bcas bsams nas 'od zer gyis// ston bzhin rang dgra sangs rgyas su// bskyed dang des bskyed lha mo'i tshogs// bdud rtsi lngas
65a6(rgyud 'grel): gang bum pa yis// dbang bskur de dang bla mar bcas// zhugs pas rdo rje sems dpar bskyed// oM badz+ra d+h+r-ika sngags kyis phyung ste// mdun du rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng // 'khor lo bcas pa mos byas la// mchod bstod bdud rtse myang
65b1(rgyud 'grel): ba bya// a ho yaM gis sngags brjod pas// rlung gi bteg nas mngon dga' ru// gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags 'phangs pas// de bdag sras su skye bar nges// rang rang lha yi sbyor ba 'am// de yi gnas pa gang rung du// blo gros
65b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sbyor ba de kho na yis bya// gnyis po rang zhugs de ma thag/ de yi ye shes rang lha 'am/ zhe sdang dag pa'i sbyor kho nas// gong mi bzhin du rab tu brtsam// bdag med sems med bems po ni// lan gsum
65b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi ni gzhig byas pas// gong gi sbyor bas 'bras bu che// 'jug tu brtsam mi dgos par 'byung // de ltar thabs dang sngags ldan pas// 'khor ba'i 'og ma'i rgyu ldan pa// bsad pas rang dang gzhan dag pas// ma 'khrul pa ru gsungs
65b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// sred pa zhe sdang gis bslad pa'i// sems kyis gsod pa'i gti mug can// thabs med ye shes dang bral bas// thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro// da ni gnas nas spo ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// thams
65b5(rgyud 'grel): cad snga ma bzhin byas la// gnyis kyis rab tu bsgrub byas pa// gsum pa las 'di brtsam pa'o// thod pa srubs ni gang ba dag/ pho dang mo yau bskrad pa la// de yi rigs pas btsal byas la// gnod byed yul gzhan dbyung bar bya// a ri lo ma'i
65b6(rgyud 'grel): khu ba dang // rkang pa g.yon pa'i srin lag khrag/ snag tshar byas de bya rgod kyi// sgro rtsa'i smyu gus bri bar bya// 'gar ba'i dur khrod ras ma la// gzhu 'dra rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng // ral gri yi ni mtshan pa bri// de steng bsgrub bya'i gzugs
66a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la// gong gi ras la de yi ming // sngags kyi bar bcug che ge mo'i// u ts+tsha Ta ya phaT bris la// de yi snying gar gzhug par bya// bkug ste bcug nas de dkris la// thod pa ru ni bcug byas te// khro bo'i
66a2(rgyud 'grel): tshig gis rang rang sngags// rig dang bcas par brgya rtsa brgyad// thun bzhir zhag bdun bzlas byas nas// khyim mam grong ngam sgo dag tu// sbas te bzhag na dusa~M de ru// sangs rgyas dpung yang skrod par 'gyur// de bzhin tA la'i lo ma la/
66a3(rgyud 'grel): gro ga 'am shog shog ras la sogs// snod med cho gas gong ma ltar// stong rtsa brgyad ni rig bcas bzlas// dgra yi khyim mam sgo dag tu// sbas te bzhag na myur ba ru// dkon mchog 'joms pa'i dgra bo che// skams sam 'chi 'am
66a4(rgyud 'grel): skrod par nges// las de bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi// sbyor ba yis kyang rab tu bsgrub// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// cho ga 'di ni rab tu brtsam// rgyal mtshan ras ni chag gang la// gru bzhi lham par kha ti dang // a ri sha yi lo ma dang //
66a5(rgyud 'grel): ro bsregs smyo byed sol ba dang // mu zo'i dug dang rkang g.yon gyi// ming meng khrag la snag tshar byas// khwa yi gshog pa'i smyu gu yi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra la// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad rtse bstan pa'i// ral gri brgyad pa'i
66a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo lo// de dbus bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris la// de yi snying gar phreng sngags ni// gong gi rig pa dang bcas pa// dgug med bris nas snying gar glan// bkug ste bcug nas rkang g.yon gyis// mnan te brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas/
66b1(rgyud 'grel): namaHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+ra naM/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daM sh+tso Ta/ ka Ta b+hai ra ba ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu/ pA sha ha tA ya/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li kha kha kha hi kha hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+han+ta b+han+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gar+Na gardza/
66b2(rgyud 'grel): s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nA na/ bi na ya ka naM/ che ge mo uts+tshu Ta ya phaT/ de yang phyag 'tshal 'jug tu yang // bskul ba 'di ni bya ba dang // phyag 'tshal bskul dang bod pa dang // las brgyad de dag tu shes bya// de ltar bsngags nas ras/
66b3(rgyud 'grel): ma de/ ma mo la sogs gan su sgra// sangs rgyas dpung yang skad byed na// bgegs kyi gnod pa smos ci dgos// / da ni bsgrub bya srin po la sogs pas// 'dzin du gzhug pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// thaMd
66b4(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin byas la// gzhan gyi mi thub rnal 'byor gyis// gsum pa'i dus su rdzas ldan par// cho ga 'di yis las 'di byed// rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun dang // shi ba'i thod pa gnyis btsal la// dur khrod kyi na sol ba la//
66b5(rgyud 'grel): bo'i sngags ni rig bcwa bzlas// de yi thod par srin po'i gzugs// 'jigs rung gyen brdzes mche gtsigs pa// shArlon zla zhing khrag 'dzag pa// g.yas g.yon ro langs gri dang ni// sdigs mdzub bye ba hUM bskyed de// de yi snying gar
66b6(rgyud 'grel): rus phyi dang // dug dang mthe'u chung khrig gis ni// che ge mo ni zung zhig bri// yang ni thod pa gnyis pa la// bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes sa dang ni// re bsregs sa dang thal ba dang // sol ba ga cin gyis spros byas lo// de yi gzugs
67a1(rgyud 'grel): brnyan byas nas su// dug dang rus phye mdzub mo khrag/ ming dang sngags bcas ta ler bris// de yi snying gar gzhug par bya// gnyi ga bkug ste bcug byas nas// de ni 'og bzhag gong ma steng // srin po de yis
67a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya rnams// bzung bar bsams nas khros byas te// nag po gnyis las dur khrod du// nam phyed song nas bsgreng byas te// sngags bzlas srin pos 'dzin par 'gyur// na maHsa man+ta naM kA ya wa ka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM hUM dzi na ri ta
67a3(rgyud 'grel): cho ge mo rak+Sha g+hi hA hUM phaT/ de bzhin sbrul dang seng+go dang // 'byung po sdig la sogs pa rnams// cho go gong bzhin gnyis par bri// gong gis sngags de rig bcas bzla// g.yeng med gnyis kyi mtshan du su// khros nA bsgreng zhing bzlas
67a4(rgyud 'grel): byas pas// gal te mi bskyod yin na yang // de dag rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur// de dag thar bar byed 'dod pas// 'dzin byed de dag thams cad kun// bsgrub bya'i lus la bsdus byas la// rkang pa gnyis kyis mnye bar bya// lag gnyis
67a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i rdo rje ra bskyed// de yis byugs pas bdug par bya// rdo rje 'bar bas brdung ba dang // sngon gyi sngags bzlas lcug mos gdab// che ge mo rak+Sha sa 'di phyi mau tsa ya// srin mo ma rungs gtum po dang // 'jigs pa chen pos 'khrugs
67a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la// sbyor ba de yos rab sbyar na// cho ga bzhin du grol bar byed// / da ni dgug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par byo'o// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nasu// lha yis dbang bskur yan chad ni// thams cad gong ma bzhin byas
67b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ bsam gtan 'khor los dgug par bsgrub// rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo chen po rnam par bsam// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la// lcags kyu gnas ni bsgom par bya// oM AHdzi na tri ka che ge mo sen
67b2(rgyud 'grel): nam sen ma yin pa A kaR+Sha ya dza brjod pas de las rab 'phros pas// lcags kyu zhags pas mtshan pa yi// lha yi sku ni mang po dag/ bsgrub bya 'gugs phyir spro bar bya// dgug bya ming gi yi ges bskyed// yaM byung rlung dkyil la bzhag
67b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ lcags kyus snying btab zhags pas bcings// rlung gis btag nas 'od 'bar bsam// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo sogs// mtshan ma'i lha rnams spros byis nas// de yis btab pas de bzhin du// dgug par the tshom med pa'o// laM
67b4(rgyud 'grel): gis yab ste mdun bzhag nas// sngon bzhin lha mo gnyis kyis ni// 'tshe ba bzlog nas bka' nod bsam// de ltar sbyor bas zhag bdun du// thun bzhir rab tu sbyar byas nas// dgug las mi 'da' kun gyis kyang // sgrub po las
67b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs byed par 'gyur// de bzhin mi bskyod rdo rje dang // rnam par snang mdzad 'od dpag med// 'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ba yis// lcags kyu gnas bsam rang sngags brjod// oM AHbadz+ra d+h+r-ika che ge mo A kaR+Sha ya dza/ oM AHU ro
67b6(rgyud 'grel): lig che ge mo A kaR+Sha ya dza/ gzhan kun sngon bzhin dpag byas la// thun bzhir zhag bdun sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum gyi nus pa yang // 'gugs 'gyur bsgrub bya smos ci dgos// sems kyi spyod pa gzhan bral bas// rdzogs chen
68a1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de yi bsam gtan 'ba' zhig gis// dgug pa drag ni thabasu gsungs// dga' dang dga' ba bar ma yin// bskyed pa gang du mngon byas la// bsgrub bya ye shes de ba ru// byas/
68a2(rgyud 'grel): te gnyis par chud byas te// ma 'phros rtse gcig pa yis bzung // ye shes gsum gyi sku gsum mchog/ de yi rgyud la 'gugs 'gyur na// sngags rgyud la sogs bsgrubo bya ni// smos ci dgos te de mchog yin// de bas rnam pa thams/
68a3(rgyud 'grel): cad du/ las rnams kun 'di bston pa yi// lus sogs med pa'ang dgug sogs 'gyur// gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// rang gi sngags kyis rig pa mchog/ grangs med bzlas pa rab tu bya//
68a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas lung rtsal thob pa yis// 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa bya// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris byas la// lha yis dbang bskur bar gyis zhugs// bud med gzhon nu'i thod pa ni// ma chags cing ni ma gas pa// pad+ma ltar mdzes yid du 'ong //
68a5(rgyud 'grel): dum bu gcig pa blangs byas nas// gi the nga la ni sngags bzlas nas// rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bris te// lte bar dgug par bya ba ni// gur gum go ro tsa nas bri// gro ga shog shog la sogs la// phreng sngags
68a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni mi dgug par// swA hA bton te dza bcug nas// bskul ba dang bcas bris nas ni// de yi snying gar glan par bya// thod pa de yang kha sbub nas// gshin rje gshed kyi zhabs g.yas brkyang // g.yon pa bskum pas mnan byas la// khro
68b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas gsang sngags 'di// rdo rje gsum dang bcas bsams par// lan gsum drag tu brjod par bya// na maHsa man+ta/ ka ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+TA na sa tra da ma kA/ a si mu sa la pa ra
68b2(rgyud 'grel): shu pA sha hAstA ya/ tsa tur+dz+dza dze tsa tur+m+ma kha/ Sho Da sha tsa rA ya/ A gAts+tsha A gats+tsha/ sarba duSh+TA na prA NAM a ha ri Ni/ ma hA big+h+na na bi nA ya kaM/ bi kr-i tA na na sarba b+hu tra b+he yaM ka ra ya/ A gat+ta ha sa dA da ni/ byA g+hA tsa ra ma Ni ba sa na/ ku ru ku ru/
68b3(rgyud 'grel): sarba karma tshon+na tshin+na/ sarba man traM/ b+hin+ta b+hin+na/ pa ra mu traM/ bu mo che gau A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha yaM/ sarba bu taM/ nirmaM tha ya nirma tha ya/ sarbi duSh+Ta na/ pra be ga ya pra be sha ya/ maN+Da laM be bi bau ba swA hA/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka pri ya/
68b4(rgyud 'grel): ku ru ku ru/ ma mi ka r+yaM/ da ha da hA/ paM tsi pa tsa/ ma bi laM ba ma bi lAM baM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ sarba nA sha ya shwa ni suM ka ra ka ra/ he he b+ha ga banra/ kiny+tsa ra ya si ma ma ar+tha sA d+ha yadz+dza/
68b5(rgyud 'grel): de las 'phros pa'i gshin rje gshed // lcags kyu thogs pa mang po yis// sngon bzhin rlung dkyil la gnas pa'i// bsgrub bya bud med dgug par byed// skrag pas 'tshe ba bzlog pa'i phyir// spyan ma'i sngags kyis sngon
68b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir// mA ma kI ni sbyor bas srung // de bzhin skyes pa'i thod pa la// g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum pas mnan te// cho ga sngon bzhin rab byas te// skyes po rnams kyang dgug par byed// bsam
69a1(rgyud 'grel): gtan sngags rgyud sbyor ba yis// zhag bdun thun bzhir rab brtsams nas// gshin rje gshed kyi yon tan yang // dgugs 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// 'dod pa'i rgyal
69a2(rgyud 'grel): po khro bo che// 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshogs bsgom// bu mo rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog/ gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud gsungs pa'i// tshogs bsgrub bya bkug bcug nas// g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum gyis mnan na// sngags 'dis
69a3(rgyud 'grel): rig bcas bzlas brjod bya// na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ ta kiM bu mo che ge mo hUM/ A kaR+Sha ya dzA/ brjod pas sngags byung khro bo yis// lcags kyu sngon bzhin bkug byas nas// zhi ba srung ba'i cho ga yis// lha rnams la sogs
69a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gugs par byed// sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la// rdo rje las byung mi g.yo ni// 'og nas 'byung bzhin rab bsgoms la// lha tshon chung mar bcas pa dgug/ skyes pa'i thod pa ma gas pa// mdzes shing srubs med ma gas pa//
69a5(rgyud 'grel): 'thab tshe g.yul du shi ba yi// skyon med pa de btsal bar bya// rkang pa g.yas pa'i sor mo'i khrag/ lan tshwa yungs kar ske tshe la// sgeg tsha byas nas bya rgod rkang // lha chen chung mar bcas pa kun+da// thod pa de la bri bar bya// de yi snying gar
69a6(rgyud 'grel): gong ma lngar// rig bcas sngags ni dgug par bya// bris nas snying gar glan par bya// bkug na ste bcug nas khas sbub la// g.yon bskum g.yas brkyang bas mnan na// sngags 'di thun bzhir zhag bdun du// rig pa dang bcas bzlas
69b1(rgyud 'grel): dgug bya// na maHsa man+ta/ kA ya wak+Shit+ta badz+rA NAM/ a tsa la ga na tse ta/ nAD+hA nA g+h+ra mo Ta mo Ta/ sa ta so tA/ da ha da ha/ mo ha ma ha/ sa ha sa ha/ ha na ha na/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a be sha a bi sha/ ma hA ma da ta pa la ka/ d+hu na d+hu na/ nyi ni nyi na/
69b2(rgyud 'grel): kha nga kha da/ big+ha naM ma ra ma ra duSh+TA na ni/ b+hak+She bak+Sha/ sarbaM ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi sha badz+ra s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ tri ba li baM ga narta ya/ aM haM aM haM/ a tsa la tse ta/ swa ta ya spa ta ya/ hUM hUM/ a sa man+ti ka/ tra ta ma
69b3(rgyud 'grel): hA ba la/ sa ma ya man+taM naM/ haM mi shu ta bu lo ka du sh+ya du/ badz+ra na mo sta pri ti ha ta ba la bya/ dza la ya tra ta a sa ha na na ma/ lha chen po bud med dang bcas pa// A kaR+Sha ya dz+nyA/ sngags las byung ba'i khro bo che// lcags kyu thogs
69b4(rgyud 'grel): pas 'gug bsams nas// sngon bzhin rab mchod bsrung ba yis// g.yog dang chung ma'i bya ba byed// de bzhin lha min la sogs kyang // sbyor ba de yis rab bsgrubs na// skrag cing 'jigs pa gong mas bsrung // kha sbyar lus
69b5(rgyud 'grel): su bcas pa 'grub// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho ga yis// gnod mdzes rgyal po bsgom byas te// bu mo rnams ni dgug par bya// mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa// rgyal mtshan gyur pa'i
69b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thod pa la// rkang pa g.yon pa'i ming med khrag/ snag tsha byas nas na ci sgros// bsgrub bya'i bu mo'i gzugs bris la// de'i snying gar gong ma ltar// rig bcas sngags bri glan byas la// de yi b+ha gar gnod mdzes kyi// rkang pa
70a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i mthe bos mnam// thun bzhir zhag bdun gsang sngags 'di// bskul dang bcas pas khros byas nas// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'o// oM sum b+ha ni suM b+hA bu mo che ge mo hUM/ gr-ih+NA pA yA gr-ih+NA pa ya/
70a2(rgyud 'grel): bu mo che ge mo hU~M/ a na ya hoHb+ha ga ban bid+ya rA dza bu mo che ge mo hUM phaT dz+dzi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// gnod mdzes gyur pa lcags kyu zhogs// thogs pa 'phros pas rlung dkyil la// gnas pa'i bu mo snying gi phug/
70a3(rgyud 'grel): zhags pas ske nas bcings nas ni// 'ongs pa'i tshe na bzlog pa'i phyir// zhing dang bsrung bas brtan byas pas// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed// gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas// snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya// kha ti la sogs
70a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub byas la// skyes pa bud med dgug pa bsgrub// zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe// btsag gam rdo rgyus la sogs pa// rang gi kha ra bcug nas kyang // de nyid gsum bskyed lha ru byasam// de bar rang sngags bcug nas ni// s+pha ro Na yis
70a5(rgyud 'grel): spro byis pas// de los byung ba'i lha rnams ni// lcags kyus mtshan pas na mkha' dgang // bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus nas// rdzas kyis lha la bstim par bya// brten pa'i ngo bos yang dang yang // zla ba grol gyi bar du gzung // de nas
70a6(rgyud 'grel): brtsams te thun bzhi ru// zhag bdun goms byas de bton la// tshangs pa drag po la sogs lha// gong gi ming rnams bris 'gyur na// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// skrag cing 'jigs nas 'ongs 'gyur na// tha mal skyes pa bang
70b1(rgyud 'grel): med sogs// smos ci dgos par 'ong bar 'gyur// ston bzhin bzlas pa la sogs nas// dbang bskur yan chad zhugs byas te// rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i// thor tshugs gcig ma bsgom par bya// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbu ma
70b2(rgyud 'grel): sdo/ dang pos rang gi thabs la 'khyud// g.yas gnyis gri dang ral gri dang // g.yon gnyis thod pa nor bu bsnams// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa// rnam par smin sogs mos pa yis// rnga sgra dang ni ldan byas nas// cung zad mche
70b3(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs dmigs par bya// mtshams thung mi smrar gyur pa yi// thod pa klu shing me tog dang // rkang pa g.yon pa'i ming mod khrag/ bsres te 'o mar sbyar byas la// de yi sgra yi bar gyis na// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi// nor rgyas la
70b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs bu mo bri// de yi snying gar rig sngags ni// bskul ba dang bcas bris te glan// bkug ste bcug nas g.yas brkyang ste// g.yon bskum pa yis gnas byas la// sngags 'di brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas// oM AHbadz+ra shu li ni
70b5(rgyud 'grel): klu'i bu mo che go mo A kaR+Sha ya dz+dza/ brjod pas gsum las byung ba yi// mdud can ma ni lcags kyus mtshan// rlung dkyil la gnas bsgrub bya ni// bcug ste sngon bzhin 'tshe ba zlog/ de ltar zhag bdun thun bzhi ru// sngags rgyud de
70b6(rgyud 'grel): yis rab sbyar nas// klu yi bu mo mig bzang dag/ bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i// khro gnyer ma yi sbyor ba yis// na mkha'i rigs 'dzin bu mo dgug/ dmar skya g.yas/
71a1(rgyud 'grel): sngo g.yon dkar ba// dang po rang gi thabs la 'khyud// g.yas gnyis pad+ma ral 'dzin// g.yon gnyis rin chen 'khor lo 'dzin// gsum po mos pas dpag med mtshan// se ral thod pa'i phreng ba brgyan//
71a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan kun brgyan pa'i na bza' klubs// mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa bsgoms// rgyal po 'dra ba'i bu mo yi// thod par rig 'dzin bu mo'i gzugs// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// gong gi rdzas kyis bri bar bya// snying gar sngon bzhin ming
71a3(rgyud 'grel): bros na// bkug ste bcug nas g.yas brkyang dang // g.yon bskum pa yis a nan byas la// 'di ni brgya dang rtsa gcig bzla// oM ba ya na sha ni tra sa pra b+hai ni tra ya trA swa ya/ be ti be ra ti/ shwe pa ti sh+tse be ta/ dzi ti ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo che ge/
71a4(rgyud 'grel): mo I kaR+Sha ya b+h+rUM/ brjod pas sngags las byung ba yi// khro gnyer lcags kyus mtshan pa yis// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog/ gser gyi rna rgyan 'phyang ba rnams// bkug ste 'ongs pa rgyas btab
71a5(rgyud 'grel): po/ lhun gyis grub pa gnyis mi dgos// thun bzhi re zhag bdun sbyar na 'grub// gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas// sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la// mAr ngo bcu bzhi'i chos brgyad la// ro bsregs sol ba blangs nas ni//
71a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad du ni// bzlas nas srin po la sogs pa// ming bcas gro ga la sogs la// bris nas de yis dgug par byed// oM hrIHSh+T+r-i wi kr-i tA na na srin po la sogs pa che ge mo skyes pa 'am bud med 'di bdag la byin
71b1(rgyud 'grel): zhig staM pa ya hUM phaT dz+dza/ brjod cing de mnan thun bzhi ru// bdun sbyar srin po la sogs pas// rang gis bka' stsal gang yang rung // khrid nas nges par 'bul bar byed// 'das ma thag pa'i sbyor ba yis// khams cad snga ma bzhin byas
71b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ ji skad bshad pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ bsgrub phyir sbyin sreg cho ga bya// dur khrod thal ba sol ba la// hom khung gru gsum khru do pa// zabasu khru gang kha phyer ni// sor me brgyad pa'i tshad du bya// rdo rje rtse gsum sor bcu gnyis// rtse dbus
71b3(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu ltar byas nas// dbus dang kha khyer la bkod de// dmar nag kha khyer rams kyis byugs// ji skad gsungs pa'i gshin rje gshed// hU~M bskyed rdo DoM lde ldan pa'i// zhal du nges par bsgyur byas la// po seM cha sogs me sbar ro// dug ni
71b4(rgyud 'grel): khrag dang rab tu sbyar// lan tshwa ske tshe de bzhin sbyar// du du a yi 'bras bu yis// zhag du bsreg cing lus dang ngag/ khro zhing bsgrub bya'i ming bcas pa'i// sngags 'di stong dang rtsa brgyad du// blo dang ldan pas g.yal med pas// zla zhing sbyin sreg
71b5(rgyud 'grel): brnam pa'o// oM hrIHSh+T+r-i wi kr-i tA na nA bu mo che ge mo staM pa ya na shA ya hUM hUM phaT dz+dza/ de las 'phros pa'i gshin rje gshed// lcags kyu thogs pa 'phros byas pas// rlung dkyil la gnas bu mo yi// snying gar sbyar te dgug par bos ma// nyi
71b6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gung dang nam phyed na// 'di ni shis pa'i dus yin pas// blo dang ldan pas sbyor ba des// nyi ma gsum dang drug tu bya// 'ongs pas 'tshe ba bzlog pa'i phyir// sngon bzhin zhi dang bsrung ba bya// bskal pa grangs med gsum du'ang // de yis
72a1(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu 'dul bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sam ni chos 'dzin nam// rdo rje sems dpa' gang yang rung // gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni// de yi tshe ni der zad 'gyur// / da ni k+Sha skams pas chur bcad par
72a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// sngon bzhin byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid// kha dog ser po bsgoms byas la// char mi bcad pa 'gog pa bya// yul yul kun nas phyogs gcig ste// hU~M bskyed sna tshogs rdo rje ni// rab
72a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar me stag 'phro ba ni// 'dod pa'i phyogs ni g.yogs par bsam// de yi lte bar hUM bskyed pa'i// rdo rje rtse lnga 'greng bu ni// ta l-i'i tshad tsam me 'bar ba'i// bum par rten gyi dkyil 'khor bsam// de ru gong gi sbyor ba ni// 'khor lo dang bcas
72a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bsgom// bdag ci 'dra bar 'khor rnams kyang // brjod pas bsams te sngags 'di bzlas// oM AHhUM ma hA ba ra sha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de rnams pa spu pu ga las// 'phros pa'i 'od zer ser po yis// 'dod pa'i phyogs ni khyab
72a5(rgyud 'grel): bsams pas// sna tshogs rdo rje me yis ni// sa gzhi thams cad bsregs nas ni// klu skams gyur zhing 'bros bsams na// rang 'dod gnas las phyi rol tu// 'bab bam 'on te mi 'bab 'gyur// yang na sbyor ba des gnas la// ske tshe
72a6(rgyud 'grel): lan tsha 'bru mar ding // dug dang da du ra dag gis// dur khrod ras la 'khrul 'khor bri// dang po pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// klu brgyad nam gi sa bon na ma// rang rang snying po bri ba'o// bu phaM phe pho pha pheM phaM/ snying po phaT gnyis bar du ni// chu
72b1(rgyud 'grel): yi snying po b+ha bris la// de rnams bkug ste sa bon la// bcug ste gsal bar bsgom par bya// yang ni ra sa ma gnyis pa la// las kyi rdo rje ser po ni// 'od zer 'bar ba bri byas la// lte bar rdo rje rtse lnga pa// hUM gis mtshan pa bri bar bya// gong gi
72b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas byin brlabs la// dang po ras ma bkan te bzhag/ ras ma gnyis pa khas sbub nas// rdo la sogs pa mnan byas pas// gong ma'i sngags ni bzlas brjod bya// klu rgyal 'bum ni khros gyur kyang // char pa 'gog pa'i mchog
72b3(rgyud 'grel): yin no// da ni pha rol gyi ngag dang dpung gnon pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas// ting 'dzin 'di yis zhag bdun du// thun bzhir gzugs brnyan gcig sbyar bya// 'phral du mngon du phyis
72b4(rgyud 'grel): byed 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i sbyor ldan pas// gcer bu la sogs phyir rgol rnams// ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed// spobs pa mnan phyir de yi mgor// laM la dbang chen ser po la// grwa bzhir rdos mtshon par bsaM// de steng haM byung l+r-i no// de steg+haM/
72b5(rgyud 'grel): po bskyed pad+ma la// gzhal yas khang po ji bzhin bsam// de dbus khro bo'i 'khor lo che// kha dog ser po bsgom byas nas// de ni gnon por rnam par bsam// rkan gyis dbus su haM bskyed pa'i// sna tshogs rdo rje kha bzhi yis// gsum po
72b6(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo rno ba yis// lkog mar phug bsam sngags bzla'o// de nyid gsum par rang rang sngags// che ge ba sha pa ya hUM// brjod cing bltas pas bsgrub bya de// mig mi lta zhing smra mi nus// gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor ma// 'di yang sngon bzhin
73a1(rgyud 'grel): rab sbyar nas// gang tshe dpung tshogs mthong ba yi// nga tshe las la yang dag sbyar// dpung rnams kun gyis spyi bo ru// sa sogs rten ni sngon bzhin bskyed// 'khor lo thams cad khro bo che// pad+ma ser po mdog ltar
73a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgomad/ ri yi rgyal po tsam bsams te// de nyid gsum par rang rang sngags// ba hu pa ya hUM zhes brjod// dpung rnams 'og 'byong bar 'gyur// khro bo rnams ni phar bltas bsam// ba hu bi ra hUM zhes brjod// de dag phyir ni mi ldog par// /
73a3(rgyud 'grel): sa par rab tu gyur pa'o// gal te khro bo rang mdun bltas// ba hu gr-ih+Na hUM zhes brjod// de ni 'bros par byed 'dod kyang // mdung bzhin du ni rengs par 'gyur// tshu rol pham par byed 'dod pas// gnyi ga mdun gyi phyogs byas pas// ba hu
73a4(rgyud 'grel): oM hi hU~M brjod pas// pha rol rgyal bar 'gyur ba'o// de ltar sbyor ba'i rnam pa yis// g.yel ba med par sbyar 'gyur na// sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon byed na// mi dbang la ni dogs pa med// yang ni sngon bzhin rab byis lo// gang che dpung
73a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mthong 'gyur nas// de rmongs bya phyir phur bu yi// bsam gtan 'di ni sbyar bar bya// hUM las bskyed pa'i phur bu ni// steng ni rtse lnga 'og rtse gcig/ sbyor brgyad tshad tsam rab bsams la// ded dpon dang pos dpung rnams
73a6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// thams cad snying ni phyogs bsams nas// de ni rdo rje tho ba yis// khros shing thams cad phog bsams la// sngags 'dis rab tu gdab pa'o// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ dpung thams cad phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/
73b1(rgyud 'grel): dpung thams cad phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra kI la ya badz+ra d+ha ro a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ dpung thams cad k+Sha ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ khros pas bzla zhing btab 'gyur na// sangs rgyas dag gi dpung dag kyang // ting 'dzin de yis
73b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig 'gyur na// mi yi dbang po smos ci dgos// / da ni char dbab pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o// 'og byung ba yi rim pa yis// stobs po che yis rnal 'byor pas// grangs med bzlas pas bka'
73b3(rgyud 'grel): lung thob// 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa bya// thams cad dmar por rab bsams la// rdza phor so ra ni ma btang la// / ral gri rtse brgyad 'khor lo la// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po bri// de la rams kyi khu ba yis// rdo rje thor tshugs gcig
73b4(rgyud 'grel): ma yid/ sngags kyi snying po 'di bri'o// oM shu li ni naM swA hA br-i// de dang 'dra ba'i kham phor bzhag/ kha sbyar skud pa sngon dmar dkri/ de dang des 'dul rab bkug ste// 'khor lo 'di la gnas par bsam// de ni ji bzhin gzhan thal sbyar
73b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa tshogs kyis mchod byas nas// klu gnas mtsho dang rdzing bu sogs// gzhan la gsangs nas gzhug pa'o// bdag nyid gnas dgon dben pa ru// saM sogs cho ga sngon 'gro bas// me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum steng //
73b6(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam bri// chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ste// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po ni// phyogs dang mtshams ni ma 'khrul bar// sbrul brgyad phyi rol snol mar bri// dbu su chu bdag dkar po che// sbrul mge 'dun pa zhabs
74a1(rgyud 'grel): klu gcig/ skyes bu'i gdong can sbrul zhags bsnams// lto 'phye mkhra 'gro zhon pa bri// shar gyi 'dab mar mtha' yas ljang // ut+pal thegs pa bri bar bya// lho yi 'dab mar nor rgyas dkar// rin chen
74a2(rgyud 'grel): bum thogs bri bar bya// nub kyi 'dab mar 'jog po dmar// dgra ste thogs pa bri par bya// byang du karko Ta nag po// sbrul gshog thogs pa bri bar bya// nub phyogs 'dab ma pad+ma dka re// pad+ma thogs pa bri bar bya// bden bral 'dab mar pad
74a3(rgyud 'grel): chen dkar// padad+ma dkar thogs pa bri bar bya// rlung mtshams 'dab mar dung skyong ster// dung phor thogs pa byi bar bya// dbang ldan rigs ldan sna tshogs pa// rgyal bu 'dzin pa bri bar bya// de dag kun kyang sbrul mgo gdengs// zhabs kyang
74a4(rgyud 'grel): sbrul 'khyil sprin gyis ni// gdan la bzhugs pa bri bar bya// g.yo ba drag po la sogs pa// rang rang phyogasu brgyad pa ni// zur dang sgo ru gnyis 'khril nas// sgo zur gnyis su mgo mjug bsnol// ji ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// /
74a5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa'o mas gang ba dgu/ phyogs mtshams rnams bzhag nas ni// rgyan rnams kyis kyang mdzes par bya// de yi rtog pa las bshad pa'i// cho gas klu rnams nam gis bskyed// sog dang bcas pa bzhin du na// gong ma lta bu bsgom
74a6(rgyud 'grel): papar bya/ de rnams dza naM dzaM zhes brjod// de nas bkug la gtsang gtor sogs// byas nas de la zhugs par bsam// de nas gtor ma 'o mar bcas// bu ram la sogs lho bshis che// phul nas rang rang sngags 'di ni// brgya rtsa
74b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyis dga' bar bya// oM baM ba ru nA ya ga ti pad ye nA ga na paR+sha ya hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM aM a nan ta ya hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM baM ba su k+She hUM naM hUM swA hA/ e taM tak+Sha hUM naM hUM swAhA/ e kaM karko Ta hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM paM pad+ma hU~M naM hUM swA hA/ oM ma~M
74b2(rgyud 'grel): ma hA pad+ma hU~M naM hUM swA hA/ oM saM sa kha ba la d+h+r-i naM hUM swA hA/ oM a na pa tA ha hU~M na~M hU~M swA nI/ de nas pog snod bzung byas te// gau tor ma sogs kyis mnyes byas la// stob sa chen sbyor ba de nyid kyis// bzhig ste tshig gis gsol po ga la// k+Sha
74b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po ni khyed rnams kyis// bdag la yang dag dga' ba dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' yis na// char gyi rgyan ni dbab tu gsol// lAn gsum brjod pas klu rnams kyis// dga' bas char pa 'bebyas byasnams nas// rang gi sbyor ba
74b4(rgyud 'grel): ma nyams pau ra// ji bzhin rang gi sngags bzla'o// na maHsa man+ta k+Sha ya s+tha k+tsit+ta badz+rA nAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM u gra la shu la ba ni hUM hUM hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ oM dze ti ni na da hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM oM oM ma hA pa lA ya swA hA/
74b5(rgyud 'grel): de yis dbang du rab byas nAswA// sa gzhi thams cad char gyis ni// rgyun gyis ngoms par byas nas ni// thams cad byed la gnas par byed// de yis phebs par ma gyur na// stobs po che yis rnal 'byor pas// thams cad dkar pos
74b6(rgyud 'grel): bsams byas te// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni bsgrub// ho khung zlum po khri gang par// khwa phyed zab su kha khyer la// sor bzhi tshad tsam de tsam 'phags// pad+ma'i 'dab mas bskor bar bri// 'khor lo 'khor lo phreng bskor la// rdo rgyus
75a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs kyis byugs byas te// ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis// me lha la sogs mchod par bya// de yi dbus su stobs po che// 'go nas 'byung ba bzhin du byas// phyogs dang mtshamasu klu brgyad kyang // de yi
75a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal ltas thal sbyar bsam// gong gi stegs kyis spyan drangs nas// gsang gtor zhabs bsil la sogs pa// byas nas de la thim par bsam// de rnams lce yi dbus su ni// yi ge na~M ni bsam byas te// blugs gzar dgang
75a3(rgyud 'grel): gzar cho ga bzhin// byas nas bsangag to ra la sogs pa// yang ni byas nas sbyin sreg dbul// 'o ma dang ni 'bras tshon dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi li kha ra// dbang po la sogs sman rnams ni// dang por gsum gsum dbul bar bya//
75a4(rgyud 'grel): gong gi sngags la zhi bo yi// rig pa dang bcas bzlas na ni// klu rnams kun la ci 'dod pa'i// gong rdzas ni sbyin sreg bya// tshim par byas nas rang gi sngags// gong ma bzhin du rab brjod pas// ji ltar 'dod pa'i phyogs rnams su// /
75a5(rgyud 'grel): char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed// de yis phebs par ma gyur na// stobs chen khro bo'i rnal 'byor pas// thams cad nog por bsams byas te// 'khrul 'khor cho ga bsgrub par bya// chu bo'i ngos gnyis sa dang ni// grogs mkhar sa
75a6(rgyud 'grel): dang gshing gci bsres// klu yi gzugs brnyan mtho gsum pa'i// snying gar 'khor lo 'di ni gzhug/ dur khrod kyi ni ras ma la// ske tshe lan tshwa yungs mar dang // khrag dug rims kyi snag tsha yis// ral gri rtse brgyad 'khro
75b1(rgyud 'grel): lo brid de steng pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// phu sogs brgyad ni bI ba ra dang // snying gar yi ge bA bris la// sngon bzhin bsams te dgug gzhug bya// gzugs brnyan yan lag thams cad kun// tsha ba gsum dang ske tshe dang // da du ra drung
75b2(rgyud 'grel): yungs mar dang // byugs nas me la gdung bya zhing // gong gi sngags ni brjod bya zhing // klu rnams gzugs ni rab tsha bas// bye ma me yis 'jigs pa yis// 'jigs nas char rgyun 'jam po yis// mngon par 'dod pa'i phyogs
75b3(rgyud 'grel): ni 'bebs// de yis char ni mi 'bebs na// sngon bzhin klu yi dkyil 'khor bri// stod g.yogs ser po slad g.yogs dmor// ze'u kha dag sngon po bcings nas ni// gos ni dmar pi bgo ba 'am// yang ni gcer bur byung byas la// skra
75b4(rgyud 'grel): bshig so ni gtsigs byas nas// rkang par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje 'bar bar byin brlabs la// klu ni gan rgyal gnas par bsam// g.yon pas de yi dkyil 'khor mnan// skrag ste gdengs ka g.yo bar byas mau// gyen bltas
75b5(rgyud 'grel): khA las byus 'debs shing // de yis khrag gis mkha' khyab nas// rgya mtsho lta bur gyur bosam nas// sngags 'di g.yong pa med par bzla// nA maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM naM hUM ni hUM naM hUM/ phaT naM phaT naM/ oM u gra la shu la ba
75b6(rgyud 'grel): ni naM/ hUM na hUM naM/ phaT naM phaT naM phaT/ oM dzo ti nir nang / hUM na hUM na hUM/ phaT naM phaT naM phaT/ oM ma hA pa la naM phaT/ de yis klu rnams stobs chen la// skrag nas sa gzhi rgyas pa ru// da ma tshig dbang gis de dag giso// char gyi rgyun
76a1(rgyud 'grel): ni 'bebs par byed// des kyang char ni mi 'bab na// sngon bzhin mngon spyod haM khung du// po so cha yi tsher mas dgang // sme sha can gyi me sbar bya// me lha sngon bzhin mchod byas nas// de dbus stobs po che bsams
76a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ zhal gdangs rdo rje rtse ldan pa// miche ba gtsigs pa bsams par bya// sngon gzugs klu yis gzugs brnyan ni// dug dang lan tshad du ra// ske tshe sogs pa rab byas la// phus bskyed dgug cing gzhug par bya// de ni bshang dang
76a3(rgyud 'grel): gci bas byugs// gdug pa'i dgra yis g.yon pa yis// de yi mjug ma'i rtse mo nas// gtub cing gong ma'i sngags zlo zhing // klu rnams ma ra ya phaT zhes// brjod cing sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad// byin pas klu rnams thams cad kyang // /
76a4(rgyud 'grel): tsha ste skrag nas char 'bebs byed// gal te de ltar byed pa la// char ni 'bebs par mi byed na// stobs po che yi 'gal ba'i phyir// de gnon pa yi cho ga bya// chu ngogs sa lo sogs pa yi// sngon gsungs rdzas la khro bo che// gzugs
76a5(rgyud 'grel): brnyan zhal gsum phyag drug pa// byas te gan rkyal bzhag par bya// bdag nyid dpal ljon gsum pa yi// rnal 'byor 'og nas 'byung bzhin bskyed// de ni bkug nA gzu Da brnyan bcug/ g.yon pas mnan te sngags zla'o// oM sum b+hu
76a6(rgyud 'grel): ni suM b+ha ni/ ma hA ba laM bar Sha shI g+haM hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na ma hA bo la baR+Sha shI g+h+raM hUM phaT/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya/ ma hA ba la baR+Sha shI g+h+raM hUM phaT/ A na ya ha b+ha ga ban bi d+ya ra dza ma hA ba la ba rA shi g+haM hUM phaT/ de 'am ji bzhin khri
76b1(rgyud 'grel): phrag gnyis// bzlas brjod byas nas gong ma yi// hom khung dbus su gnod mdzes che// zhal gdangs hUM gi lce can bsam// bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas pa yis// gzugs brnyan gtub cing khri phrag gcig/ de yi zhal du sbyin
76b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis// bzlas brjid byas nas gong ma yis// ha~M khung dbus su gnod mdzes che// zhal gdangs hU~M gi lce can bsam// bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas pa yis// gzugs brnyan gtub cing khri phrag gcig/ de yi zhil du
76b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg bya// stobs po che yaus char phab nas// 'dzam gling 'di dang thams cad kun// char gyis ngoms par byas pa yis// lo legs 'bru rnams 'phel bar 'gyur// 'khrul 'khor rgyud ni kun lnga grags// de nas zhi ba'i ha~M
76b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod no// sngon bzhin du ni rab byas nas// spyan ma dkar mo bsams nas ni// de yi sngags dang de'i tsho gas// ma r-i dang 'o ma 'bras chan sogs// de yi zhal du dbab byas nas// sreg thugs khri phrag gcig dbul bas// khru dang khro
76b5(rgyud 'grel): stobs po che// tshar bcad de yis zhi bar byed// des na de yis dga' 'gyur te// gzhan du sbyar ba tsam gyis ni// modo la char gyi rgyun 'bebs byed// las kyi tshogs ni de dag gam// gzhan la sgrub po bsrung ba 'am// yang na
76b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis gzhan bsrung phyir// sbyor ba 'di ni brtsam pa'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i// mA ma kI ni sngon bsam// ye shes sems ma'i thugs ka ru// bsgrub bya bzhag nas sngags 'di bzlo// oM AHshang ka re shan+ta ka
77a1(rgyud 'grel): re g+huT+Ta TA g+huT+Ta n+yA g+hurba NI nI g+huHTi ni g+hA ta ya swAhA che ge mo raSh+Ta rat+na hUM/ brjod pas sngon bzhin stobs dbab dang // dbang bskur byas nas bsgrub bya ste// rdo rje sems dpa sa sprul pa yang // srung na gzhan
77a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar smos ci dgos// gal te khyi gtses la sogs la// mtshan cha nir ni gzhan lta bsgrub// de chos gsum sgra 'gengs tshe// rnal 'byor 'di yis bsrung bar bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yi// spyi bor hUM las rdo rje bskyed// de yi lte bar
77a3(rgyud 'grel): bo lad/ mA ma kI ni sngon bzhin bsam// de yi ye shes lha mo ni// thugs kar mi la bzlas pa'i sngags// yang 'greng rig bcas bskor bar bsam// de nyid bzlas pas 'od zer 'phros// de yis spyi bo nas brtsams te// rkang mthil bar
77a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi rdo rje yi// go chas par mtshams med gtams te// 'byi lo ka ni chur blugs bzhin// sbyor de yeng dang yang bsams te// bdag dang gzhan ni srung bar byed// 'jigs pa stong gsum gang ba yang // srung byed stobasu 'gyur bar
77a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad// mngon rtog nye ba'i rnal 'byor pas// las ni bzhi ste gcig la gsum// bsgrub phyir nye dang mi nye bas// bsam gtan ri mo bsrung ba'i phyir// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams kyis// don dang 'bras bur bcas pa rnams// /
77a6(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i khro bo rnams kyi ni// bsgom po'i cho ga bshad par bya// sngon bzhin rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang // dang po mgon po bskyed byas nas// sems can skye rim bzhi spangs nas// bar ma'i sems kyis dang por 'gyur// bskul
77b1(rgyud 'grel): bas hUM lnga bruM du byung // hUM lnga lcags kyu dbyug tho dang // rtse grwa su m+ba ral gri rdo rjer 'gyur// b+h+rUM ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'gyur// de yang de dag rnams kyis mtshan// 'od kyi khams bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams// rang dang 'dra ba
77b2(rgyud 'grel): skyusbyar byas+ya // tsug sde sa bon nang du thim// Ta ki rgyal po khro bo che// sgra dang dra gu zhal mthong ga la// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar phyug drug pa// g.yas gnyis lcags kyural gri 'dzin// g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ha'o// dbyug ston
77b3(rgyud 'grel): ceno no khro ba che// sku mdog de 'dra phyag drug pa// g.yas gnyis dbyug tho sak+She 'dzin// g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o// stobs po che ni kha~M 'a tsho// zhal gsum de 'dra phyag drug pa// g.yas gnyis rtse gsum ral gri 'dzin// g.yon gnyis
77b4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen pad+ma'o// mi g.yo mgon po khro bo che// zhal gsum de 'dra zur gyis lha// g.yas gnyis ral gri 'khor lo 'dzin// g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o// gnod mdzes rgyal po khro bo che// sku dang dbu zhal de 'dra ste// g.yas gnyis
77b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ral gri dang // g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o// gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur rgyal che// sgra dang drabu zhal gser bco 'dra// g.yas gnag gu yon dkar phyug drug pa// g.yas gnyis 'khor lo rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon gnyis rin chen
77b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dzin// de dag dang pos rig ma 'khyud// stag lpags sham thab sa dang ldan pa// 'gying bag tu ni rab khro ba// mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa ste// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// pad+ma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la//
78a1(rgyud 'grel): sbom po g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba'o// ma yi 'od kyis dkyil 'khor nang // 'khor lo 'bar bas gtsug car bskor// mi bskyud cod pan mtshan ma bsgom// de dag dran pa gcig pa ste// las b+h+rUM khyud
78a2(rgyud 'grel): par sgrub byed pas// 'di ni 'khor lor ldan pa yi// zhar la de yi bsgrub pa gsungs// dgug dang dbang gi dang po dang // chos che rgyas mdzad mang po zhi// ma yin las kyi khyad par rnams// dang po gnyis pas yang bya ste// dus
78a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bye brag nges med pas// 'grub ste dang po thun mong lung // khyad par gzhung 'dis bzlog byas te// dad pas de rnams nan tan bya// gti mug nyes pa'i 'dod chags dang // sgrib pa las ni rnam dag pa'i// rang bzhin gzung dang
78a4(rgyud 'grel): dgo' ba dang // tshul dang mi g.yo rgyu nyid dang // 'bras bu dgo ste de rnams kyi// spyi yi mtshan nyid rnam dag pa// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi// bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// gang phyir ro mo'i brtul zhugs
78a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis// gzhung du nges par gsungs pas na// las kyi rim pa bkang ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i thig le rgyud las gsungs// de phyir sgrub thabs rim pa ni// rdzogs par bya phyir bla mas kyang // sgrub po rnams la phan gdags phyir//
78a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i cho gar gsungs pa yi// sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnal 'byor gnas// dbus zhal sku ni mthing ga la// g.yas dkar g.yon do mar phyag drug pa// dang pos rang gi rig ma 'khyud//
78b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// g.yon gnyis pad+ma zhags pa bsnams// mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa ste// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan// dbu skra ser po gyen du brnyes// gtum pa'i hUM gaM nga ro sgrogs// stag lcagasna
78b2(rgyud 'grel): smad g.yogs dang ldan pa// drag po g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gis// lha chen chung mar bcas pa yis// ldan g.yon sra bi'i nu mar mnan// cod pan mi bskyod mtshan pA bsgom// de ltar bsgoms nAs de yi stegs// hUM bzhi
78b3(rgyud 'grel): bim dwer gsungs bcu bdun po// rtse gcig lngas rnams kun+d+ha la nI// sngar bcas tshig bzhin du bzlas// oM AHk+Sho d+h+waM b+h+rUM ka ran ta na ma tha b+hAny+tsa hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i rnyog pa'o// oM hri da ya hU~M/ snying ga'o// oM ka pA la hUM phaT/ mchog
78b4(rgyud 'grel): ma lwa'o// oM AHhU~M ka ra kai ka bai rA hUM phaT/ spyi gtsug tu'o// oM dz+wA la dz+wa la li ta bA krA ha hUM phaT/ go cha la'o// oM baM baMs swa nan ta ka hU~M phaT/ mtshon cha la'o// sbyor ba de yis ba daMn dang // thal ba snag tsha bcig sor gtub
78b5(rgyud 'grel): skrong byed dag gi las rnams dag/ ji bzhin du ni bsgrub par bya// dur khrod ras la ba dan nI// kha dog mthing ga sor bcu drug/ smyug ma'i yu ba khru gang la// btags te dur khrod gnas su bsgrub// de ni lag tu gzung byas nas//
78b6(rgyud 'grel): zhig bdun sngags bzlas nam langs na// de thogs dgra dpung la g.yabs pas// the tshom med par gnon par 'gyur// mtshon thogs bdag la gnod byed gzhan// sgrub pa po ni mthong tsam gyis// de dag mdung bzhin
79a1(rgyud 'grel): rengs par 'gyur// de bzhin glang rgyal myos pa dang // shing rta rta dang srog chags rngam// rkang thang 'khrugs pa mang bcas pa// mthong ba tsam gyis rengs par 'gyur// mtshan mo myi ro bsregs pa yi// gnas song
79a2(rgyud 'grel): sgra ba shis gcer bur byung // bzlas pa bskor zhing rab byas naso// nam langs thal ba sparar+ya gang blangs// lag pa g.yon pas blangs nas ni// rang gi khyim du 'gro bar bya// yang na lha khang stong par 'gro/ phyir ni bltas par mi bya'o// de
79a3(rgyud 'grel): dor yang thal ba de// zhag bdun stegs bzlas bsrung bar bya// snod sar nang du rab bzhag ste// sa la bzhag par mi bya'o// de yis gong gi dpung gi tshogs// mthong na lon cig gtor tsam gyis// rengs par 'dod na rengs par 'gyur/
79a4(rgyud 'grel): rlung phyogs dag tu sbyar ba na// ldog par 'dod na ldog par 'gyur// mdun du bsnyen te gtor byas na// myong bar gyur de mtshon cha rnam// de kho na bzhin 'dor bar 'gyur// tshal chen snu ma la mar ma ni// thog pa bzang por sbar bar bya//
79a5(rgyud 'grel): snying gi thod par du po bsgo// snag tshar byas te de blangs la// zhag bdun sngags bzlas nam langs na// du bau'i snag cha mig la bsku// de yis gang mthong thams cad kun+da// ci bgyi zhes ni bka' nyan 'gyur// yug snam btsag ni dge ba
79a6(rgyud 'grel): dag/ bsreg pa'i gnas 'gro khar bcug la// de phyed tshig pa'i dus su ni// grogs med par ni mtshan mo blang // lha yi khang stong du khyer nas// gong gi sngags ni zhag bdun bzla// de tshe bgegs kyang sna tshogs 'ong // mi 'jig/
79b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dug cing de las bzla// de nas na ma lahAs gyur pa na// ras ni dmar pos dkri byas la// mchod cing bsrungs nas bzhag par bya// de yis sems dang ldan pa 'am// mi ldan gang gi ming bris pas// bskul nas dogs pa
79b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa yang // rdo rje 'chang ba'i bka' bzhin du// 'ongs nas las rnams thams cad byed// srog song dur khrod khyer ba na// gser gyi sor gdub de yi kha ra// bcug nas bdag nyid gcig pu ni// khro bo'i sngags ni zlos shing
79b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug/ ro de me yis tshig 'gyur na// kha yi sor gdub sgrub pa po'i// lag pa g.yon pas blangs byas la// zhag bdun bar du bzla bar bya// de nas sor gdub bzang po de// lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo la// bcug ste lag
79b4(rgyud 'grel): pa de yis ni// gang dang gang la rig 'gyur bya// de dang de yis las kun byed// phyi bzhin du'ang rtag tu 'brang // rten 'brel bsam gyis mi khyab pas// 'di la dpyad par yod mi bya// sing ta'i shing la gab tshe yang // bzang po sor ni
79b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyud pa bya// de yi nang du spyod byed kyang // dngos grub sbyin par byed par zlog/ zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe// ma grol bar du de la bzla// de nas sngon bzhin 'khor lo bri// 'byung po gtor ma sbyin byas la// gab che nang gi skrod byed kyang
79b6(rgyud 'grel): sgra 'byung yang nags kyi bar// de srid zhag bdun de la ni// khro bo'i sngags kyis bzlas pa bya// de tshe skrong byed grub ma thag/ blangs nas gang yang rung ba ru// cho ga bzhin du sbyar na ni// de yis mi nus gcig kyang med // sa
80a1(rgyud 'grel): yang 'gas byed chu yang skems// rin chen phye ma bzhin du rlog/ ri rtser sbyar na brnyil bar byed// khrag dang sol ba'i sol 'bebs byed// gnam lcags dag ni 'thor ba dang // sa g.yon spyan na
80a2(rgyud 'grel): gtor ba dag/ rnal 'byor pa yis rab sbyor na// glo bur du ni thogs med 'grub// mtsho g.yo klu rnams skrag pa dang // shing rnams 'bras bu glo bur 'byir// gzhan yong sgrub po ci bsams pa'i// las rnams thams cad de yos byed
80a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi// sngags rgyud ldan pa'i las rnams de// gzhan yang de las gsungs pa yi// lus rnams mkhas pas shes par bya// da ni thun mong gi dngos grub kyi mjug tu mngag gzhug bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par
80a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// rdo rjes bzlas gnas rnal 'byor pas// rang gi dgos pa rdzogs bya'i phyir// bdag gi rigs kyi khro bo mchog/ mngag gzhug pa ru bsgrub par bya// 'dod pa'i lha yi rnal 'byor pa'i// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// hri ni 'od zer
80a5(rgyud 'grel): lnga 'bar ba// na mkha'i dbus su bsam par bya// mkha' dbyings bde gshegs byang chub sems// rig pa'i lha dang khro bo'i tshogs// gang bar bsams nas sngags 'di yis// sku gsung thugs la gnas la gdab// oM AHhri
80a6(rgyud 'grel): mo g+ha sid+d+hi nan b+hak+Sha A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ phab pas gnas di rigs kyi rim// mi bskyed pa yi a gyur te// tshe dpag med pa'i khaM du gyur// rnam par snang mdzad deng gyur to// cho ga de la skad cig gis// cho ga gnyis pa bsgrub par bya//
80b1(rgyud 'grel): de bdud rtsi 'khyil par gyur// thal sbyar gzhan la sngon bzhin pas// kham de pad+ma mthar byed gyur// de ni gshin rje gshed gyur te// de dag sngon bzhin nyi ma la// gnas te dang po thal sbyar bsam// lha mo spangs pa'i phyag mtshan ya
80b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi tha marA dpa' bo dang // lcags kyus bkang ba'i snod gzung nas// sgrub pa po la stobs byed bsgom// de dag gnas gsum gong ma yi// a khaM de ni bkod byas nas// de nas bskul ba la sogs pas// don yod grub pas dbu
80b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan te// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i thugs ka ru// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// mi bskyod po ni bsgom par bya// pad+ma mthar byed thugs ka ru// de nas tshe dpag med par bsgom// gshin rje gshad kyi thugs ka ru// zla ba'i dkyil
80b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la gnas pa'o// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom// de nas rigs gsum phyag gnos pa'i// mdung rtse gsum dang kyo ba dang // rdo rje dang ni gtun shing gis// gsang ba'i gnas la brdab cing bskul// oM mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje
80b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ khyed kyis rigs kyi khro bo che// nga yi re ba rdzogs bya'i phyir// khyed kyis mang gau gzhug pa ru bskul// tshe dpag med dang snang mdzad kyang // de bzhin du ni bskul byas te// nyams dga' ba yi ri dag dang // chu gling rnam pa sna tshogasu// /
80b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan 'di ni zla phyed bsgom// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gis// rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed dang // 'khor lo can gyi byang chub 'grub// des khrid sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro/ zab cing rgya che'i chos thob 'gyur// de ni gnyid sogs dang bral
81a1(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs nas// gnyid 'od de ru gong gsungs pa'i// mtshan ma rnams ni yang dang yang // 'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med// lha yi bka' yis brtan par byed//
81a2(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' chos rnams spangs pa yang // rta dang glang chen la sogs pa// sgrub pa po yis bskul ba yi// mngag gzhug de yis byed par 'gyur// gong gsungs 'og nas 'byung ba la// sgrub pa'i thabs ni ji snyed pa// nus dang ldan
81a3(rgyud 'grel): pas de rnams las// lha sogs rnams kyis khyad shes gyur// 'don po'i dang po'i gnas bzhin du// thams cad brjod pas lung rdo thogs// de bas dad pa ston 'gro bas// gzhung gi don la brtan par bya// da ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos
81a4(rgyud 'grel): grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o// sngon gsungs yang dag rim gnas la// gos dang don byed ma rtogs pa// bya ba thams cad mchil thal bzhin// spangs nas rdo rje 'chang ba yi// sbyor ba thob phyir dus rtag
81a5(rgyud 'grel): tu/ sangs rgyas mchod dang 'gro don la// dad pas brtson 'grus kyis sbyor byed// thabs shes sbyor bas skyon kun bsol// thob pa'i zas ni za bar byed// chags pa sdang ba rnams dang bral// 'jig rten chos brgyad ma rtogs pa'i//
81a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i longs spyod thob bzhin spyod// bka' yi gzhung lugs 'dzegs spangs nas// lus gnas pa yi cho ga shes te// bya ba gsum gyis mtha' la spyod// dgos pa 'grub pa des bsgrub bya// ci gsung mtshan ma mthong
81b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur nas// rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya mchog/ gong du bstan pa'i cho ga yis// bkug ste bdag gir bya ba'o// de dang lhan cig yid 'ong mgon// rang nyid ma gtogs gzhan gyis ni// mi phyed gnasu zla drug tu// gsang ba'i
81b2(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs spyod pa bya// brgyud pa'i man ngag las gsungs pa'i// lus ngag yid kyi spyod pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya dag phyir nyin mtshan du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug brtson par bya// de yis zla ba gcig gis ni// skal ldan
