81b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i the tshom med// de dang lnga yi bar du ni// rjes mthun shis pa'i zas longs spyod// rang gi khams nA rang gnas pa'i// bde gshegs rnams kyis thugs gdungs nas// de ru byon nas sgrub po la// 'phral du bka' stsal
81b4(rgyud 'grel): ster bar gyur// de nas bka' stsal thog ma thag/ rang gi mthu stobs rtogs bya'i phyir// gong dang lhan cig zla drug tu// phyi yi rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// yid 'ong dben par cho ga bzhin// 'dus pa'i 'khor lo bri byas la//
81b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes byas te// bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs par bya// de nis bdag nyid de dang ni// bcos ma'i gdong la sogs pas mtshan// yang na phyogs gos 'ba' zhig gis// mtshan te kun tu rgyu bar bya// ri
81b6(rgyud 'grel): yi gcong rong nags tshal gnas// glang chen seng+ge sbrul dang stag/ gdug pa'i sems can 'jigs pa'i sar// bdag rgyu de dag brtse bar byed// rdo leb rgya cher bdag nyid 'dug/ ri dgas lte ba'i dri bro ste// in+d+ra nI la'i kha
82a1(rgyud 'grel): dogu 'dra snum dang mig stong gdun bzhin no// tshe ra mang chu mig grog ral mang // mi sdug gnas su bdag rgyu bas// me tog 'bras bu bzang po dang // dri zhim chu ni mdangs dang ldan// gzhan gsungs phyag
82a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyargyu rnams kyis mtshan// gar byed glu blang brkam tshig smra// mi shes blun pa'i gzi can rnams// 'dul zhing lus kyi rgyu mthun pas// gso bar byed cing stobs mthong bas// nags tshal dag tu bsod snyoms bslang // sgrub dbang de
82a3(rgyud 'grel): yi gzi brjid kyis// nags tshal lha rnams skrag nas ni// kha zas bzang po bstar ba dag/ sgrub pa po la rab tu sbyor// phun sum tshogs pa ma sbyar na// dam tshig stobs kyis de rnams 'chi// de ltar spyi dang dngos gzhi yi// mtshan thob
82a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas// rang gi khams ni ngag bye'i phyir// 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin// dus mtshan bzhi ru zhag bdun du// bsgom pa'i dbang bskur rnam dag pas// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can// 'khor lo'i bdag nyid dri med bya//
82a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sa bon 'od lcags kyu// rtag drang sbyor ba'i spyan ma'i tshogs// 'og min nas ni bkug byas nas// na mkha'i khams kun gang bzhugs bsgom// de nyid bde chen ro zhu bas// 'o ma'i rgyun ltar de dag gi// spyi bo nas ni mdun rgyab dang //
82a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga stong dag ni zhugs par bya// de bzhin bde ba can zhing nas// dpag med dang sbyor gos dgug/ sngon bzhin bsams nas de yi dus// de dag rnams kyi lce la gzhug/ mngon dga' las byung mi bskyod dang // mA ma kI ni gnyis med zhu
82b1(rgyud 'grel): de dag rnams kyi thugs ka ru// lnga stong bdun brgya'i bar du zhugs// 'od des kha tri ka nas kyang // don yod grub dang sgrol ma yang // bde chen gzhan gyi dbang gyur nas// lte bar de dus zhugs byas nas// nam mkha' lta bur de bzhin
82b2(rgyud 'grel): nyidade/ yang dang yang du brtson par bya// gang phyir de nyid yang bsgoms pas// dngos po dag par byed pa'i phyir// rgyal ba rnams kyis de nyid bsngags// de dang de yi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan pa ni// khyu mchog de ni
82b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par 'gyur// de ltar sbyor po gsum ldan pas// dngos gzhi'i las la 'jug don du// gong gsungs las kyi phyag rgya che// rigs gsum bye brag gis gzung bya// mi bskyod rdo rje rnal 'byor pas// sme sha can du gyi mthu chen gyi// /
82b4(rgyud 'grel): bu mo lo grangs bcu drug pa// ut+pa la yi mdog 'dra bsgrub// de bzhin rtag pa'i sbyor ba yi// btso brlag mkhan gyi bu mo dkar// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa// spyan ma'i ngo bor bsgrub par bya// tshe dpag med kyi rnal 'byor pas// gar mkhan
82b5(rgyud 'grel): bu mo rab mdzes gling // dmar po bzhin sdug mig dukyus ring // nyi shu lon pa gos dkar bsgrub// yang na bam ze rgyal rigs dang // rje'u rigs dmangs rigs gzhan bud med// gang gi rnal 'byor gyis gnas bsgrub// de yis gsang
82b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sku gsum thob// 'dis ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ lhag pa'i bya ba bya zhes bsgrub// chags man chags dang bral ba'ong min// dbu mar yang ni dmig so// 'di
83a1(rgyud 'grel): ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ bud med sgyu ma'i rgyu 'di yis// sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas// bud med sgyu ma khyad par che// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis// rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o// 'jig rten gsum
83a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir bud med 'dis// gus pa byed pa dag tu 'gyur// rnyed dang bde ba dga' kun gyis// ngan spyod rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi ngo bo yongs su bsgyur nas// bud med kun gyis sgyu ma 'grub// ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di// mkha'
83a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma yi brdar bstan to// de bos de dang lhan cig tu// yid 'ong gnas su sngon bzhin du// ri ma'i dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang // byin brlabs la sogs sngon bzhin bya// de ru stegs bu gru bzhi ni// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas byug/ bde ba'i
83a4(rgyud 'grel): stan la de dang ni// lhan cig sgyu 'dra'i ting 'dzin rol// bsrung ba la sogs rten bsgrubs la// dang po'i mgon pos bdeg nyid bsgrub// gong ma rig ma'i 'du byed pas// rab tu bsgrubs te pad+mar bzhag/ phrin las la gnas bde chen po// de yi sku
83a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum goms bya'i phyir// yang dang yang du nyin mtshan du// zla ba drug tu bsgrub par bya// de yis sgrub po bdag nyid kyis// phyi nang dus su sangs rgyas kyi// mtshan gyis brgyan par ma gyur na// yang ni cho ga de kho nas// de yi 'dod pa longs
83a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod cing // gsang ba'i mchod pa dang bcas pas// sa bcu de la gnas bcas te// zla ba drug tu yang sgrub bya// gal te de ru sgrub pa pos// gong gsungs mthong bar ma gyur na// ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis// yang ni zla drug rab tu
83b1(rgyud 'grel): brtsams// drug gsum bcwo brgyad myog bzhin// bsgrub pas rdo rje gsum gyis ni// dngos grub ster te phyis 'byung ba'i// phyag rgya chen po rab tu 'thob// de ltar byas pa'i sgrub pa pos// bsgoms byas dngos grub mchog ma mthong
83b2(rgyud 'grel): snyan tshig zhi bo'i bskul ba yis// dngos grub bslang bar bya ba'o// sngon gyi 'khor lo khang pa'ang // gzhan yang gang yang rung ba ru// bgegs bskrad phur bus btab na su// sngon bzhin gtsang gtor sa gsol gdab// sangs rgyas
83b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs snga ma bzhin// gsol gdab stegs bu 'dus byas te// byin brlabs ting 'dzin gsum gnas la// skye gcig thogs bsam gsol pa gdab// drug cu rtsa bzhis bgegs bskrad nas// sa bsrungs sa yi lha mo yang
83b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes byas la// dbang por zhal gyis bzhis byar bya// de nas me tog sna tshogs dang // dri zhom la sogs ldan pa yi// maN+Dal sngon bzhin 'dus byas la// de na gnas pa dmigs par bya// rang gi sa bon 'ang
83b5(rgyud 'grel): zer las// lcags kyu rdo rje gsal shing srogs// mtshan pa'i khro bo spro byos la// de dag mchod sogs kyis mnyes bya// sgrub pos 'og nas 'byung ba yi// tshigs bcad sngags kyi khyed rnams kyis// sangs rgyas byang chub
83b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rnams// bskul cig ces ni smra bar bya// de nas zhal gyis bzhes nas ni// song ste 'jig rten khams gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas sogs la phra mo dang // snyan tshig 'jobs pa'i dbyings kyis bskul// che ga zhe
84a1(rgyud 'grel): bya rdo rje che// 'di yi gnas su dam sdom can// rig ma'i brtul zhugs spyod pa yis// tshogs ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// bsgom pa bzlas brjod yongs rdzogs nas// phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir//
84a2(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs spyod pa yang gnas nas// khyed kyis bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri// khyed cig de ru byon nas su// de yi 'khor lo byin brlabs la// mchod pa la sogs bzhes nas kyang // phyag rgya chen po gnang par mdzod// de ltar brjod
84a3(rgyud 'grel): pas de dag kyang // rab tu dgyes nas khro bo la// de ltar bya zhes bsams nas kyang // lhan cig byon bsams gnasu dgod// khro bos sgrub pa po la smras// bdag cag rnams kyis gsol ba gdab// de dag kyang ni 'di skad gsungs// /
84a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje che ge zhes byas la// bdag cag phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gsungs nas 'di ru byon pa lags// khyed kyis mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// mnyes par byas te dam tshig bskul// de nas sgrub pos sangs rgyas dang // khro rgyal lha
84a5(rgyud 'grel): mo mnyes bya'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkug nas// rang gi ba spu bu gar bcug/ de nyid lha mo sgeg pas brgyan// spros nas sangs rgyas byang chub sems// khro bo dang bcas 'khor lo la// bde ba chen po'i ros mchod pa//
84a6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas bstod pa bdud rtsi myang // sna tshogs kyis ni mnyes byas nas// srog dang bcas pa bsams nas kyang // bdag nyid kyis ni snyan gsan gsol// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos grub kyi// dkyil 'khor bdag gis bri bar
84b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// sangs ni de ru byon nas kyang // bdag gi mchod pa la sogs pa zhes// bzhes nas bdag la dngos grub stsol// gal te ma stsal khyed rnams kun// rang nyid kyis ni bstan pa la// rdzun du smra bar gyur pa'o// de ltar
84b2(rgyud 'grel): snyan gsan lan gsum du// gsol nas de dag zhal bzhes nas// mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes par bya// steng gi gnasu gshegs su gsol// yang ni mchod pa'i bum pa rnams// sngon bzhin sta gon gnas byas
84b3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ dme tog spos la sogs pa yis// mchod nas ji bzhin gnas dgod// de nas phyi de nyid par yang // skud pa tshon rtsi sngon bzhin bsgrub// gos dang rin chen rgyan ldan pa'i// khye'u dang bu mo dbab byas nas// de yis
84b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub dkyil 'khor mchog/ yang dag sbyin byed bris nas kyang // dbye ba byas nas de nyid kyang // mchod nas rang gi gnas gtang // de nas phyag rgya dang lhan cig/ 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i cho ga bzhin// gnyis 'dres byas
84b5(rgyud 'grel): nas steng nas dbab// sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor dbyer med bya// bdag po lnga la bzhi pa'i dus// bdag po gnyis pas yang mtshan bya// yang na de dag klad rgyas dang // lkog ma snying ga lte ba dang // gsang bar rgyu yi skyes bu
84b6(rgyud 'grel): dgod// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las skyes// sgrub pa po ni blo ldan la// 'jigs shing skrag nas gyis brlob// de dag gsad pa'i mchog sogs pa// sngon gsungs mchod pa nyi shus kyang // mchod nas 'od zer rtse mo las// yid
85a1(rgyud 'grel): dga'i rin chen sna bdun spro// gser mdog lta bu'i rgyan rnams kyis// brgyan pa'i bde ba'i longs spyod 'dzin// pad+ma'i steng na gnas pa yi// bud med rin chen dbul bar bya// gnod sbyin lta bu'i
85a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs 'dzin pa// gos sngon bsgos pa rin chen gter// gzung ba'i khyim bdag rin po che// sgyu ma lta bus sprul pa bya// mtsho ba drug ldan glang po dkar// gser gyis rgyan pa spro bar bya// ut+pal mthong ga'i 'dab 'dra'i rta//
85a3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen chas brgyan spros te dbul// chang gzugs rin chen sna bdun gyis// spras pa'i ral gri rin po che// 'od zer dang ldan pad+ma la// gnas pa spros te dbul bar bya// lha yi gos kyis rab brgyan pa// 'od zer sna tshogs
85a4(rgyud 'grel): spro ba yid gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// sbyor ba shes pas spro bar bya// mkha' kun gsal bar byed pa yi// 'od zer mtha' yas rab spro ba// blon po rin chen spros nas kyang // de dag phyir rgol brgyan par bsgom//
85a5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar lha sogs bu mo dang // rigs 'dzin rnams kyis bsgyur ba yi// glu dang gar dang gling bu dang // dud dang rdza rnga la sogs pas// na mkha'i khams kun g.yos par bsgom// shin tu zhi ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'i// khu byug bung ba
85a6(rgyud 'grel): ngang pa sogs// mdangs dga' rnams kyis gang bar bsam// me tog shing gis mtha' brgyan pa'i// mdzes pa'i rdzing bu sna tshogs dang // dpag bsam shing gis nags tshal ni// 'khor lo'i phyogs bzhi nas 'byung ngo // de
85b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bza' bca' kha zas dkar// tshal dang thug pa gdun rnams dang // myos byed btung ba'i tshogs rnams kyang // 'khor lo mnyes phyir spro bar bya// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid la// chos kyi dbyings ni gnas med de// rdo rje las
85b2(rgyud 'grel): byung rtog pa ni// gsungs pa nyid kyang ma grub bo// de ltar sna tshogs mchod po yi// mnyes byas sngon bzhin rang nyid zhugs// bdag po nga rgyal dang ldan par// 'khor lo bdag la zhugs byas te// dga' ba'i ye shes par gnas
85b3(rgyud 'grel): nas// zhag bdun sogs par yang du brtag/ de ltar de ru phyag rgya che// ji skad gsungs pa thob par 'gyur// de ltar byas kyang phyag rgya che// sgrub pos kyang ni thob ma gyur// ston bzhin nyams pa sna tshogs dang // dbye ba'i sgo nas
85b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub par bya// rang gi 'dod bzhin gsol btab nas// bris pa'i 'khor lo gshegs su gsol// smon lam rnams ni byas nA su// byang chub chen por bsngo bar bya// rtog pa las byung ji snyed pa// rje btsun rnams kyi spyan sngar
85b5(rgyud 'grel): bshags// ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs byas nas// rang gi rjes su mthun pas bsgrub// 'khor lo gang dang gang bstan pa// sna tshogs phyag rgya mchod pa yis// slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang des// mchod pa byas nas de bsgru'o//
85b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi 'khor lo tshogs ldan pa'i// rang gi bla ma la sogs gzhan// yid dga' gnas su spyan drangs nas// dngos grub rnam par 'phrul 'di bya// bde bar gshegs pa'i lha rnams mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs kyis spras pa
86a1(rgyud 'grel): dril bu rgyal mtshan mchod sogs ldan// bla re dam pa bris pa ru// rdo rje sngags dang mchod la sogs// glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'bul// me tog bdug sogs rab sbyor bas// dag pa'i gdan chen
86a2(rgyud 'grel): gsham par bya// der ni dag thams cad kun// ji lta'i gnas ji bzhin 'dug/ bskal bzang rang gi phyag rgya dang // dngos grub phyir ni rnam par rol// sha dang chang la sogs pa yi// bza' bca' btung ba'i tshogs rnams dang /
86a3(rgyud 'grel): lus dang ngag gi spyod pa yis// de kun mnyes par bya dgos so// de bzhin phyogs skyong la sogs kun// gzhan bzhin 'khor lor bsgrub byas la// gong gsungs gtor ma'i tshogs rnams kyis// de dag tshim par yang
86a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// sgyu 'dra'i ting 'dzin lha rnams dmigs// 'khor lo yang dang yang du mchod// blo ma mdun du bzhag nas ni// nyams par dogs pa thams cad bas la// de ltar gom pa brtan bya zhing // ma nyams skyon med spyod par ldan//
86a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi dngos grub lam la gnas// dam pa'i rig ma ma 'khrul pas// zhag bdun dang ni zla phyed dang // zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis// rdo rje dam tshig bskyed byas nas// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de ltar yang dang yang
86a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas// bde gshegs rnams kyi dngos grub mchog/ mi 'grub 'khrul pa'i rgyu yis ni// sgrub pa po la bkag 'gyur na// de nyid du ni sgrub pa pos// go skabs gzhan ni med pa'i phyir// thugs rje che ba'i gsang ba kun//
86b1(rgyud 'grel): de la khros par rig pa yin// rtog pa'i dbang gis de dag rnams// rang rang tshogs dang de dag rang khams dang // sgrub pa po la mi gzigs te// btang snyoms chen por gnas pa'o// bka' yis 'jigs med 'khrul bsal
86b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // thub pas spyan ras gzigs bya'i phyir// dam pa'i gzhung las gsungs pa ltar// de dag rnams kyi snying po bskul// bdag dang 'khor la dmigs byas nas// de dag rnams kyi spyi bo dang // mgrin pa de 'og thugs ka ru//
86b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab// de bzhin pha mo'i 'khor lo la// sa bon sogs pas yang mtshan te// de nyid brjod pas de dag las// de dag rnams ni spro bar bya// spros te mdun du rab g.yeng ba'i// shing rta de dag bka' nod
86b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gnag cing khros pa bsam byas te// sgrub pos de la bka' yis bsgo// da ni dpal ldan cheg mo// khyod ni rtag tu bsgrub la gnas// dam sdom lam la rtag brtson pas// bdag la dngos grub sbrul du gsol// oM shrI
86b5(rgyud 'grel): tsakra aM gu sha gA te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tI da ya tsun de/ A kA r-i Sha ya phadz+ra dzaM/ A~M shrI bin pad+d+ha aM gr-i shaM ga te// gong gi bsgrub bya hr-i da ya tsun de a ka ri Sha ya phaT dza/ oM shrI bAn khAM ra ga aM gu sha ga s+t+wa~M/
86b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya hr-i da ya tsun de a ka ri Sha yang phaT dza/ oM shrI ban badz+ra ang gu sha ga te bsgrub bya tsun de a ka ri Shi ya phaT dzi/ rin chen la sogs rang sngags kyis// rang rang mtshan mas mtshan pa yi// ye shes sems dpa' la sogs pa
87a1(rgyud 'grel): de dag kun du spro bar bya// spros te phyogs bcur song nas kyang // rang gi zhing na gnas pa yi// bde gshegs rig bcas btang snyoms gnas// lcags kyu thugs kar brdeg cing bskul// che ge zhes bya rdo rje
87a2(rgyud 'grel): la// khyed kyis dngos grub dam pa stsol// gal te me stsal khyed rnams rdzun// smras pas rang nyid bslus pa'o// de bzhin lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang // sku yi bu ga kun nas kyang // de 'dra bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'phros pa'i mtshan ma
87a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis bskul// mi gzigs mngon par gyur pa'i don// thabs de zhag bdun bar du bya// de yis rgyu kun rdzogs pas na// de dag rnal 'byor pa la 'jug/ de yi 'og 'byung mchog bzhi po// rdo rje tshul mchog 'di brtsams pas/
87a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // mchog stsol zhing ni rnam par gzigs// yid ni 'jigs shing skrag 'gyur nas// yid la mgu zhing dgar 'gyur ba'i// dngos grub dam pa de dus te// de la rol mo 'byung ba'o// gal te gnyis kyi
87a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid rmongs// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur// de yis sngon du ma byas na// de dag chad pas bcad par bya// rang nyid 'khor lor bcas pa khros// nag po me dpung dkyil na bzhugs// bsnyen pa la sogs dang ldan pas// phyag rgya
87a6(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig gnyis mang bya// sngon gsungs 'phros pa rnams kyis kyang // rang khams gnas pa'i rtog pa sogs// rang rang kha dog dang ldan pa// lcags kyus bkug par byas nas su// phyag rgya'i gsang bar nyi ma'i steng // mi
87b1(rgyud 'grel): yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum du// bzhag ste de dag dam tshig gis// bsnyungs pas 'dar bar bsam pa'o// de nas rang gi rigs can nyid// nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya'i 'ad// ldan pa'i pad+ma kha bye ba'i// nang du bcug nas phan tshun bkri//
87b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i// gshin rje mthar byed stong sngon bzhin// 'od ldan smad ni rtse gcig gzugs// rdo rje las ni dbyung bar bya// de yis de bdag rtag pa yis// spyi bo nas ni sngags 'di yis// btab pas rlung gis
87b3(rgyud 'grel): thal ba ltar// sngags kyi lus ni mi snang byas// oM tshin+da tshin+d+ha/ ha na han/ da ha da ha/ dip+ta badz+ra tsakra hUM phaT/ de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs 'byung ba'i// pad+ma mthar byed spros nas kyang // sngon bzhin snang ba mtha' yas kyis// kha ru sngags 'dis
87b4(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya// oM hri phur pa hUM phaT/ rdo rje rig las byung ba yi// shes rab mthar byed de bzhin spro// de yis mi bskyod thugs ka ru// sngags 'di yis ni gdab pa'o// oM a badz+ra ra tsa hUM phaT/ yi ge gsum gyi bar bcug pa'i// sngags
87b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di bskul nas de yis gdab// rtog pa las byung ji snyed pa// bsal bas shes bya'i sgrib sogs bcom// ta ta ku lo na shwa kI la ya hUM phaT/ btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje gsum// sku gsum dri med las byung ba'i// dam tshig mchog gis
87b6(rgyud 'grel): ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga legs par byas nas ni// mkha' dbyings rdo rje mtha' klas par// 'debs par gyur pa gdon mi za// bsgrub bya de dag zhi ba'i phyir//
88a1(rgyud 'grel): bsdu dang spro ba'i sgo nas kyang // phur bu sngags kyis phyung nas ni// ye shes tsam du gnas par bya// oM AHbadz+ra d+ha ro A dz+nyA uta kI la ya hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hu ro A dz+nyA uta kI la ya hUM oM AHsarba kI la ya kA na
88a2(rgyud 'grel): bud d+ha sa te na badz+ra dI ta a badz+re ya~M ts+tsha/ oM AHsarba kI la yu ka na d+harmA sa te badz+ra de ta a badz+ra ya hUM/ oM AHsarba kI lo ya kA na saM g+hA sa te na badz+re da~M dA a badz+rA ya hU~M/ ye shes mar me lta bu'i tshul// rang gi mi shes dbyer med
88a3(rgyud 'grel): byasad/ dbugs 'byin mchog dang lhan cig tu// cho ga 'di ni ma lu sa brtsam// dpung brkyang mgul pa nas 'khyud pas// mi g.yo sgra bzung brla gnyis par// bltas te sing sla'i glu blangs nas// bung pa lta bur rtse bar bya// 'gying
88a4(rgyud 'grel): big stabs kyis 'khyud nas ni// g.yon gyis spyi bo nas bzung nas// g.yas kyi ko ko bsten nas ni// ma mchu sbrang rtsi bzhib par bya// bzhib cing sid ces rab brjod pas// 'gram gnyis su ni 'o bya zhing // dpung pa'i bar du rab byas la/
88a5(rgyud 'grel): kha yisna de la rtse bar bya// rna ba de bzhin mtshan khung dang // mgrin pa'i glo dang sum mdo rnams// sen mos ri mos gdab bya zhing // yang dang yang du byug par bya// g.yon gyis pad+ma mnye ba dang // lag pa gnyis sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor
88a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ rdo rje g.yon gyis sor mo gsum// chos 'byung nang du brub cing rtse// bsnyen dang nyer sgrub srub pa yis// 'di ltar bskyod pa tsam gyis ni// snying 'dar dran pa nyams par 'gyur// spyi bo skra bkrol gos 'dor byed// rdul mu thigs
88b1(rgyud 'grel): pas kun tu khyab// brtan pa'i ngang tshul shor nas ni// ba spu rnams kyang g.yo bar byed// dmar ba'i mig ni phra bas blta// bdag nyid bsgrub pa la gnas na// zla ba'i lta ba'i rigs can 'char// rtse gcig yid kyis ma spros par// yang
88b2(rgyud 'grel): dang yang du brtag par bya// mkha'agro ma gtogs phyag rgya yis// lhan cig dus ni bdun du brtag/ byin brlabs de 'am de sngon du// mngon du byed par the tshom med// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// bsgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya// nyi ma bdun gyi
88b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub 'gyur ba// skya rengs 'char ba'i dus na'o// de ru sangs rgyas kun+da gyi bdag// rdo rje'i chang chen kun gyi gnas// chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid de// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs byas thob// de ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// sangs rgyas
88b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon gyis mtshan par 'gyur// dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad tsam du// de yis 'od kyang snang bar byed// de nyid yang dag ye shes thob// gzugs brnyan bdag nyid spyi gzugs kyis// 'khor lo gsum po mtha' yas khams// 'gro ba'i
88b5(rgyud 'grel): phan don mdzad pa'o// 'khor ba ji srid gnas kyo bar// sbyor ba bdun ldan rdo rje sems// ro myang mtshan nyid brgyan brnyes nas// bla na med par gyur pa'o// rnal 'byor po rnam pa gnyis kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad
88b6(rgyud 'grel): zin to// / gang phyir rgyu dang bcas pa yi// dngos po de dag ngo bo ni// byang chub sems yin de yi phyir// de yi rang bzhin brjod par rigs// thog dang tha ma med zhi ba// dngos po dngos med zad pa'i gtso//
89a1(rgyud 'grel): stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa// byang chub sems su gsungs pa'o// byang chub sems su gsungs pa'o// byang chub semyas de'i nang du ni// bdag po 'gra' yang mi dmig so// de yi gnyen po rnam gsum la//
89a2(rgyud 'grel): tha dad dbye bar rnam par rtog/ de yang rang bzhin la mi dmigs// 'od gsal sems ni dag pa la// gcig dang du ma bral ba'i phyir// don gzhan 'gyur ba yang mi dmigs// sgyu ma tsam gyi sems de ni// ngag dang ma dag gnyis
89a3(rgyud 'grel): mi rung // de bas rang bzhin rnam drag pa'i// byang chub sems su nges pa'o// de yi de bzhin nyid ngo bo// gang dang 'brel pa ma yin no// ma 'brel pa yang ma yin no// kun rtog yang ni snyam mi sems// nam mkha' rtag med ltar
89a4(rgyud 'grel): mi snang // chos rnams kun kyang de bzhin no// chos rnams sku gsum mnyam pa ste// gang yin sems kyi ngo bo'o// sems de de bzhin nyid gnas la// de ni khams gsum gnas ma yin// mi gnas de ni kun brtags kyi//
89a5(rgyud 'grel): skye ming ngo bo med pa'o// yin yang bde gshegs thams cad kyi// ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid de// rgyu gsum mi gnas chos de ni// skye med ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas// sa dang rmi lam dbyer med pas// 'das pa rmi lam lta
89a6(rgyud 'grel): bu ste// da ltar 'byung ba rmi lam 'dra// ma 'ongs rmi lam las byung ba'o// bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dang // sems can rnams ni ji snyed pa// rmi lam lta bur bdag med de// sgyu ma lta bur de bzhin no// dper na
89b1(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin rin po che// rdog pa thams cad rab bral yang // skul pa ldan pa'i sems dbang gis// 'dod pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems de lnga// chos rnams thams cad 'byung bas na// namakha
89b2(rgyud 'grel): 'brang chos rnams la// sangs rgyas chos rnams rjesu 'brang // de bas dngos grub thams cad dang // sangs rgyas chos rnams cad ni// lus dang ngag dang sems la gnas// de ni khams gsum mi gnaso// na mkha' bzhin du dag pa
89b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gcig la gcig mi gnas// de dag de bzhin nyid gnas pas// de ni sgra brjod yul lAs 'das// de 'dra'i de bzhin nyid la ni// rang gi ye shes rab sbyor zhing // gzhan yang bdag po 'di snyam du// sku mi 'gyur
89b4(rgyud 'grel): bopo 'di snyam du// gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid med// nam pa rdo rje tog lus byung // log pa drug tu 'dzin snyam nas// bdag gcig ston pa mi gsung bzhugs// de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sogs// de yi gnyis pa dgag
89b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// bde bar gshegs la yang zhus pa// ga su la log 'byung mi rtag gsol// ci phyir sbyin gyi rgyal ba ltar// rdo rje 'chang bas mdzad par rigs// yod de tshangs pa la sogs pa// yang dag mngon shes ma thob pas/
89b6(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob rgyan la 'khrul pas na// bdag po 'di yis shes nas sa mo// yang na mi sems 'tshong ngo sams// de bas log 'byung bkag pa'o// skye med rdo rje mngon byang chub// ngo bo med pa mi 'gyur ba// bde gshegs
90a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis kyang mi shes// des ni sems can kun la khyab// des na de dag thams cad kun// byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// de blangs de ni thob pa'o// de bas chos 'di thams cad
90a2(rgyud 'grel): kun da/ ngo bo nyid dag gnas med la// chos dbyings shes rab gnasu rtog/ rdo rje las byung ltar smra ba// sgra ste smra ba yang ma yin// sngon bzhin thams cad mkha' la gnas// nam mkha' gang du mi gnas pas// de ni rang bzhin 'od
90a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal dbyings// de ru yang dag kun rdzob rgyan// dbyer med pa yis rnam par bsgom// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems ni bsgom pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems bsgom pas// rnam dag gsang ba'i yi ge gsum// chos
90a4(rgyud 'grel): dang longs spyod sprul pa'i sku// dad pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs par 'gyur// gang phyir bud med skyes pa dang // ma ning gsal byed thams cad ni// yi ge gsum sdud de yi phyir// de ni kun gyi gtso bo'o// dngos po gzugs can thams
90a5(rgyud 'grel): cad dang / skyo grag pa ni ji snyed dang // bsam rtog ma lus thams cad kun// rdo rje gsum gyis sdud pa'o// de 'dra'i de nyid gsum pos ni// kun khyab gzhan gyi spyod yul min// nyag gcig rtogs pa'i spyod yul bas// de ni gas
90a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i yi ge'o// de bas rdzogs ldan la sogs par// de ni snod ni ma gzigs pas// rdo rje 'chang ba de yi tshe// de 'gyur gsang ba'i don ma bshad// pha rol phyin pa la sogs pas// bskal par 'bad kyang mi brnyes pa// gsang
90b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don 'dis tshe 'di la// skad cig thang gcig yud tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub che// sku gsum dbyer med sangs rgyas mchog/ rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi gnas// bla na med pa des 'gyuraro// gong gsungs sun
90b2(rgyud 'grel): de dag kun// 'di yi snod ma yin thos nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// snying rje gar gyis de dag duso// don de zab mor bstan pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i yi ge rnam dag pas// thun mong gi ni sdug bsngal te// de bas
90b3(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs rnams kyis bkag/ dus 'dir bdag tsog snod du gyur// de yi chos nyid der blangs pas// sku gsum rdo rje'i chos nyid de// 'ga' byugs rtogs par 'gyur ba'o// de ltar bstan pa'i dngos po rnams// rnam pa bzhi ru
90b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag dbye// skyes bu lam dang de sngon 'gro/ lam gyis bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu'o// skyes bu gsum ste dang po dang // cung zad tsam dang ye shes thob// bsnyen pa thun mong cig shos kyi// bsgrub la 'jug pa'i skyes bu'o// rdo rje can gyis
90b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa yau// lam gyi rim pa rnams gnyis te// bskyed pa yaM ni rim pa dang // rdzogs pa'i rim pa kho na'o// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsnyen pa dang // thun mong thun min bsgrub pa la// snod dag skye ba'i rim pa gsum// bsgom pa'i rim pa
90b6(rgyud 'grel): snyed pa'o// rdzogs pa'i rim pa rnal 'byor dang // phyag rgya las skyes chos thams cad// sgyu ma la sogs 'dra ro bsgrub pa// rang bzhin gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ro// de yi sngon 'gro rnam gsum ste// dkyil 'khor dang ni dam tshig dang
91a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi bsgrub pa'i ngo bo ni// rdo rje 'chang bas rab tu gsungs// dkyil 'khor bzhi ster mo dang // lus dang byang sems b+ha ga ste// ye shes lnga la sogs pa yi// thob byed gnasu yang drug bshad//
91a2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig la ni rnam gnyis te// thun mong sdom par bstan pa dang // thun mong ma yin sdom pa'o// thun mong ma yin rnam gsum ste// spang ba'i dam tshig sdom pa dang // bza' dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang // rnal 'byor snying po sdom
91a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ snod sogs rkyen du yang dag bshad// dbang gi rnam pa gsum dag ste// bum pa'i dbang ni dang po dang // gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang // shes rab ye shes gsum pa'o// de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang // bla ma dam pI
91a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal las ni// thob pa yin te rnam pa gsum// kun la rab tu khyab pa'o// 'bras bu la ni rnam gnyis te// thun mong gi ni grub pa dang // phyag rgya chen po'i grub pa'o// thun mong grub pa rnam pa brgyad// rig 'dzin mngon par shes
91a5(rgyud 'grel): pa lta/ mngag gzhug sngags kyi khyad par dang // a dza las kyi dbye ba'o// cig shos rdo rje gsum yin te// de dang de ru rab brtan pa'o// sangs rgyas nyid grub dngos grub ni// yang dag ye shes dbang thob pa'o// rnal 'byor chen
91a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i rgyud rnams kun// tshul 'di las ni ma 'das pas// shes rab ldan pa rnams kyis kyang // 'di rnams kho na bsgre bar bya// // gsang dang rab gsang shin tu gsang ba 'dus pa
91b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i rgyud// phra zhing shes dka' ba gshegs rnams kyi yul 'di rtog bral dpyad las 'das// 'on kyang sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi bla med thugs rje nyi zer gyis// bskal par 'dus byas pa yi mun pa kun bsal
91b2(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs spyod yul bstan// bdag gis cung zad rtogs nas dang po grogs mchog bzang po gsang ba dang // ko sa la yi grogs mchog dri ma med pa yi bzang po zhes bya dang // shes rab lha zhes bya ba'i grogs mchog
91b3(rgyud 'grel): sany+tsa la yi dur khrod gnas// legs pa'i tshul mang shri len+d+ra yi gtsug lag khang gnas te// dge ba'i spun gyis gsol btab rgyud kyi rgyal po de la blo dman pas// tshogs ni chung ngus rtogs por bya phyir nga rgyal ma
91b4(rgyud 'grel): yin dad pa yis// bsdus pa'i don dang sgrub pa'i thabs 'di 'bad pas sems khral cher byas la// sangs rgyas la sngogs dpa' bo mkhas pa rnams kyis bdag la bzod par mdzod// /
91b5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar byas pa las byung dge ba dri med de yis 'gro ba rnams// 'dri gzhung rim pas tshogs ni rab rdzogs rigs 'dzin la sogs gsum gyis ni// tha mal pa yi skad cig sogs bsgres de 'gag de yis bzlog
91b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ rang gi phyag rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba thob nas bdud las rgyal gyur cig/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa sgrub pa'i thabs/ dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa rdzog so//
92a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu ha dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba lha btson po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// /
93a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba bdun pa zhes bya ba dbang gzhi rab tu byed pa slob dpon chen po bi ta bA ngas mdzad pa bzhug so//
93b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ yo ga sAp+ta nA ma tsaM tu ra b+hi She ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ sbyor ba bdun pa zhes bya ba dbang bzhi'i rab tu byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig dpe med tshul ldan pa// gnyis
93b2(rgyud 'grel): med bde chen rang bzhin med// thugs rjes rgyas shing bar chad med// 'gog med sangs rgyas de la 'dud// rgyu dang mi rgyu kun khyab pa// gang gi snying gi pad dbus su// mi shigs thig le dbus gnas pa// gzhom med chos la
93b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// de 'dra rab tu ston byed pa// sems ni de nyid la bzhag pa// g.yang sa'i lam sgrol dge 'dun che// bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la 'dud// lam gyi rim pa sngon 'gro ba// dkyil 'khor dam tshig dbang sogs te// bum pa
93b4(rgyud 'grel): lo sogs rim pa yis// dbang gi dbye ba cung zad brjod// dkyil 'khor la sogs cho ga yis// thar chen yang dag bslu ba ste// de nyid med pas mi 'grub pas// bzhi pa'i don ni yang dag bshad// thams cad mkhyen pas ji skad
93b5(rgyud 'grel): durgyu rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud bstan la// dbang ni rnam pa gsum drag tu// rgyud 'di las ni rab tu bshad// bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste// gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang // de ltar de bzhin
93b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa yang // bla ma'i bka' las shes par bya// dbang ni dang po dbye ba yang // cung zad kyang ni bshad bya ste// rgyu yi slob dpon chen po yis// da ni yang dag bskur bar 'dod// yul mkhar khyim dang glang po sogs// rjes mthun
94a1(rgyud 'grel): de la dbul bar bya// da yA thun mang gzhan pa yi// sdom pa snad du rung phyir sbyin// ri mo dang ni lus kyi ni// dkyil 'khor du ni de nyid thob// rig dang 'di rgyu slob dpon dbang // cho ga'i rim pa gzhan du bshad
94a2(rgyud 'grel): de yi rang gi nge be ni// sku yi rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// srog gcod la sogs snga phyi yi// ngag drang nyes por mi 'gyuraro// thabs kyis khyad par 'phags pa'i phyir// sa brgyad pa ru yang dag bshad// sbyor gsum yan lag bcas pa
94a3(rgyud 'grel): rud/ de la yang dag bstan par bya// gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams kyis// snang srid dben par rtog pa'o// snod du rung phyir bum pa ste// blugs gautor dag par byed pas dbang // 'di ni yang dag rgyu rim pa'i// lung gis
94a4(rgyud 'grel): nges par bshad pa'o// dang po'i dbye ba bstan nas ni// gnyis pa yang ni bshad bya ste// rgyu dang rkyen gyi slob dpon gyis// dbang bskur de ni yang dag thob// gsar dang dngul la sogs pa yi// rjes mthun de la dbul bar bya// srog
94a5(rgyud 'grel): gcod la sogs thun mong ba'i// sdom pa snod du rung phyir sbyin// lhag pa byang sems zhes bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor du ni de nyid thob// blo yi bye brag gis bskur ba'i// cho ga'i rim pa gzhan du bshad// dA yi rang gi ngo bo ni// gsung
94a6(rgyud 'grel): gi rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// rdzun la sogs pa snga phyi yi// ngag dang nyes par mi 'gyuraro// thabs kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir// dgu dang bcu la yang dag gnas// rdo rje bzlas pa'i ngo bo yis// sgyu 'dra'i ting 'dzin bstan par bya// mig
94b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs nang gi chos rnams kyi// snang srid dben par rtogs pa'o// bsgrags min phyin na gsang ba ste// thugs gtor dag par byed pas dbang // 'di yang brgyud pa'i rim pa yis// lung gI yang dag bshad pa'o// gnyis
94b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbye ba bstan nas// gsum pa yang ni bstan par bya// rgyu dang rgyun dang ldan cig byed// slob dpon gsum gyis thob pa'o// pad+ma rA ga pur sha sogs// rjes mthun de la dbul bar bya// dkyil 'khor bri ba la sogs
94b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gog/ sdom pa mchog ni sbyin pa'o// b+ha ga rnam dgra zhes bya yi// dkyil 'khor du ni de nyid thob// shes rab dbang dang ye shes dbang // cho ga'i rim pa gzhan du bshad// de yi rang gi ngo bo ni// thugs kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhino//
94b4(rgyud 'grel): brlab sems la sogs snga phyi yi// dag dang nye bar mi 'gyur ro// thabs kyi khyad par phye ba'i phyir// rdo rje lta bur yang dag gnas// mchog gi dngos grub grub pa'i phyir// brtul zhugs cho ga de la bstan// gzung dang
94b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i ngo bo yis// chos kun dbyen par rtogs pa'o// shes rab las kyis ye shes te// ma rtogs rtogs phyir dbang yin no// 'di yang brgyud po'i rim pa yi// lus kyis yang dag bshad pa'o// da ni yang dag
94b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad bya ba// bzhi pa mngon par byang chub pa// bla ma'i zhal nas nges thob pa// sbyor ba bdun gyi de nyid bshad// rang bzhin gnas phyir slob dpon med// rin thang med phyir yon med de// sdom pa pas ni sdom pa med//
95a1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor med// stobs kyis thob phyir dbang med de// smra bas rang gang ba meng // chos kun gnyen po gnyen pa med// rdo rje 'dzin gnas sa med de// rang bzhin med
95a2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga dang // lta ba nges tshig med pa ru// bla ma yis ni yang dag bshad// shes rab las skyes ye shes ni// bzhi pa yin par shes par bya// mkha' gnyis rab tu sbyor ba yis// man ngag tu ni de nyid brtag/ legs par goms/
95a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag rgya las// 'bad pa'i bya bas rtogs pa na// 'dod chags chags bral bar ma ste// sbyor ba bdun gyi mtshan nyid do// na mkha'i khams ni rdo rje sbyor// yang dag spyan can bde chen 'byung // gang gang yang dag dga' byed
95a4(rgyud 'grel): chags// dga' gnyis pag tu dben nyid mthong // pad+ma'i dkyil du rdo rje nor// pad snying la ni 'byor pa ste// rdo rje'i skyil mo krung nang sems// nor bu bar du mthong byas pas// gang de nyid ni yi shes te// 'di nyid rdzogs pa'i rim
95a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ru sa bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyis bshad// de la sbyor ba bdun gyi ni// rim pa bzhi pa shes par bya// ci lta zhe na/ legs par bsgoms dang lhan cig tu// ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis// nang nas 'khor lo gsal
95a6(rgyud 'grel): byAbya skyed// sor mo cung zad go byas te// snying 'dar dran po nyams pa dang // spyi bor skra grol gos kyang 'dor// rdul chu thigs pas lus kun khyab// brtan pa'i ngang tshul shor nas ni// rang gi ba spu kun kyang g.yo// mig dmar/
95b1(rgyud 'grel): phra bas rab bltas pa'i// dga' ba'i ye shes yang dag 'byung // rtag pa'i mdog gis yang dag brgyan// de ni dpe med bde rdzogs so// nam mkha' lta bu'i sku la ni// mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa// 'ja'
95b2(rgyud 'grel): tshon lta bur rab gsal ba// gsal ba nyid na ma skyes pa'i// sku chen dang du blangs gyur na// chos kyi sku dang sprul sku yang // stobs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yi// sku tsho bltas byas mi ngoms pa'i
95b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum phyag drug ltar snang ba// mchog kun ldan pas rig mas 'khyud// shes rab ye shes dbang dus su// mtshan nyid de yi tshul du gnas// ye shes dbang du gyur pa yis// brtul zhugs la sogs rim pa yis
95b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas de yi don sgrub tshe// de yi dusu de 'thob pa'o// dpe med bde rdzogs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// / dA ni rab tu bshad bya ba// dpe med bde rdzogs sku de yang // pha rol phyin pa'i rtogs sku las//
95b5(rgyud 'grel): khyad par mthong bar bya ba'i phyir// rang 'od rig ma dang ldan pas// sbyor ba gnyis pa bshad par bya// gnyis med dang bral sku da ni// longs spyod rdzogs pa tsam yin la// de dang mnyam pa dag pa'i phyir// rang gi rig mes 'khyud
95b6(rgyud 'grel): papa'o// de la gnyis kyi spros med pas// dngos po kun la mi zin pa'i// rgyu ni de la yod pa'o// de 'dra ma yin 'di la ni// gnyis med pa dang ldan pa'o// 'dod chags chen po'i bde ba yis// 'dod pa'i 'bras chen rab sbyin pas// de
96a1(rgyud 'grel): pas rgyud chen 'di las ni// sbyor ba 'di ni bshad pa yis// ye shes dang ni chos nyid dang // don dam dang ni kun rdzob dang // thabs chen dang ni shes rab ste// bde ba dang ni byang sems sogs// de
96a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar gnyis kyi rnam pa kun// dbyer med mtshon phyir gnyis med de// sgyu ma'i skyes bu bud med las// shes rab ye shes dbang dus su// dga' ba'i ye shes dus su ni// khyad par gnyis med rang 'byung ba// gnyisu med par de la
96a3(rgyud 'grel): bsha // rnal 'byor gsum pas brtul zhugs kyi// spyod pa'i tshe ni de bzhin du// gnyis med 'gyur bar 'gyur ba ru// nges pa nyid du bshad pa yin// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba ste gnyis pa'o// /
96a4(rgyud 'grel): da ni rab tu bshad bya bya// dga' ba byar ma'i ye shes mchog/ chos skur yang dag nges pa yi// lus sems gnyis med byed bshad pa// bde ba de ni ma lus kyi// sems can kun la gnas gyur kyang // de las 'di ni khyad
96a5(rgyud 'grel): mthong phyir// chen po ru ni rab tu 'dod// rgyas pa dang ni sim pa dang // nyon mongs med dang byar chad med// khyab cing 'gogr-i pa yod med par// ji srid 'khor ba gnas kyi byar// rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis su// de nyid du ni
96a6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'jug/ de 'dra'i bde chen khyad par ni// shes rab ye shes la yang med// legs goms phyag rgya rtogs pa dang // mi rtag zhing ni nyon mongs dang // rdo rje pad+ma bskyong du su// rdul ni tsha ba drag pa dang // kun la ma khyab phyir
96b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni/ lus kun la ni ma rgyas dang // nor bu tsam la gnas pa dang // yud tsam gyis ni 'gog pa ste// de phyir chen po zhes mi bya// 'on kyang shes rab ye shes la// bde chen mtshan nyid gzugs gnas// de bas legs goms
96b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya las// u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar// rlung dang rang gi bya ba yis// skyes bu gang la thung gcig tu// bde ba de nyid rdo rje ru// 'dug byas 'dUr ba'i dus su ni// skyes bu de yis rab tu brtag/ ma~M gnas kyang ni mi bsku ri phyir// 8
96b3(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po zhes su bshad// 'di ni dngos po thams cad kyis// mtha' yi de bzhin nyid yin par// bla ma mchog rnams kun gyis bshod// sbyor ba gzhan kun sbyor ba 'di'i// yan lag tu ni shes par bya// rnal 'byor ye shes
96b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang gyur pas// brtul zhugs la sogs rig ma yis// gnas nas de yis don sgrub che// de yi dus su de thob pa'o// bde ba chen po'i sbyor ba ste gsum pa'o// // da ni rab tu bshad bye ba// dngos
96b5(rgyud 'grel): po kun la rnal 'byor gyis// phyin ci log rab tu bzlog pa'i phyir// sbyor ba bzhi pa bshad par bya// rang bzhin med phyir rang bzhin med// gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang // bral phyir stong pa nyid du gsungs// dngos po kun la mu stegs
96b6(rgyud 'grel): dang da nyan thos gnyis dang rnam shes smra// dbu ma pa yi gzhung gos su// tha dad so sor rtog pa yang // 'di nyid la ni yongs 'khrul ste// so sor kun tu rtog pa'o// de dag kun kyang don dam pa// rtogs pa min pas bla dang bcas// de
97a1(rgyud 'grel): bas de yi rang bzhin kun// med pas 'di kun sgyu ma dang // smig rgyu sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// 'khor lo ru nI yang dag bshad// de bas de la bdag po dang // gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa'i chos// dngos
97a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i ngo bor 'dzin pa dang // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyis su 'dzin pa yod pa med// 'di kun mya ngan 'das pa yi// 'khor lo 'di ni nges pa yin// de la rang bzhin med pa dang // bsres pa'i don ni mchog tu gsungs//
97a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos po kun gyi nang nas kyang // rang bzhin med pa gtso bar bshad// ci phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis// 'di bsgoms pas ni sangs rgyas kyi// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub// kha cig gis ni gzhung dag gi/ chad
97a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stong pa stong pa min// rang bzhin med pa ma yin no// de yi rang bzhin de yin no// de ni lung skal can yin pas// de ltar gang bsgoms rnal 'byor pas// gzung sgrub ma legs sbrul sogs bzhin// de bas rang bzhin med pa
97a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di/ bde ba chen po'i skad cig la// dngos po thams cad dang bral ba// gang min gsal ba'i gsal ba ni// rang bzhin med par bshad pa ste// rang bzhin med dang de bzhin nyid// chos nyid dang ni chos mnyam pa// don dam la
97a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnam grangs kyang // rang bzhin med pa 'di nyid las// dor ni gzhan dag ma gsungs so// dngos po kun ni gzhig paM dang // gzhom pa yis ni stong pa min// de 'dra'i stong pa la sems kyis// dus gsum du ni gtang ba
97b1(rgyud 'grel): yi// stobs kyis rang bzhin myed par 'gyur// med pa nyid ni rgyu sogs kyis// dkyil 'khor yang dag 'gog mi 'gyur// mi 'gog dus na rang bzhin med// rnal 'byor gsum pas brtul zhugs kyis// spyod pa de don
97b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa na// de yi dus su de thob pa'o// rang bzhin med pa'i sbyor ba ste bzhi pa'o// // da ni rab tu bshad bya ba// rang bzhin med pa'i sbyor ba yis// bkra shis med pa dgag don du// sbyor ba lnga pa bshad
97b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ra bya// thugs rjes rgyas pa 'di med par// rnam pa kun gyi sems can don// byed par nus pa ma yin te// de bas thams cad mkhyen pa rnams// thugs rjes gang bas rgyas pa ste// khams gsum gyi ni sems par g+ha na
97b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams// sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas pa las// grol bar 'dod pa thugs rje'o// thugs rje de yang rnam gsum ste// sems can ma lus thams cad kun// sdug bsngal de rgyu lngas 'gog par// rtse gcig dmigs
97b5(rgyud 'grel): pa gtod pa ni// las dang po yis shes par bya// khams gsum 'di ni chos dbyings tsam// de la sems can ming yang med// don dam par yang ming yang med// don dam par yang mi dmigs pa// sa gnas byang chub
97b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'o// dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba// ji ltar na mkha' khamasu yang // sprin byung lta bur snang ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi// thugs rje chen po yin par gsungs// de 'dra'i snying rje rje btsun che
98a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyas pas na// thugs rjes rgyas pa zhes bshad do// 'khor ba ji srid yod kyi bar// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rim pa dang // shAkya thub pa la sogs pa'i// gzugs kyis gdul bya'i rgyud la ni//
98a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'dul ba der snang ste// kun don byed par shes par bya// sprul sku 'di ni dang po ru// dga' bral shes pa'i dus su ni// thig le 'gog par 'gyur pa ste// na mkha'i khams kun gang 'gyur ba'i// gzugs kyis rab tu gnas pa'o//
98a3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu ni// mi rtog bzhin du skal ldan la// doni rnams byed de de bzhin du// bde chen rang bzhin med pa las// dmigs pa med kyang don 'byung ba'o// ye shes dbang du gyur pa yis// brtul zhugs la
98a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs rim pa yis// grang tshe de don bsgrub pa na// de yi dus su de thob pa'o// thugs rjes rgyas pa'i sbyor ba ste lnga pa'o// / da ni rab tu bshad bya ba// dpe med bde rdzogs chos sku dang // thugs rje sku yi ngo bo ste// res
98a5(rgyud 'grel): 'ga' ba nyid 'gag pa'i phyir// sbyor ba drug pa bshad par bya// dpe med pade rdzogs sku tshon yang // mi gnas mya ngan 'da' tshul gyis// rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis ni// rgyud dag rnams la rtag tu snang // de bzhin bde chen
98a6(rgyud 'grel): chosu yang // khyab dang rgyas pa'i tshul gyis su// na mkha'i ji srid gnas kyi bar// rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis 'jug/ thugs rje'i rang bzhin sku de yang // gdul bya ji ltar mos pa ltar// srid pa srid du gnas nas ni// bar
98b1(rgyud 'grel): chad med par rgyun du 'jug/ de 'dra'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sku// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa ste// bsgrub par bya ba'i mtshan nyid do// shes rab ye shes dbang dus su// dga' ba gsum gyi gnas skabasu// skad cig gnyis
98b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs chu tshod dang // nyin gcig zla ba la la sogs// gnas pa rgyun mi 'tshod ces bya// phyis kyi 'bras bu mi bslu phyir// de la yang ni de skad du// bla ma'i zhal las bshad pa yin// ye shes dbang du gyur pa yis// brtul
98b3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs cho ga de sgrub tshe// de yi dus su de thob nas// de nas 'khor ba'i mtha' yi b.ro// rgyun gyis rtog tu gnas pa'o// rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sbyor ba ste drug pa'o// // da ni rab tu bshad bya ba// dpe med bde
98b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sku chen dang // bral ba dgag par bya ba'i phyir// sbyor ba bdun pa bshad par bya// gong du yang dag gsung ba yi// dga' ba'i ye shes dus byung ba'i// dpe med bde tshogs rigs ldan sku// lan cig byung nas med pa ni// /
98b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa zhes ni rab tu bya// 'gog pa do las byung ba no// phyis kyi 'bras bu mchog gyur pa// 'gog pa med par shes par bya// snying rje che ba'i dbang gis ni// 'khor ba ji srid bar du ni// dbang phyug brgyad kyi bcom ldan 'das
98b6(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo gzhug phyir 'gog med dang // gnas la yang ni de bzhin du// mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya// skal ldan rnams kyi sngon du yang // shes rab ye shes dbang dus su// bla ma'i zhal las nges thob pa// dge' dang
99a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' bo bar ma dang // dga' bral dga' ba 'gog pa las// de 'dra'i sems rgyun myong ba ste// 'gog pa med pa zhes bshad do// ye shes dbang du gyur pa yis// brtul zhugs la sogs spyod pa la// gnas
99a2(rgyud 'grel): nas de yi don bsgrub tshe// de yi dusu de thob pa'o// bya ba byas pa'i dbang phyug che// mtha' yi pha rol phyin pa'i mchog/ mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o// 'gog pa med pa'i sbyor ba ste bdun pa'o//
99a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar sbyor bdun ldan pa yi// bzhi pa mngon par byang chub pa// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ba'o// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi gnas// chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid
99a4(rgyud 'grel): ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs bya'o// de ni 'khor ba ji srid kyis// bar du gnas pas rtag pa'o// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// ngo bor gyur pas gcig pa'o// de la sgrib pa bzhi yi ni// tsha ba med pas bsil ba'o// 'khor dang mya
99a5(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das pa ni// gcig tu gyur pas bde ba'o// gzugs la sogs pa rtog pa yis// ma gos phyir ni mi gdung ba'o// phyin log 'khrul rtog dang bral byas// dag cing dri ma med pa'o// zab gsal byang chub las mi ldog/ gzhan don mdzad
99a6(rgyud 'grel): pas dga' ba'o// chos nyid dang ni sems can la// sems mnyam bzhag pas yid dang ba// 'di ni bde ba chen po yi// ro myang ba yi mtshan nyid brgyad// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bzhi pa'i don ni bla med pa'o// dngos po kun la
99b1(rgyud 'grel): tshecher gnas dang // gang mi gsal ba'i dngos po ru// de nyid bla ma dam pa yi// zhal nas nges par thob pa la// som nyi yid gnyis mi bya'o// de yi ngo bo bshad nas ni// rnam grangs dag dang bshad pa bya// 'dod chags dang ni byar
99b2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang // chags bral du ni shes par bya// dga' dang dga' ba bar a dang // dga' bral gyi ni dga' ba'o// bde rtogs sku dang chos sku dang // sprul sku ru ni shes par bya// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang nau// stong dang mtshan med smon pa
99b3(rgyud 'grel): med// gsang dang gsang chen shin tu gsang // rnal 'byor lhag pa'i rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya'o// bdag dang gzhan dang lhan cig byed// dpal gsum du ni shes par bya// dang po rnal 'byor las rgyal mchog/
99b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog shes par bya// thig le phra mo gsang sngags bzlas// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// dam tshig gsum du shes par bya// dam tshig gsum dang ting 'dzin da // ye shes sems dpa' shes par bya/
99b5(rgyud 'grel): lus dang b+ha ga byang sems kyi// dkyil 'khor gsum du shes par bya// bum pa dang ni gsang ba dang // shes rab ye shes shes par bya// de la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi/ bzhi pa yi ni tshig gi ni// de 'dra'i rang bzhin mi shes
99b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ de nyid sngags kyi sku ru bshad// dpe med pade rdzogs ye shes sku// hUM sogs bskyed pa'i lha yi gzugs// bzhis bsgrub sku ru rab tu gnas// gong gi bzhi la gnas byed phyir// bar chad med cing 'gog pa med// de ltar
100a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan gsang 'dus su// rtog pa yi ni rnal 'byor pas// bskyed pa'i rim pa la brten te// bzhi pa'i don la spyod par 'gyur// de 'dra'i don rnams mi shes pas// phyi rol don la mngon
100a2(rgyud 'grel): zhen te/ rin chen sems ni dri can byas// des na dge dang mi dge ba'i// las byas pas ni mtho ris dang // dmyal la sogs par 'tshed 'gyur ba// chos 'di rang bzhin gyis dag pa// rnam rtog dra bas blun byas la// dge
100a3(rgyud 'grel): sdig phung po gnyisu brtags// de spangs nas ni skye med pa'i// rang bzhin don ni rtogs par bya// yang dag don du dge spangs na// dge ba smin pas smos ci dgos// dper na mi gang chu klung gi/ pha rol tu ni 'gro ba dag/ rtsa shing la
100a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs bsdus byas pas// chu la rgal ba'i gzings byas te// de la 'jus te rab brgal nas// bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin bzhi po'i ngo bo yi// don rtogs pas na 'bad rtsil gyi// bya ba de la ci zhig bya// de phyir bla ma dam
100a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// mnyes byas dbang gi don mchog gi/ bdud rtsi mchog 'di gang zag gang // bdag gzhan don du 'thung byed pa// gang de rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya// de phyin chad ni gang cung zad// 'dod chags la sogs dngos po rnams// /
100a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsir zin phyir de la dbul// skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ro// sgom par ldan pa smos ci dgos// do ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas// de ni yang dag rkang gnyis mchog/ de ni 'khor ba'i pha rol son// de ni byin log khur chen
100b1(rgyud 'grel): por/ de ni bya ba thams cad byas// de ni kun gzigs rnams kyis bzhag/ da ni gang du gnas gyur kyang // sangs rgyas kyi gdung ma chad pas// bstun pa rin chen gnas pa yi// gtso bo ru ni de gnaso// de ni gang du 'dug kyang rung //
100b2(rgyud 'grel): de dang de ru 'jig rten mgon// bzhugs dang bzhud par shes par bya// rnal 'byor de la thams cad kyis// dngos po kun gyi phyag byar 'os// srid gsum bdag po kun gyis kyang // dkyil 'khor mchod par 'os pa yin// de
100b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang // nyin re lan gsum byon nas ni// phyag byas cing ni bsngags brjod na// gzhan ma rnams ni smos ci dgos// de bas kun nas 'bad pa yis// bla ma yang dag mnyes byas te// bzhi pa'i don mchog
100b4(rgyud 'grel): blang byas nas// dgon pa 'am yang na grong gi mthar// gang rung ci rung de lta bu ro// gnas nas bla ma'i zhal ste yi// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsnyen bya ste// rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtogs par bya// dngos po thams cod dngos med pas// rgyu sogs
100b5(rgyud 'grel): don ni rtogs pa dang // rdo rje pad+ma spyad pa dang // bdud rtsi lngas ni rang dgar byed// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la ni// rnal 'byor ci dgar spyod byed cing // gsang bar bya ba'i chos gsang bas// gsang zhing sbas te spyad par bya// longs spyod
100b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po dka' thub dang // bsam gtan smon pa'i tshul gyi su// de 'dra'i ngo bo ma shes pas// lag pa dang ni rkang pa dang // mig sogs sbyin pa btang bas kyang // bskal pa chen po brgya ru yang // bdud rtsi'i ro thob mi 'gyur ro//
101a1(rgyud 'grel): de bas dngos po 'di gcig gis// dam pa rtog pa thams cad spangs// zab cing legs par gsal ba'i sku// kun nas 'od zer 'phro ldan pa// kun tu bzang por rang gi yid// rnal 'byor gang /
101a2(rgyud 'grel): gI sgo mi byed// de bsgoms pasti tshe 'di la// zla ba drug gis dngos grub mchog/ the tshom med par 'grub pa ste// su yIsa? dngos po de bzlog 'gyur// 'khor lo gcig pa'i shing rta la// rta bdun sbrul gyi thago pas
101a3(rgyud 'grel): sprel// nau kha khyod ro smad med pa yis// mkha' la khrid nas mtha' ru phyin// rang dang gzhan don byed pa ltar// dngos po yis ni chos kun dang // mdzes gyur min ltar snang gyur yang // rang dang gzhan gyi dngos grub
101a4(rgyud 'grel): pas na skyes bus 'di ni blang bar 'os// dal 'byor 'di ni g.yo bas ni// drag po'i rlung gis mar mo ltar// skad cig du ni mi snang 'gyur// dri bas de nyid bsam par 'os// de 'dri'i rang bzhin ngo bo la// sgom pas rtag tu mnyam
101a5(rgyud 'grel): zhog lo// khyab bdag rim bzhin rtogs gyur cig/ bdag ni rtag tu gsol ba 'debs// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgya mtsho las// bla ma'i zhal snga bsgrubs pas na// sbyor ba bdun gyi bdud rtsi mchog/ sman pa'i zhabs
101a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis thob pa'o// de 'dra'i bdud rtsi de la ni// 'thung byed de ni log pa yi// rtog pa yis ni rab 'chi ba'i// nad ni kun nas med gyur cig/ de med pas ni sems can kun// yang dag phung po rgyas 'gyur te// sbyor ba bdun gyi
101b1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin mchog/ 'bras bu de nyid rtogs par shog// sbyor ba bdun pa zhes bya ba/ dbang bzhi'i rab tu byed pa/ slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad
101b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mochen gyis bsgyur ba'o// /
102a1(rgyud 'grel): gta mtshan ma tshig thob dpon can po btam das mdzad pa bzhugs so//
102b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gr-i r-i skad du/ mau hU~M bau lA~M bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ gtor ma chen po'i cho ga/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tsha lo// gang zhing shes bya'i sgrib sogs rab spangs nas// me long la sogs ye shes yang dag ldan/
102b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi 'khor lo don byed rab mchog gtso// 'jam dbyangs de la 'dud cing bla ma la'ang // rnal 'byor rnams kyi bar chad zhi byas nas// mngon par don ni rab bsgrub phyir// sangs rgyas ye shes zhal lnga'i rims 'ongs pa//
102b3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus bstan pa'i gto ma bshad par bya// mchod sbyin rnams ni thams cad kyi// gtso bo gtor mi'i las yin te// rnal 'byor rnams ni de bsgrub 'dod// cho ga 'di la 'bad par bya// gang phyir gzhan don gnyer ba 'am//
102b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub sgrub pa'i lus byed na// bzlas dang sbyin sreg gnyis ka bas// gtor ma'i las 'di mchog tu gsungs// de yi las ni 'di lta ste// bdag nyid bsgyur dang de mgron dang // de yi yo byad bsngo ba dang // gsol gdab
102b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegasu gsol ba'o// dang por bdag nyid yau dme ltar// sku dang mkhyen pa bya ba dbang // rim pas thams cad rdzogs bsgoms nas// zhi phyir don grub gautor ma gtang // 'khor lo la sogs khang pa yi// phyogs bzhi
102b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bzhir stegs bu brgyad// brgya byin dbang ldan par du gcig/ chu dang bodan bral bar du gcig/ dam pa'i dri yis bcu po byug/ mdzes po'i me tog rnams kyis brgyan// glu dang gar dang gdugs sogs pos// nus pa ji
103a1(rgyud 'grel): snyed kyis brgyan bya// de nA rang nyid rnal 'byor pas// dngos grub myur du mi 'thob phyir// 'khor lor bcas pa 'am yang na ni// khros pas thams cad nag por bsgyur// de yi ye shes sems dpa' las
103a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer lcags kyu nag 'phros pas// phyogs skyong rang rang phyogs gnas pa// chung mo 'khor bcas dgug par bya// brgya byin ser po spyan stong pa// rdo rje 'dzin pA sha tsir bcas// glang chen rab tu brtan pa la// chibs pa
103a3(rgyud 'grel): shar gyis stegs dbus// dgug bya de g.yon mkha' lding l-i// zhon pa'i khyab 'jug nag po ste// g.yas pa rtse gsum 'khor lo 'dzin// g.yon du dung nor bu 'dzin// de steng dgug byas shar lho yi// stegs steng ra zhon ma
103a4(rgyud 'grel): lha ni// ral pa'i dbu rgyan dmar mdog can// skyabs sbyin phreng 'dzin g.yon du ni// dbyug pa gu De'u 'dzin pa dgug/ de bzhin lho yi stegs steng du// dgug bya ma he la zhon pa// gshin rje nag po brkyang bskum tshul// rgyun
103a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar phyag na dbyug pa dang // sdigs 'dzub 'dzin pa gnasde par bya// lho nub stegs steng la dgug pa// mi ro la zhon brkyang bskum tshul// gcer bu mche gtsigs sgra bzhin gnag/ bden bral gri dang kA pa la 'dzin// nub kyi
103a6(rgyud 'grel): stegs bu'i steng dgug pa// mekha' 'gro lto 'phye zhon pa yi// chu lha dkar po klu zhags 'dzin// klu mgo bdun pa zhabs klu gcig/ de bzhin nub byang steng dgug pa// dgo pa ser zhon rlung lha ljang // phyag gnyis rlung gi gos
103b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin cing // na mkha'i khamasu brkyang ba'o// byang gi stegs bu la dgug pa// mi zhon gnod sbyin ser po ste// bi dza pu ra sa bon gang // ne'u la btsir nas 'dzin pa'o// de steng byi ba la zhon pa// log 'dren dpon po glang chen mgo/
103b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar po la phug phreng ba dang // mngar bsres dbyug 'dzin dgug pa'o// byang shar stegs bu l-i dgug pa// glang la zhon pa'i dbang phyug dkar// ral can rus pa'i phreng ba tsa ni// kha T+wAM rnge'u chung 'dzin pa'o// brgya byin dbang ldan par
103b3(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa// rta bdun shing rta la zhon pa// nyi ma dmar po zer bcas pa// phyog mtshan pad+ma dmar po 'dzin// de g.yon ut+pa la gnas pa// zla ba dkar po la gnas po// phreng ba 'dzin paM 'khor dang bcas// bkug nas de ru gnas
103b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de nyid dbus su de steng dgug/ ngang pa zhon pa tshangs pa che// thung ngu zhal bzhi tshangs skud can// tshon po phreng ba dbyug pa 'dzin// klu dang cig shos gnyis par stong // shing rta la zhon thang bzang gnag/ dgug bya ral gri
103b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// lha min tshigs dang bcas pa'o// de yi g.yon du de steng du// pad+ma la bzhugs dgug bya bya// sa yi lha mo ser mo ste// bum+b+ha pa 'dzin pa bsam par bya// 'di rnams rin chen dbu rgyan can// rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs/
103b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis// rab tu spros pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// phyogs skyong shin tu che ba rnams// ring 'dra ba yi tshogs bskor ba// rnam smin 'od dang sku mdog gis// mun pa thams cad sel byed pa// rang gi lha yis dgug byas dgod// de ltar nga/
104a1(rgyud 'grel): bkug byas nas// cho ga'i rim pa 'di yis ni// shes bya'i sgrib pa mun bsal nas// de rnams rab tu sbyar bar bya// thugs kyi 'od zer las byung ba// gshin rje gshed sogs khro bo bcu// sku stong zhal gsum
104a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug bltam// smad ni gsal/ shing gzugs gnas pa// g.yas pas mgul po brtan byas nas// ri rab las grub tho ba yi// g.yon pas brdab cing gong ma rnams// rim pa bzhin du gdab par bya// oM AHbig+h+nAM ta kr-ita sarba duny+tsas
104a3(rgyud 'grel): ku bai ra ga na pa ti swa pu ri wa ra Na kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM AHTak+ki sarba duSh+TAn// ag+ne sa pa ri wa r+ya Na kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM AHnI la daN+Da sarba duSh+TA na nai ri ti sa pa ri wa ra Na kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba la sarba duSh+TAnA bA yu ni sa pa ri wa ra Na/
104a4(rgyud 'grel): kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM AHa tsa la sarba duny+dzanA~M/ I sha na sa pa ri wa ra Ne kI lA ya hUM phaT/ oM bruM tsakra sarba duSh+TA na/ arka tsan+d+ra pra ti ma hA sa pa ri wa ra Na kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM AHsuM b+ha sarba duSh+TAn tsa ma ri pa ti daM ba pra Na sa pa ri wa
104a5(rgyud 'grel): ra Na kI la yaM hUM phaT/ sngags de dag ni brjod byas nas// gdab bya gdab byed gdab pa rnams// sgrib pa mnyam nyid shes pa yis// brtsal phyir rims bzhin phur bus gdab// de dag lus 'di phur btab nas// thal ba nyid
104a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur rlag byas nas// rnam par shes pa mar me ltar// gnas pa sa bon gyis bkug ltar// zhal zhugs byang chub sems gyur nas// rdo rje'i lam byung mtsho skyes nang // babs pa bsam pa'i gnod sems rnams// bsal
104b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir sngags 'dis byin gyis rlab// oM AHoM shrI he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya hri sarba duSh+TA na sa ma ya mu dra bA ban tsakra a shAHa sha dz+nye shaM a pa nA ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje he ru ka yis ni// sngags kyis shes bya'i sgrib mun bsal// de
104b2(rgyud 'grel): nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi// phreng ba bzlas pas nyon mongs bsal// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ na mo badz+ra daMSh+To Ta ka Ta b+hai ra ba ya a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hasta ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tISh+Ta
104b3(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha bar+N+Na/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gardza gArdzA/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nan bi nA ya kA nAM/ ma hA ga na pe ti d+hI bi tA na ta kA rA ya/ sarba Sh+yaM a sha ya d+ho shaM a pa na ya hUM phaT/ de yaus sgrib mun bsal nA su// mtsho
104b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes nang gnas khu ba las// cho ga gsum gyi legs bsgrubs pa'i// sku rnams phyogs su dgod par bya// badz+ra hUM ruM kaM muM paM yaM b+ha saM lu ma a b+he ma maM laM/ bya ba'i sa bon rnams su gyur// de las rdo rje 'khor lo gu De'u
104b5(rgyud 'grel): dong // dbyug pa gri dang klu zhags dang // rlung gos bi dza pu ra dang // pad+ma rtse gsum pad+ma dang // ut+pal pad+ma ral gri dang // pad+ma mtshan ma rnams kyi nang // rang rang so bon mtshan par bsam// sa bon phyag mtshan de nyid las//
104b6(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin rdo rje mtshan du gyur// ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rdo rje ril gri phyag g.yas la// 'khor lo pad+ma g.yon du 'dzin// thugs rigs zla ba'i steng du dgod// khyab 'jug sgyu ma rdo rje gyur// nag po zhal gsum
105a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug pa// 'khor lo ral gri phyag g.yas la// dung dang pad+ma g.yon du 'dzin// 'di yang thugs rigs nyi mar dgod// drang srong rdo rje ma ru gyur// dmar ser zhal gsum phyag drug pa// skyabs
105a2(rgyud 'grel): byin dang ni phreng ba g.yas// glu Di dbyug pa g.yon du 'dzin// 'di yang thugs rigs zur gsum dang // nyi ma'i gdan la dgod pa'o// gshin rje rdo rje tshe zad gyur// nag po sgra 'greng zhal gsum pa// phyog drug dbyug pa
105a3(rgyud 'grel): rol gri dang // nor bu pad 'dzin brkyang bskum tshul// thugs rigs nyi ma'i gdan la dgod// bden bral rdo rje gtun du gyur// bung 'dra zhal gsum phyag drug pa// gri gug ral gri phyag g.yas pa// ka pa la rin chen g.yon du
105a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// thugs rigs nyi ma'i gdon la dgod// de rnams dbu rgyan mi bskyod pas// cod pan la ni mtshan pa'o// chu lha klu yi rdo rjer gyur// zhal gsumo dkar po klu gdong dang // klu yau zhabs can phyag drug pa// klu zhags ral gri
105a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas la// rin chen pad+ma g.yon du 'dzin// gsung rigs zla ba'i gdon la dgod// tshe dpag med kyis dbu rgyan pa'o// rlung lha rdo rje rlung du gyur// mar gad ltar ljang zhal gsum pa// phyag drug rlung gos ral gri g.yas// nor
105a6(rgyud 'grel): bu pad+ma g.yon du 'dzin// las kyi rigs te zla bar dgod// rnga sgra yis ni dbu brgyan pa'o// lus ngan rdo rje'i 'jigs byed gyur// gser 'dri zhal gsum phyag drug pa// pi dza pu ra ral gri g.yas// pad+ma dung ni g.yon du 'dzin//
105b1(rgyud 'grel): gsung rigs nyi ma la dgod bya// log 'dun rngu rje mchu rangs gyur// dkar pon la gsum phyag drug pa// rdo rje mchu can la phug dang // ral g+hi g.yas 'dzin pa'o// na chen pad+ma g.yon du 'dzin// 'di yang gsung rag
105b2(rgyud 'grel): mAr dgod// dbang ldan rdo rje khro bor gyur// dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rtse gsum ral gri g.yas nA 'dzin// g.yon du rin chen pad+ma 'dzin// gsung rigs zla ba la bkyede// tshe dpag med kyis gsum po brgyan// nyi ma
105b3(rgyud 'grel): rdorje 'khyil par gyur// dmar pi zhal gsum phyag drug pa// pad+ma ra lo gre phyag g.yas la// g.yon du 'khor lo rin po che// rin chen rigs te nyi mar dgod// rin chen 'byung ldan gyis brgyan pa'o// zla ba rdo rje 'od du gyur// zhal gsum
105b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug dkar po'i mdog/ ut+pal ral gri phyag g.yas la// rin cheni pad+ma g.yon du 'dzin// sku yi rigs te zla bar dgod// tshangs ma thub pa'i rdo rjer gyur// ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o// pad+ma rAl gri phyag g.yas
105b5(rgyud 'grel): pau nor bu 'khor lo g.yon du 'dzin// sku rigs 'di yang zla bar dgod// lha min rdo rje thag bzang gyur// nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// g.ya su ral gri 'khor lo 'dzin// g.yon du rin chen chu skyes 'dzin// sku yi rigs
105b6(rgyud 'grel): te nyi mar dgod// sa gnas rdo rje sar gyur te// ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// pad+ma ral gri phyag g.yas la// g.yon du rin chen chu skyes te// sku rigs 'di yang zla bar dgeng // bzhi po rtag pas brgyan pa'o// sgyu mdzeH/
106a1(rgyud 'grel): byin za dang // ma bdag sha rlon za ba dang // lus ngan log par 'dren pa dang // lha dmag zlog par byed pa rnams// nyi ma ma yi 'od kyis 'khor// rten pa'i rgyab na gnas pa'o// lhag ma zla ba'i
106a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyab rten can// dang po rang 'od rig ma 'khyud// rdo rje skyil mo krung gnas pa// zab mo yang dag gsal ba'i sku// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa// mtshan dang dpe byad kyis 'od gsal// rang rang phyogs kyi na mkha' gang //
106a3(rgyud 'grel): rang rang dang 'dra 'khor tshogs rnams// zhal gsum phyag drug rig mar ldan// yang dag bskyed nas nyer sgrub sogs// yid 'od gsal ba 'dus pa yi// gzhung gis byin brlabs sbyang bor bya// de bzhin na mkha'
106a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa yi// 'gre ba ma lus sa bon gyis// bkug nas zhal zhugs zhu bar gyur// rdo rje'i lam 'byung mtsho skyes nang // ye shes rim pa lnga las byung // rdo rje sems dpa'i mos pa yis// zho gyur pad+ma'i nang gnas pa
106a5(rgyud 'grel): spyan sogs lha mo glu dbyangs kyis// skul bas k+ShaM la sogs pa yi// sa bon nyi shu gcig tu gyur// de las mtshano ma sa bon mtshan// sa bon phyag mtshan las byung ba// sa snying la sogs gzugs bskyed nas// sku
106a6(rgyud 'grel): mdog zhal dang phyag mtshon rnams// sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs grags pa rnams// na mkha'i khams kun spros pas gang // de ltar mgon rnams kun sbyangs nas// yo byad rnams ni sta gen gnas// gser dang
106b1(rgyud 'grel): dngul dang zangs ma'i snod// lcags dang nya phyis la sogs pa'i// snod mchog nang du khur ba dang // zan dang sdig med sha khrag dang // mdzes pa'i lha bshos nya sha dang // mon sran gle'u 'o mya dang // chu dang marar+ya me dri me tog/
106b2(rgyud 'grel): lhag rgyu btung rgyu bza'i rgyu sogs// rgyas pa mdun du mthong bya ste// glu dang gar drang rol mo dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan dang // bla re la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs// de bzhin phyi rol kun bskor bkod// med na kham
106b3(rgyud 'grel): phor la sogs la// mon sran gre'u chu zan dang // gzhan ma dag kyang rnyed pa bzhin// cho ga bzhin du dbul bar bya// 'khor lo snga ma bzhin bsgrubs nas// pad+ma sa bon bcu po las// bo spu'i bu ga las byung ba'i// gzugs
106b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs lha mo spros pa yis// na myakha'i khams kun rab bkang nas// mgron rnams so so 'khyud byas te// de bzhin me tog la sogs pa// sa bon gyis bskul so sor thengs// mchod pa mnyam nyid bya ba'i phyir// sngags
106b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis brlab par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ dri nas rdo rje dril bu ni// gsor gsil bskor ba'i bde bas kyang // lha rnams thams cad dges bya'i phyir// chos thams cad kyis bstod par bya//
106b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mau bskyed ye shes tshe// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// rdo rje sgrogs la phyag 'tshalo// rnam par snang mdzad dag chen po// rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin 'od gsal
107a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyug 'tsha'o// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje na mkha' dri ma med// rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje dpag mang 'dod chags tshe//
107a2(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog na mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol byin pa thob// 'od gsal rdo rje phyag 'tshalo// dngos grub rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// rang bzhin dag pa rdo rje sems// rdo rje sems
107a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' phyag 'tshalo// de nas yaM byung gzhu 'dra dang // r-i byung gru gsum me dkyil du// oM byung pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// rdzas rnams mi mchi lnga ru dmigs// de steng zla ba nyi ma la// bruM sogs bsams nas de'i 'od kyis// rigs lnga'i
107a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bkug byas te// sa bon las ni thim gyur stobs// rlung gi me bus pad nang gi/ bdud rtsi khol bas gcig gyur te// rlangs pa hUM byung rdo rje dkar// lte bar hUM bsams zhu gyur pas// pad nang bdud rtsi la babs te// zla ba shel
107a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar dag bsams nas// steng du oM bsams zhu gyur pas// nang du thim byas gsal byas te// 'od zer lnga ni rab 'bar bsam// de nyid gsum gyi gsadra sngags nyid// rab tu bzlas pas byin brlabs te// de ltar sbyang byas gtor
107a6(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams / sa bon gyis bskul pad+ma yis// na mkha'i khams kun bkang byas te// lha rnams ji snyed phyag g.yon bteg/ zangs par byas nas so so yi// lce ni hUM las rdo rje yi// bum par hUM baMs ma de 'od kyis// lce 'us chu ni 'thung
107b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// bdud rtsi 'thungs pas zad med do// de yi stobs kyis gnyis med kyi// ye shes yongasu myong bar bsam// de nas tshigs bcad 'di rnams kyis// rab tu brjod de dbul bar bya// oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig
107b2(rgyud 'grel): rten khams gnas pa// dus gsum las ni byung ba kun// mkha' dang rgya mtsho sprin gyi tshogs// shin tu rgya che phra rab kyi// rdul gyi dkyil 'khor so so yi// nang du gnas pa'i tshogs chen po// na mkho'i dbyings dang mnyam
107b3(rgyud 'grel): yI/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can// phyogs bcu skyong ba thams cad drang // sems can khams rnams ma lus pa'o// so so sbyor ba'i tshul gnas pa// de dag kyang ni 'di lta ste// rdo rje mtshon cha sgyu ma rdo rje dang // rdo rje mi dang
107b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zad dus dang // rdo rje gtun dang klu yi rdo rje dang // rdo rje rlung dang rdo rje 'jigs byed dang // rdo rje mchu rings rdo rje khro bo dang // rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje 'od tshun dang // thub pa'i rdo rje rdo rje thag bzang dang // sa yi rdo rje 'khor dang so sor bcas
107b5(rgyud 'grel): sa snying phyag na rdo rje nAm snying dang // 'jig rten dbang dang sgrib sel kun tu bzang // gzugs dang sgra dang d+hi ye rdo rje ma// ro dang rig byo chos dbyings rdo rje dang // spyan ma dang ni mA ma kI dang ni// na bza' dkar mo dam tshig sgrol ma dang //
107b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen dbang phyug dang // snang mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams// mi bskyod pa yi tshogs chen thams cad la// bdag gis me tog dang ni spos dang ni// mar me dri zhim zhal zas dam pa dbus
108a1(rgyud 'grel): rol mo la sogasna dag dang ldan pa yi// gtor ma'i yo byad 'di ni thugs rje yis// bzhes shing dgongs shig bdag la rab tu dgongs// bdag la gser dang dngul dang 'gron bu dang // nor phyug tshe ring
108a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang bzhon pa dang // na tsha med dang dam tshig bde ba kun// 'phrog par byed pa bgegs kyi sde dpon dang // gdug dang shin tu gdug pa can dag dang // mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dag/ rmugs par gyis shig rab tu rmugs
108a3(rgyud 'grel): par gyis// chings shig chings shig khyed kyis yang dag tshom// de bas nga yis 'gron bu gser dngul dang // nor gyi 'byor dang tshe ni ring ba dang // gzhon pa dang ni na tsha med la sogs// bde ba chen po rab tu 'phel bar mdzod//
108a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni byang chub snying po ma thob par// khyed rnams bdag gi grogs la rtag tu spyon// bdag gi nad rnams dag ni zhi ba dang // bdag la bgegs kyi gnod pa zhi bar gyis// kye bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ skyon
108a5(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi phyag rgya gshig pa po// bdog gis gtor phul bdag la zhi ba dang // dus 'di nas ni bsrung bar mdzad du gsol// de ltar 'dod bzhin gsol btab nas// de dag rnams kyang mthun pa ru// bdag la dngos grub
108a6(rgyud 'grel): gnang bsams nas// mgrin gcig tu ni legaso zhes// gsungs pa'i ku cos khams bkang ba'i// sgra kun grags par dmigs na su// tshigs bcad 'di yis bshags par bya// 'jig rten 'di na 'khod pa'i gron
108b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun// phyogs skyong sems can kun dang lha yi lha// rang bzhin gyis grub sbyor bas sbyangs pa rnams// bdag ni brtson dang mi ldan bkren chen te// mchod gzhan ci yang bdag la ma mchis na// gzhan don
108b2(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pa'i mgon po khyod rnams kyis// thugs dang mi 'gal rang gi mthus bzhes shig/ bdag ni rnam g.yeng rmugs dang le lo yis// sems ma 'dus dang mi gsal ma bsgrubs pa// mgon po khyad
108b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams thugs dang 'gal ba gang // rang bzhin bdag gi chos gzigs bzod pa mdzod// de ltar brjod pas dga' 'gyur te// 'gal ba dag ni sos par dmigs// yang na a yis dang por rdzogs// brjod/
108b4(rgyud 'grel): pa byin brlabs gtor ma dbul// de nas rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i// bde ba'i dbyings rab brjod bya ste// bskor nas pad+ma'i lag bskor lnga// byas nas sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol// oM sems can don kun
108b5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas su// rang gi yul du gshegs su gsol// yang ni byon par mdzod tsog muH// gshegs gsol yi ge brgya pa yis// las kyi skyon kun gsal bar bya// oM badz+re satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/
108b6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ DoM D+ho me b+ha ba a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo mau b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+him+ma pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+ra
109a1(rgyud 'grel): mA me muny+tsa/ badz+rI b+hA bA ma hA sa ma ya satwa AH/ de nas brjod nas gtor mya rnams// mngon sum dus su phyogs bcur gtor// gzhan ma sa phyogs gtsang sbyar spung // chu gnas sems
109a2(rgyud 'grel): can rnams dang ni// mi ni dbul ba rnams la sbyin// khyi dang bya rog la sogs la// nan tan gyis ni sbyin mi bya// de bzhin de yi rim pa yis// zhi ba la sogs ji bzhin dang // rang 'dod phyogs su kha bltas te//
109a3(rgyud 'grel): de yi kha dog 'khor lor ldan// ston bzhin phyogs su skyong ba rnams// bkug nas bsam pa'i nyon mongs bsal// shes bya'i sgrib pa yang bsal nas// de dag stong byas sa bon las// bsregs nas rje dpon du
109a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// yi dam lha yi phyag mtshan sogaso// spro dang bsdu ba byas nus su// snga ma'i rten ni gyur byas nas// thams cad kun mkhyen sku thob bya// 'phro ba'i zer byung thugs dbang gis// phyogs bcu khams kun khyab
109a5(rgyud 'grel): par byas// sku dang mkhyen po byed pa dbang // rgyas btab mtshan nyid shes byas nas// myur ba snga bon sogs tshul gyis// mchod byos dgos byos tshim par byas// gtor ma sngon bzhin byin brlabs nas// phul te tshom
109a6(rgyud 'grel): byas gnyis med kyi// ye sheso yongs su myong bar bsam// yid kyis rdo rje dril bzung nas// mi bskyod la sogs tshigs bcad kyis// bstod pas dgyes te lan cig gsungs// de nas phrin las bsgrub pa rnams//
109b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya'i don du gsol ba gdab// 'di yis gtor ma byin brlab sngags// oM AHbadz+ra d+h+r-ika sarba duSh+TA na swa ma ya mu dr-i pra b+haM dza ka ma ma shan+tiM ku ru swA hA hUM/ de bzhin rgyus pa'i mtha' ru oM// puSh+TiM ku ru zhes
109b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// bya shaM ku ru zhes bya'o// mngon spyod la ni hUM dang pheMT// mA ra ya ni zhes bya'o// dgug pa'i mab+hi ru dza zhes bya'o// bskrad pa la ni phaT mthar bzhig/ u tsa ta ya zhes pa'o// de bzhin las kyi bye brag gis//
109b3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar// sngon du gsungs pa'i sngags rnams brjod// de dag rab tu dgyes bsams nas// rang gi gnas su gshegasu gsol// de ltar mya lus bstan pa yi// gtor ma'i cho ga mchog
109b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni// bla ma mchog gis legs sbyangs pa'i// sems dul dang ldan brtson 'grus can// gsang shes de nyid rigs pa po// dkyil 'khor la sogs rtog pa'i tshogs// shes shing sgrub pa lhur len pa// de
109b5(rgyud 'grel): la 'di ni sbyin par bya// gang zhig bla ma la mi gus// dang med 'jungs pa rnam g.yeng ba// le los sems sbyong rnam spangs pa// blun chen de la sbyin mi bya//
109b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis gtor ma'i cho ga 'di byas dge ba yis// rnal 'byor 'di sgrub par chad zhi zhing 'dod don grub// gtsug lag tshad mas rnal 'byor chen po'i lam bgrod de// bcu gsum dge ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
110a1(rgyud 'grel): sar 'gro shog// gtor ma chen po'i rim pa slob dpon chen po bi ta pA dAs mdzad pa rdzogs so//
110a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu ha dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
111a1(rgyud 'grel): pa nas mnas kya'i grub thapas thob tsan chen po sa sa sa pa jug so/
111b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ rat+na ma ti nA ma sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ mi shigs pa'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo// glang zhig dri med gzi brjid ldan// spros pa
111b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnam pa kun byal te// mtha' yas rigs kyi sprul 'phro ba// 'jam dbyangs de btung bla ma la'ang // blo gros pa/ zhan yang dad pa yis// 'dus pa'i don gyis de bzhin nyid// rang gzhan dran par byed pa'i don// /
111b3(rgyud 'grel): mi shigs rin tshon bshad pa'i bya// de la yang dag pa'i man ngag dang bral ba rnams ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ston cing shes kyang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du bsgrubs kyang bla na med pa'i// /
111b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phong thob par mi nuso// du phyir bdag gis kyang bdag cag gi bla ma chen po sangs rgyas ye shes kyi zhal snga nas kyi rim pa nas 'ongs pa'i rlung gi de nyid kyi sgo nas mi shigs pa'i rin po
111b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs cung zad ston pas skyes bu chen po rnams kyis 'bade gzung bar bya'o// de la dngos po thams cad kyi mtha'i de bzhin nyid ni zab mo dang gsal ba gnyisu med pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de yang chos kyi dbyings spros
111b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i mtha' thams cad dang bral po/ na mkha'i dkyil ltar rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'o// de lta bu'i rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo la thog ma med pa'i dus nas sems can rnams kyis phyin ci log tu brtags pas rlung gi khams
112a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs te// de las ma/ de las su/ de las sa khyams bsgrubs pas phung po dang sgyu mched dang khams srung zhing 'khor ba'i chos kyis rnam par sbyang ngo do// de ltar snang ba'i dun nyid
112a2(rgyud 'grel): yang rnam par dag pa'i don la ni g.yo ba rdul tsam yang med do// de lta bu'i don de sems can thams cad la kun rdzob kyi rnam pa'i gzugs kyi gnas rnam par gnas kyang bla ma'i zhal las bstan pa med par
112a3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// de bas na lhan cig byed pa'i slob dpon gyis byin gyis brlabs pas rlung gi sgo nas spros pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo gnas dang ngal gso pa'i de kho na nyid bla ma'i kha las rtogs 'gyuraro// rtogs pa de
112a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas phyin ci log tu snang ba'i phung po la sogs pa rim gyis log pas yang dag pa'i phung po la sogs pa zab pa dang gsal ba dbyer med pa'i ngo bo 'thob pa'i rtags rnams rnyed par 'gyuraro// de rnyed pas bsgo
112a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa dang bcas pas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur te// de bsta na ji skad bshad pa'i b+ha bas de rtogs par bya ste/ de phyin chad dgon pa 'am gang yang rung ba'i gnas su rnam par gnas
112a6(rgyud 'grel): nas// sngon du bya bar 'os pa thams cad tshogs par byas te/ thabs 'dir ni rim pa gnyis pa'i don bsgom par bya'o// de yang dang po sems can thams cad la mi btang ba'i snying rje chen po'i sems bskyod de/ de nas ra
112b1(rgyud 'grel): gi thugs ka na ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rim pa dang po pa rnams la yi ge'i gzugasu snang ba gzhom du med pa de las/ yi ge kha dog lnga'i 'od zer steng gi blan
112b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas nas byung ste/ de'i rtse las dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spros pas phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi kun tu rtog pa rlung gi bzhon pa dang ldan pa rnams/ de rnams bla ma lta bur gyur
112b3(rgyud 'grel): pa la thim pas rnam par dag par byas te/ de nyid slar bsdus te ye shes kyi ngo bor gyur te g.yon nas zhugs te/ mtshan ma'i dbus kyi bum pa'i sa bon la thim pas/ de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan bskyed pa'i rin po
112b4(rgyud 'grel): che dngos po thams cad la khyab pa'i rang bzhin mi shigs pa'i thig le 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa tsa nu ka'i 'bru ched tsam du gyur par bsam mo// de'i 'od zer gyis gnas dang ye shes sems dpa' la sogs po gsal bar
112b5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ bdag gi mthe bo'i rtsa ba dang rje ra dang / brla gnyis dang / gsang ba'i gnas dang / lte ba dang / gsus pa dang / nu ma gnyis dang / lag rtse dang / mgrin pa dang / mchu dang / 'gram pa dang / mig gnyis
112b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / rna ba'i rtsa dang / spyi bo dang / lus kun gyi nang gsal bar byas te/ de dag na gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems sgra yig bcu drug gi gzugasu snang ba bkug ste/ thig ler zhugs par bsam mo// de bsams pa
113a1(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis de'i nang du lha bcu dgu rten dang brten can lhag par mos pas bsgoms te/ de'i dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs kar gong ma ltar ye shes kyi thig le bsgoms nas/ de'i 'od kyi rim pas rten gyi thig
113a2(rgyud 'grel): le'i bar gsal bar bya'o// de nas gnas bcu drug nas 'od zer bzhag pa phyung ste/ des dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa gsal bar byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshe
113a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi zhal du zhugs nas mi shigs pa'i thig ler song nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi blangs te/ rdo rje'i lam nas byung te/ 'o ma'i rgyun ltar 'du zhing thibs dang shes rab kyi dbye pas/ sna bug g.yas g.yon du zhugs
