173a4(rgyud 'grel): tshon lhag ma de rnams de kho na nyid gsum yi ge mu'i mtha' dang bcas pas gshegasu gsolo// tshon gyi snod skye bo med pa'i sa phyogasu bzhag nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rom pa'i lci bas byugs la spos chu dri zhim pos
173a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang byugs te de nyid du me tog sil ma dgram par bya'o// de'i rjes la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa'i yo byad bye bra ba dang / bum pa dgod par byas te/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni dkyil 'khor
173a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyi rol gtso bo'i g.yas kyi char bzhag go// bumo pa gzhan rnams ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi grwa bzhir bzhag go// yong bum pa gzhan zhig la bdud rtsi thob sbyor gyi sngags bzlas la ku sha'i khres chung
173b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa ni bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi sgo logasu bzhag par bya'o// bum pa de rnams las chu nyung zad nyung zad blangs te/ mchod yon gyi snod du blugs la/ mchod yon gyi snod de yang bdag dang
173b2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma dbang bskur bar bya ba'i don du rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i khar bzhag go/ de nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas la phyogs mtshams bzhir mar me brgyad bzhag pa dang / de las lhag pa'i spos snod spos dri zhim
173b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas par bzhag par bya'o// de nas slob dpon cho ga bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi sgor stan nang tshangs can la lha la mngon par phyogs pas 'dug ste/ dkyil 'khor
173b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ba// de'i rim pa ni 'di yin no// rgyud las ji skad bshad pa lta bu'i phyi'i rog pa dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya'o// de med na yid kyis bsgom par bya'o// de yang dang por re zhig slob dpo/
173b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas rang gi rdo rje dang / chu skyes yang drag par sbyor ba'i sgras na mkha' lnga bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams blos rang gi nang du bcug nas slar yang dkyil 'khor gyi
173b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo lta bur rang gi lus las byung nas na mkha' la khyab par spro bar bya'o// de nas slar yang bkug la dkyil 'khor gyi ngosu bzhag par bya'o// de nas gshin rje gshed la sogs pas bgegs bskrad la/ rdo rje
174a1(rgyud 'grel): ra ba la sogs pa rnam par bsgoms nas/ de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi ngos la bzhugs pa yi ge dzas dgug pa dang / hUM gis dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu rang gi mtshan mar gzhug pa dang / de
174a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du baM gis brtan par bya ba dang / hos mnyes par byas nas nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pas byin gyis brlab par bsam par bya'o// de'i rjes la mchod yon dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa yi ge gsum gyi
174a3(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bzlas pa dang / rasau zung re de bzhin du mngon paro bzlas pa lha re re zhing dbul ba dang / nang gi mchod pa yang byas nas/ rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing bstod pa bya ste/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhra
174a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po/ rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// rdo rje dbyings la phyag 'tshalo// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che// rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mcho go/ ston pa rdo rje khyed phyag 'tshal// rin cheni
174a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje na mkha' dri ma med// rang bzhin dag pa gos po med// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che// me tog na mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa ban+d+ha so// rdo rje gsung la phyugs
174a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo/ don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshalo// de ltar bstod pa byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bdag nyid
174b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o// de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la phyir byung te/ bza' ba dang bcu ba sna tshogs nya dang sha la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i gtor ma rgya chen po rang rang gi phyogs kyi gtor ma'i
174b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags mngon por bzlas la phyogs skyong rnams la phul nas/ yang dkyil 'khor gyi khang par gzhug ste/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa/ dkyil 'khor la phyag byas la/ rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing slob ma dang lhan cig
174b3(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba ldan gsum bya'o// yang phyir byung la nang par gyi dus su rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste/ de bzhin nang par rgyas par bya// zhes bshad pa'i phyiraro// slar yang zhugs te 'og nas bshad pa'i cho gas rje su gnang ba'i dbang
174b4(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'i mtha' thugs pa'i 'jug pa'i cho ga bcom ldan 'das bdag po las thob par blos bsam par bya'o// 'dod chags che las byung de nyid// 'khor lo gzugs brnyan lta bur ni// shes par byas la dkyil 'khor du// /
174b5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma gzhug par bya ba'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das la bdag por gsol ba gdab par bya'o// na mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha myed pa yi mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' che rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' deng
174b6(rgyud 'grel): grub mdzod// kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod// 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa//
175a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod// shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang chub
175a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya mchog/ grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa// rdo rje snyemyas bdag bdag mdzod cig/ sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing // sems
175a3(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi snying la bzhugs// sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid// 'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'o// bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog/ shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor yin// bden pa de yis mgon
175a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la// khyod kyi 'dod pa rab rdzogs shog/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las kun tu byung // de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes// /
175a5(rgyud 'grel): bden pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor du// gzugs brnyan gsal ba slob ma ni// kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog/ ces bden pa sgrags par bya'o// slob ma re re zhing yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la gos dmar po bskon/
175a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dar dmar pos gdong g.yogs shing / mgo la me tog gi phreng ba dkris pa lag na me tog gi phreng ba thogs pa yol ba'i bar du bzhag la dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa
175b1(rgyud 'grel): sgor bzhag pa'i bum pa'i tshus bsang gtor byas nas// slob ma la sdug pa khyod su yin zhes dri bar bya'o// slob mas kyang sdug pa bdag ni bskal pa bzang po'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas slob ma de'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag
175b2(rgyud 'grel): nas 'og nas bshad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sems bskyed par bya ste/ oM sar+b+ba yau ga tsit+ta ut+pA da A mi su ra te sa ma yas+t+waM ho/ sid+d+hi badz+ra ya ta su khaM/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis
175b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsong ba 'di / khyed kyis dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar ma byed cig/ drad pa dang mi ldan pa rnams yang ma yi no zhes brjod par bya'o// dzaHhUM zhes brjod pa
175b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dis kyang slob dpon gyis slob ma dgug pa dang gzhug pa bya zhing // A khaM bi ra hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o// dam tshig gi mchog 'dzin tu gzhug par bya ba'i phyir slob ma de dkyil 'khor gyi shai rA sgo'i mdun
175b5(rgyud 'grel): du bzhag la/ deng khyod do bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigasu zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod l-I ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgo ste/ de lta bu'i
175b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bskyed par bya yis// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la mau sgra zhig/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes brjod la slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ oM rdo rje sems dpa'i deng khyod kyi// snying la
176a1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bzhugs par gyur/ gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs// zhes brjod nas bdud rtsi lnga pad+ma'i snod du bzhag ste/ yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la ji lnga
176a2(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin du bsgoms te// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na bsreg par 'gyur// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub te// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung zhig/ oM badz+ra u da ka Tha tha tha zhes brjod de/ slob ma 'thung du gzhug//
176a3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gyis slob ma la dam bca' ba brtan par gyur pa'i phyiraro/ 'og nas bshad pa 'di yang brjod do// deng phyin chang khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di bos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgoso// /
176a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smos la/ de nas slob ma la 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje
176a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' 'bab par gyur cig ces smros shig ces bsgo la// slob ma'i snying gar lam las byung ba'i dbang chenagyi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa kha dog ser po rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa dbus su yi ge hUM gnas pa
176a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom mo// lkog mar yang po las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po kha dog dkar po bum pas mtshan pa la/ dbus na yi ge a gnas pa bsgom mo// spyi bor yi ge yaM las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs
176b1(rgyud 'grel): can kha dog sngon po ba dan gyis mtshan pa la dbus su yi ga ha gnas par bsam mo// slob ma'i rkang pa'i 'og tu yang yi ge dz+haiM 'od zer 'bar ba dang bcas pa bsams la de'i yang 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na raM wa d+hung
176b2(rgyud 'grel): bapaba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar po bsams nas/ dril bu dkrol zhing / A be sha ya s+t+waM b+ha ya/ ra ra ra ra/ tsA la ya/ tsA la ya/ hUM hA a dz+nye zhes brjod par bya'o// slob ma de'i lce la yi ge hriHdmar po bsams la
176b3(rgyud 'grel): de 'od dpag tu med pa'i skur bsams nas/ babs par gyur pa dang / 'dod chags rdo rjer de gnas pa la/ rdo rje dge ba dang mi dge ba smos shig ces dris nas/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra zhes bya ba 'dis slob ma de brtan par bya'o// de nas
176b4(rgyud 'grel): pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hoHzhes brjod/ me tog gi phreng ba dkyil 'khor du dor la/ de blangs nas pra tI gr-ih+Na tA mi maM satwa ma hA ba la/ zhes bya ba 'dis slob ma'i mgo bo lA bcings nas/ de'i mig gnyis su yi ge oM 'od zer dang bcas pa
176b5(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang khyod kyi// mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad// mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// ces bya ba'i tshigasu bcad pa brjod la/ gdong g.yogs dkrol nas dkyil 'khor
176b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag po nas bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi bor du bstan par bya'o// de la lha rnams kyi mtshan ma 'am/ mtshan mo dang nye bar me tog gi phreng ba gang du babs pa de'i rnal 'byor sbyin par bya'o// yang na slob ma gang la dad pa de'i sbyor ba
177a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par bya'o// slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga'o// dA ni dbang bskur ba yin te/ de'i rim pa ni 'di yin no// sngar bshad pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la bzhag pa'i snod la gnas pa'i chus slob ma rnam
177a2(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad du bsgoms pa'i spyi bor/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes zlos shing dbang bskur ba ni chu'i dbang bskur ba'o// gser la sogs pa khams kyi rang bzhin las byas pa'am/ 'bur du brkos pa 'am/ ri mo bris pa'i cod
177a3(rgyud 'grel): pa na ni ma de ma 'byor na raswa las byis pa de'i spyi bor bzhag la/ lag pas 'dzin du bcug nas spyi bo der mi bskyod pa bum pa bsnams pa bsam zhing / rig pa du mos kyang slob ma la dbang bskur bar bsam par bya ba ni cod
177a4(rgyud 'grel): pan gyi dbang bskor ba'o// de'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag la de yang lag pas 'dzin du bcug nas de'i spyi bor mi bskyod pa bum pa bsnams pa bsams nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang // de ring khyod la bskur bar gyur// sangs
177a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun tu rab grub phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyi long // zhes brjod pa ni rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'o// de'i rang gi gdod mo'i lha'i rnal 'byor byin la slob ma rdo rje dang dril bu dag 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin du bcug lA/ oM badz+ra a d+hi ba
177a6(rgyud 'grel): twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mai tiSh+To badz+ra sa ma yas+t+waM zhes brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni bdag po'i dbang bskur ba'o// de'i spyi bo ra lag pa bzhag lo oM badz+ra satwe tAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma~M badz+ra na maHa b+hi shi kA ta/ kye che ge mo rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas/
177b1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi dngos grub kun gang gang snang // gtso bo de ni rnam rgyal 'ang // rang bzhin gyis ni chos dag pas// sangs rgyas ye shes gang yin de'o// zhes slob ma la bsgo bar bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'o// rig pa'i dbang bskur
177b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i rnam par dag pa ni 'di lta ste/ chu'i dbang bskur pa ni/ me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can/ mi bskyod pa'i rnam par dag pa'o// cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi
177b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid can rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o// rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can 'od dpag tu med pa'i 'o// bdag po'i dbang bskur ba ni bya ba bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can don yod par
177b4(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i 'o// ming gi dbang bskur ba ni/ ma rig pa 'gags nas rig pa'i khams dang / rigs rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid can rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam par dag pa yin no// de'i rjes la gal
177b5(rgyud 'grel): tephyir mi ldog pa'o dbang bskur bar mi byed na/ rig pa'i dbang bskur ba la yang rdo rje'i brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan pa dang / dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya'o// yang ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba tsam byed nA/ de'i tshe de'i
177b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes la rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kho na tsam sbyin par bya ba la phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dusu ni 'di la lung bstani sbyin par bya'o// de la rdo rje'i brtul zhugs ni 'di yin te/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems
178a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i lag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // rdo rje sems dpa'i brtul zhugs brtan// zhes brjod la rdo rje slob ma 'dzin tu bcug la sngags 'di brjod du gzhug ste/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta
178a2(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tISh+Tha e Sha traM d+ha ra ya mi hI hi hau hi hI hUM/ de nas thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ ces
178a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing 'dris rdo rje 'dzin tu gzhug/ de'i rjes la rdo rje dril bu 'dzin tu bcug la// 'di te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab sgra yi rjes 'gror bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed

178a6(rgyud 'grel): ni nges khyod lung bstan pa// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// srid pa mchog gi sgrub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton// kye de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba/ sid+d+hi b+hur b+hA ba swa/ 'od yis/
178b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur gyur pa yi// sngags pa 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu// bde gshegs kyis kyang lung bstan mdzad// ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni lung bstan pa'o// de nas der tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag
178b2(rgyud 'grel): gis dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste/ mchog gsang ba dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// mthong ba dang ni zhugs gyur pas// sdig pa kun las ngos grol bar// khyed rnams deng nyid legs par gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di

178b4(rgyud 'grel): ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin// dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di// rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs// dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no// gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni//

179a2(rgyud 'grel): dang dug dang dbyigs dug nad// mkha 'gro rnams kyis gtses pa dang // gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis// bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gyur// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// rdo rje slob dpon blo gros
179a3(rgyud 'grel): ched/ dge ba rab tu mi spyoms pa// nam yang smad par mi bya'o// bla ma la ni gus bcas yon// rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya// des ni rim sau sogs gnod pa rnams// phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu rang gis

179a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin bcas pa// kun gyis dang khyod dbang bskur bas// khoms gsum gyi ni rgyal po che// rgyal po'i bdag por brtan pa yin// deng ni bdud las rnam rgyal te// grong khyor mchog tu rab zhugs pa// khyed rnams
179b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid// de nyid thob par the tshom med// de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis// rang gi dam chog mi zad bde bskyed brtan par gyis// deng ni 'gro ba la myur byang rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rab tu mnyaM/

179b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan sman par bshad pa ni// sngags kyi bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs ni bsgom pas so// zhes bya ba ni chos bshad pa'o// de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje bzung ba dang // chos kyi dril bu dkrol ba la sogs pa shes
180a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'i phyir// de nyid kyi ni rdo rje gzung // chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla// zhes bya ba de ni 'di yin no// rig pa'i dbang bsgyur ba'i cho ga'o// da ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang
180a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba ste/ de'i rim pa ni 'di yino// slob mas phyag byas la// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas kyis// mchod chen ji ltar gsal ba bzhin// bdag kyang rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir// na mkha' rdo rje bdag la gsol// zhes bya bya'i tshigasu

180a4(rgyud 'grel): stan la bzhag pa'i stan nang tshangs can la 'dug tu btsog ste/ steng nas bla re bri ba dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o// de dag ma 'byor na sna tshogs pad+ma 'deb brgyad par khri'u dang stan bzhag la rang gi lha'i sbyor ba dang /

180a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas dbang bskur bar mdzad par bsams la/ slob dpon gyis rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba/ khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa// gisang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //

180b2(rgyud 'grel): khung ni ye shes te/ sems kyi brtsegs pa bskyed pa yin// phyi yi gru bzhi pa gang yin// tshad kyis mnyam nyid gyur pa yin// byams pa la sogs sems gang yin// thig bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin// chos kyi sbyor ba rjes dran
180b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ gang de rdo rje'i thig tu bshad// lta ba kun las rnam grol ba// ye shes thig tu bshad pa yin// tshul khrims tshogs kyi dam pa ni// gang yin rgyun tu bshad pa yin// dang dbang la sogs sems gang yin// ra ba lngar ni yang
180b4(rgyud 'grel): dngag byung // rnam par thar pa bzhi po ni// sgo rnams su ni yang drug bshad// yang dag spong ba bzhi po ni// rta babs rnams dang ka bar byung // dran pa nyer bzhag bzhi po ni// khyams rnams bzhi por shes par bya// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni
180b5(rgyud 'grel): de ni sgo khyud rnam bzhi yin// byang chub yan lag bdun pa yin// phreng ba me tog chun brgyan pa// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa ni// ka pa brgyad ces bya bar bshad// sgrib pa gnyis las rnam grol zhing // ting 'dzin ye shes
180b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis rtags pa// lam gyi ye shes khyad par rnams// rnga yab ces ni yang dag bshad// nyon mongs thams cad nges gcod cing // nyon mongs 'phrogs pas dra bo ste// yang dag gcod cing spong ba nyid// sel ba'i spong ba la gnas pa// /

181b5(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa nas phyir byung la ji skad du bshad pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin srog byas nas/ slar yang dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs nas/ shar sgor 'dug la mchod pa rgyu chen po byas te/ bstod pa yang

183b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas gyur pa// 'jam dpal yang dag phyag 'tshal nas// de yi sgrub thab rim bshad bya// dpal ldan gsang 'dus la brten nas// phun sum tshigs pa kun byed pa// bla mas ji lta rau bstan pa yi// ye shes zhabs

183b4(rgyud 'grel): tu gra yo ba ste// snod la shes rab thabs 'di ni// de phyir sems kyis bya bar rigs// byams dang snying rje mnyam ldan pas// sem+b+has ni byang chub bskyed byas pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rab zab pa'i// tshul la lhag par myos
183b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yid // sbyin dang khrims sogs phun sum tshogos// srid dang longs spyod la phyir phyogs// sems kyi sdug bsngal yang skyo med// lho rnams brten po byed gyur pa// chu dang cod pani rdo rje dang // bdag po ming dang slob dpon
183b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang // shes rab ye shes brtul zhugs sogs// bsod nams ye shes cher 'tshor ba'i// dpal ldan gsang 'dus dkyil 'khor du// ji ltar rigs par dbang bskur ba// bla ma yongasu mnyes pa yis// dbang bskur
184a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems brten pa// rnal 'byor spyod nus rnal 'byor pas// ri bo la sogs yid 'ong bar// gnas byas mgon pos sgrub par bya// bsam gtan sogs pa la brtson pa// mtshan mo phyed kyis lcug ma
184a2(rgyud 'grel): la// cho ga bzhin du langs byas la// snying zla ra de nyid mau 'o ldan// gdong lo sogs pa dag par bya// de nas chu bzang sman dang ni// me tog ga pur tsan+dan gyis// bsam gtan gnas ni yang dag byas// bsams pos kyang ni yid
184a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od bya// bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni// legs brten rdo rje'i skyil mo krung // de ru yang na bder gnas pra// bsam gtan rab tu bsam par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // kun tu bla mar bcas pa yi// dus gsum
184a4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pas yangs gang ba// na mkhar mngon sum bzhin bltas la// sa bon maM byung gzugs sogs bri// de bzhin rin chen phung po yis// mchod sogs rtog pa spang byas nas// rab tu 'bad par de rnams mchod// de rnams spyan
184a5(rgyud 'grel): sngar gnas byas la// pus mo gtsugs te thal sbyar nas// dmigs pa med par byas nas ni// sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya// gang zhig thog mad srid pa'i chu klung du// ma lus kun tu rtog gis bsags snyogs pa rnams
184a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje cher ldan spyan sngar de dag ni// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bshags par bgyi// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang mdzad pa// de dag kun la yang dag
184b1(rgyud 'grel): rang zhing // byang chub tu ni yongasu bsngo bar bgyi// yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrubs// snying rje dam pa mtha' yas pa yI thabs// rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yi// bde gshegs rnams la rtag tu skyabasu mchi// rtog pa
184b2(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa las nges grol zhing // sems dpa' dam pa kun gyi phun tshogs gzhi// dngos po thams cad ro gcig ngo bo nyid// dam pa'i chos la rtag par skyabasu mchi// 'ching ba rnams las yang dag grelo 'gyur zhing /
184b3(rgyud 'grel): snying rje mchog gis bskrun pa'i dpal dang ldan// rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab bzhugs pa// brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la skyabasu mchi// bsam dang rnam par smin pa dag gyur cig/ sgrib pa kun gyi bag chags yang dag
184b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byin// lhag byar mos pas rnam par brgyan pa yi// sems ni byang chub dam par bskyed// bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyi lam gcig pu// sbyin sogs rnam bcu dkar po'i yon tan tshul// rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ma
184b5(rgyud 'grel): lus ngo bo'i blos// yang dag nyid du da ni gnas par bgyi// 'jig rten mthar 'byin posam pa dang // ldog par lta ba'i sgom pa dang // tshul khrims brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin pa'i// nyes pas 'gro ba 'di bskyed pas// snying rje
184b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dmigs byas te// don dam pa ni ji lta bar// byang chub sems mchog bsgom par bya// tshigs bcid don 'di bsam bya ste// ngo bo nyid dang bral phyir stong pa ste// de phyir rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med// rtogs pa
185a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang bral phyir dngos po ni// ma lus smon pa las ni nges par grol// de ltar stong pa dang ldan par// 'gro ba 'di kun blta byas nas// ji srid sems ni brtan 'dod pas// sngags 'di nye bar brjod
185a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA prA At+ma kro ha~M/ stong nyid ro gcig gling sems dpa'// byang chub mchog tu mi bgyur ri// gnas dang gzhal yAs bdag nyid de// rlung gi sems kyis 'di ltar bya// sangs rgyas zhing du nAm
185a3(rgyud 'grel): yang ninamya dag ba yis 'tshong mi rgya// de yi sma dang por zhing dag phyi re// rang sems nyi mar bsgom par bya// de ru hU~M skyes rdo rje ni// kha gyes sngon po 'od 'bar ba// de yi dbus gnas hUM yig laMs// rdo rje phra mo rnam spro bya// 'og dang
185a4(rgyud 'grel): steng dang phyogs bzhi ru// rdo rje ra ba gur dang ni// rdo rje rang bzhin sa gzhi bya// bsrung ba'i don du bsam par bya// sdug bsngal kun 'byung shes pa dang // 'gog pa dang ni lam dang ni// zad dang mi skye chos dang ni// de bzhin rjes
185a5(rgyud 'grel): dang kun rdzob dang // sngon gyi gnas 'gro shes pa dang // ji ltar thos pa rnams rab shes// chos dbyings tha dad med pa rnams// shes pa 'di rnams su 'gyur ro// 'di ltar shes pa bcu gcig ni// legs par rdzogs pa'i
185a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu yin te/ rtsibs bcu la ni khro bo bcu// lte bar mchog ni bcu gcig pa// shar sogs phyogs ni de rnams su// go rim bzhin du rnams la// gshin rje shes rab mthar byed bsgom// pad+ma bgags ni mthar byed kyang // me
185b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su// 'dod ston stobs dang mi g.yo rnams// steng du gtsug tor rgyal por 'gyur// 'og tu gnod mdzes 'dren pa'o// lte bar rdo rje hUM madz+nyA dpal// rtag pa la sogs par yang 'gyur// rang gi lhag
185b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha yang 'di ra// rnal 'byor pa ni kha cig 'dod // b+h+yo ba lcags kyu dbyug pa dang // dbyug pa pad+ma rtse gsum dang // rdo rje ral gri 'khor dang // rdo rje rdo rje g.yas nas 'dzin// phyag g.yas thams cad ral gri ste// g.yo nAn rin chen
185b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'o// spyan g.yon rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// mi g.yo byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan gyis brgyan// rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan rdo rje ste// g.yas nyid na ni yang dag gnas// gang gi g.yas na pad+ma yod// de yi g.yon du 'khor lo'o// rdo rje hUM/
185b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyi g.yon du// zhags pa lcags kyu'i phyag 'ab ra be// u ma dang bcas bde byed ni// zhabs kyis mnan nas yang dug gnas// gzhan gyis mi thub dkar por 'gyur// pad+ma mthar byed dmar po ste// gtsug tor khA
185b5(rgyud 'grel): dog ser por 'gyur// lhag ma rdo rje 'dzin nagau po// dmar dang ser dang lus dkar rnams// g.yas pa'i gdong ni nag po mdzes// dkar dang dkar min dmar ba ni// de rnams kyi ni g.yon du bsgrags// khro bo nag po rnams kyi ni/
185b6(rgyud 'grel): dbye bas kha dog shes par bya// nas kyi myu gu dang 'dra ba// g.yon pa dmar po'i rnam pa ste// g.yas pa dkar por 'dod pa yin// bden bral dang ni rlung gi mtshams// gang zhig phyogs su gnas pa rnams// thams cad
186a1(rgyud 'grel): mi sdug thung ba ste// gdong 'jigs gsus pa chen po ste// sma ra smin ma skra ser ba// gang brgyangs bzhad par byed pa'o// stag gi pags pas gos mdzad khro// sbrul gyi rgyan ni 'dzin pa'o// mgul dang lag pa rna
186a2(rgyud 'grel): ba la// rigs ldan dung dang 'jog po rnams// dmar ser mdangs ldan nor rgyas ni// sku rigs su ni rnam par gnas// rkang pa dpung por dkar ba yi// pad+ma pad+ma chen po gnas// ka ra ko Ti dang mtha' yas dag/ ljang sngo se ral mgo la'o/
186a3(rgyud 'grel): mche bas cung zad mchu mnan te// zhal ni rnam par brgyan pa'o// zhi ba'i rgyun dang gos bzang ste// gzugs mdzes gzhan ni mtshams thung ba// sna ma stu na gyen 'greng tshogs// gzhan ni rin chen dbu brgyan no// thams cad smin ma
186a4(rgyud 'grel): khro gnyer 'khyog/ zhal ni gnyer mas mtshan pa ste// sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma la// g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag gnas// phyogs su khro ba'i rigs spro ba// sdang tshogs thams cad 'jigs byed pa// thog ma bar dang mthir
186a5(rgyud 'grel): byal ba dang skye dong 'jig pa rnam par spangs// thams nAd ye shes tsa mo lnga brten// chos kyi de nyid go 'phang gnas// 'di ni shes pa ji ltar thos// grub nas yongasu gnas pa'o// 'khor lor chos 'byung phyag rgya ni// gru gsum dkar
186a6(rgyud 'grel): po steng gnos pa// dbus gnas sna tshogs pad rdo rje// nang gi na mkha'i rang bzhin du// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od 'phror ldan// phyogs ni mtha' yas gsal blta dang // sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas bsgom// zla bar b+h+rUM ni yang
186b1(rgyud 'grel): dag 'bar// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa// ma rig la sogs yan lag dag/ sa bon bcas pa de gyur nas// rtag pa rig mar bcas la byung // byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi// rnam dag 'khor lo bsgom par bya//
186b2(rgyud 'grel): de la sangs rgyas sangs rgyas min// mnyam phyir gru bzhir gnas pa'o// de yi rnam dgu rnam bstan phyir// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams las// dran pa dag phyi shar phyogs sgo// gang phyir dran pa sngon 'gro bas// dge la rjes
186b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug par 'gyur// dge dang mi dge'i chos rnams ni// bskyed dang mi bskyed pa yi phyir// rtsom dang yongs su sbyong yin to// so sor rtog dang bya lhur le ni// 'di ni brtson 'grus rnam dag pas// des na lho yi sgo ru 'gyur// 'dun pa
186b4(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus de bzhin sems// dpyod pa zhes bya 'di dag pos// rdzu 'phrol rkang pa bzhi yin te// de bas nub phyogs sgo ru 'gyur// dang po brtson 'grus dran pa nyid// ting 'dzin shes rab dang bcas pa// dbang po lnga po de dag
186b5(rgyud 'grel): pas rang byang phyogs skor ni 'di 'gyur// rtog dang dpyod dang dga' ba dang // bde dang ting 'dzin rnams ni// bsam gtan dang po yan lag lnga// gnyis pa yan lag bzhi yin te// rtog pa dang ni dpyod pa dang // nang ni rab tu dang ba
186b6(rgyud 'grel): dang // bos mo gtan dang po'i yan lag mthas// de yis gang ni ldan gyur pa'o// btang snyoms dran pa dang 'brel ba// shes bzhin dang ni bde ba'i rten// de ni sems rtse gcig par ldan// yon lag lnga ldan gsum pa yin/
187a1(rgyud 'grel): btang snyoms dran pa yongs su dag/ bde sdug min pa'i tshor ba dang // sems rtse gcig dang ldan pas na// yan lag bzhi ldan bzhi pa yin// go rims ji bzhin bsam gtan ni// bzhi po yongasu dag
187a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// 'di dag sgro sgor gyur pa yi// rta babs gzugs kyis mdzes par byas// dpa' 'gro na mkha' mdzod du grags// dri med sang+ge rnam rol po'i// ting 'dzin 'di rnams rnam dag pa// khyams ni bskor bar gyur pa'o//
187a3(rgyud 'grel): kA ro mu khaM zhes sogs// bzod dang chos dang don sngags kyi// gzugs rnams dag cing dag pa yis// mchod bzang gis ni lag sbrel ba'i// de dag khyams rten lha mo yis// kun nas yongasu bskor ba'o// sems can 'dod
187a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs byed pas// sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// mdo dang dbyangs dang lung bstan dang // tshigs bcad ched brjod gleng gzhi dang // de lta bur byung shin tu rgyas// skyes pa'i rabs rnams sgra sgrogs pa// ston pa'i
187a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa yon lag dgu/ phyogs bcur rab tu bskor bar byed// 'di ni rlung gis bskyod pa'o// pa dan dril bu'i sgra sgrogs ldan// dran pa shes rab ting nge 'dzin// shin tu sbyangs dang dga' btang snyoms// brtson 'grus zhes
187a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di bdun pa// byang chub yan lag rnam dag pas// dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang // phreng bzang me long rnga mas mdzes// ji ltar gnas su bkod pa yis// 'di rnams kyis ni mdzes byas pa'o// stong nyid la sogs rnam pa dang //
187b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can gzugs rnams lta byed pa// zil gyis mAn mnas rab tu shes// de ni rnamya thar dang po yin// nang ni gzugs med 'du shes pas// phyi rol gzugs la star bzhin du// mthong ba zhes pa gnyis pa ste// rnam pa
187b2(rgyud 'grel): thar par yang dag brjod// sdug pa'i rnam thar lus kyis ni// gzugs dang ldan pa nyid brjod pas// mngon sum byas nas rdzogs byas te// na mkha' dong ni rnam shes dang // ci yang med pa gzhan yin te// 'du shes med min
187b3(rgyud 'grel): 'du shes med// skye mched bdun gyi dbye ba yis// 'gyog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni// brgyad par nye bar brjod pa ste// yid ni rnam par grol ba yis// rnam par thar par nges 'dod do// 'di ltar rnam par brgyad rnams kyi// go
187b4(rgyud 'grel): ri mo ji bzhin rnamo dag pas// 'khor lo rin chen mtsho skyes dang // ral gri ka ba brgyad kyis brgyan// kun tu bar chad med pa yis// rdo rje theg pa rab bskor bas// ka ba'i steng du gnas gyur pa// rdo rje phreng ba zlum pos bskor// gzugs
187b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa phyin ci log/ rag tu zhi byas bla med pa'i// tshod med pa dang yang dag sbyangs// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di// shin tu rnam dag las grub pa// chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par brgyan// mchod po rnam pa lnga yis dgyes
187b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga ji bzhin rnam par gsol// 'gro ba kun dang tha mi dang // nyes pas gang la ma gos pa// gnas 'di dag ni bcu dgu ru// sna tshogs pad+mas brgyan byas pa'o// rmongs dong rab rib gzhir gyur pa// 'dam ni rnam par skems pas na//
188a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems kyi myu gu dag/ smin pa'i don du yang 'di yin// snying rje'i rang bzhin nyid bzang po// bdun gyis yongasu brgyan pa'o// dbus kyi stan dang bdun spangs te/ phyogs dang sgro na rnam par gnas// dge
188a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang // nyon mongs gdung ba zhi ba'i phyir// shes rab bdag nyid mngon khyab pa// lhag ma nub mo byed pa yin// tshogs gnyis yang dag rdzogs 'gyur bas// grub par bstan pa'i don gyi phyir// snying rjes brlan pra
188a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag gang // bum pa gang bas 'di brgyan byas// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// de bzhin rin chen lnga yi gzugs// gzhal yas khang gi rnam pa ni// rang gi sems ni rnam dag pa'o// de dbus gdan gyi zla ba la// nyis 'gyur/
188a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs yig bcu drug ste// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis tshogs// bskyed par nus pas bsgom par bya// lugs dang mthun dang mi mthun pa'i// phreng gnyis dag ni dgod par bya// dag pa'i zla ba shel 'dra bas// 'od zer phreng ba spro bar byed/
188a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar gzhan yang bsgom bya ste// dbyangs yig bcu drug las byung ba// stong pa nyid kyi 'phangs pas na// gang phyir sems ni 'di ltar 'gyur// des na shes rab rang bzhin 'di// ri bong can du yang dag mtshan// shes rab yang ni
188a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med shes// bcu drug stong pa nyid gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor tshogs ni dag chen po// na mkha' bzhin du dri ma med// gnas ngan lem ni kun las grol// rtog pa spangs pa'i mchog yin no// nyon mongs dri ma thams cad dag
188b1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba mthong ba sngon 'gro ba// 'dir ni sangs rgyas yon tan kun// a la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas// a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e e/ o au/ aM aH/ 'di dag bcu tshogs pas ni// byung ba nges par
188b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa yin// kun tu bzang po gsal ba ru// ye shes zhabs ni nyid kyi su// dar gnas tshig bzhin du sgra// dbyangs yig bcu drug smra ba yis// ji ltar brjod pa'i dbyangs yig gis// bsil ba'i 'od zer rab bsgrub pa//
188b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams 'di ltar grub pa ni// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yino// sku ni byin gyis brlabs 'gyur ba// gang phyir 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur// d+ha da ya laM wa bsnan bya// kau sogs nyis 'gyur byas pa las// de steng ri bong can blta
188b4(rgyud 'grel): ste// dpe byad sgrub par byed pa'o// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin pas// snying rje rtsa ba'i rang bzhin grags// bsod nams tshogs ni yang dag rdzogs// yid las byung yang rnyog pa bral// 'jig rten rab grags grangs kyis
188b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba las// sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi lus// 'dir ni ka la sogs pas gsal// yang gsungs pa// snying rje chags las yang dag byung // sems can rje su 'dzin byed pa// dge ba'i chos ni yang
188b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag rdzogs// nyon mongs kun las nges gnod pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// byang chub zla ba gnyis pa'o// 'dir yang sangs rgyas ston rnams// ka sogs gzugs kyis yang dag 'jug/ gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor blam/
189a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes so// kun gzhi rnam shes gyur pa las// 'di ni zla ba gnyis su grags// me long ye shes su brjod pa// rnam pa ra dang po nyid yin no// nyon mongs can yid gyur pa las// mnyam nyid kyi ngo bo nyid// der yang
189a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM byung rdo rje ste// dmar gsal ba yi 'od can no// phung po lnga ni rnam dag pas// ye shes lnga ru bstan pa yin// steng du gnas pa de yis ni// lte bar hU~M yig zla gnyis gnas// brjod bya rjod byed las 'das te// chos nyid rab tu rtogs
189a3(rgyud 'grel): pas na// de ni rtogs par gyur pa lngas// so sor kun tu rtog par bsgom// de las de bzhin gshegs spros pas// 'gro ba kun la phan byas nas// sangs rgyas gang de 'dir bsdus pa// de ni bya ba nan tan no// byang chub spyod gang dag pa ni/
189a4(rgyud 'grel): bla med sangs rgyas ye shes so// de rnams dag ni rang yid gzugs// brtan pas rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// 'di ltar yid kyis bsgom byas nas// rang gzugs tha dad med pa'i dngos// rdo rje ji ltar bstan mthong nas// de la bdag tu nga rgyal
189a5(rgyud 'grel): byed/ de yang sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'di ni// snang ba med cing gnas med pa// ma skyes ma byas dag pa ste// rang bzhin la sogs rnam par spangs// mi chod mi phyed sreg tu med// lhag ma med pa chos kyi sku// rdo rje bdag nyid yang dag 'byung/
189a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sku ni bla na med// ces gsungs so// rang gi sems kyi 'phen pa yis// byang soms shor ba mchog yin no// spro dang bsdu ba dag la ni// brtan par byed 'dod byin gyis brlab// rdzogs sangs rgya su mnyam 'gro ba// rgyud gzhan las kyang
189b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa yin// sngags ni 'di rnams 'dir brjod pa// gang zhig sngags ni rigs pas so// de la oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+haM ka ro mi/ oM bo d+hi tsit+taM ut+pA da yA mi/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ oM pa ra badz+ra/ oM sa~M ha ra badz+ra/ At+ma ko&haM/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA/
189b2(rgyud 'grel): ga ta ta thA a haM zhos pa'ode la zla sogs yongs gyur pas// skad cig ye shes sbyor ba yis// kun tu bzang por bdag nyid ni// rgyal ba rnams bskyed rgyal ba yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin mgon// rnam thar sgo gsum gyi ni zhal// sngon
189b3(rgyud 'grel): po dkar po dmar por ldan// g.yas dang dbus dang g.yon rnamaso// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku// rdo rje ral gri nor bu pad// gnyis kyis shes rab la 'khyud pa// rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas// mi bskyod pa yis spyi bor brgyan//
189b4(rgyud 'grel): ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan phra'o// rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// zhi dang skrag pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa// phun tshogs kun byed mgon po ste// mtshan mo byed pa'i 'od byed pa// chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag pa'i// rang bzhin
189b5(rgyud 'grel): du ni bsgom par bya// 'dod chags chen po 'dul ba yi// sems can khams la kun tu ni// snod ldan la ni bltas nas ni// gsang ba 'dus pa'i don bstan phyir// dog pa'i sgyu ma'i sgra rnams kyis// lus la sangs rgyas rnams bcug/
189b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bde ba rdzogs pa yang dag grub// thams cad sangs rgyas gcig gzugs gyur// spyan dang gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// gzugasu sprul nas phyung ba rnams// de rnams rang gi rig ma la// ji lta ba bzhin yang dag gzhug de bzhin
190a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i sangs rgyas rnams// bcug ste zhu bar gyur pa rnams// lha mo'i pad+mar spro byas la// rdo rje can gyis gnas par blta// de dag yongasu gyur pa sems// rten dang rten bcas dkyil 'khor te/ mi
190a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod gtso bo bsgom byas la// skye bo'i tshogs ni yang dag gzhug/ rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// de bzhin rdo rje can gyis gzhugs// byang chub sems su zhu ldan pas// de yis skye bo dbang bskur bya// de nas bya
190a3(rgyud 'grel): chu'i sems kyis ni// 'gro la 'od zer reg gyur pas// ston pa'i byin gyis brlabs dbang gis// yang dag byang chub bde thob pa// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug ste// sa snying la sogs ngo bo nyid// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo
190a4(rgyud 'grel): can gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan ldan// de phyir de rnams mnyam par ldan// der gnas sangs rgyas mkhas pa yis// sems kyis mang po gdon por bya// skrag ma'i sa bon ji lta bas// dam pa'i mig dang rna ba sna// /
190a5(rgyud 'grel): lce dang lus dang yid rnams kyis// yongasu dag po'i rang bzhin ni// de ni ye shes bzang shar ba// sa snying la sogs drug po yi// sa bon la sogs rim bzhin yin// k+ShiM dzAM khAM gaM de bzhin du// skaM saM zhes pa yi ge'i rim
190a6(rgyud 'grel): dzaHhUM baM hoHde bzhin du// khaM raM sa bon rim 'di rnams gzugs sogs rdo rje drug rnams kyi// gzugs sogs skye mched bdag nyid do// lAM mAM pAM tAM 'di zhes bya// sa bon sa bon rig pas brjod// spyan ma la sogs bzhi po na
190b1(rgyud 'grel): sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang ni rnam shes kyang // rtag tu rnam par dag grub pa'i// rtag pa la sogs par gsal lo// b+h+rUM aM d+h+waM khaM hUM sa bon// 'di rnams go rim
190b2(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin 'gyur// 'di ltar thams cad phyung nas ni// lhag pa'i lha rnams par bya// de la lhag pa'i lha rnams ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo can// sngon bzhin rnal 'byor pas bskul bas// rang gi kha ru gzhug par
190b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ de ni byang chub sems byas la// rdo rje nas ni son par blta// rig pa'i pad+ma'i nang song ba// kha dog gzugs su gyur pa'o// shes rab thabs kyi chags chen gyi// rang bzhini phyir na 'od gsal ba'o// de ru oM AH
190b4(rgyud 'grel): bobasam mo hoHdmar gnyis kyi dbus bcug pa// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi// me 'bar bas ni zhu bar byas// ljid kyi tshogs su zhu bar byas// de ni 'bar byas yab yum yang // zla ba dang 'dra zhu ba'i gzugs// zla ba'i
190b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i lAm bzhin gnas// dogs med rang yid kyis bltas la// byams pa snying rje'i rgyu mthun dang // dgo' dang btang snyoms rang bzhin gyi// mA ma kI dang spyan mar grags// gos dkar
190b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma mnyam pa ru// mi dmigs pa yi sbyor ba yis// de yi 'od zer las byung ba// 'di rnams rang gi gnas zhugs pas// bskul bas rtsol ba bsgom par bya// sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// /
191a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la skyabasu gsol// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad
191a2(rgyud 'grel): du gsol// rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rab tu phan par gzigs// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// 'dod chags dam tshig
191a3(rgyud 'grel): chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba// 'jig rten dag gi don dang dgos pa mdzad la rab tu brtson// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis
191a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhed na// dga' ba'i spyod pa kum tu bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid thugs brtse ba// mgon po
191a5(rgyud 'grel): gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter 'gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod// 'di rnams kyis ni bskul ba'i sems// zhu ba'i gzugasu bsgom par bya// sems can don nyams
191a6(rgyud 'grel): mthong bas na// bdag nyid phun sum tshogs nyams pa 'dra// sgyu ma lta bur mos pa yis// chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya// yongasu gyur nas sangs rgyas spros// zhu ba'i yi ge maM du bsgom// de yongs gyur nas
191b1(rgyud 'grel): ral gri ste// sa bon maM 'bar yu bar ni// bdag gi rang bzhin de ltar bsgom// sems brtan de nyid rig pas so// de las byung ba'i spangs rgyas tshogs// 'gro la phan par blta bar bya// slar yang de ru zhugs gyur nas//
191b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bsgom par bya// spro bya rgyan dang cod pan can// gur gum rlon pa'i 'od ldan pa// ral gri mnga' dang chu skyes s+ho// gzhu yis mtshan pa bzhi pa~M ga/ rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pa// shes rab 'di zhal
191b3(rgyud 'grel): myang bas 'gying // zla bar rdo rje skyil mosau gonas// na bza' dam pas rgyan gyis mdzes// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag no// sngo dkar sgeg pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas tshogs ni ma lus spro// srid gsum ma ni rab tu
191b4(rgyud 'grel): bo sgrubs// srid pa sdug bsngal dbang song ba// nyon mongs kun skyes bsal bar mdzad// bdag nyid bde ba dang mnyam pas// sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par spangs// rab tu rtogs pa'i snod rung ba// sems can kun gyi don byas
191b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ snying rje tshigs med ngo bo yis// kun rdzob tu ni thabs bstan to// mya ngan 'das kyang tshul bzhin du// yang dag ma yin sgro 'dogs srid// so so'i skye bor bden 'gyur ba'o// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed// gang zhig
191b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni mos byed pa// chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab pa'o// rnam par byang la zhugs pa yi// spang bar bya phyir 'dir brjod do// oM d+har+m+ma b+hU tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M/ chung ngu'i gnyen po'i yan lag nyid// chung ngu'i rgyu mthun 'bras bzang po//
192a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas mig sogs byin brlabs pa// thams cad mkhyen pa 'i phyir bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// k+ShiM yig da/ rA dang 'kho las// phyug dang zhal dang mny-id// rnam par sna ts+tsha/
192a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin can// mig tu sa yi snying por grag so// phyag na rdo rje rna bar ston// zla ba ra dzA yig rdo rje las// byung ba mi bskyod pa 'dra'i gzugs// zla bar khaM dang rin chen skyes// sna yi ning du mkha' snying po// rin chen 'ab+h+ring lhun dang 'dra bar//
192a3(rgyud 'grel): dog mtshan ma zhal rnam so// sgrol mI bdag por yong dag gnas// gaM dang mtsho skyes las byung ba// 'jig rten mgron po lce la'o// kha dog la sogs dpag medo 'dra// mtshan mo byed bzang gzugs te gnas// yi ge kaM mchog ral gri
192a4(rgyud 'grel): las// zhal sogs don yod dang 'dra bar// mgo bor sgrib pa rnam sel gtso// 'od dkar gdan la saM rdo rje// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs 'dra ba// snying gar kun tu bzang por grags// byang chub sems dpar bsgom par bya// thams cad rdo rje
192a5(rgyud 'grel): lamo krung // rab 'phro rin chen cod pan can// shes rab dam pas 'khyud zhi ba// zla bzang la brten 'od gsal ba// rang gi kha dog sa bon bsgrub// spro zhing bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// rang rang skye mched bdag nyid gzugs// rang rang rnam
192a6(rgyud 'grel): por yang dag gnas// de bzhin mtshan rang sa bon las// rang gi gdan la gnas pa'i gzugs// gzugs sogs gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// sa sogs spyan la sogs pa rnams// rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// gzigs
192b1(rgyud 'grel): sngogs phung po lnga po rnams// bsgom bya nges par mos pa yis// sems ni brtan pa nyid kyis ni// 'di dag nye ba'i sgrub pa dang // rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bur byed// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yi// sku yi don du 'di bsgom bya/
192b2(rgyud 'grel): snying zlar gnas pa'i hUM yig las// yang dag byung ba'i rdor dbus su// de bzhin hUM skyes rdo rje ni// phra mo bsgom bya hUM dang btsas// de yi sangs rgyas 'od zer gyis// sems can don yod yongasau gyur nas// thugs kyi rdo rje dbang phyug bsgom//
192b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra mchog/ thugs rdor rang snying sa bon gyis// 'od zer las sbrul gzugs rnams kyis// thugs kyi rdo rjes gang khyab pa// phyogs gnas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyus// snying gu'i sa bon 'od zer gyis// kun tu yang
192b4(rgyud 'grel): dag sprul pa'o// gzugs sogs rdo rjer gyur pa yis// de rig nang zhugs bdag nyid kyis// mchod byas de rnams thugs rdo rje/ byin gyis brlab phyir gsol ba gdab// tshigs bcad 'di gnyis rtogs byas la// thams cad bde byed
192b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nasu// rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsumo bsgo
192b6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ dang bdag byin gyis brlabs na su// rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rnams kyi// yon tan gyis ni mnyam gyur pa// de yi byin gyis rlabs pa'i thugs// sems su brtan pAr blta// rdzogs sangs
193a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi thugs rdo rje'i// bdag po dang mnyam blta bar bya// thugs kyi sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs// rdo rje'i tshigs brjod bstan pa yin// dpal ldan gsang 'dus rdzogs byang chub/ sgrub par 'dod pa'i sems
193a2(rgyud 'grel): lA ni// byang chub mngon du byed 'dod pas// btang snyoms lam la zhugs gyur pa// dkar dang dkar mi ni ljang ser dang // dmar po ljang sngon 'od 'dra ba// oM hUM swA dang AHhA ra bcas// go rim 'dir ni byin gyis brlab// snying min sku yi
193a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjer grags// lte ming rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// gsang min rin chen 'byung ldan no// gsang bar 'dod chags rdo rje'o// rla gnas rkang pa la gtugs pa// don yod bltas te yi ge des// lha mo'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// de la de rnams rtag
193a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ hUM skyes pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// de ni dmar po 'od phreng po// gsang yin rang gi gsang bar yang // rdo rjer gyur par rnam par bsam// yi ge AHdAng oM las byung // de dag ze 'bru nor bu dang // sangs rgyas gzugs ni dum ru
193a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag kyang bsgom par bya ba'o// 'dod chags chags pa'i spyan gyis blta// de nas de dang bde 'dod pas// rgyal ba'i rjes chags bya ba yi// lugs yin zhes ni byas pa'i sems// mnyam pa'i ye shes sbyor yis// 'od zer
193a6(rgyud 'grel): zhags pas bkug nas ni// sngags pas dga' ba brtsam par bya// rang 'dra'i nang du lhung gyur pas// 'dod chags nyes pa spangs nas ni// skal bzangs ma dang rjes chags bya// sangs rgyas mchod phyir ngo rgyal bya// sngags
193b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di nye bar brjod par bya// oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ ting nge 'dzin rang don bsgom pa'o// 'di ni dang po'i sbyor ba'o// de'i phyir dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/ gzhan gyi don du bsgom par bya// ye shes sems
193b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i snying zla yi// yi ge maM gyi 'od zer gyis// sangs rgyas tshogs las gsol btab nas// rang gi sa bon nang gzhug bya// rang rig pad+ma'i khong su ni// rdo rje nas ni gdon par bya// byang chub sems ni zhu gyur rnams// r-ing+gi 'od ni 'bar ba
193b3(rgyud 'grel): las// de dag gyur pa sa bon te// rang gi 'od zer 'bar ba las// de gyur rang gi sa bon dgod// rang gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rten dang brten pa rnam par gsal// gcig nyung nyi shu'i lha rnamaso// de ru brtan par byas nas ni// rjes
193b4(rgyud 'grel): gnang thob bya rigs bdug las// cho ga bzhin du 'khor lo gdon// sgrub pa po yis sngags brjod pas// bden min sgro 'dogs las byung ba// zhe sdang rgyun ni dag pa yis// ma 'dres in+d+ra nI la'i 'od// phyag mtshan rdo rje sems dang
193b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs// rnam dag ye shes las grub pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las// cung zad 'gro ba'i nyams tshul ldan// sangs rgyas stong ni spro byed pa// dmar dang gnag dang dkar po'i gzugs// g.yon dang dbus dang g.yas rnamaso//
193b6(rgyud 'grel): badz+rI d+h+r-ikaM gis yang dag bskul// mi bskyod gtso bo gdon par bya// phyogs kyi sems can zhe sdang rigs// zhe sdang rdo rje'i rang bzhin byas// yid kyis de ltar rig byas nas// bsdus nas bdag la bstim par bya// gzugs phung kun gzhi/
194a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par shes// gti mug lus ni rnam dag pa// me long ye shes yang dag pa// 'khor lo ral gri nor bu padad+ma// rdo rje 'dzin chen rnam pa yi// zhal dang kha dog rjesu byed// slar yang yid kyis gdon par bya//
194a2(rgyud 'grel): dzi na dzika gis rtag pa'o// 'gro ba'i gti mug bcom nas ni// ma lus de yi ngo bor byas// de bsdus nas ni blo ldan gyis// mdun du ri bong dkyil 'khor dgod// nga rgyal nyon mongs can yod tshor// phung po rnam par dag gyur pa// mnyaM
194a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid ye shes yang dag ldan// 'jam pa'i rdo rje lnga 'u'i zhal// rat+na d+h+r-ika gis rin cheni dbang // dzam+b+hi chu bo'i dang mtshungs 'od // bdag nyid chen po gdon par bya// rin chen ral gri 'khor lo padad+ma// de yis ma lus 'jig rten 'di//
194a4(rgyud 'grel): gzigs nas bdag dang mnyam par mdzad// yang dag bsdus nas lho phyogs mAr// de ni nyi mA ra dgod par bya// 'du shes phung po dag 'dod chags// rnam rtog shes pa dag gyur pa// so sor yang dag rtog par bya// oM sar+b+ba ta/
194a5(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ zhes pa ni sngagaso// de stong nu ma'i dkyil du ni// mtshan ma'i dkyil du gsol gdab med// dam tshig sems dpa' dang 'dra ba// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya// lkog mar oM skyes chu
194a6(rgyud 'grel): skyes las// aHla sa byung ba'i pad+ma ni// phra mo sa bon bcas pa bsgom// gsung gi rdo rje bsam par bya// spyan ras gzigs de dang 'dra bsgom// mkha' gnas gsung gi rdo rje bsnams// yang dag mchod bya gsol ba gdob// de yi
194b1(rgyud 'grel): tshigs bcud gnyis brjod do// chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// dang bdag byin gyis brlabs nasu// rdo rje gsung gi mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
194b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nasu// rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol// dbyangs kyi yan lag kun phun tshogs// rang gi ngag ni mos par bya// sangs rgyas gsung dang mnyam
194b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya// oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta bAka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ka haM/ spyi bor bzlas nas oM las ni// 'byung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// oM dang 'khor lo pra las byung // sa snying dang 'dra ste
194b4(rgyud 'grel): bltas nas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs gnas la// tshigs bcad gnyis kyis sku rdor tshigaso// byin gyis brlab phyir gsol po gdab// dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag
194b5(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs na su// rdo rje skus ni mdzod du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs gan su// rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol// byin gyis brlab
194b6(rgyud 'grel): popor sku bltas la// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bar// dpe byad bzang po phun tshogs pa// mnyam par bya phyir brjod par bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ sa snying la sogs sku mthar thug/ migo la
195a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa nam drag pa// 'di ltar mdor bsdus shes par+ya d+ha// byug rgyu bzhi yis rgyus bat+tA b+hA pa'o// rlung ngu'i sgrub pa'i yan lag dang // rgyung ngu'i skyes bu'i byed 'dus// d+hI wA hU~Ms rgyal dbang bsrung ga/
195a2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ de bzhin 'dir ni dran par bya// ye shes sems dpe'i thugs 'od kyis// rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas bsnol nus ni// 'od zer las byung rig ma rnams// bArar+ya mid khyub po ga rnams kyus// pad+ma'i phyug ni nusa~M pa yi swA// rin chen
195a3(rgyud 'grel): bum pa yid 'ong ba// rang lus rnam dag kha dog bzang // byang chub sems kyis rab gang bas// gzugs la sogs pa'i rdo rjes kyang // mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba yis// bdag nyid 'khor lor bsgyur bzhin du// de nyid rig pas
195a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bya// spyi bor mi bskyed rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'tshod par 'gyur ba'i phyag sogs ldan// byang chub sems ni dam pa'i chu// yongasu gyur pas bsgom par bya// ye shes chen po'i mthur shes bya// chung ngu'i sgrub pa chen po dang /
195a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu yang ni dro myed ni// chung ngu'i ngo bor rab tu bsgrags// rgyu mthun rgyu dang 'dra ba ste// rnam par smin pa lhag 'bras bu// gang gi stobs las gang skyes pa// 'bras bu de ni skyes bur 'dod// dri modo bral ba'i 'bras bu ste// gang
195a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir chos kun bdag po'o// ma lus sems can phun tshogs don// sna tshogs dri ma 'khru bas so// de bzhin shes rab mdun bltas la// rang snying bdog nyid mnyam byas pa// de ni lngar bzhin bsgoms nas ni// mig la
195b1(rgyud 'grel): srogs pa sbyang ba'o// slar yang 'di yi bye brag ni// rnam pa gzhan dag brjod par bya// sku sogs byin gyis brlab pa la// tshigs bcad brjod pa spangs pa'o// de ni 'bring gi bsnyen sogs dang // ldan par nye bar brtag par bya// thab
195b2(rgyud 'grel): ni ye shes lnga yin kyang // shes rab chags pas dag gyur te// pad+ma ral gri nor 'khor lo// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal drag ni// 'jam pa'i cha byad dang 'dra'o// snang ba mtha' yas shin tu dam ra// A ro lika gis gdon par bya/
195b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod bya rjod byed las 'das pI// chos nyid rab tu ston byed pas// 'dod chags sems can phyag byas nas// bzlog pa las ni yang dag byung // 'dod chags chen po la gnas pa// brtul zhugs can gyi yang dag bzung // rgyab tu pad+mo nyid dkyi
195b4(rgyud 'grel): du// de byon gnas par yang dag blta// phrag dog la zhugs rnam par shes// 'du byed phung po dag pa yi// gcig tu ljang gu mtha' yas 'od// ral gri 'khor lo nor bu pad// pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika gis don yod grags// bya ba nan tan bden
195b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i la mo// sems can kun don mdzad pa'o// nam mkha' khyab par spro bar bya// phrag dog gtso bo'i phrag dog la// bzlog pas rim gyis brtul nas ni// bya nan ye shes dang ldan par// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin byas nas nI// bsdus nas
195b6(rgyud 'grel): byang gi phyogasu ni// mtsho skyes nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// slar yang bzhugs par bsgom par bya// rtse gcig yid kyis gsal bar bsgom// kun kyang dam pa'i shes rab 'khyud// legs brgyan rtswa phyag gnyis kyis// rdo rje skyil mo krung
196a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom bya// ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'o// sa dang snying po thabs dang ni// stong pa nyid sgo'i rang bzhin can// rtag pa'i gzugs kyi spyan ma ni// mo ha ra ti zhes pas gdon// sems can don la brtson
196a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // snying rje stong pa nyid kyi sgo// rang gi nyes spong bsam gtan dang // yang dag pa yi las dang ni// myur bar bde ba'i byang chub dang // ma lus thabs ni gsum dag dang // 'gro ba ring du song ba las// ji lta'i stobs kyis bzhag byas
196a3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ nyes dang 'jigs pa kun nyan la// phan phyir de ni yang dag gnas// bsdus nas yid kyis blta byas te// me ru zhi ba sgrub byed ma'o// byams dang smon lam yang dag ldan// chu khams mtshan ma med pa yi// rnam dag lha mo mA ma
196a4(rgyud 'grel): kI/ mi bskyod pa rang 'od dang mtshungs pa// dwe Sha r-i ti zhes bskul nas// kun nas 'od zer mi mnyam dang // tshogs ni gsog par rtsom pa dang // sems can don la rjes 'brel dang // sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag dang // 'dir ni smon lam
196a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum dgo dang // mi g.yo ba la des bzhugs nas// byams sogs dam pa la gzhug pas// 'gro ba kun gyi don byas te// 'gro ba de de 'od 'bar byas// bsdus nas bden bral du bkod pa// yang dag 'jigs pa 'joms byed ma'o//
196a6(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis pha rol phyin dang me// dga' ba dang ni smon pa yod// dag pa'i gos dkar mo gdon bya// 'od dpag med pa'i btsun mor mtshungs// rA ga ra tau zhes bskul nas// sgeg pa'i nyams dang dam pa'i dga'// dga' ba la sogs
196b1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan dang // rang las nyon mongs bdud sogs las// rnam par bzlog la dgod pa ste// de yis 'gro la phan par byas// 'dir ni stobs ni rnam gsum dang // legs pa'i blo gros la bzhag pa// ji ltar byas nas yang dag 'ongs//
196b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od mdzes 'khrigs pa'i phreng ba can// rlung du rgyas pa 'phel mdzad ma// rnal 'byor pa yis bzhugs par bsgom// bau ting snyoms ye shes pha rol phyin// rlung dang rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// rnam dag sgrol ma gdon par bya// gtso ma'i
196b3(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi 'od dang ldan// badz+ra re ti zhes sngags kyis// rin chen dbang gis zhal mdzes ma// 'gro ba'i bya kun rang gi ni// btang snyoms yon tan sogs kyis mdzad// mi rtog pa dang rnam rtog dag/ mnyam par rab tu rtogs pa dang // sems
196b4(rgyud 'grel): can don thabs phun sum tshogs// lkog tu gyur pa'i rjes 'jug la// 'gro ba thams cad nges par sbyor// ye shes pha rol phyin gsum dang // chos kyi sprin gyi rang bzhin gyis// sa la yang dag gzhug par bya// de nas sna tshogs ston
196b5(rgyud 'grel): rten dadu bsgoms nas sbyor bas bsdu byas te// dbang ldan du ni lha mo de// dbang gi lus ni sgrub byed bzhugs// thams cad rin tshon cod pan mtshan// lang tsho sar pas 'gying bag can// rdo rje skyil krung rnal 'byor ldan// zla mdzes gdan dang
196b6(rgyud 'grel): da yi 'od// bdag 'dra'i thabs la yang dag 'khyud// mdzes ma dga' bar bsgom par bya// phyogs kyi 'gro ba'i don byas nas// ji lta ji ltar da ltar byung // 'khor lo ut+pal dmar po pod// ut+pal sor po dang 'dra ba// phyag mtshan
197a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams gtso bor 'gyur// lhag ma rang gi bdag por mtshungs// ser sna'i gnyen por gyur yis// spyan ma gnyis pa nyid yin te// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dag pa// 'di ltar gzugs kyi rdo rje gdon// chos dang zang
197a2(rgyud 'grel): zing mi 'jigs grags// ji ltar nus pas sbyin pa la// ser sna'i dri ma las grol phyir// 'gro ba ma lus dgod par bya// rab ni sngon song dga' ba'i sar// 'gro ba'i dam pa bzhog nas ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams kyi// me yi mtshams
197a3(rgyud 'grel): su bzhag par bya// rnam dag tshul khrims las grub pa// mI ma kI dang mtshungs po de// sgra rdo rje grags gdon par bya// ngan song gis na 'jigs skrag byed pa// sdom dang shin tu sems can don// dam chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang // 'dir
197a4(rgyud 'grel): ni tshul khrims rnam gsum la// tshul khrims 'chal la zhugs pa dag/ snod ni ji ltar bzhag par bya// de bzhin dri med sa la bzhag/ slar ni ji ltar gshegs bltas la// bden bral du ni yid 'ong ma'o// de bzhin bzod pa rnam dag
197a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ rin cheni dbang phyug shes rab mtshungs// sems can kun la phan ldan pa// dri yi rdo rje yang dag gdon// chos la dmigs pa phun sum tshigs dang // sems can sdug bsngal lhag gnas dang // gzhan gyis gnod pa la
197a6(rgyud 'grel): bzod la// 'gro ba ma lus bkod byas te// des ni 'od byed sa la ni// rtag tu brten par byed pa'o// rlung du mdzes pa'i gzugs can te// byon nas gnas par blta bar bya// brtson 'grus phun tshogs rnam dag pa// gos dkar mo
197b1(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra ba gzhan// slar yang 'od dpag med 'dzin ma// ro yi rdo rje yang dag 'byung // go cha bzhin dang rab sbyor dang // yongs su brtan par gyur pa yi// 'dir yang brtson 'grus rnam gsum dang // sems can 'od 'phro la 'god//
197b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bdud rtsi tshom byed pas// 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed// de byon nas ni dbang ldan du// yang dag gnas par mkhas pas bsgom// bsam gtan rnam dag yang dag grub// don yod rang 'od rjes byed ma// 'jig rten rnam
197b3(rgyud 'grel): nga zhi ba'i phyir// reg bya rdo rje yang dag gdon// mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa dang // nyes pa sel bar byed pa dang // khyab bdag dam pa'i bsam gtan la// skye bo ma lus nges sbyar te// kun kyang sbrang ka'i sa la ni// brtan par yang dag
197b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar byas te// shor gyi sgro yi byed du ni// byon nas yang dag gnas par bsgom// shes rab pha rol phyin rnam dag/ rang bzhin zhi ba'i gzugs can ma// kun tu bzang po'i rig mo 'dra// de nas chos dbyings rdo rje gdon// sbyar bya thos
197b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bsam pa dang // bsgom po la yang bye brag tu// gti mug mun pa'i skye bo kun// mngon du gyur la brtan par byas// shar sgo'i lho yi tsha la ni// dam pa'i lam mchog gsal byed ma// mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho ni// blo dang ldan
197b6(rgyud 'grel): pas gnas par bsgom// thams cad 'di la shes byas te// thabs dang rgyan dang cod pan dag/ 'di rnams thams cad kyi yang ni// rtsa ba'i mtshan ma'i khyad par ni// mdzes pa'i me long pi bang can// dri yis rab tu gang du
198a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// ye shes bdud rtsis gang ba yi// ro yis snod ni shin tu mdzes// sna tshogs kha dog gos dang ni// chos 'byung gi ni phyag rgya yang // phyag ni g.yas pa nyid kyis ni// phyag rgya mchog ni yin phyir 'dzin// sku
198a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// rigs kyi rim pas dgod par bya// gung phyir 'di skad le'u ni// bcwo brgyad pa las yang gsungs pa// kun kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// dkyil 'khor du ni dgod pa'i phyir// de rnams gzhan du thos gyur
198a3(rgyud 'grel): pas// de rnams 'byin pa yig gsum 'dod// ma dang phung po 'jig tshogs lha// shes bya'i sgrib pa zad ces bya// dad pa'i rang bzhin yang dag grub// khro bo'i tshogs ni yang dag smos// gdul dka' 'dul la rab brtson pa// thams cad
198a4(rgyud 'grel): du ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ya mAn+ta kr-i ta zhes pas khro// gshin rje 'joms byed spro bar bya// rang gi yon tan l-i bkod nas// rnam pa man na rim pa bsgoms pa las// de ni shar phyogs skor gnas pasam// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbu su'o//
198a5(rgyud 'grel): le lo nyon mongs bdud dang ni// mthar 'jig lta ba mi mthun phyogs// rnam dgra brtson 'grus yang dag 'byung // sems can kun la phan don du// ma lus sdang ba'i tshogs dag ni// gdul ba'i don du yang dag brtson// bskal pa 'bar
198a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i me dang mtshungs// de yi 'od zer na mkha' khyab// lha dang lha min spyi bo yi// rin po che yis zhabs gnyis brgyan// pra dz+nyA na ta kr-ita zhes pas khro// shes rab mthar byed zhes pas gdon// rang gi brtson 'grus sogs ldan par//
198b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba 'dir byas byon gyur pa// lho yi sgo ru bsgom par bya// mtsho skyes nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// 'chi bdag rjes ngas log par lta// skye ba'i sgrib pa mi mthun phyogs// rnam dag dran pa las skyes pa// pad+ma na ta kr-Ita kyis khyab bdag/
198b2(rgyud 'grel): gdon bya phyogs su sems can doni// byas pas dran sogs mcho go gyur pas// byon nas nub phyogs sgo ru ni// nyi dkyil yang dag gnas pa bsgom// rnam g.yong lta ba mchog tu 'dzin// lha yi bdud dang lus sgrib dag/ rnam par
198b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yeng l-i rab gtum gzugs// ting 'dzin dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi// big+h+nA na ta kr-i tau zhes pas // bgegs 'joms pa ni gdon par bya// de nas 'gro ba'i bya bas byas// mi mthun phyogs zad las de grub// de ni byin nas yang dag
198b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas// byang gi sgo yi nyi ma la'o// bgegs kyi tshogs ni ma lus pa// kun tu 'joms par byed pa'o// 'di dag zhal mdog mtshon cha rnams// bsrung ba'i 'khor lor brjod po yin// de yi phyir na 'phral du ni// bsgom bya de rnam
198b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ma brjod// dgug pa dang ni gzhug pa dang // bcing ba dang ni mnyes pa yang // nyams pa med pa'i bya ba dag/ 'di rnams bye blag shes par bya// thams cad gdan la skyil krung ni// bcas pas yang dag gnas pa rnams// /
198b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bdag po la mngon phyogs// byang chub sems dpa' 'dir mi 'dod// gzhan dag sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // khro bo rnams ni g.yon brkyang gis// bye brag tu ni 'dir gan so// 'di ltar thams cad du grub pa//
199a1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dkyil 'khor bltas nas ni// ye shes sems dpa'i snying 'od kyis// ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug par bya// bgegs ni mthar byed la stsogs smras// ba glegs bskrad yang dgu bsgrangs
199a2(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// mchod yon dbul bya rang sngags kyis// dam pa'i tsan+dan la stsogs pa'i// dgug pa la sogs las rnams ni// man drag gis ni rig por bya// gshin rje mtha ro byed sogs khro bos// ji ltar slar yang rim bzhin du'o//
199a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni chen po'i rgyu mthun gyi// yang dag 'bras skyes dam pa dang // chen po'i bsnyen par shes par bya// bsgom pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi// so sor dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi// mig sogs byin gyis brlabs pas na// chen po'i rnam
199a4(rgyud 'grel): smin 'bras don dang // chen po'i nye bar bsgrub po'o// thugs sogs byin gyis brlabs pa las// chen po yi ni sgrub pa dang // chen po de las grub gyur pa// 'bras bu'ang bskyes bu byed pa'o// phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thob pa// /
199a5(rgyud 'grel): chen por son par gyur pa ste// 'dir yang sgrub pa chen po ste// de yang dri med 'bras bur grags// sangs rgyas rnams la rdo rje sems// mA mak+Shi dang sgra rdor dag/ phyag na rdo rje khro rnams ltos// pad+ma gshin gshed ma gtogs pa'i//
199a6(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor mi bskyod don gyiso// de la'ang rdo rje 'dzin chen gnas// thugs gsung sku rdo rje rnams kyis// mi bskyod dpag med rtag pa rnams// kha cig rdo rje 'dzin par smra// rnam par ma spros rang bzhin la// ye shes lnga gcig rang bzhi
199b1(rgyud 'grel): pasaH/ sangs rgyas lnga ru bsgrags pa yI// sa yi snying po gshin rje gshed// spyan dang gzugs kyi rdo rje yi// spyi bor rtag pa rin chen dbang // dri yi rdo rje mkha' snying la'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug pad mthar byed// gos dkar ro yi rdo rje
199b2(rgyud 'grel): yi/ spyi bor 'od dpag med par 'gyur// gtsug tu nor bu bzhin du gsal// sgrolo ma sgrib pa rnam sel dang // re gau bya'i rdo rje cod pan yang // dbang bskur go 'phang thob gyur nas// 'dren pa don yod grub pa bzhugs// kun tu bzang po
199b3(rgyud 'grel): chos dbyings kyi// spyi bor yang ni gsal gyur pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o// gang gis gang la dbang bskur 'dir// do yi de ni bdag por 'dod// dbang gi go 'phang gnas gyur pa// spyi bor rang gi bdag por mnan// de rnams dkyil
199b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'dir mi bsgom// lhag ma nang bdag dkyil 'khor min// phyag rgya bzhi yis mtshan pa dang // rigs kyi bdag po dbang bskur min// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin min// gang rnams zhal gsum phyags drug min// gang gi gang la
199b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu ru// 'gro ba'i don ni byed pa min// dbang bskur gyi ni rjes thogs la// blo dang ldan pas mchod par byas// tshogs gnyis po ni 'phel phyir dang // yid ni bde ba skyes pa'i phyir// ye shes snying go'i sa bon gyis// 'od kyis zang
199b6(rgyud 'grel): kun nas bkug/ de la gzugs la sogs pa'i yul// rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya// de nas zhu bar gyur pa sems la// rdo rje lam nas rnam par 'byung // lha mo'i pad+mor blta bar bya// de ni ba spu'i bu// las// 'od zer gzugs
200a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi de rnams dbyung // de rnams 'od zer sgo dbyung ba// rgyun ni thams cad 'dzin pa rnams// rtog pa las ni grol 'gyur bas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bde rgyu yis// sgyu ma la sogs yang dgu blta// 'jig rten lta la
200a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa rnams// na mkhar ma lus sprul byas la// mchod pa 'dzin pas brel ba'i phyag/ gzugs rdo rje sogs lha ma'i tshogs// na mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pas// kun nas de las byung gyur pa// lha rdzas spos nI yid 'ong dang // sna
200a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs phyi yi me tog sogs// rang gi bde bor gshegs kyang mchod// mchod pa'i bdag nyid mnyan son par// mchod pa nyid du sems kyis bsam// mi brtan pa ni rab zhi nyid// sngags 'dri brjod par bya'o// oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta pU dza~M
200a4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra swa b+ho ba At+ma ko&haM/ thams cad sgra brnyan dang mnyam par// sgra yi tshogs ni nges bsams te// chos rnams rang las dbyer med pas// 'dod pa'i lha yi bstod par bya// mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings nA mkhas chen po
200a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsu ma mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// rdo rje dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che// rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po// rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen rgyal po
200a6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu zab// rdo rje na mkha' dri med mkha'// rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che// mi rtog na mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal
200b1(rgyud 'grel): bstod// don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod// na mkha'i phyogs gnas zla ba la// gnas pa'i hUM skyes bsgom bya ste// da ni
200b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje hUM bcas so// de ye 'og tu 'di bsam bya// dung mdog gzhu dbyibs rgyal mtshan ldan// yaM skyes rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro// de dbus raM skyes dmar po ni// zur gsum mau yi dkyil 'khor ro// de steng a las byung ba yaM// pad+ma'i snod
200b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbus su ni// bi mu ra sU dang bcas pa// gau ku dA ha dang lnga'o// sangs rgyas sa bon bum sogs kyi// gau ri ma ji bzhin byin gyis brlab// de ru rdo rje dbyab par bya'o// zhu gyur 'od zer rnams kyis ni// de nas thams cad zhu byas te// me ni rab tu
200b4(rgyud 'grel): gsal bas so// yi ge oM ni de ru dgod// ston zla'i 'od zer phung po 'dra// de 'od kyis bkug sangs rgyas kyis// bdud rtsi ma lus nang du gzhug/ blo dang ldan pas bdud rtsi bzhin// de ni 'od zer gyis gang lnga// oM AHhUM zhes bya ba yi// /
200b5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gsum gyis byin brlab// rang gi snying gar 'khor lho ni// dpa' bo'i blo yis bsgom par bya// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi// lce la rdo rje 'bar ba ste// yang dag hUM hUM nas 'bras skyes// rtse lnga dkar po bsgom par bya// rang bzhin
200b6(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor bsams nas ni// de bzhin gshegs rnams tshim par bya// rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// blo dang ldan pas 'di bsam mo// lce yi rdo rje sbu gu yis// blo dang ldan pas bkug par bya// bdag dang dkyil 'khor pa
201a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang // ye shes bdud rtsi chu de ye tshim// dkyil 'khor 'byin pa sngon 'gro ba'i// bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga ni// 'di ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi/ ting nge 'dzin tu yongs gnas// rang sems dbang du
201a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir// thig le rnal 'byor la sogs bsgom// ji ltar rig par bsgom bya ste// las kyi rgyal mchog sgrub pa la'o// gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo yis// phyi rol dngos po yid ma yin// de phyir de yi 'dzin pa med// rnam par shes kyang
201a3(rgyud 'grel): yod mo yin// de phyir 'di dag rang yid dngos// bag chags kyis bkrus rmi lam bzhin// 'gro ba ji ltar ji ltar min// 'di dag rab tu rtogs par bya// 'di ltar spyad byas rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes snying ga'i sa bon rnams// spros
201a4(rgyud 'grel): pas 'gro ba ma lus pa// des ni rdzogs sangs rgyas su byas// slar yang yid kyis bkug nas ni// rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya// tsa na ka gnas dbang gyur lto// rang sngags thig lo'i gzugs can ni// de yi nang song blta bar bya//
201a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid lha yi 'khor lor ni// ye shes sems dpa'i de 'od kyis// thugs la sogs pa sad par bya// skar yang de yis thams cad ni// bar ming rab tu gsal bar ro// ba spu'i khyung bu las slong bya// 'od kyis sna tshogs kyang gsol
201a6(rgyud 'grel): lonaslar yang de nyid du bsams te// rab zhugs gsul ba'i gzugasu lha// rnal 'byor de ltar sa mos rtse gcig/ da ni ya shes bdud rtsi 'bab// 'di ni thig le'i rnal 'byor ro// sngar bzhin 'od zer gyis bskul bas// sangs
201b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas tshogs ni yang dag gzhugs// rang gi sa bon rtags las grub// zhu bar gyur ces bsam par bya// rang rig gsang ba'i rtse la// nas tsam gyi ni tshad dag ni// ral gri rang sa bon skyes lha// de dbus yud
201b2(rgyud 'grel): ka ra dang mnyam pa'i// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin phyir// khwa dog lnga ldan bsgom par bya// ji skad brjed pa de yi dbus su// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom par bya// dang por smig rgyu 'dra ba ste// du ba lta bu gnyis pa yin// mkha' snang
201b3(rgyud 'grel): lta bu gsum pa yin// mar me ltar 'bar bzhi pa yin// sprin med na mkha' lta bur ni// rtag tu snang ba lnga pa yin// 'di ltar mtshan ma lnga rnams ni// sems kyis rab tu brtan gyur pas// rnal 'byor pa yi shes par bya// 'gro ba'i don
201b4(rgyud 'grel): ni rab tu bsgrub phyir// sprul pa yi ni dbang ba gyur pas// phan sems snying rje'i bsam pa yis// gzung ba le sogs ma myong bas// bdag nyid rig la brten nas ni// sangs rgyas spro bar bya ba ste// mtshan ma 'am 'od zer las sprul pa//
201b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro// sku gsung ye shes thugs rnams kyi// bdag nyid bsgom la rab brtson pa// rang mtshan lte bar gnas gyur pa// ji ltar ji ltar rang brtan la// oM AHmoM hUM zhes gsal bar+ya// balka byA der gnas blo y+r-i
201b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga bya// 'dir ni kha cig yang dag gnas// rlung dang chu dang dbang chen dang // me yi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// sku sogs sa bon gzhan dag ni// gzhung lugs smra bas brjod po'o// de rjes rang gi ting
202a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gnas// mkhas pas rang sngags dbye ba med// ring min thung ba ma yino// sngags ni 'di ltar gdon par bya// srog gi rlung gis khyab par bya// oM la sogs pa'i sa bon gyi// sku la sogs pa spro bar bya//
202a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad thugs sogs byin brlab bzhin// de rnams gzugs rdo rje sogs kyis// der gnas mchod pa byas nas ni// blta bya bde mchog thob pa yis// rtsol ba'i rlung gis bkug nas ni// rang rang sa bon du gzhug bya// rimo pa
202a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar bya ba ni// so sor rim ni gsum spro ba// brjod pas ma lus spro bar bya// sngags kyi blo ni bsdus byas te// ye shes sa boni ye shes la// kun rnams rtag tu spro bar bya// 'dir ni rnal 'byor kha cig gis// thig le phra mor yang
202a4(rgyud 'grel): dag lda no// chung ngu sogs dbye sbyor ba yis// dang por ma skyes rang bzhin du// sku la sogs pa rnam par brtag/ rang gi sa blon byang chub brtag/ bsam gtan bzlas pa'i tshogs gnas// 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga'o// zhum pa'i sems
202a5(rgyud 'grel): dang le lo dang // rgod pa la ni lhag mthong bya// 'di ltar zhum pas bzung gyur na// lha mo'i glu yis bskul ba ste// rgod pa thig le'i sbyor sogs kyis// de nyid bsgom pa zhi bar bya// dngos po rnam par dpyad pa yis// stong pa nyid ni yid
202a6(rgyud 'grel): la bya/ bsgom pas bskyod pas ngal gyur nas// de rnams zhi bar bya nyid la// 'di ltar tshim pa'i cho ga bya// nyams stobs 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir// spyi bor mtho gang gis spags par// bdud rtsi dkyil 'khor bdud rtsir bcas//
202b1(rgyud 'grel): oM yig dkar po dang ldan lta// bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i 'od dang bcas// de nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin rgyun// rtag tu 'dzag par byed pa ni// srog rdol 'od kyis bkug bya ste// blo ldan gyis sku sogs la dbab// 'di ni tshom byed
202b2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'o// 'di ltar thad cig ngal gso ste// bde zhen gyis ni ma bkrugs par// thog le la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i// ma zhen pa yi sngagasau bzlas bya// gang tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa dang // bsgom pa gtong bar 'dod pa yis// de tshe mchod bstod/
202b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi myang // cho ga bzhin du byas nas ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// mtshan ma'i sa bon las bsdu bya// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ni// cho ga bzhin du rim gyis so// gdod nas ma skyes bsgom bya ste// sku gsung
202b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi bdag nyid do// na mkha'i bzhin du ma gos pa// gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin no// 'di ni las kyi rgyal mchog gi/ ting nge 'dzin du yongs su bsgrags// slar yang smon lam gdab bya ste// sems can don ni nyer 'phel
202b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir// bdag gi bsod nams gang bsags dang // 'jam pa'i rdo rje brten pa yis// 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bdag gyur na// seMn sdug bsngal sgrol gyur cig/ son don thaH phur bu tsheH/ rnaM par rgya lci bas legs grub shog/ sems can 'khor ba ji srid
202b6(rgyud 'grel): du// de srid 'gro la phan byed shog/ chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yi// sku gsum rnam par gnas pa dang // bdag la 'gro ba re ba dang // 'dod pa bdag la sgrub par shog/ 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// skad cig gis ni
203a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du// gdul ba'i thabs ni rig pa yis// snod dang snod min bskang bar bya// gdul b+h+ra ma yin+da kha ni ga ni// khams gsum dag tu byung gyur na// thams cad byang chub lam la ni// de rnams
203a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bzung bar bgyi// 'di ni smon lam mo// // lhag pa'i lha yi sbyor ba yis// ting nge 'dzin las langs nas ni// rnal 'byor yid ni chags med pas// snang ba'i go 'phang
203a3(rgyud 'grel): la gnas te// thams cad rang gi lha gzugs sam// rang gi rigs kyi rjes rim 'am// gzugs stsogs rdo rje'i ngo bo 'am// rang rang dag par rnam par gnas// gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin gyis// rdo rje 'chang chen bdag nyid
203a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams// d+hi ltar thob pa'i yul rnams ni// dogs pa med pa nye bar spyad// 'di ni mtha' yas mchod mchog tu// sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag gsungs// rtag tu bar med sbyor bas na// byang chub 'bras bu ster bar byed//
203a5(rgyud 'grel): zas la sbyor ni sngar bzhin du// bdud rtsi myang ba'i tsho gas brten// 'di ni phyi yi sbyin sreg gam// gzhan nyid kyis kyang bsgre bar bya// yid kyis bsdams pa tsam gyis kyang // legs par brten pas de bzhin spyod// phung po'i bud
203a6(rgyud 'grel): shing bsrog pa yis// ye shes me ru bla na med// bdag nyid mchod pa nyid ni bya// gzhan ma rang gi lhag pa'i lha// rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis// dam tshig 'di ni bder gshegs bzhed// sdom la gnas pas ji ltar rnyed//
203b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dam tshig ma nyams pas// rnyed pas nyin mo 'am mtshan mo ru// legs par spros pas yang dag spyad// gang gis sems can mnyam med don// sangs rgyas mchod pa mchog yin te// gang yang lus lnga sogs pa
203b2(rgyud 'grel): las/ snying rje'i bsam pas bya ba ste// sngags dang phyag rgya'i bad nyid kyis// de kun de yir 'gyur ba ste// lhag pa'i lha yi sbyor bdag nyid// gang nyid thams cad du bya ste// 'di 'am gzhan du sman pa'am// pha yis bu la
203b3(rgyud 'grel): bslab ched du// 'bras bu med lo phan pasems paso// las kyi gnod pa rtsom par byed// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga dang // dngos kun bdag nyid rig pa yis// na mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i sems// gnyis med rnal 'byor min
203b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes 'gyur// don yod grub pa'i sbyor ldan pas// de yi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas te// ji ltar tshul bzhin dbang bskur bya// dam tshig nyams pa blang bar bya// rlung gi ye shes thugs zla ru// khaM skyes sna tshogs rdo rjer gnas// zla
203b5(rgyud 'grel): ba khaM yig bcas bsams nas// 'od zer gyis ni rgyal ba bskul// slar yang 'di ni khyad par te// dbang bskur sngon du song ba yis// bla ma brnyas la sogs nyes pa// bshags dang sbyin dang mi chod ston no// sngar gyi dbang bskur/
203b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du khrus// rang gi 'khor lo'i bdag sbyor ldan// thun mchims gsum du bsgom bya ste// las dang po yis mnyam par bya// rang gis sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// sngar bzhin du ni nyer bsdus te// ye shes 'khor lor
204a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam son pas// shes rab snying rjer ldan pas nyal// nang par nyal las ldang ba na// lha mo'i glu yis bskul ba ste// sngar bzhin bsgom pa sngon 'gro bas// rtag tu sngags kyi bzlas pa brnam// nye ba'i sgrub pa
204a2(rgyud 'grel): nas brtsams te// ye shes cung zad thob bdag po// sngags kyi tshul khrims brtul zhugs ldan// dang po'i las dang 'dra bar bsgomo// spro ba dang ni bsdu bar ldan// slar yang yang dag ye sheso// skad cig gis ni ye shes rdzogs// /
204a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan min rnal 'byor yang dag bsten// so sor dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// rtag tu snang bas phan pa bsgom// 'khor lo bdag nyid gzugs kyis ni// mtshan ma gnyis ni thob gyur pa// dang po'i las can 'dir shes bya/
204a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas re re 'phel ba nau// lhag ma'i rnal 'byor par shes bya// ting 'dzin gsum ni yongs rdzogs pa// snga ma bzhin du las dang po'i/ 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor ston song ba// lhag ma'i mtshams la bsgom pa yi// ye shes
204a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'byin pa dang // slar yang sprul pa'i 'khor sdud pa// gang tshe nyal bar 'dod gyur ces// rnal 'byor pa ni gzhan dag smra// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bri ba 'am// yid kyis sprul par bya ba yang // sku gsung thugs ni
204a6(rgyud 'grel): legs mchod po// cho ga bzhin du der mchod nas// rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// 'khor lo'i dbusu yang dag gnas// 'dod pa'i dngos po bsgrub par bya// de yi rgyu la sems brtan paso// sngar gsungs bdud rtsi 'khyil
204b1(rgyud 'grel): pa spro ba'i khro bo'i 'od zer na mkhar 'bar// 'khor lo'i bdag po shes bya cho ga yis ni rang nyid de yi rnal 'byor ldan// nges par chos kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog/ nyid pa ces pa nyid du rig par bya// log 'dren page/
